English: Aesthetic awareness

Danish: Efter 11 dage, hvoraf de 8 har været i land, har 61 mennesker fortæret en del.
English: After 11 days, 8 of which in harbour, 61 people have eaten quite a bit.

Danish: Efter 25 år og mange lange ture, ville jeg nok betakke mig for at sejle i Nordsøen og det Keltiske hav med Havhingsten.
English: After 25 years and a lot of long trips, I would probably politely decline the chance to sail on the Sea Stallion in the North Sea or the Celtic Sea.

Danish: Efter 25 år samme sted, er der stadig plads til at drømme.
English: After 25 years working in the same place, there is still room to dream.

Danish: Efter 45min opvarmning og udspændning er Tunabåden ude i sin rette form.
English: After 45 minutes of heating and expanding, the Tuna boat has the correct shape.

Danish: Efter 7 timers roning og et par vabler anløb vi Hedeby fredag aften.
English: After 7 hours of rowing and a couple of blisters we arrived at Haithabu Friday night.

Danish: Efter nogle år ændrede jeg interiøret i værelset og knagen blev, sammen med andre ting, anbragt på loftet. her opbevarede jeg aflagt legetøj mv.
English: After a few years I changed the interior in the room and the hook was, along with other things, put in the attic.

Danish: Efter en god nattesøvn på den lokale sportspladsen i Lowestoft på den engelske Nordsøkyst - destinationen efter Ramsgate - skruede skipper Vibeke Bischoff rengørings-bissen på ved morgenmødet, fredag.
English: After a good night's sleep at the local sports field at Lowestoft on the English North Sea coast, the next stop after Ramsgate, skipper Vibeke Bischoff was in a mood for cleaning at the morning meeting on Friday.

Danish: Er der gået længere tid i havn / for anker, bestemmer skipper hvilken vagt som skal starte når vi lægger ud for årer eller sejl.
English: After a longer spell in harbour / for anchor, it is skipper who decides who is to begin when we set off under oars or sail.

Danish: Efter en portion grød og en kop kaffe er vi klar til endnu et døgn på vandet med Havhingsten.
English: After a portion of porridge and a cup of coffee, we are ready for yet another day on the water with the Sea Stallion.

Danish: Efter en kort introduktion til aftenen af direktøren for National Museum of Ireland Pat Wallace, bød Irlands berømte poet og nobelprismodtager Seamus Heaney besætningen velkommen.
English: After a short introduction of the programme, the director of the National Museum of Ireland Pat Wallace, let the famous Irish poet and nobel price winner Seamus Heaney welcome the crew.

Danish: Kort roning ud af havnen og så sejlet op.
English: After a short rowing out of the harbor, the sail came up.

Danish: Efter en weekend i Tyskland med overvældende interesse for både skib og besætning, sætter Havhingsten kursen mod Danmark.
English: After a weekend in Germany with overwhelming interest, and hospitality, the Sea Stallion sets the course for Denmark.

Danish: Efter et stykke tid i vand vil lindens bast kunne tages fra.
English: After a while, the bast from the bark can be removed.

Danish: Efter cirka fire minutter forlader gasterne to og to skibet.
English: After about four minutes the crew abandon ship two by two.

Danish: Efter næsten 30 år i eksil vendte Edward hjem til England, hvor han i 1042 blev kronet som konge af England.
English: After almost 30 years in exile, Edward returned to England where, in AD 1042, he was crowned king.

Danish: Efter næsten et halvt års kløvning, tilpasning, boring og skæring, blev Gislingebåden søsat.
English: After almost half a year of cleaving , chopping, shaping, drilling and carving, the Gislinge Boat was launched.

Danish: Øjesplejsning er færdig og nu er det tid til at lægge rebets sidste kordel.
English: After almost half a year of cleaving , chopping, shaping, drilling and carving, the Gislinge Boat was launched.

Danish: Efter en time begyndte Ture at sætte nogle små kiler ind langs stammens side, og efterhånden blev de større kiler også bragt i spil, og kløvningen gik fremad.
English: After an hour, Ture began to insert small wedges into the line of the split along the side of the oak, gradually increasing their size as the cleaving continued.

Danish: Efter ankomsten til Dublin i 2007 var Havhingsten centrum i en større udstilling om vikingetiden og vores fælles historie.
English: After arriving in Dublin in 2007, the Sea Stallion was the main item of an exhibition about the Viking Age in Ireland and our related pre-history.

Danish: Efter en brandskade kom Rylen til Bådeværftet og fik skiftet ca 40 m bord, enkelte spanter, dæksbjælker og en del dæk.
English: After being damaged by fire, Rylen came to the Boat Yard and had about 40 metres of planking replaced as well as a few ribs, deck beams and some of the deck.

Danish: Efter et stykke tid under vandet i havnen, har fyrretræet suget det vand det kan.
English: After being submerged for a while, the pine has absorbed as much water as it can.

Danish: Efter kogningen blev alt bådtræ tørret og henlagt i omkring 5 år, hvorefter det blev imprægneret med bivoks.
English: After boiling in the solution, all the ship's timbers were dried and then laid aside for about 5 years, after which the wood was impregnated with melted beeswax.

Danish: Efter at han havde bygget vikingeskibe på værftet i en årrække, etablerede Ture og en partner deres eget bådeværft i København.
English: After building Viking ships here at the museum boatyard, Ture founded his own boatbuilding company in Copenhagen together with another boatbuilder.

Danish: Efter Karl den Stores død i 814 var den politiske og økonomiske situation i Frankerriget præget af usikkerhed, og landets forsvar kraftigt svækket.
English: After Charlemagne's death in 814 AD, the political and economic situation in the Frankish Empire was marked by uncertainty and the country's defences were greatly weakened.

Danish: Til sidst bliver bordplankerne hugget til med en bredbil, der i kraft af sin lange æg udjævner overfladen på bordplanken.
English: After cleaving, the pieces are roughly shaped using an axe before being finished with a broad axe, the long edge of which can smoothen the surface of the plank.

Danish: Efter udkløvning bliver stykkerne grovhugget med en retøkse.
English: After cleaving, the pieces are roughly shaped with an axe.

Danish: Efter at have konstateret, at træet var retvokset, besluttede vi at spejlskære bordplankerne på savværk.
English: After confirming that the wood was straight-growing, we decided to radially saw the planks at a saw mill.

Danish: Bådebyggeren har en skabelon med, for at finde den perfekte form til sit kølsvin.
English: After excavation all the various parts of the ship were surveyed.

Danish: Efter fire døgn blæst inde i den lille kystby Howth nord for Dublin uden mulighed for at komme sydpå mod Den Engelske Kanal vågnede Havhingstens besætning op til en svag nordlig vind torsdag morgen.
English: After four days in the little coastal town of Howth north of Dublin with no possibility of sailing south towards the English Channel, the crew of the Sea Stallion woke up on Thursday morning to a light northerly wind.

Danish: Efter søsætning af Gisle i oktober 2015, udførte projektholdet en række testsejladser, for at kunne undersøge bådens sejladsegenskaber.
English: After Gisle's launch in October 2015, the project team carried out a series of sailing and rowing trials in order to establish the boats seaworthiness.

Danish: Efter utallige magtkampe mellem grevskaber i Frankrig blev Vilhelm selv hertug af Normandiet i 1046.
English: After innumerable power struggles between the French Counties, William himself became Duke of Normandy in AD 1046.

Danish: Efter udgravningen blev Hjortspringbåden konserveret og rekonstrueret af Rosenberg.
English: After its excavation, the Hjortspring boat was conserved and physically reconstructed by Rosenberg.

Danish: Efter søsætningen er den faktiske modstand målt ved slæbning af Tilia efter en motorbåd.
English: After launching, the actual resistance was measured by towing Tilia behind a motorboat.

Danish: Efter afsejlingen fra Dublin går kursen mod syd, rundt om Lands End og ind i Den Engelske Kanal.
English: After leaving Dublin, the course will be south, round Land’s End, and into the English Channel.

Danish: Efter lange og fortrolige forhandlinger mellem Nationalmuseet i Dublin og Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde er parterne nu nået frem til et kompromis.
English: After long and secret negotiations between the National Museum in Dublin and the Viking Ship Museum both partners have now reached an agreement.

Danish: Efter Martin Blindheim: Graffiti in Norwegian Stave Churches c.
English: After Martin Blindheim: Graffiti in Norwegian Stave Churches c.

Danish: Efter Martin Blindheim: Graffiti in Norwegian Stave Churches c.1150-c.1350, Oslo 1985, plate XVI
English: After Martin Blindheim: Graffiti in Norwegian Stave Churches c.1150-c.1350, Oslo 1985, plate XVI

Danish: Efter mere end 30 år på vandet, har Roar Ege lagt mange sømil under kølen, inklusive togter til Gotland, Polen og Frankrig, samt utallige dage til søs i de danske farvand.
English: After more than 30 years on the water, Roar Ege has many sea miles under its keel, including voyages to Gotland, Poland and France, as well as countless days on the seas around Denmark.

Danish: Forestil dig at komme til en øde fiskerihavn i Irland klokken fire om natten.
English: After moving ballast into the front of the ship, it is still a bit lee-lurch.

Danish: Den havde angrebet kernen af stammen, lige ved bunden, men prøverne viste også, at den ikke havde spredt sig længere ind i træet.
English: After much careful deliberation, it was decided that the damage was localised in such a small area that the boatbuilders could continue with the production of the stems, using wood from the unaffected area.

Danish: Efter at have foretaget en grundig ødelæggelse samt formentlig fjernet udvalgte dele af gravgodset, blev resten skovlet tilbage i agterskibet.
English: After much of the grave-contents had been destroyed and selected pieces of the grave-goods had probably been removed, the rest were shovelled back into the stern of the ship.

Danish: Efter adskillige angreb på de engelske kyster lykkedes det ham at erobre York.
English: After numerous attacks along the English coast he succeeded in conquering York.

Danish: De blev efter grunding med ufortyndet trætjære inddelt i seks lodrette “striber”, som blev påført forskellige smørelser alle på basis af trætjære og marsvinsolie, da sæltran ikke kunne skaffes i efteråret.
English: After priming with undiluted wood tar, these were divided up into six vertical “stripes”, which were then painted with different treatments, all with a base of wood tar and porpoise oil, as it was not possible to obtain seal oil in autumn.

Danish: Efter 19 timers sejlads fra Portsmouth lå Havhingsten en times sejlads fra havnen i Ramsgate tirsdag morgen, og vi havde stadig ikke modtaget en bekræftelse på, om byen var klar til at modtage os.
English: After sailing for 19 hours from Portsmouth, the Sea Stallion was an hour from Ramsgate harbour on Tuesday morning and we had still not received confirmation that the town was ready to receive us.

Danish: Efter flere timers kamp satte Vilhelm rytteriet ind, og selvom englænderne kæmpede bravt, kunne de som fodfolk intet stille op.
English: After several hours of fighting, William brought his cavalry into action, and even though the English fought bravely, they could – being infantrymen – do nothing.

Danish: Efter Skuldelev måtte sejlet bjerges og årene fattes.
English: After Skuldelev we had to take the sail down and crab the oars.

Danish: Efter nogle forstærkninger af skibet, så det er mindre fleksibelt end i fjor, er skib og besætning så godt som klar.
English: After some reinforcement of the ship, making it less flexible than last year, the ship and crew are as good as ready.

Danish: Efter en overvintring i Dublin med afsejling fra Irland den 29. juni går turen nu hjem til Roskilde - en distance på i alt 1400 sømil.
English: After spending the winter in Dublin and sailing from Ireland on 29 June, the ship is now on its way home to Roskilde – a distance of 1400 nautical miles in all.

Danish: Plankerne har, efter lagring, et vandindhold på omkring 18-20%.
English: After storage, the planks have a water content of ca. 18-20%.

Danish: Efter aftensmaden på kajen, havde vi en kort evaluering.
English: After supper on the quay we had a short evaluation.

Danish: Efter at have indtaget byen York, forlod han byen igen med en aftale om, at lokalbefolkningen skulle levere ham forsyninger og gidsler ved Stamford Bridge øst for York.
English: After taking York, he left the town again having arranged with the local inhabitants that they were to deliver supplies and hostages to him at Stamford Bridge, east of York.

Danish: Efter bueskytterne indstillede skydningen, trådte fodfolket frem, og kampen begyndte for alvor.
English: After the archers had ceased fire, the infantry stepped forward and the battle commenced in earnest.

Danish: Efter at hæren havde samlet kræfter, begyndte kampene for at erobre resten af landet.
English: After the army had recuperated, battles began in order to conquer the rest of the country.

Danish: Efter Slaget ved Hastings, hvor Harold Godwinson mistede livet og Vilhelm Erobreren tog den engelske trone, ønskede både Godwinsons sønner i Dublin og deres fars fætter, den danske konge Svend Estridsen i Roskilde, at true Vilhelms magt.
English: After the Battle of Hastings, when Harold Godwinson was killed and William the Conqueror took the English throne, both Godwinsson's sons in Dublin and their father's cousin, the Danish King Svein Estridsson in Roskilde, wanted to threaten William's power.

Danish: Efter det danske tab af den sydlige Østersøkyst i 1227 blev den skandinaviske søhandel efterhånden overskygget af de fremadstræbende hansestæders omfangsrige handel.
English: After the Danish loss of the southern Baltic coast in 1227, Scandinavian merchant seafaring was gradually overshadowed by the large-scale trade of the enterprising Hanseatic cities.

Danish: Efter Dublintogtet blev Havhingsten i en række år på land, men nu er der igen sejladser med det dragende og berømte langskib.
English: After the Dublin voyages the Sea Stallion spent years on land, but now the famous and longship is sailing again.

Danish: Efter den indledende runde kan man vilkårligt springe til en hvilken som helst ledig plads inden for lillemølle spillet.
English: After the first round the pieces can jump to any free space on the board where the lines meet.

Danish: Efter de første bølger af plyndringstogter erobrede vikingerne sig jord og bosatte sig.
English: After the first wave of plundering expeditions the Vikings conquered land for themselves and settled.

Danish: Denne nordiske kolonisation betød en opblomstring af handelslivet og bykulturen.
English: After the first waves of pillaging expeditions, the Vikings conquered land and settled there.

Danish: Efter de første bølger af plyndringstogter erobrede vikingerne sig jord og bosatte sig.
English: After the first waves of pillaging expeditions, the Vikings conquered land and settled there.

Danish: Efter kristendommens indførelse opstillede man gerne sømærker i form af kors.
English: After the introduction of Christianity, navigation marks were preferably erected in the form of a cross.

Danish: Odo fik efter invasionen omfattende besiddelser i Kent, og visse angelsaksiske træk i den latinske tekst på tapetet tyder på, at den kan være forfattet der.
English: After the invasion Odo was granted extensive lands in Kent and certain Anglo-Saxon features in the Latin text in the tapestry suggests that it can have been composed here.

Danish: Efter søsætningen 2004 roede vi nogle ture i skibet på Roskilde fjord, og det blev kun til en enkelt sejltur det år.
English: After the launch in 2004, we rowed a few trips in the ship on Roskilde Fjord, and there was just the one sailing trip that year.

Danish: Efter tabet af den danske flåde i 1807 måtte der gøres noget drastisk ved manglen på egnet træ til skibsbyggeri.
English: After the loss of the Danish fleet in 1807, drastic measures had to be taken to address the lack of suitable oak for ship-building.

Danish: Efter planken er høvlet ned i rette tykkelse, skal den passes til bådens facon, og den skal passes uden om alle revner og småfejl, der måtte være i emnet.
English: After the plank has been planed to the correct thickness, it is adjusted to the fit the boat's shape, taking account for any small cracks or flaws in the wood

Danish: Efter de indledende testsejladser og sidste års forsøgsrejse til Dublin kan der næppe herske tvivl om, at Havhingstens sejl fungerer efter hensigten.
English: After the preliminary sea trials and last year's experimental voyage to Dublin, there can be little doubt that the Sea Stallion's sail functions as intended.

Danish: Efter genetableringen af Dublin og udviklingen til en velhavende by, blev kontrollen over den, en nødvendighed for enhver konge, der søgte herredømme over hele Irland.
English: After the re-establishment of Dublin and its development into a wealthy town, control of the town became a necessity for any king seeking control over all of Ireland.

Danish: Efter nogen tids brug efterbehandles sejlet med oksetalg der bliver indgnedet på sejlets forside for at gøre den glat.
English: After the sail had been in use for a certain time beef suet was kneaded into the front side to make the surface smooth.

Danish: Efter at agterskibet blev indrettet som gravrum for den afdøde og det personlige udstyr, og forskibet blev fyldt op med dyr (11 heste og 3-4 hunde) og yderligere genstande, blev hele skibet forsynet med et dækkende plankelag.
English: After the stern part had been arranged as a grave for the dead person and his personal equipment, and the foreship had been filled up with animals (11 horses and 3-4 dogs) and other objects, the whole ship was covered with a layer of planks.

Danish: Efter den succesrige udgivelse af bogen om nordmanden Ottars rejser (Ohthere's Voyages) udgiver Vikingeskibsmuseet nu den mindre kendte rejseberetning, der ledsager Ottars beretning i den oldengelske udgave af Orosius' verdenshistorie.
English: After the successful edition of the book on the voyages by the Norwegian Ohthere, Ohthere's Voyages, the Viking Ship Museum now presents the less known travelogue which accompanies Ohthere's report in the Old English version of Orosius' world history.

Danish: Efter den succesrige udgivelse af bogen om nordmanden Ottars rejser (Ohthere’s Voyages) udgiver Vikingeskibsmuseet nu den mindre kendte rejseberetning, der ledsager Ottars beretning i den oldengelske udgave af Orosius’ verdenshistorie.
English: After the successful edition of the book on the voyages by the Norwegian Ohthere, Ohthere’s Voyages, the Viking Ship Museum now presents the less known travelogue which accompanies Ohthere’s report in the Old English version of Orosius’ world history.

Danish: Efter omvisningen kan du gå i 'Bådebyggerens værksted', hvor formidlere og bådebyggere står klar til at hjælpe dig i gang med økse, hammer, kile, kniv, høvl og skebor.
English: After the tour, you can visit the 'Boatbuilders Workshop', where our guides and boatbuilders stand ready to help you use axes, hammers, wedges, knives, planes and augers.

Danish: Efter årets store succes med sejladsen fra Roskilde til Dublin, har Havhingsten brug for nye kræfter.
English: After the year's great success sailing from Roskilde to Dublin, the Sea Stallion needs new hands.

Danish: Efter byggeriet voksede drømmen om at rekonstruere alle fem Skuldelevskibe.
English: After this building process, the dream of reconstructing all five Skuldelev ships began to grow.

Danish: Niels har arbejdet på værftet i to år, og er nået halvvejen mod svendebrevet.
English: After two years at the boatyard, Niels halfway through the apprenticeship and on his way to getting his boatbuilder diploma

Danish: Efter besøget på Lindesnes Fyr returnerede de tre skandinaviske kongehuse i eftermiddag til havnen i Spangereid.
English: After visiting the lighthouse at Lindesnes the three royal families returned to the harbour in Spangereid.

Danish: Da vi havde rorvidjen ude af rorspandet, tog vi roret ud og løftede det op i båden.
English: After we got the rudder withy out of the rudder rib, we could lift the rudder into the boat.

Danish: Efter at havde arbejdet med mange forskellige træbåde, brugte hun to år som naver over hele Europa.
English: After working with many wooden boats she spent two years as a travelling craftsman (naver) all over Europe.

Danish: Efter kølbordene er kløvet ud bliver de hugget ned i tykkelse
English: Afterwards the garboards have been cleaved out and hewn down to size.

Danish: Herefter flytter forskerne til tysk farvand for, i samarbejde med arkæologer fra Archäologisches Landesamt Schleswig-Holstein, at gennemføre undersøgelserne af det andet skibsvrag.
English: Afterwards they will move to German waters, and in cooperation with archaeologists from Archäologisches Landesamt Schleswig-Holstein, investigate the other shipwreck.

Danish: Nå ble Torberg førstemann i arbeidet på skipet helt til det var ferdig.
English: Afterwards Thorberg was the master builder of the ship until she was entirely finished.

Danish: Herefter hugges der, på den modsatte side, hakker med jævne mellemrum, hvorefter kortere stykker kan kløves af.
English: Afterwards, evenly spaced cuts are made into the opposite side, where shorter sections can be cleaved away.

Danish: Herefter kan den tages af, og det sidste kan passes til, så bordplankerne slutter helt vandtæt sammen.
English: Afterwards, it is taken off and the last adjustments made, so that the strakes will be completely watertight.

Danish: Den blev efterfølgende udskiftet til en stivere, tykkere mast.
English: Afterwards, it was replaced with a stiffer, thicker mast.

Danish: Herefter skal den tilpasses bådens form og færdigforarbejdes med økse og høvl, til formen og dimensionen er som på den originale båd.
English: Afterwards, it will be adjusted to fit the boat's shape and finished with an axe and plane, until its form and dimensions match those of the original boat.

Danish: Herefter vil museumsbutikken kontakte dig med anvisninger på returneringen.
English: Afterwards, the Museum Shop will contact you with information on how to return the item.

Danish: Herefter skal bordet i 'svedekisten'.
English: Afterwards, the plank has to be put into the steam chest.

Danish: Fra materialelageret findes den bedste planke, som skæres ud i den rigtige form på båndsaven.
English: Afterwards, the plank is planed to the correct thickness using a thickness planer.

Danish: Herefter høvles bordplanken ned i tykkelse på tykkelseshøvlen.
English: Afterwards, the plank is planed to the correct thickness using a thickness planer.

Danish: Derefter skal plankerne lægges udenpå og klinkes fast.
English: Afterwards, the planks will be placed in position and attached.

Danish: Herefter skal der tænkes og streges, før kølen hugges helt færdig.
English: Afterwards, we must assess the timber and mark it up, before it can be finished.

Danish: Hvis kølen blev færdig før stævnene, blev den omhyggeligt smurt med linolie og opbevaret i skygge, så den ikke skulle tørre ud og flække under solens varme.
English: Again, an axe was used as the primary tool, although the boatbuilders also use chisels when marking specific depths for the cuts and for the finer shaping of the curved ‘wings' that form the keel's outer edges.

Danish: Agger Tange er dannet af de enorme sandmasser, som bølgerne transporterer med langs kysten.
English: Agger Tange was formed of huge sand masses displaced along the coast by the tidal current.

Danish: Aftaler betragtes som bindende, når museet har fremsendt en ordrebekræftelse.
English: Agreements are considered binding when the museum has issued an order confirmation.

Danish: Foran sig har skib og besætning en 1.700 kilometer lang sejlads over Nordsøen og videre gennem de barske farvande nord om Skotland.
English: Ahead a 1,700 kilometre journey across the North Sea and onward through the unforgiving waters North of Scotland awaits ship and crew.

Danish: Den luftdrevne airlift fungerer bedst på større dybder.
English: Air-powered airlifts are better at greater depths.

Danish: Fly som automatisk sender data til DMI.
English: Airplanes which automatically submit data to the DMI.

Danish: Fra Skandinavien kendes moselig fra førromersk og tidlig romersk jernalder, men ingen af disse er fundet sammen med våben, og dette antyder, at de hører hjemme i en anden sfære end den militære.
English: Al-though bodies are found in bogs in Scandinavia that date to the Pre-Roman and Early Roman Iron Age, they are not found with weapons, indicating a non-military context.

Danish: Drømmen om at genskabe Skuldelev 3 opstod allerede under udgravningen, og Kystfareren var den første rekonstruktion, der blev bygget på Vikingeskibsmuseets bådeværft.
English: Aldready during the excavation, the dream of recreating Skuldelev 3 arose and it was the first reconstruction to be built in the Viking Ship Museum's Boatyard.

Danish: Alfred den Store, som blev konge i 878, tvang vikingerne til fred og befæstede London.
English: Alfred the Great, who became king in AD 878, forced the Vikings to make peace and fortified the town.

Danish: Al aptering er lavet i lærketræ
English: All accommodation is made of larch

Danish: Alle aktiviteter foregår indendørs i Vikingeskibshallen.
English: All activities take place indoors in the Viking Ship Hall.

Danish: Alle publikumssejladser foregår efter Søfartsstyrelsens anvisninger.
English: All boat trips are conducted according to the instructions of the Danish Maritime Authority.

Danish: Alle børn kan lave og grille deres egne pølser.
English: All children can make and grill their own sausages.

Danish: Børn skal altid ledsages af en voksen.
English: All children must be accompanied by an adult.

Danish: Alle gaster skal gennemgå sikkerhedskursus og senere vil der blive afholdt en større evakueringsøvelse ude i fjorden.
English: All crewmembers must complete a safety training course, and later on a major evacuation exercise will be conducted out on the fjord.

Danish: Alt krumtræet har ligget på lager i omkring 3 år.
English: All crooked timber has lain in storage for ca. 3 years.

Danish: Alle data gemmes på en harddisk – og alle data sendes til projektets hjemmeside.
English: All data is stored on a hard drive – and send back to the project homepage.

Danish: Alle rabatordninger træder ud af kraft.
English: All discounts are suspended.

Danish: Alt udstyr ordnes, og...
English: All equipment is...

Danish: Alle fire havde været søsyge så længe, at skipper Carsten Hvid frygtede for deres helbred.
English: All four had been seasick so long that skipper Carsten Hvid feared for their health.

Danish: Alle illustrationer tilsendes i digital form: 20 x 25 cm 300 ppi for fotografier og 1200 ppi for tegninger.
English: All images are issued in digital form: 20 x 25 cm, 300 ppi for photographs and 1200 ppi for drawings.

Danish: Alle billederne er optaget af Vikingeskibsmuseet fotograf Werner Karrasch.
English: All images are taken by the Viking Ship Museum's photographer Werner Karrasch.

Danish: Alt sammen så man ikke kan se forskel på denne båd og en original drvkvase - hvis ikke man er meget tæt på.
English: All in all, it's impossible to see the difference between this boat and an original drifter - unless you come very close.

Danish: I alt skal der være otte 'bordgange' - altså antallet af vandrette rækker af planker - i skibet.
English: All in all, there will be eight strakes – in other words, eight rows of planking – in the ship.

Danish: Alt vel ombord
English: All is well.

Danish: Alle marinarkæologer refererede til, hvad vi gjorde i Danmark.
English: All marine archaeologists referred what we were doing in Denmark.

Danish: Alle besætningsmedlemmer er beordret på badevægten medalt deres oppakning og...
English: All members of the crew have been ordered on to the bathroom scales with...

Danish: Hele formiddagen har vi rebet sejl og rebet ud igen - god træning for både de nye besætningsmedlemmer og os gamle, der ikke har sejlet længere ture siden 2009.
English: All morning we have reefed the sail in and then out again - great training for both the new crew members and us old ones, who haven't been sailing the Sea Stallion since 2009.

Danish: Iagttagelser dokumenteres i Bådsmandsdagbogen til brug for den efterfølgende analyse.
English: All observations will be recorded in the boatswain's log for subsequent analysis.

Danish: Så er alle bundstokke sat fast, med fyrretræsnagler og en jernnagle i toppen.
English: All of the floor timbers are secured using treenails made of pine with additional iron nails on the top.

Danish: Alle bordplankerne på drivkvasen har været en tur i svedekisten.
English: All of the planks for the eel drifter have been through the steam chest.

Danish: Alle er de fyldt med tilskuere, og folk med store kameraer løber langs flodens bred.
English: All of them are full with spectators, and people with large cameras run along the river side.

Danish: Det er alle sygdomme der opstår på grund af vejrforholdene, men som også er et resultat af, at besætningen er moderne mennesker som befinder sig under uvante arbejdsvilkår.
English: All of them occurr due to the weather conditions and are a result of the crew being modern people working under conditions to which they are unaccustomed.

Danish: Alle disse faktorer er af afgørende betydning for vandstrømningerne omkring skroget, og de lovede godt for bedre sejlegenskaber.
English: All of these factors are of crucial importance for the movement of the water around the hull and would also seem to imply better sailing capabilities.

Danish: Alle disse informationer er nu tilgængelige fra museets nye hjemmeside.
English: All of this information is now available from the museum’s new homepage.

Danish: Der er altså både tale om ren fornøjelse og et stykke arbejde, som vi gør i fællesskab.
English: All of this is both great fun and hard work, which we tackle together as a group.

Danish: Alt træ er rådnet væk, på nær små rester af egetræ, som er blevet konserveret af salte fra de rustende jernnagler fra bordplankerne.
English: All of this was covered by a burial mound, which also contained a buried longship, placed on top of the grave chamber.

Danish: Alle ordrer sendes med Post Danmark.
English: All orders are sent with Post Danmark.

Danish: Alle dele undersøges med hensyn til funktionsdygtighed, slitage, styrke, brud, reparationer og ændringer i dimensioner.
English: All parts will be inspected for functionality, wear, strength, fracture, need of repair and change in size.

Danish: Roskildepinden: Werner Karrasch, Vikingeskibsmuseet.
English: All photos of the Roskilde Stick: Werner Karrasch, Viking Ship Museum.

Danish: Alle billeder som er brugt på www.vikingeskibsmuseet.dk tilhører museet, er underlagt copyright og må således ikke bruges uden kildehenvisning.
English: All photos used on this website are restricted by copyright and can only be used with clear statement of source of origin.

Danish: Alle fotos: Werner Karrasch, Vikingeskibsmuseet
English: All photos: Werner Karrasch, the Viking Ship Museum

Danish: Samtlige priser gælder kun for engangspublicering, og for en udgave ad gangen.
English: All prices are valid for single publication and single editions only.

Danish: Alle priser i DKK ekskl. moms og porto.
English: All prices i DKK, excl.

Danish: Alle priser i DKK ekskl. moms og porto.
English: All prices in DKK, excl.

Danish: Dokumentationen sker i Rumdagbøgerne, og suppleres af video og fastbillede optagelser.
English: All routines and procedures will be documented in the room logs and by means of films and photographs.

Danish: Alle samlinger af skibssidens planker i langskibet var lavet som såkaldte "tungelasker" - en dekorativ måde at samle plankerne på, som ellers var forbeholdt de bredeste og mest synlige planker i vikingeskibene.
English: All scarfs in the longship were made as so-called "tounge scarfs" - a decorative way of connecting the planks otherwise reserved for the widest and most conspicuous planks in the Viking ships.

Danish: Hvad har I gjort ved roret siden turen til Irland?
English: all teh best Søren, The VIking Ship Museum Boat Yard.

Danish: Bygningerne på Museumsøen var blevet sikret med barrikader af sandsække, men vandet steg til et så højt niveau, at det alligevel trængte ind.
English: All the buildings on the Museum Island was secured with barricades of sandbags, but the water rose to such a high level that the water still got into the buildings.

Danish: Alle besætningsmedlemmer er raske og glæder sig til at komme afsted mod Irland.
English: All the crew are well and looking forward to leaving for Ireland.

Danish: Alle detaljer diskuteret, og for hver beslutning blev der udarbejdet et notat med beskrivelser, tegninger og kildehenvisninger.
English: All the details were discussed, and for each decision, a memorandum was drawn up with descriptions, drawings and references.

Danish: Alle spanterne definerede af cirkelslag kunne indsættes i den skalbyggede bund, som betyder at skibsbygningsmetoden kombinerer et skeletbygningskoncept med et skalbygningskoncept.
English: All the framing elements defined by the arcs could be erected in the shell-based bottom, thus introducing a skeleton-based building concept onto a shell-based bottom.

Danish: Alle møbler var blevet bragt i sikkerhed på 1. sal, mens tunge maskiner blev holdt vandfri ved konstant pumpning.
English: All the furniture had been taken to safety on the 1st floor, while heavy machinery was kept anhydrous by constant pumping.

Danish: Alle hestene er vant til tungt træk, så vi tror naturligvis selv på opgaven", fortæller Mads Bengtsson fra Jydsk Hesteavl Øst, som lægger heste til forsøget.
English: All the horses are used to hauling heavy loads, so naturally we feel confident” says Mads Bengtsson from Jydsk Hesteavl Øst, who are providing the horses for the experiment.

Danish: Alle bevægelige dele skal smøres så ofte som muligt, for at modvirke slitage og skamfiling.
English: All the moveable parts have to be lubricated as often as possible, to prevent chafing, wear and tear.

Danish: Deltagerne på sejladsen udgør skibets besætning, og skal deltage aktivt om bord - ro skibet ud af havn, sætte sejl og måske bemande roret.
English: All the participants crew the boat and will have to take an active part in the sailing, including rowing out of the harbour, setting the sail and perhaps also manning the rudder.

Danish: Alle plankeskarene - sammenføjningerne af skibsplankernes ender - er udformet som kunstfærdige tungeskar.
English: All the plank scarfs - the joints between the ends of the ship's planks - are shaped as elaborate tongue-scarfs.

Danish: Alle plankeskarene – sammenføjningerne af skibsplankernes ender – er udformet som kunstfærdige tungeskar.
English: All the plank scarfs – the joints between the ends of the ship's planks – are shaped as elaborate tongue-scarfs.

Danish: Alle spillere vender det øverste kort ind på midten af bordet.
English: All the players take their top card and turn it over in the middle of the table.

Danish: Alle sejladserne starter klokken 13.00, og Helge Ask forventes tilbage i museumshavnen klokken 16.00.
English: All the sailings will commence at 13:00 and Helge Ask will return to the museum harbour at 16:00.

Danish: Ture og Simon tog et langt træk for at få den sidste bordgang på.
English: All the strakes are in place and Simon and Ture take a well-deserved break.

Danish: De er alle enæggede med længder mellem 33 og 70 cm og med grebtungen i midten af bladet.
English: All the swords are single-edged with lengths of between 33 and 70 cm and with the tang lying in the central axis of the blade.

Danish: Bordplankerne og garneringen er fæstnet til spanterne med egetræsnagler, og der er brugt meget få jernspigre til at holde det forskellige tømmer sammen.
English: All the timbers are fastened to the hull with treenails; very little iron had been used.

Danish: Under disse to konger udvikledes orlogsflåden og blev specielt reorganiseret under Christian IV.
English: All the timbers are fastened to the hull with treenails; very little iron had been used.

Danish: Alle vassallerne har rettigheder i havnebyer, enten langs med den normanniske kyst, eller ved floderne, og vi må forestille os, at det især er disse havne, som har skullet stille skibe.
English: All the vassals had rights in harbour-towns, either along the coast of Normandy or on the rivers, and we must assume that it was these harbours in particular that were expected to provide the ships.

Danish: Helt ud imod stævnen er der også plads til at stuve grej.
English: All the way out in the stem, there is also storage space.

Danish: Alt træ er rådnet væk, på nær små rester af egetræ, som er blevet konserveret af salte fra de rustende jernnagler fra bordplankerne.
English: All the wood had rotted away, apart from small remains of oak wood, which had been preserved by the rust from the rivets in the planks.

Danish: Bevaret er især området agter for masten, hvor klinknaglerne, der har holdt de enkelte bord- eller plankegange sammen, stadig ligger pænt på rækker.
English: All the wood had rotted away, apart from small remains of oak wood, which had been preserved by the rust from the rivets in the planks.

Danish: Alt træværk i fartøjet var rådnet væk, men de mange nagler af jern, som havde holdt skibets planker sammen, lå stadig på deres plads.
English: All the woodwork in the vessel had rotted away, but the many iron rivets, which had held the ship’s planks together, still lay in place.

Danish: Alle disse faktorer er af afgørende betydning for vandstrømningerne omkring skroget, og de vil have indflydelse på skibets generelle sejlegenskaber.
English: All these factors are of vital importance for the water flow around the hull, affecting the ship's overall sailing performance.

Danish: Alle disse faktorer er af afgørende betydning for vandstrømningerne omkring skroget, og de vil have indflydelse på skibets generelle sejlegenskaber.
English: All these factors are of vital importance for the water flow around the hull, affecting the ship’s overall sailing performance.

Danish: Hele denne problemstilling kan nøje følges på Skuldelev 3, der ikke alene har mastesporet bevaret, men også bidevindshuller til sejlets fastgørelse forud i rælingen., og skødehuller agterude til skødets indføring.
English: All these factors can be followed closely on Skuldelev 3, which not only has traces of the mast preserved but also has tacking holes for securing the sail forward at the rail, and sheet holes towards the stern to take the sheet.

Danish: Alle disse variationer må omhyggeligt registreres, samtidigt med at der sejles så meget som muligt på forskellige kurser i forhold til hovedvindretningen, for at teste skibets fart- og manøvreegenskaber samt sødygtighed.
English: All these variants must be carefully recorded, at the same time as sailing as much as possible on different courses relative to the main wind direction in order to test the ship's properties of speed and manoeuvring as well as seaworthiness.

Danish: Alle disse variationer må omhyggeligt registreres, samtidigt med at der sejles så meget som muligt på forskellige kurser i forhold til hovedvindretningen, for at teste skibets fart- og manøvreegenskaber samt sødygtighed.
English: All these variants must be carefully recorded, at the same time as sailing as much as possible on different courses relative to the main wind direction in order to test the ship’s properties of speed and manoeuvring as well as seaworthiness.

Danish: Alle data samles i en supercomputer og udgør grundlaget for meteorologernes beregninger og prognoser.
English: All this data is gathered in a supercomputer and is the base of the meteorologists calculations and forecasts.

Danish: Det er overvældende og helt ubegribeligt med al den sympati
English: All this support is overwhelming and quite impossible to grasp

Danish: Fælles for disse både er, at de alle har en tyndt udhulet træstamme som grundelement.
English: All three boats are built using large tree trunks as a basic construction element.

Danish: Alle tre medier havde selvstændige hjemmesider om projektet og på hver deres måde blev historien fortalt levende og begejstret.
English: All three media had their own web pages on the project and each told the story in their own lively and enthusiastic way.

Danish: Det er karateristisk for alle tre bådfund, at overfladerne er glathøvlede.
English: All three of the boat finds had a characteristic smoothly-planed surface.

Danish: Eller alle tre ting? - Det kommer helt an på, hvad man gerne vil vide!
English: All three? - That depends on what you want to know!

Danish: Turen er planlagt til at slutte umiddelbart før solnedgang.
English: All trips are planned to end just before sunset.

Danish: Alle vejrmeldinger for Nordsøen tyder på, at Havhingsten når Thyborøn søndag morgen.
English: All weather forecasts for the North Sea suggest that the Sea Stallion will reach Thyborøn Sunday morning.

Danish: Alle weekender til og med den 18. juni
English: All weekends until June 18.

Danish: Alt vel.
English: All well.

Danish: Alt gik godt.
English: All went well.

Danish: Kongerne skulle hyldes på Tinge og blev kåret til konger i:
English: Allegiance was sworn to the Danish kings at the Thing in:

Danish: Næsten 95 % af skibet er bevaret, og i de 100 år, hvor skibet har været udstillet, har det været betragtet som en sandfærdig rekonstruktion.
English: Almost 95% of the ship has survived, and in the 100 years it has been on display, it has been regarded as a faithful reconstruction.

Danish: Næsten alle store lastskibe, som ikke forliste på deres rejserute, er fundet nær havne, som var vigtige i middelalderens Danmark, især Roskilde og Hedeby/Slesvig.
English: Almost all large cargo ships, which were not lost en route, were found in the vicinity of prominent medieval Danish ports, namely Roskilde and Hedeby/Schleswig.

Danish: Næsten alle de andre belæg af ordet eyrr i engelske stednavne findes i Nordvestengland, hvor flere af dem betegner sandbanker i floden Lune.
English: Almost all of the other instances of the word eyrr in English place-names are found across the Pennines, many of them referring to sandbanks in the River Lune.

Danish: Næsten alle fartøjer er bygget i enten Trondheim eller Bergen, og endda således at Bergen fortrænger Trondheim som skibsbygningssted samtidig med at Bergen også bliver den politisk og økonomisk set vigtigere af de to byer.
English: Almost all of the ships were built either in Trondheim or Bergen and Bergen replaces Trondheim as their place of building at the same time as Bergen becomes the more important of the two towns from a political and economic point of view.

Danish: Byen lå ved en bæk nær fjorden Slien.
English: Almost all of them were aligned towards the harbour.

Danish: Næsten hvert eneste skridt mod målet skulle trædes ad ukendte veje.
English: Almost every stage of the project was through uncharted terrain.

Danish: Næsten som et mikadospil.
English: Almost like a game of pick-up-sticks.

Danish: Vi er næsten i mål
English: Almost there

Danish: Tæt ved målet.
English: Almost there.

Danish: Historiker Louise Kæmpe Henriksen fra Vikingeskibsmuseets i Roskilde holder med hektiske pletter på kinderne foredrag for børnene i Kirkley and Pakefield Football Club i Lowestoft om Havhingsten og vikingetiden.
English: Almost unable to keep pace, historian Louise Kæmpe Henriksen from the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde is holding a talk about the Sea Stallion and the Viking Age for the children of the Kirkley and Pakefield Football Club in Lowestoft.

Danish: Alene de sikkerhedsmæssige aspekter taler for, at der på denne forsøgsrejse anvendes et sejl rekonstrueret på grundlag af de velafprøvede metoder, som er udviklet gennem de sidste tre årtier på Vikingeskibsmuseet.
English: Alone the safety-related aspects dictate that, on this experimental voyage, use was made of a sail reconstructed on the basis of the well-tested methods, developed during the last three decades at the Viking Ship Museum.

Danish: I vikingeskib langs Grønlands kyst
English: Along Greenland's coast in a Viking ship

Danish: I vikingeskib langs Grønlands kyst
English: Along Greenland’s coast in a Viking ship

Danish: Langs kanterne af plankerne og på skibets indvendige tømmer løber dekorative profiler, selv på steder, som er skjult når skibet er i brug.
English: Along the edges of the planks and on the ship's internal timbers run decorative mouldings, even in places where they are hidden when the ship is in use.

Danish: Langs kanterne af plankerne og på skibets indvendige tømmer løber dekorative profiler, selv på steder, som er skjult når skibet er i brug.
English: Along the edges of the planks and on the ship’s internal timbers run decorative mouldings, even in places where they are hidden when the ship is in use.

Danish: Langs den øverste bordgang ses endnu dele af skjoldremmen til krigernes skjolde, og på 6. planke i bagbord side agter er spor efter en indskåret dekoration.
English: Along the sheerstrake there are fragments of the shield-rack, and on the 6th strake on the port side aft there are traces of a carved decoration.

Danish: Langs gaderne lå små husgrunde med husene gavlvendt mod gaden.
English: Along the streets there were small plots with houses facing the street.

Danish: Undervejs fortælles der om museets arbejde og erfaringer med vikingeskibe.
English: Along the way, hear stories about the Museum's work and experiences with Viking ships.

Danish: På vejen passerer Havhingsten flere historiske monumenter og gør også stop undervejs.
English: Along the way, Sea Stallion will pass several historic monuments and they will also hold some breaks along the way.

Danish: På turen passerede skibet nogle af byens store attraktioner.
English: Along the way, the ship passed many of the city's great attractions.

Danish: På turen passerede skibet nogle af byens store attraktioner, her Bodes Museum på Museum Insel.
English: Along the way, the ship passed many of the city's great attractions; here it can be seen passing Bodes Museum on the Museum Island.

Danish: På rejsen gjorde skibet stop i mange havne, og det var muligt at følge skibes sejlads via satellitkort på Vikingeskibsmuseets hjemmeside.
English: Along the way, the ship stopped at many harbours and it was possible to follow the sailing via a satellite map on the Viking Ship Museum's website.

Danish: Sammen med en række andre byer i Irland, blev Dublin grundlagt af de vikinger, som kom til øerne omkring år 800.
English: Along with other cities in Ireland, Dublin was founded by Vikings coming to the island around the year 800.

Danish: Sammen med resten af bestyrelsen administrerer Bent Lindgaard arven efter skibsreder Carsten Brebøl, som døde i 1997.
English: Along with the rest of the board Bent Lindgaard manages the legacy of shipping magnate Carsten Brebøl, who died in 1997.

Danish: Allerede nu har 15 medier fra Europa og Nordamerika tilmeldt sig og hver dag kommer nye til.
English: Already 15 members of the media from Europe and North America have signed up, and each new day adds to the list.

Danish: Allerede i 1893 sejler den første rekonstruktion af dette skib over Atlanten.
English: Already in 1893 the first reconstruction of this ship sailed across the Atlantic.

Danish: Men allerede det næste billede med sejl - hvor Harold vender hjem til England - er væsentligt forenklet.
English: Already the third picture with the sail, however, – where Harold is returning home to England – the picture is simplified.

Danish: Kan også fås som elektronisk bog.
English: Also available as electronic book.

Danish: Ved hver ende af det afgrænsede område i graven blev desuden fundet to fliser, som hver var groft udskåret med det kristne kors.
English: Also found in this burial site, at either end of the enclosure, were two slabs, each roughly carved with a Christian cross.

Danish: Også Saxo Grammaticus' mange beskrivelser af hærtogterne mod venderne på Østersøens sydkyst, gengivet i Gesta Danorum, optræder langskibene i stort tal, men desværre med meget få konkrete oplysninger.
English: Also in Saxo Grammaticus' many descriptions of the raids made against the Wends on the south coast of the Baltic, recorded in Gesta Danorum, the longships appear in large numbers but unfortunately also with very little concrete information.

Danish: Også Saxo Grammaticus’ mange beskrivelser af hærtogterne mod venderne på Østersøens sydkyst, gengivet i Gesta Danorum, optræder langskibene i stort tal, men desværre med meget få konkrete oplysninger.
English: Also in Saxo Grammaticus’ many descriptions of the raids made against the Wends on the south coast of the Baltic, recorded in Gesta Danorum, the longships appear in large numbers but unfortunately also with very little concrete information.

Danish: Også af hensyn til det referencemateriale, som er skabt gennem rekonstruktionerne af de øvrige fartøjer fra Skuldelevfundet, bør man fastholde et ensartet og fælles metodisk fundament, selv om dette måtte møde kritik.
English: Also with regard to the reference material created through the reconstruction of the other vessels from the Skuldelev site, it is necessary to maintain a uniform and common methodological foundation, even though this may meet criticism.

Danish: Alternativt skrider sammenligningsgrundlaget mellem rekonstruktionerne samt den erfaringsbasis, der er blevet udviklet siden rekonstruktionen af "Skuldelev 3", Roar Ege, i første halvdel af 1980’erne.
English: Alternatively, the standard of reference between the reconstructions, as well as the wealth of experience developed since the reconstruction of 'Skuldelev 3', Roar Ege, in the first half of the 1980s, will be compromised.

Danish: De fleste af husene i Waterford var med lergulve og lerklinede vægge,af samme type som i Dublin.
English: Although actual boundary fences were not always found, there is evidence for continuity of plot orientation, as was the case in Dublin.

Danish: Selvom der endnu mangler at blive afdækket arkæologiske spor i Limerick, er der flere, vigtige fund fra området omkring byen.
English: Although archaeological evidence in the city has yet to be uncovered, there are a number of important finds from the Limerick area.

Danish: Trods forventninger om spændende fund, kom mængden af kanoner, skibsdele og øvrige genstande bag på forskerne.
English: Although archaeologists expected to make exciting discoveries, the number of cannons, ship parts and other objects are surprising.

Danish: Selvom de detaljerede beskrivelser af enkelte skibe er sjældne i sagaerne, vrimler de med beskrivelser af kampscener og livet ombord, og de rummer derfor et rigt kildemateriale til søfartens terminologi og praktiske forløb i tidlig middelalder.
English: Although detailed descriptions of individual ships are rare, the sagas are full of descriptions of battle-scenes and pictures of life on board and they therefore provide a rich source of information about maritime terminology and practical processes in the Early Middle Ages.

Danish: Selvom Dublin begyndte som et center for slavehandel, gennem hvilket slaver, der først og fremmest var inddrevet fra klostrene, blev udskibet til den skandinaviske verden, udviklede byen sig til den mest betydningsfulde handelsby i den vestlige del af vikingernes verden.
English: Although Dublin began as a slaving emporium through which slaves who had been mainly collected at monasteries were shipped out to the wider Scandinavian world, it developed into the most important trading town in the western Viking world.

Danish: Selvom der kendes mange piletyper, var de fleste panserbrydende, og bueskydning var forbundet med krigsførelse snarere end jagt.
English: Although many arrowhead types are known, most were armour-piercing and archery was military related rather than for hunting.

Danish: Selvom mange af dokumenterne er sekundære kilder og bygger på legender og fortællinger, indeholder krøniken også enkelte førstehåndsbeskrivelser af hændelser, som ikke er belyst i andre skriftlige kilder.
English: Although many of the documents are secondary sources and based on legends and stories, the chronicles also contain first-hand accounts of events not illuminated in other written sources.

Danish: Ingen andre fund til belysning af bevæbning, våben og våbenofre i førromersk jernalder i Norden og Østersøområdet har et tilsvarende omfang som Hjortspringfundet, men mindre fund kendes bl.a. fra Passentin i Mecklenburg, Tidevad i Västergötland, Krogsbølle på Fyn og Værebro Å i Nordsjælland.
English: Although no other finds of armaments, weapons and weapon-offerings in the Pre-Roman Iron Age in Scandinavia and the Baltic region are anywhere near as comprehensive as the Hjortspring find, small finds are known from such places as Passentin in Mecklenburg, Tidevad in Västergötland, Krogsbølle in Fyn and Værebro in the north of Zealand.

Danish: Selvom Samsø er kendt for sine kartofler, kommer de ikke på bordet.
English: Although Samsø is best known for its potatoes, they will not be on the table.

Danish: Selvom små save fra vikingetiden og den tidlige middelalder er blevet fundet ved arkæologiske udgravninger, er sav-spor aldrig fundet på skibsfund fra den periode.
English: Although small saw blades dating to the Viking and early Middle Ages have been found archaeologically, sawmarks have never been found on any ship timbers dating from that period.

Danish: Selvom Den angelsaksiske krønike er tavs omkring størrelserne på flådernes skibe, og selvom vi ofte kan have grund til at tvivle på deres præcision, tegner angivelserne dog et billede af, at flådeoperationerne gennem vikingetiden omfatter flere og flere skibe.
English: Although the Anglo-Saxon Chronicle is silent about the sizes of the ships in the fleets and although we often have reason to doubt the precision of the figures quoted, the accounts present a picture that suggests that fleet operations in the course of the Viking Age involve increasing numbers of ships.

Danish: Selvom der ikke fandtes rester af den afdøde sammen med genstandene, forekommer det sandsynligt, at der er tale om en kvinde.
English: Although the human remains were not retained with the artefacts, it is probable that this was the burial of a female.

Danish: Nogle klostre blev aldrig udsat for angreb, og heller ikke alle angreb var lige alvorlige.
English: Although the Irish annals tell of the horror of the Viking raids and the destruction inflicted upon the monasteries, warfare was not new to Ireland.

Danish: Selvom mast og rig ikke blev fundet, var selve skroget forholdsvis intakt.
English: Although the mast and rig were not found, the hull was relatively intact.

Danish: Selvom ændringerne i skrogformen nu er efterprøvet i skibstanken i Trondhjem, mangler vi dog stadig at se om den nye fuldskala rekonstruktion, som bliver bygget i Tønsberg i Norge, vil vise sig at være et mere sødygtigt, mere stabilt og bedre skib.
English: Although the new hull form was tried in a tank test, it remains to be seen if the new full-scale reconstruction which is being constructed in Tønsberg, Norway, will be a more seaworthy, more stable, and better-sailing vessel.

English: Another waiting day in Lowestoft owing to easterly winds was spent training the crew in lowering and raising the mast and rigging

English: Another way of playing is to make the same number of cards of each of the different persons (king, queen etc.), but in this game, the king is the highest card, the queen next-highest, and so on down to the lowest – the pawn.

English: Ansgar's Biography, written by Archbishop Rimbert, is primarily a description of the monk Ansgar’s work as a missionary and his path to the episcopacy.

English: Ansgar's first missionary expedition was in AD 826, during which he spread the Christian message among the Saxons and possibly also the Danes of Southern Jutland.

Danish: Ansgar missionerede blandt saksere, daner og svenskere.
English: Ansgar's missionary work was among the Saxons, Danes and Swedes.

Danish: På nær nogle få træagtige planter voksede træer og buske oprindeligt ikke på Færøerne.
English: Apart from a few tree-like plants, trees and bushes did not originally grow on the Faroes.

Danish: På nær en ofte citeret indskrift på sten nr. 6 fra Århus er der ikke noget i runestensteksterne, som tyder på andet end at den militære søfart var strengt hierarkisk organiseret.
English: Apart from an often quoted inscription on stone, no. 6 from Århus, there is nothing in the runic texts to point to anything other than that military navigation was organised strictly hierarchically.

Danish: Udover Skuldelev 1's stævnparti har bådebyggerne og arkæologerne studeret en grafitti fra en kirkeport i Fortun kirke i Sognefjorden samt stævne fra sen jernalder fundet i Hordaland, ligeledes Vestnorge.
English: Apart from Skuldelev 1’s stem, the boat builders and the archeologists have also studied a piece of grafitti from a church door in Fortun curch in Sognefjorden and stems from the late Iron Age find in Hordaland, which is also in western Norway.

Danish: Bortset fra det mellemstore skibsfund Skuldelev 1, der er bygget i Vestnorge, leverer de undersøgte skibe intet afgørende vidnesbyrd om langdistancekontakter med udenlandske lokaliteter, selvom to af skibene, koggerne fra Kollerup og Skagen, forliste under længere sørejser nær Jyllands nordspids.
English: Apart from the medium-sized Skuldelev 1 ship from western Norway, the examined ships fail to provide definite evidence for long-distance contacts to foreign places, although two of the ships, the Kollerup and Skagen cogs, were lost during longer voyages near the north tip of Jutland.

Danish: Bortset fra runeindskrifterne, kommer langt de fleste skriftlige kilder fra vikingetiden, fra udlandet.
English: Apart from the runic inscriptions, the great majority of contemporary written sources about the Vikings originate from outside Denmark.

Danish: Bortset fra skibsgraven adskiller gravpladsen sig ikke fra størstedelen af de gravpladser, vi i øvrigt kender fra vikingetid i Sydskandinavien, og som er kendetegnet af et generelt beskedent genstandsinventar.
English: Apart from the ship-grave the burial site is not different from the majority of the burial sites we know from elsewhere in South Scandinavia in the Viking Age, and which are characterised by a generally limited artefact-content.

Danish: Udover de to engelsksprogede forskningsserier, Ships and Boats of the North og Maritime Culture of the North, har Vikingeskibsmuseet udgivet en lang række af bøger omhandlende forskellige maritime emner.
English: Apart from the two research series in English, ‘Ships and Boats of the North' and ‘Maritime Culture of the North', the Viking Ship Museum publishes books aimed at communicating research results to the broader community of people interested in maritime archaeology and history.

Danish: Af øvrige steder omtales kun et enkelt fartøj fra Nordland, samt et fra Orust, der lå ganske nær Kongshelle, den nu forsvundne men engang blomstrende norske købstad ved Göta Älv.
English: Apart from these there is only a mention of a vessel from Nordland and one from Orust, which is quite close to Kongshelle, the now-lost but once flourishing Norwegian market town on the Göta Älv.

Danish: Ud over TV-AVISENS og DR Onlines dækning vil det også være muligt at følge togtet minutiøst på Havhingstens egen hjemmeside på adressen: www.havhingsten.dk

English: Archaeological techniques have changed enormously over the last twenty years, in line with technological development.

Danish: Arkæologerne regner med, at der findes spor efter ca. 20.000 bopladser fra stenalderen i de danske farvande.
English: Archaeologists estimate that the remains of some 20,000 Stone Age settlements are to be found in Danish coastal waters.

English: Archaeologists have excavated the newly found Kalverev ship - and it is quite rare that archaeologists have the opportunity to conduct a full underwater excavation and salvage of a ship from Denmark's past.

Danish: Arkæologerne har udgravet lange strimler fladjern med forhuggede huller i, fra vikingetiden.
English: Archaeologists have found long strips of flat iron with holes bored in them, dating to the Viking Age.

Danish: Arkæologerne ved endnu ikke med sikkerhed, hvor stort skibet oprindeligt var, men det vil en mere detaljeret analyse af skibsdelene kunne fortælle meget mere om.
English: Archaeologists still don’t know exactly how large the original ship was, but a more detailed analysis of the ship’s parts should be able to yield more information.

Danish: Dermed er det lykkedes arkæologerne at holde skibets eksistens og position ukendt og hermed blive de første dykkere på skibsvraget.
English: Archaeologists succeeded in keeping the wreck's existence and location unknown, and thus were the first divers on the site.

English: Architectura Navalis Historica aims at studying seven main aspects: form, function, concept, construction, materials, dating and origin, providing information that can be combined into a broader understanding of the wreck material.

English: Around 1030 there seems to have been a period of famine in Norway and there would have been a strong need for ships like this to pick up food supplies in Denmark.

English: Around 1060 AD – during the reign of Svein Edstridson – Aarhus again became an Episcopal residence.

English: Around 1300 BC, the horse-head prow first appears and slightly later, a bird-figure on the backwards-bent gunwale extension also appears; the keel-extension curves markedly upwards forward, while there is still a dipping keel-skeg aft.

Danish: Som kontrolforsøg blev der udsavet fire planker af fyr og eg, der blev grundet med trætjære og derpå påført moderne giftmaling af mærket Hempel “Classic”, der har kobber som effektivt giftvirkemiddel, hvilket svarer til den beskyttelse, der normalt påføres Vikingeskibsmuseets sejlende rekonstruktioner.
English: As a control, four planks of pine and oak were sawn off, primed with wood tar and then treated with a modern chemical preservative, Hempel “Classic”, which has copper as the active preservative substance and is the treatment normally applied to the Viking Ship Museum's sailing reconstructions.
