Danish: Det er som regel også forskibet, der er hårdest ramt af søsyge.
English: As a rule, it is also the foreship crew that is hardest hit by seasickness.

Danish: Som videnskab beskriver arkæologien fortidens kulturhistorie ud fra genstande og andre materielle levn og skaber indblik i sampspillet mellem fortid, nutid og fremtid.
English: As a science, archaeology describes the cultural history of the past through artefacts and other material remains and provides insight into the interaction between the past, the present and the future.

Danish: Som led i Vikingeskibsmuseets eksperimentelle virksomhed, arbejdes bevidst med at rekonstruere og vedligeholde de forsvundne eller næsten forsvundne maritimt relaterede teknologier:
English: As a step in our experimental activities, the Viking Ship Museum works actively to reconstruct maritime related technology which has disappeared:

Danish: Som altid er humøret højt blandt bådebyggerne.
English: As always, the humour amongst the boatbuilders was high.

Danish: Som forsøg er der også brugt lidt lindebasttov til midterskøderne (prierne) og til de råbånd der fæster sejlet til råen med råbåndsknob.
English: As an experiment, a little linden bast rope has been used for the centre sheets ("prierne") and for the robands that fasten the sail to the yard using reef knots ("råbåndsknob").

Danish: Som eksperimentelt bidrag til seminaret gennemførte bådelauget omkring museets Skuldelev 1-rekonstruktion Ottar en forsøgsrejse fra Hedeby til Gdansk.
English: As an experimental contribution to the seminar, the Museum’s Boat Guild for the Skuldelev 1 reconstruction, Ottar, completed a voyage from Hedeby to Gdansk.

Danish: Som arbejdsgrundlag tjente originalbåden på Nationalmuseet i København, Rosenbergs publikation fra 1937, Johannessens skitser og rekonstruktionstegning, samt konsultationer med berørte museumsfolk i Roskilde og København.
English: As basis for the work, the original boat in the National Museum in Copenhagen, Rosenberg's publication from 1937, and Johannessen's sketches and reconstruction drawing were used, and consultations took place with maritime archaeologists in Roskilde and Copenhagen.

Danish: Som arbejdsgrundlag tjente originalbåden på Nationalmuseet i København, Rosenbergs publikation fra 1937, Johannessens skitser og rekonstruktionstegning, samt konsultationer med berørte museumsfolk i Roskilde og København.
English: As basis for the work, the original boat in the National Museum in Copenhagen, Rosenberg’s publication from 1937, and Johannessen’s sketches and reconstruction drawing were used, and consultations took place with maritime archaeologists in Roskilde and Copenhagen.

Danish: Som det ses i Snorri Sturlusons sagatekst om kong Olav Trygvasons ORMR INN LANGI, var netop udformningen af stævnene en af de mest prestigefyldte opgaver i skibsbyggeriet, og har sikkert været genstand for megen diskussion skibsbyggerne imellem.
English: As can be seen from the text in Snorri Sturluson’s saga about Olav Tryggvason’s ORMR INN LANGI, it was precisely the shaping of the stems that was one of the most prestigious tasks involved in shipbuilding and this would certainly have been the object of much discussion between the shipbuilders.

Danish: Som man kan se i Vikingeskibshallen, hvor originalen af det store skib er opstillet, er der kun ca. 25% tilbage af det.
English: As can be seen in the museum hall where the original longskip is exhibited, only about 25% has been preserved.

Danish: Svend måtte flere gange som dansk konge se sig udfordret af Harald Hårderåde, men ved et forlig i 1062 anerkendte de to hinanden som konger af henholdsvis Danmark og Norge.
English: As Danish king, Svein was on several occasions challenged by Harald Hardrada but they became reconciled in AD 1062 and recognised each other as kings of Denmark and Norway, respectively.

Danish: Eliteholdet fra Kajakklubben Nord havde træning og erfaring til at sikre realistiske målinger af Hjortspringbådens fartpotentiale som beskrevet i afsnit 3.5, samt til at give erfaringer med brugen af padlerne sammenlignet med moderne, bredere padler.
English: As described in Section 3.5, the well-trained elite paddlers from the kayak and canoe club Nord ensured realistic records of the speed potential and provided experience for the functioning of the paddles compared to modern, broad paddles.

Danish: Allerede i 1953 var der blevet fundet rester af et vikingeskib i havnen ud for den store vikinge-handelsplads Hedeby ved Schleswig.
English: As early as 1953, remains of a Viking ship were found in the harbour off the large Viking Age trading site of Hedeby near Schleswig.

Danish: Allerede i jernalderen havde man markedspladser, hvor handlende mødtes flere gange om året.
English: As early as the Iron Age there were market places where merchants met several times a year.

Danish: Banen udlægges så den så vidt muligt er fri af strøm eller andre lokale forhold.
English: As far as possible, tacks will be selected which are free of currents and other unusual characteristics.

Danish: Volden er så vidt muligt lagt op ad naturlige vandløb, der fungerede som voldgrave.
English: As far as possible, these were placed alongside natural watercourses which then functioned as moats.

Danish: Fordi han var formand på byggepladsen, modtog han en højere løn end den almindelige bådebygger, kaldet Filungar.
English: As foreman on the building site, he received a higher wage than the ordinary boat builders, who were called Filungar.

Danish: Idet Gislinge III blev bygget som en rekonstruktion af et arkæologisk fund, var der nogle specifikke grænser, der skulle arbejdes indenfor under byggeprocessen.
English: As Gislinge III was built as a reconstruction of an archaeological find, there were specific parameters that had to be respected when building the boat.

Danish: Som jeg før har skrevet om, så var denne sejlads en prøvelse for både skib og mandskab.
English: As I have written before, this voyage was a test for both ship and crew.

Danish: Som jeg hørte en sige på havnen i weekenden; det kan godt være, at vikingerne ikke havde moderne navigations- og kommunikationsudstyr om bord på deres krigsskibe, men havde de haft det, ville de have brugt det… lige som vi gør”.
English: As I overheard someone say on the harbour last weekend; maybe the Vikings did not have modern means of navigation and communication on their war ships, but if they did, they would have used them… just like we are doing”.

Danish: Som det ser ud nu, vil det tage over fem døgn at nå den hollandske kyst.
English: As it looks now, it would take over five days to reach the Dutch coast.

Danish: Da var det yderst vigtigt, at man holdt styr på, hvor langt man havde sejlet og i hvilken retning siden det sidste observerede sted.
English: As it was crucial to keep a check on how far one had sailed and in which direction since the last observed position.

Danish: Så længe organismen er i live, vil den optage nyt C-14, men fra dødsøjeblikket sker der kun henfald; det vil sige, at de radioaktive kulstofisotoper omdannes til almindelige, stabile N-14 atomer.
English: As long as an organism lives it will take up new 14C, but from the moment it dies only decay takes place, i.e. the radioactive isotope converts to stable, ordinary nitrogen atoms 14N.

Danish: Så længe bordet er friskt og vådt kan det tvinges i facon, man kan også bøje planken ved at varme den op over ild og gløder.
English: As long as the plank is fresh and wet, it can be forced into shape but planks can also be shaped by warming them up over fire or hot coals first.

Danish: Som mange sikkert har bemærket, er Havhingsten på sin færd til Dublin forsynet med et ekstra bord placeret oven på …
English: As many have probably noticed, the Sea Stallion on its voyage to Dublin has been equipped with an extra plank, plac…

Danish: Der er som sagt ikke mange store flotte egetræer i de danske skove, så vi synes, vi skylder de få, der er tilbage, at udnytte dem til det yderste.
English: As mentioned above, there are very few large oak trees remaining in the Danish woods, so we think that we owe it to those there still are, to use them in the most effective way possible.

Danish: Som nævnt er begreberne fartroser og krydsforsøg væsentlige i beskrivelsen af et skibs sejlegenskaber.
English: As mentioned, speed rose and beating ability are important concepts when describing a ship's sailing characteristics.

Danish: Som en del af jubilæumsaktiviteterne, sejler Havhingsten ud i det danske sommerland.
English: As part of the anniversary activities, Sea Stallion will sail out into the Danish summer.

Danish: I forbindelse med Havhingstens afsejling fra Dublin, bliver der arrangeret Vikingefestival i hjertet af Dublin.
English: As part of the celebrations for the departure of the Sea Stallion, Dublin City invites you to explore our Viking heritage at Dublin's first Viking Festival.

Danish: Som en del af udstillingen kan besøgende også følge Skjoldungens sejlads via et live-track, som løbende opdateres med skibets position.
English: As part of the exhibition guests can also follow a live-track that is frequently updated with information about the ship's position.

Danish: I Lowestoft kommer efter planerne 16 nye gaster og 16 står af.
English: As planned, 16 new hands will join the ship in Lowestoft and 16 will leave.

Danish: Som forberedelse til byggeriet lavedes forsøg med fremstilling af lindebastsnor og strækprøvning heraf.
English: As preparation for building parts of the boat, various cords from linden-bast were produced and the tensile strength tested.

Danish: Da man ikke kendte til køleskab brugte man at konservere sine madvarer på flere forskellige måder.
English: As refrigerators were unknown, foodstuffs were preserved in several different ways.

Danish: Derfor er det nederste bord "kølbordet" rejst, så det står mere stejlt, end det tilsvarende bord på søsterbåden Oselven.
English: As shown in the cross-sectional drawing, the lowest plank, the garboard strake, is raised so that it has a more upwards slant than the corresponding plank on Bjørnefjord's sister ship, the Oselven.

Danish: Det skyldes i al sin enkelthed, at der er mange vejrstationer på land, mens der er mange hundrede kilometer imellem vejrbøjer og skibe, der observerer vejret, ude i Atlanterhavet.
English: As simple as it is this is due to the fact that there are many weather stations on land while in the Atlantic Ocean the ships and weather buoys observing the weather at sea can be hundreds of kilometres apart.

Danish: På Vikingeskibsmuseets bådeværft kan du opleve vores dygtige og specialiserede bådebyggere i fuld sving med at bygge en rekonstruktion af et vikingeskib.
English: As something special, the boatbuilders are inviting visitors to the Museum to try their own hand at this ancient craft.

Danish: Så snart faktorer som bølger, tidevand, nattemørke og nedrebning spiller ind, forringes krydsegenskaberne mærkbart.
English: As soon as factors such as waves, tides, the dark of the night and reefing down play a role, the tacking properties are sharply reduced.

Danish: Og da gran kun har kerneved kan den benyttes helt ude under barken.
English: As spruce only consists of heartwood, it can be used all way the out to the bark.

Danish: Ifølge Stryhn´s er den: Så godt som hjemmelavet.
English: As Stryhns say, “It’s practically home-made”.

Danish: Helge Ask er, som det første af Vikingeskibsmuseets rekonstruktioner, dekoreret med farver og udskæringer.
English: As the first Viking Ship Museum reconstruction, Helge Ask is decorated with colour and carving.

Danish: Da skroget er en sammenhængende konstruktion kan man ikke påvirke en dimension, uden at det vil påvirke eller give ændringer i andre dimensioner.
English: As the hull form is a coherent structure, one cannot make alterations in one dimension without influencing changes in other dimensions.

Danish: Da den engelske trone ved Edwards død i 1066 i stedet blev givet til Harold Godwinson erklærede Vilhelm krig mod den nye konge.
English: As the latter was given instead to Harold Godwinson on Edward's death in AD 1066, William declared war on the new king.

Danish: Der har, som digtet fortæller, været store forskelle mellem træl, bonde og høvding.
English: As the poem foretells, there were great differences between thrall, farmer and chieftain.

Danish: Da Havhingsten er et 30 meter langt skib, har man valgt at placere en mellemråber ved masten i skibets midte således, at skipper og styrmænd kan komme i kontakt med den forreste del af skibet.
English: As the Sea Stallion is 30 m long, a mellemråber (a middleman) is placed by the mast at the centre of the ship so that skipper and coxswains can contact with bow sections of the ship.

Danish: Togtet over Nordsøen vil være den længste enkeltetape på Havhingstens forsøgssejlads.
English: As the ship arrive at the northern part of Scotland it has made just about half of its way from Roskilde to Dublin.

Danish: Skibet havde spor efter flere mindre reparationer, så skibet havde tydeligvis havde været i brug et stykke tid, før det blev anvendt som gravskib, så det er imidlertid sandsynligt, at skibet selv er blevet bygget i årene omkring 900.
English: As the ship had clearly been used for a while before it was incorporated into the burial - traces were found of several minor repairs - it is therefore likely that the ship itself was built around AD 900.

Danish: Skibet havde spor efter flere mindre reparationer, så skibet havde tydeligvis havde været i brug et stykke tid, før det blev anvendt som gravskib, så det er imidlertid sandsynligt, at skibet selv er blevet bygget i årene omkring 900.
English: As the ship had clearly been used for a while before it was incorporated into the burial – traces were found of several minor repairs – it is therefore likely that the ship itself was built around AD 900.

Danish: Da skibet har flere bordgange, plankerækker, end der kan fastgøres på stævnens sider, er der indsat korte brede plankestykker, der samler flere planker til én, inden de fastgøres på stævnen.
English: As the ship has a greater number of strakes than can be attached to the sides of the stem and stern, short wide pieces of plank have been inserted which gather together several planks into one before they are attached to the stem and stern.

Danish: Da Havhingsten fra Glendalough blev søsat i 2004, var det Hendes Majestæt Dronning Margrethe, der gav skibet sit navn.
English: As the ship was launched in 2004 Her Majesty Queen Margrethe II gave the ship its name.

Danish: De mindre oselvere i dag fører sprydsejl men Bjørnefjord sejler med et råsejl i overensstemmelse med tidligere tiders tradition.
English: As the smaller Oselver boats are not nowadays square-sailed, but sprit-sailed, it was also necessary to adapt a square sail in keeping with earlier traditions.

Danish: Som det mindste fartøj i Vikingeskibsmuseets udstilling, står Skuldelev 6 i skyggen af det store og imponerende langskib, Skuldelev 2.
English: As the smallest vessel in the Viking Ship Museum's exhibition, Skuldelev 6 is overshadowed by the large and impressive longship, Skuldelev 2.

Danish: Som det mindste fartøj i Vikingeskibsmuseets udstilling, står Skuldelev 6 i skyggen af det store og imponerende langskib, Skuldelev 2.
English: As the smallest vessel in the Viking Ship Museum’s exhibition, Skuldelev 6 is overshadowed by the large and impressive longship, Skuldelev 2.

Danish: Da morgendagens vejrudsigt blev kendt, opfordrede skipper og styrmænd straks til indkøb af kolde øl, lejrbålshygge og soven længe dagen derpå.
English: As the weather forecast for the upcoming day was known, the skipper and steersmen immediately suggested the purchase of cold beers, the creation of camp fire spirit, and sleeping in the next morning.

Danish: Da skibets træ var rådnet væk, har vraget ikke kunne dateres ved hjælp af dendrokronologi, som er den normale metode til datering af skibsfund.
English: As the wood from the ship had rotted away, it was not possible to date the ship with the aid of dendrochronology, which is the normal method of dating archaeological finds of ships.

Danish: Som årene går, bliver de forskellige versioner af krøniken mere og mere selvstændige, indtil de efterhånden ophører i det 11. og 12. århundrede.
English: As the years pass by, the various versions of the chronicle become more and more independent, until they come to an end in the 11th or the 12th century.

Danish: Da der ikke findes nordiske skriftlige kilder fra denne periode, kunne man forledes til at tro, at der ikke fandt nogen kontakt sted mellem de to dele af Europa.
English: As there are no Scandinavian written sources from this period, one could be led to believe that there was no contact between those two parts of Europe.

Danish: Imens de ventede på, at stormen skulle drive over, morede mændene sig med at indridse graffiti i gravkammerets vægge.
English: As they waited for the storm to blow over, the men amused themselves by carving graffiti into the walls of the tomb.

Danish: Ifølge Tinna Damgård-Sørensen har Vikingeskibsmuseet dog ikke tænkt sig at bøje nakken.
English: As Tinna Damgård-Sørensen says, the Viking Ship Museum is not going to admit to the will of the Irish for nothing.

Danish: Der var som sædvanlig hektisk aktivitet blandt de frivillige medlemmer af museets bådelaug og enkelte af bådene nåede også en tur ud på Roskilde Fjord.
English: As usual, there was hectic activity among the volunteer members of the museum’s boat guilds and the individual boats also managed to go out sailing on Roskilde Fjord.

Danish: Da vikingetidens skibsbyggere normalt foretrak eg, når de kunne, kan genbruget her blot være udtryk for mangel på byggematerialer.
English: As Viking shipbuilders normally preferred oak, when it was available, the re-use of timber could just be an expression of the lack of suitable ship-building timber.

Danish: Men som vi har set ovenfor, skete væksten snarere i højden og bredden end i længden.
English: As we have seen above, however, growth took place in height and beam rather than in length.

Danish: Da de byggede den samme båd igen, var beddingen allerede på plads og det krævede ikke så meget arbejde at få det hele klar.
English: As we were building the same boat as last year, the stocks were already in position at the boatyard and didn't require a huge amount of work to make ready.

Danish: Ud over tilpasningen lægges der også en uldtråd imellem bordene.
English: As well as making sure they fit precisely, a woolen thread is also inserted between the boards.

Danish: samt ben- og håndledsbeskyttere.
English: as well as shin and wrist guards.

Danish: Ud over graven fra Kiloran Bay er der også fundet begravelser, der inkluderer dyr, ved Machrins på Colonsay.
English: As well as the Kiloran Bay grave, there have also been two other burials with animals found at Machrins on Colonsay.

Danish: samt kastesten og slynger.
English: as well as throwing stones and slings.

Danish: De er, ligesom bundstokkene, fremstillet af krumvokset egetræ.
English: As with the floor timbers, they are also made from crooked oak.

Danish: I 2014 deltog også Havhingsten fra Glendalough i åbningen af en stor vikingeudstilling i Berlin ved at gennemføre en tur ned ad Spree gennem Berlin og en uges 'Åbent Skib' i centrum af Berlin.
English: As yet, no destination has been set for this project, but the summer voyage in 2014 was primarily intended to be a training voyage for the new crew as preparation for the longer voyage.

Danish: Masten var, som det ses på billedet lige tynd nok.
English: As you can see on the photo, the mast was slightly too thin.

Danish: Da ”Åkra” betyder hellig og da vand og bådgrave ofte sættes i forbindelse med vanerne, der var frugtbarhedsgudinder, har graven måske forbindelse til frugtbarhedsdyrkelse.
English: As “Åkra” means holy, and as water and boat graves are often linked with the Nordic deities, the Vaner, who were fertility goddesses, these graves may be associated with a fertility cult.

Danish: Asbjørn tog sammen med to af Svends sønner til den dansk-venlige by York for at finde støtte til at rejse en hær imod Vilhelm.
English: Asbjörn went with two of Svein's sons to the Dane-friendly town of York in order to find support in raising an army against William.

Danish: Men da stammen var åbnet, kunne bådebyggerne se at stammens centrum, marven, var blevet angrebet af en eller anden form for råd.
English: Asger sent a number of samples to Hussvamp Laboratoriet for analysis and the problem was identified as Ox Tongue fungus (Fistulina hepatica).

Danish: Foruden talrige våbenfund er der ved alle de keltiske pladser også menneskeskeletter, der ofte er halshuggede.
English: Aside from numerous finds of weapons, all the Celtic sites also contain human skeletons, often beheaded.

Danish: Spørg i billetsalget hvor dagens håndværker holder til.
English: Ask at the ticket sales where today's craftsman has put up shop.

Danish: Klokken 10.00 lokal irsk tid vinkede de 60 besætningsmedlemmer farvel til deres mange nye venner i Howth, roede ud i den svage vind og satte sejl mod syd i diset vejr med udsigt til en række byger.
English: At 10.00 am local time in Ireland, the 60 crew members waved farewell to their many new friends in Howth, rowed out into the light wind, and set sail for the south in misty weather and the prospect of showery rain.

Danish: Klokken 11.00 vender strømmen ude i det Irske Hav og løber mod syd.
English: At 11.00. the current in the Irish Sea will turn to the south.

Danish: 11.00 på dansk og kl. 13.00 på engelsk.
English: At 11:00 in Danish and at 13:00 in English.

Danish: Kl 22 ror vi efter et par kryds ind til de høje bolværk i Lochinver.
English: At 22 hours we row, after a couple of tacks, in to the high wharf at Lochinver.

Danish: Kl. 23.30 nåede vandet højeste måling: 206 cm højere end et døgn tidligere!
English: At 23:30 the water reached the highest water measurement: 206 cm.

Danish: Kl. 23.30 nåede vandet højeste niveau, der nogensinde er målt: 206 cm over daglig vande!
English: At 23:30 the water reached the highest water measurement: 206 cm.

Danish: Med en længde på 7.7 meter og en bredde på 1,5 meter, havde båden en lastevne på ca. 1 ton – det svarer til fire mænd og ti får.
English: At 7.7m long and 1.5m wide, the boat would have had a cargo capacity of around 1 ton – the equivalent of four men and ten sheep.

Danish: Klokken 8.30 roede det 30 meter lange vikingeskib ud gennem den store industrihavn i Den Helder.
English: At 8.30, the 30-metre-long Viking ship was rowed out through the huge industrial harbour in Den Helder.

Danish: På et senere tidspunkt i bådens liv, har man ombygget den fra fiske- til fragtfartøj ved at sætte en 7. bordgang på.
English: At a later stage in the life of the boat, it was converted from a fishing vessel to a cargo vessel by adding a 7th strake.

Danish: I en tid, hvor færdsel over land var langsom og besværlig, har små både som Gislingebåden, med dens mange forskellige anvendelsesmuligheder, været livsnerven på kysten.
English: At a time when travel over land was slow and cumbersome, small craft like the Gislinge boat would have been the lifeblood of coastal economies, adapting to different purposes as needed.

Danish: I bedste fald - dvs. når bark eller yderste årring er bevaret - kan fældningstidspunktet dateres på halvår.
English: At best - i.e. when the bark or outer tree ring is preserved - the felling date can be determined to within six months.

Danish: I bedste fald - dvs. når bark eller yderste årring er bevaret - kan fældningstidspunktet dateres på halvår.
English: At best – i.e. when the bark or outer tree ring is preserved – the felling date can be determined to within six months.

Danish: I Brede var der i grunden ikke så meget at se - og alligevel var det på sin vis nærmest et historisk besøg.
English: At Brede there wasn't a lot to see, but it was still a historical visit.

Danish: Ved Collins Barracks et par kilometer længere oppe ad floden, gik den store kranoperation igang.
English: At Collins Barracks, a few kilometres up river, a major operation by crane began.

Danish: Ved afslutningen af bådrummet var fæstet en stor kløftet stævn ovenpå bundplanken, hvortil også sideplankerne var fastsyet.
English: At each end of the boat, a large winged stem rested on top of the bottom plank and the ends of the side strakes were attached to this.

Danish: For hvert nyt led kan der forekomme en ny tolkning.
English: At each new stage a new interpretation may emerge.

Danish: Edvards Puciriuss fra Estland er sammen med en gruppe andre bådebygnings interesserede gået i gang med at bygge en båd i fuld skala.
English: At first glance, traditional boatbuilding, open source file sharing and social media may seem a strange combination.

Danish: På Fyns Hoved foregår der således aktiviteter af mere eller mindre sæsonmæssig karakter, hvorimod anløbspladsen ved Ladby formentlig har været af mere permanent og formentlig central betydning for den østvestgående sejlads til Odense.
English: At Fyns Hoved, for example, there is activity of a more or less seasonal character, while the landing place at Ladby was of more permanent and probably more central significance for the east-west-going boat traffic to Odense.

Danish: Pindens skygge vil på en given breddegrad ramme en bestemt cirkel rundt på pladen.
English: At given latitude, the shadow of the pointer will strike a particular circle around the plate.

Danish: Idet Kraka er så lille, er det dog et overskueligt arbejde for så mange medlemmer.
English: At least one Danish warship stands out though by having zero tolerance regarding alcohol onboard.

Danish: Men i hvert fald et dansk krigsskib skiller sig ud ved at have absolut nul-tolerance overfor alkohol om bord.
English: At least one Danish warship stands out though by having zero tolerance regarding alcohol onboard.

Danish: Mindst to gravpladser blev fundet i området, og måske lå en tredje nord for Liffey i det, der nu er Phoenix Park.
English: At least two cemeteries were located in the area and perhaps a third lay north of the Liffey in what is now the Phoenix Park.

Danish: Mange steder findes også skibsvrag - sommetider med last og udrustning.
English: At many sites, we also find shipwrecks - sometimes also the vessels' cargo and equipment.

Danish: Mange steder findes også skibsvrag – sommetider med last og udrustning.
English: At many sites, we also find shipwrecks – sometimes also the vessels’ cargo and equipment.

Danish: Om natten kunne et bål tjene samme formål, og i ufredstid brugte man røgen og ilden fra bål, til at alarmere befolkningen i baglandet om et angreb.
English: At night, a fire could serve the same purpose, and in times of strife the smoke and flames from fires, so-called beacons, were used to alert the population in the hinterland in event of attack.

Danish: Op af dagen kom en kraftig byge indover os; båden krængede voldsomt og vi måtte tage to reb forneden for at formindske sejlarealet.
English: At one point during the day we were hit by very hard rain; the boat swayed from side to side and we had to reef in twice to make the area of the sail smaller.

Danish: På et tidspunkt kom der også et lyn, som jeg rapporterede.
English: At one time there was also lightning, which I reported.

Danish: I området omkring Puck er der fundet flere skibsvrag fra vikingetiden, foruden et vrag, der indeholder to skibsbygningsteknikker - slavisk og skandinavisk.
English: At Puck several Viking Age wrecks have been discovered, including one showing a mix of two shipbuilding techniques - Slavonic and Scandinavian.

Danish: I området omkring Puck er der fundet flere skibsvrag fra vikingetiden, foruden et vrag, der indeholder to skibsbygningsteknikker – slavisk og skandinavisk.
English: At Puck several Viking Age wrecks have been discovered, including one showing a mix of two shipbuilding techniques – Slavonic and Scandinavian.

Danish: I sørejsernes knudepunkter opstod nye, sammensatte kulturer og byer, netværk og fællesskaber.
English: At seafaring's nodal points, complex new cultures, towns, networks and communities emerged.

Danish: Det var derfor ubehageligt for skib og besætning at sejle i. Ved St. Albans Head i Sydengland sejlede vi tæt på land, fordi vi havde sol, frisk vind og strømmen med os.
English: At St Alban’s Head in southern England, we sailed close in to land because we had sun, fresh wind and the current with us.

Danish: Med denne fart ville turen til Thyborøn på cirka 360 sømil tage 15 dage...
English: At that speed, the trip to Thyborøn of about 360 nautical miles would take 15 days....

Danish: Skagen by havde ikke så mange mennesker at handle med, som de andre byer i området.
English: At that time the area was completely desolate because the spit and the area around it was not suited for agriculture.

Danish: Bagerst i billedet ses et kløvestykke der endnu ikke er hugget til planke.
English: At the back of the picture a cleaved section that has not yet been fashioned into a plank can be seen.

Danish: I starten af vikingetiden troede man i Norden på de nordiske guder.
English: At the beginning of the Viking Age, people in the Nordic Countries believed in the Nordic gods.

Danish: På det bedst tænkelige tidspunkt har Vikingeskibsmuseet modtaget en økonomisk saltvandsindsprøjtning, som sikrer Havhingsten fra Glendalough optimale betingelser, når skibet sejler retur fra Dublin til Roskilde til næste sommer.
English: At the best possible moment, the Viking Ship Museum has received a financial shot in the arm that will give the Sea Stallion the best possible circumstances when the ship sails from Dublin to Roskilde next summer.

Danish: På bådeværftet arbejder bådebyggerne på reparationen af vikingeskibet 'Roar Ege' og nordlandbåden 'Rana' med kopier af det originale værktøj og efter de originale metoder.
English: At the boatyard, the boatbuilders are working on repairing the Viking ship, 'Roar Ege' and the Nordland boat, 'Rana', using copies of original tools and working with original methods.

Danish: På værftspladsen skal stammerne kløves med økser, kiler og rå muskelkraft for at blive til de såkaldte 'kløvestykker'.
English: At the boatyard, the logs will be cleaved into halves, then quarters, eights and sixteenths using mallets, wedges and raw muscle power.

Danish: På bådeværftet kommer vi helt tæt på byggeriet og hører historien om, hvorfor der bygges endnu en rekonstruktion af Skuldelev 6.
English: At the boatyard, we will be able to get very close to the building process and hear the story of why a second reconstruction of Skuldelev 6 has been undertaken.

Danish: Ved booking bedes du oplyse navn, adresse, telefonnummer samt evt. e-mailadresse.
English: At the booking, please give us information about your name, address, phone number and if possible your email address

Danish: Ved booking bedes du oplyse navn, adresse, telefonnummer samt e-mailadresse.
English: At the booking, please give us information about your name, address, phone number and if possible your email address.

Danish: Ved booking bedes du oplyse navn, adresse, telefonnummer samt evt. e-mailadresse.
English: At the booking, please give us information about your name, address, phone number and if possible your email address.

Danish: Ønskes kurset givet som gave, tilsendes oplevelsesgavekortet i smuk gaveæske.
English: At the booking, please give us information about your name, address, phone number and your email address.

Danish: I bunden ligger bundstokkene og resten af vejen op til overkanten af bordene sidder oplængerne, som regel én i hver side.
English: At the bottom lie the floor timbers and extending from here to the top edge of the planks sit the futtocks, as a rule with one on each side.

Danish: På fjordens bredeste sted lykkedes det ham i ly af mørket, at lette skibene for last og trække dem over land ud i det åbne hav.
English: At the broadest extent of the fjord he succeeded, under the cover of darkness, in unloading his ships and pulling them over land and out to the open sea.

Danish: På den afbrækkede ende af pinden har der været yderligere et antal fartøjer indridset.
English: At the broken end of the stick some other ships must have been carved.

Danish: Nordmanden Ottar berettede ved Kong Alfred den Stores hof i England om sit liv som høvding i Nordnorge og sine sørejser fra Det Arktiske Hav til Danmark.
English: At the court of King Alfred the Great in England, the Norwegian Ohthere told stories of his life as a chieftain in Northern Norway and of his sea voyages from the Arctic Ocean to Denmark.

Danish: Kølen blev strakt i slutning af juni, og nogle vægte, og efterfølgende sten, var lagt på kølen, for at presse den tilbage til den rigtige facon.
English: At the end of June, the keel was laid and weighted down, initially with metal weights and then later with stones, to press it back down into the desired lines.

Danish: I slutningen af dokumentet er anført, at Vilhelm havde 1000 skibe til sin rådighed til invasionen, plus dem som hver af vasallerne havde lyst til at yde yderligere.
English: At the end of the document it is noted that William had 1,000 ships at his disposal for the invasion, apart from those that each of the vassals might have been willing to supply in addition to the number mentioned in the list.

Danish: I slutningen af udgravningen fandt vi ud af, at der skulle nedsættes en sidste øl inden omsen.
English: At the end of the excavation we wanted to bury the last beer before sales tax was introduced.

Danish: Afslutningen på denne fantastiske rundvisning var, at jeg fik en lille forseglet plastikpose med et stykke vikingeskib på størrelse med en 2-krone.
English: At the end of this fantastic tour I was given a small sealed plastic bag with a piece of Viking ship the size of a coin.

Danish: I model var det muligt at rekonstruere det meste af skrogets øverste dele ved hjælp af en enkelt oplængerskabelon.
English: At the extremities of the hull, the shipbuilders had no problem shaping the missing parts by inserting special frames.

Danish: Vi er i fonden imponerede over de resultater, der er opnået ved togtets første del i 2007, og vi glæder os til at følge resten af dette flotte og ambitiøse eksperimentalarkæologiske projekt.
English: At the Foundation, we are impressed with the results achieved in the first part in 2007, and we look forward to following the rest of this beautiful and ambitious experimental archaeology project.

Danish: I øjeblikket er 8.000.000 kroner på plads.
English: At the moment the museum has 8.000.000 kr.

Danish: På museet er det halvt fyldt og optimismen er stor.
English: At the museum it is half filled and the optimism is big.

Danish: På museets værksteder kan du slå din egen mønt, male et skjold og dekorere en torshammer eller lave kæder med glasperler.
English: At the Museum's workshops you can strike your own coin, paint a shield, decorate a Thor's hammer or make jewellery with glass beads.

Danish: På museets værksteder kan du slå din egen mønt, male et skjold og dekorere en torshammer eller lave kæder med glasperler.
English: At the Museum’s workshops you can strike your own coin, paint a shield, decorate a Thor’s hammer or make jewellery with glass beads.

Danish: Ved kongelig beslutning iværksatte admiralitetet derfor en omfattende nyplantning af nye ege, så kommende generationer kunne sikres en god materialeforsyning.
English: At the order of the king, the Admiralty began the extensive planting of new oaks, so that future generations would be ensured a good supply of materials.

Danish: I den anden ende af pladsen har et større grill-party udviklet sig.
English: At the other end of the pitches a large grill party has started to develop.

Danish: I den anden ende var en hulsten sat fast.
English: At the other end, a stone had been fastened.

Danish: Midtskibs målte det godt 1 m fra undersiden af kølen til overkanten af rælingen.
English: At the same point it measured just over 1 m from the lower surface of the keel to the top of the gunwale.

Danish: Samtidig strammes alle løsnede undervanter op, og dermed skibet er klart til at sejle med sejl igen.
English: At the same time all the loosened lower shrouds are tightened, and the ship is then ready to raise its sail again.

Danish: Samtidig med udgravningen af langskibet fra Hedeby havn, var marinarkæologer i færd med at udgrave det første ikke-skandinaviske langskib, Puck 2 som lå i Gdansk-bugten på den polske kyst.
English: At the same time as the excavation of the longship from Hedeby Harbour, marine archaeologists were in the process of excavating the first non-Scandinavian longship, Puck 2, in the Bay of Gdansk on the Polish coast.

Danish: Samtidig er skibet et eksperiment.
English: At the same time the ship is an experiment.

Danish: Samtidig sker der en nedgang i antallet af bopladser, hvilket fortsætter ind i begyndelsen af germansk jernalder (400 e.Kr).
English: At the same time there is a decrease in the number of settlements, which continues into the beginning of the Germanic Iron Age (AD 400).

Danish: Byen blev samtidigt et vigtigt politisk center, hvor Kongen holdt Råd og lovene blev udstedt.
English: At the same time, London also became an important political centre - it was here that the king held his counsel and laws were issued.

Danish: Byen blev samtidigt et vigtigt politisk center, hvor Kongen holdt Råd og lovene blev udstedt.
English: At the same time, London also became an important political centre – it was here that the king held his counsel and laws were issued.

Danish: Samtidig måler andre instrumenter vindretning, hastighed og meget mere.
English: At the same time, other instruments measured wind direction, speed and much more.

Danish: Samtidig ekspanderede de nordiske samfund – Danmark udviklede sig faktisk til en stormagt i løbet af vikingetiden.
English: At the same time, Scandinavian society was expanding – Denmark became in fact a great power in the Viking Age.

Danish: Samtidig har flere hold fra Havhingsten i de sidste par dage malet nogle store omklædningsrum for klubben.
English: At the same time, several teams from the Sea Stallion have painted some of the club’s changing rooms over the past couple of days.

Danish: Samtidig slækkes bidevindsvanterne, fordi de er monteret på skroget fremme i skibet og dermed trækker masten fremover.
English: At the same time, the close-haul shrouds are loosened because they are mounted on the hull towards the fore end of the ship and therefore pull the mast forwards.

Danish: Samtidig voksede samlingen, og det stod efterhånden klart, at vedligeholdelsen af de mange fartøjer krævede en bådebygger.
English: At the same time, the collection was growing and it became clear that the maintenance of the many craft required a boatbuilder.

Danish: Samtidig er ideen om, at vækst ikke nødvendigvis gør befolkningen lykkeligere helt central og i stedet for udelukkende at opregne landets rigdom i form af det traditionelle mål for landes velstand, bruttonationalprodukt, har man i Bhutan indført et begreb man kalder ”national bruttolykke” en slags lykke-index, som man har indarbejdet i hele landets struktur lige fra skoler til virksomheder.
English: At the same time, the idea that growth does not necessarily make people happier is crucial, and instead of merely enumerating the country's wealth in the form of the traditional measures of countries' wealth, gross national product, Bhutan has introduced a concept called ‘gross national happiness'; a kind of happiness index, which has been incorporated into the country's entire structure, from schools to businesses.

Danish: Samtidig er ideen om, at vækst ikke nødvendigvis gør befolkningen lykkeligere helt central og i stedet for udelukkende at opregne landets rigdom i form af det traditionelle mål for landes velstand, bruttonationalprodukt, har man i Bhutan indført et begreb man kalder ”national bruttolykke” en slags lykke-index, som man har indarbejdet i hele landets struktur lige fra skoler til virksomheder.
English: At the same time, the idea that growth does not necessarily make people happier is crucial, and instead of merely enumerating the country’s wealth in the form of the traditional measures of countries’ wealth, gross national product, Bhutan has introduced a concept called ‘gross national happiness’; a kind of happiness index, which has been incorporated into the country’s entire structure, from schools to businesses.

Danish: Samtidig lægger Vikingeskibsmuseet alle detaljer om byggeriet frit tilgængeligt på website, hvor blandt andet byggetegninger kan hentes.
English: At the same time, the Museum will make all details about the construction freely available online, where the working drawings for the boat are also available for download.

Danish: Og samtidig understreger byggeriet, at der ikke findes nogen entydig sandhed indenfor den eksperimentelle arkæologi.
English: At the same time, the reconstruction process highlights that there is no unique truth in the field of experimental archaeology.

Danish: Samtidig er skibet og sejladserne del af et arkæologisk eksperiment.
English: At the same time, the ship and its voyages are also a part of an archaeological experiment.

Danish: Samtidig med at to personer låser dragløberen omkring en klampe, der sidder på mastefisken.
English: At the same time, two people lock the halyard runner around a clamp on the mast fish.

Danish: Ved historiens kilde: Fundets betydning for beskyttelsen af vores undersøiske kulturarv, og marinarkæologernes arbejde i det iltfattige miljø, der bevarer fortællinger om skibe, søfart og generationers evner og muligheder - lige fra stenalder til i dag.
English: At the source of history: the Skuldelev find's impact on the protection of our underwater cultural heritage and the work of the maritime archaeologists in the oxygen-poor environment, preserving stories of ships, seafaring, the skills and possibilities of generations - right from Stone Age until today.

Danish: Ved forårs- og efterårsjævndøgn er dag og nat lige lange.
English: At the spring and autumn equinox day and night are of equal length.

Danish: Ved sommersolhverv er dagen længst, og ved vintersolhverv er dagen kortest.
English: At the summer solstice the day is longest and at winter solstice the day is shortest.

Danish: Da han rejste, havde sejlskibet kun været kendt i få generationer i Skandinavien, og lange sørejser åbnede en verden af nye muligheder.
English: At the time of his travels, sailing ships had only been known in Scandinavia for a few generations and long sea voyages opened up a world of new possibilities.

Danish: De enkelte skibsdele er i skrivende stund kun delvist blevet dokumenteret, og fundet kan derfor ikke beskrives nærmere endnu.
English: At the time of writing, the individual ship's parts are only partly documented and the find cannot yet be described in more detail.

Danish: De enkelte skibsdele er i skrivende stund endnu ikke blevet dokumenteret, og fundet kan derfor ikke beskrives nærmere endnu.
English: At the time of writing, the individual ship's parts have not yet been documented and the find cannot yet be described in more detail.

Danish: De enkelte skibsdele er i skrivende stund kun delvist blevet dokumenteret, og fundet kan derfor ikke beskrives nærmere endnu.
English: At the time of writing, the individual ship’s parts are only partly documented and the find cannot yet be described in more detail.

Danish: De enkelte skibsdele er i skrivende stund endnu ikke blevet dokumenteret, og fundet kan derfor ikke beskrives nærmere endnu.
English: At the time of writing, the individual ship’s parts have not yet been documented and the find cannot yet be described in more detail.

Danish: I slutningen af vikingetiden/starten af middelalderen, opstod nogle få større byer i Vestnorge, blandt andet Stavanger.
English: At the transition from the Viking Age to the Middle Ages, a few larger towns became established in Western Norway, including Stavanger.

Danish: Drevet af et indædt had til sin magtfulde bror, støttede han op om nordmændenes angreb.
English: At the Tyne, Harold Godwinson's own brother, Tostig, joined the Norwegian army.

Danish: I Tyne sluttede Godwinsons egen bror, Tostig sig til den norske hær.
English: At the Tyne, Harold Godwinson's own brother, Tostig, joined the Norwegian army.

Danish: På Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde er glæden - og taknemmeligheden - stor:
English: At the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde the joy and the gratitude are great.

Danish: På Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde er glæden – og taknemmeligheden – stor:
English: At the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde the joy and the gratitude are great.

Danish: På Vikingeskibsmuseet lægger man ikke skjul på, at det selvfølgelig er risikabelt at sejle i et åbent fartøj den lange vej fra Roskilde til Dublin – ikke mindst når sejladsen går gennem de farligste farvande i Europa – havet nord og vest for Skotland.
English: At the Viking Ship Museum it is no secret that going in an open vessel all the way from Roskilde to Dublin is risky – not in the least when the voyage goes straight through the most dangerous waters in Europe – the sea north and west of Scotland.

Danish: På Vikingeskibsmuseet forsker vi så at sige i fuld skala.
English: At the Viking Ship Museum we do full scale research, so to speak.

Danish: Både i forhold til færdsel, fødekilder og generelle samfundsorganisatoriske aspekter.
English: At the Viking Ship Museum we investigate Man's interaction with the sea.

Danish: På vikingeskibsmuseet udforsker vi menneskets interaktion med havet.
English: At the Viking Ship Museum we investigate Man’s interaction with the sea.

Danish: På Vikingeskibsmuseet tilbyder vi i sommerhalvåret kurser der bringer dig tættere på Vikingetidens håndværk.
English: At the Viking Ship Museum we offer workshops that bring you closer to the crafts of the Viking Age.

Danish: På Vikingeskibsmuseets bådeværft kan du i øjeblikket følge med i byggeriet af to små pramme, som museet håber at bruge til udlejning.
English: At the Viking Ship Museum's boatyard, you can now follow the construction of two small prams, which the museum hopes to hire out.

Danish: På Vikingeskibsmuseet skal skibsdelene 3D-scannes, så alle informationer bliver bevaret til nærmere analyse.
English: At the Viking Ship Museum, the timbers will be 3D scanned, so all information can be saved for more detailed analysis.

Danish: På Vikingeskibsmuseet fremstiller og undersøger vi mange forskellige rebtyper, når vi bygger rekonstruktioner af skibe.
English: At the Viking Ship Museum, we work with producing and examining many different types of rope when we build our Viking ship reconstructions.

Danish: Forsøget er inspireret af gamle sagaer, hvor det blandt andet fortælles at "Sigurd tager en ekstra uld trøje på og går i krig"- men hvor effektiv er en uldtrøje i en sværdkamp?
English: At the Viking Ship Museum, you can try your hand at the fighting techniques mastered by the Vikings during this special week.

Danish: Gå i krigertræning med sværd og skjold - havde du mon overlevet i vikingetiden?
English: At the Viking Ship Museum, you can try your hand at the fighting techniques mastered by the Vikings during this special week.

Danish: På Vikingeskibsmuseet er 'Konge for en dag' startskuddet til en hel uge med ferieaktiviteter værdig for en vikingekonge.
English: At the Viking Ship Museum, “King for a Day” will be the starting point for a whole week of holiday activities worthy of a Viking king.

Danish: I vidjeværkstedet kan du prøve kræfter med at vride vidjer; tovværk lavet af rette, slanke pilegrene.
English: At the withy workshop, you can try your hand at twisting withies, ropes made of straight, slender willow branches.

Danish: Nu skal sejlet svinges hurtigt rundt, så vinden igen kan drive skibet fremad.
English: At this point the sail must be quickly swung round so that the wind is able to drive the boat forward again.

Danish: Vi sejlede på det tidspunkt en 10-12 knob i en temmelig høj søgang.
English: At this time we were sailing 10-12 knots in a high swell.

Danish: I jernalderen ophører skibsbillederne på bronzer, men de fortsætter på nogle helleristningsfelter med det fællestræk, at fartøjernes snabler i begge ender er svagt buede, næsten parallelle og ens for og agter.
English: At this time, ship representations cease to appear on bronzes but they continue in some rock-carving fields with the common feature of horns slightly curved at each end, almost parallel and identical fore and aft.

Danish: Disse små og store høvdinge kunne til tider kæmpe indbyrdes om herredømmet over folk, territorier og økonomiske resurser.
English: At times these major and minor chieftains fought among themselves over the control of people, territories and economic resources.

Danish: Ved hvilken vindstyrke og sejlføring sejler skibet hurtigst?
English: At which wind speed and sail setting does the ship sail fastest?

Danish: Flådeoverfaldene omtales hyppigt, ligesom også etableringen af vinterlejre, udbetalingen af danefæ, og de vekslende politiske alliancer.
English: Attacks by the fleets are frequently mentioned, as are also the establishment of winter-quarters, payment of the Danegeld, and the shifting political alliances.

English: Authentic recordings from Sea Stallion and Ottar's voyage is composed into a soundscape of creaking masts, the noise of the wind, the skipper's command and waves beating against the ship's sides.

Danish: B&W 1 er et kravelbygget fartøj, 26.0 m langt og 6.0 m bredt.
English: B&W 1 is a carvel-built vessel, 26.0 m long and 6.0 m wide.

Danish: B&W 2 er et ca. 27.0 m langt og 7.5 m bredt kravelbygget fartøj, som er bygget ca. 1606.
English: B&W 2 is a ca. 27.0 m long, 7.5 m wide carvel-built vessel, dendro-dated to ca. 1606.

Danish: B&W 2 blev bygget ca. 1606 i området omkring Amsterdam eller et hollandsk påvirket område og viser store lighedstræk med vraget B&W 5, selvom skibenes tværsnit er forskellige i deres form.
English: B&W 2 was built around 1606 in the region of Amsterdam or a Dutch-influenced area and shows strong analogies with B&W 5, though with a different bottom shape, as it displayed an angled garboard.

Danish: B&W 2 blev ombygget i Danmark mellem 1618 og 1622, da et lag egeplanker blev spigret til det oprindelige skrogs klædning med et lag tjærefilt, bestående af dyrehår iblandet tjære og knust glas, ilagt mellem de to lag egetræsplanker.
English: B&W 2 was re-built in Denmark between 1618 and 1622, when a second layer of oak planks had been spiked to the outside of the original hull, with a layer of animal hair (tar mat) in between the two layers of planking.

Danish: B&W 3 udgør resterne af et klinkbygget fartøj, dendrokronologisk dateret til at have været bygget ca. 1606, formodentligt i Danmark.
English: B&W 3 represents the remains of a clinker-built vessel, dendro-dated to have been built ca. 1606, probably in Denmark.

Danish: B&W 4 kan sammenlignes med 1600-tallets skibe som går under betegnelsen smak og andre beslægtede mellemstore fartøjer (15 til 20 m. i længde), som blev anvendt til fragt af gods og passagerer langs med Nordsøen og de indre Hollandske farvande.
English: B&W 4 is comparable with descriptions of a ship-type known as a Smak and other related medium-sized vessels (15 to 20 metres in length), that were used as traders and ferries along the Friesian coastline and the inshore waters of the Netherlands.

Danish: B&W 7 er vraget af et ca. 20.0 m langt kravelbygget skib, dendrokronologisk dateret til ca. 1588.
English: B&W 7 is the remains of a ca. 20.0 m long carvel-built vessel, dendro-dated to ca. 1588.

English: But with the voyage of the Sea Stallion and all the perspective encompassed by the project, this has been the most fantastic adventure that I have ever been involved in as a diplomat", said the Irish ambassador Joe Hayes from the podium, before he and Roskilde’s mayor, Poul Lindor Nielsen, lowered the Time Capsule into the 2-metre deep hole.

English: Claus is one of the few people who was on the Sea Stallion’s first cautious expeditions with sailing trials on the fjord in 2005, the voyage to Norway in 2006, the experimental voyage to Dublin in 2007 – and now he is leaving halfway through this year’s voyage home from Dublin.

Danish: Samtidig med den accelererende urbanisering i Danmark i første del af 1200-årene forsvandt desuden de særegne træk i den nordiske skibsbygningstradition endegyldigt til fordel for en mere funktionel og alment nordeuropæisk byggemåde, der udviklede sig kontinuerligt.
English: Coinciding with the accelerating urbanisation in Denmark during the first part of the 13th century, specific features of the Nordic ship-building tradition finally gave way to a more functional and common northern European design which continued to evolve.

Danish: Men der kunne være stor forskel på hvor meget de var værd og hvordan man betalte med dem.

English: Commodities from the Viking Age are used, including the ingredients that the Vikings brought back from other countries.

Danish: Fælles for dem alle var, at grundlaget for deres opståen eller udvidelse var et helt andet end i de tidligere byer.
English: Common for them all was the fact that the basis for their emergence or expansion was completely different from that of the earlier towns.

Danish: Husene stod tættere og i flere tilfælde bygget op med hovedgaden som byens centrum, og ikke havnen, som det var i de ældre byer.
English: Common for them all was the fact that the basis for their emergence or expansion was completely different from that of the earlier towns.

Danish: Fælles for disse både er, at de alle har en tyndt udhulet stammebåd som grundelement, der er opvarmet og blødgjort over ild, og spændt ud til en ny skrogform.
English: Common to all three boats is that they all have a thin, hollowed-out log boat as their basic component, which is heated and softened over fire and then expanded out into a new hull form.

Danish: Fælles for disse både er, at de alle har en…
English: Common to all three boats is…

Danish: Fælles for disse bygningsværker er, at de fortæller om vikingekongernes økonomi og overgangen til central magt i Danmark.
English: Common to these structures is that they tell us about the economic power of the Viking kings and the transition to centralised power in Denmark.

English: Compared to its length a Viking ship like The Sea Stallion from Glendalough is not that heavy a construction.

Danish: En sammenligning af skibets sejlegenskaber og præstationsevne med andre kendte skibstyper vil perspektivere de muligheder, langskibene tilbød deres samtid,” forklarer museumsdirektøren.
English: Comparing the sailing ability and efficiency of the ship with other known ship types will put a perspective on the possibilities offered by the long ship in the Viking Age,” the museum director explains.

Danish: En sammenligning af skibets sejlegenskaber og præstationsevne med andre skibstyper vil perspektivere de muligheder, langskibene tilbød deres samtid.
English: Comparison of the ship’s sailing qualities and performance with those of other types of ship will put into perspective what the longships offered their time.

Danish: Sammenligninger med tilsvarende genstande i møntdaterede grave og dendrokronologiske dateringer af skibsgravene fra Borre, Gokstad og Tune tyder på, at gravlæggelsen har fundet sted i tidsrummet 900-925.
English: Comparisons with similar objects in coin-dated graves and dendrochronological datings of the ship-graves from Borre, Gokstad and Tune suggest that the burial took place in the period AD 900-925.

Danish: Kompleksitet er det mest iøjnefaldende aspekt ved skibsgraven fra Ladby, der både fremviser stor rejseaktivitet og træk, der kan forklares på lokal baggrund.
English: Complexity is the most conspicuous aspect of the ship-grave from Ladby, which at the same time displays references to travel activity and contains features which can be explained in the local context.

Danish: Lav et dramatisk skjaldekvad om Knud den Stores angreb på London og belejring af byen i 1014.
English: Compose a dramatic skaldic epic about Cnut the Great's attack on London and his laying siege to the town in AD 1014.

Danish: Lav en menu til en vintersolhvervsfest i vikingetiden og en menu til en stor fest i dag.
English: Compose a menu for a winter solstice party in the Viking Age and a menu for a big party today.

Danish: Derfor er komposition og brugen af naturligt lys altafgørende for hans teknik.
English: Composition and use of natural ligh are therefore paramount for his technique.

English: Concrete knowledge of the Vikings' longships

English: Conquering England

Danish: Derfor lukker Vikingeskibsmuseet denne dag for besøgende kl. 14.00.
English: Consequently the Viking Shiop museum closes this day for visitors at 14.00.

Danish: Det har følgelig været vanskeligt få tilstrækkeligt brede bord til at følge samme standard som tidligere.
English: Consequently, it must have been difficult to find sufficiently broad planks to keep to the same, earlier standard.

Danish: Fundsituationen i denne henseende var langt mere gunstig end for eksempel ved udgravningen af en skibskammergrav ved Hedeby nogle årtier tidligere, hvor man ikke kunne få et særlig god indtryk af skibsformen.
English: Consequently, the find circumstances were, in this respect, more favourable than for example those relating to the excavation of a ship chamber burial at Hedeby some decades previously, where an impression of the form of the ship remained very vague.

Danish: Derfor skal man nok være lidt forsigtig med at tro på alt, hvad der står; måske har man overdrevet for at gøre det lettere at få ham helgenkåret.
English: Consequently, we must be rather cautious in believing everything that was written down; perhaps there was some exaggeration in order to make it easier to have him beatified.

Danish: Derfor bruger vi modeller og tegninger, samtidig med at vi undersøger vikingernes byggetradition.
English: Consequently, we use models and drawings while examining the Viking building tradition.

English: Consider what is important for you to include for posterity.

Danish: Overvej, hvad der var vigtigt for dig at få med for eftertiden.

Danish: Betydelige dele af Hjortspringbåden og af våbnene blev optaget ved tørvegravning omkring 1880, uden at det dengang kom til arkæologernes kendskab.
English: Considerable portions of the Hjortspring boat and the associated weapons were removed from Hjortspring Mose during peat digging in about 1880, without the find being brought to the attention of archaeologists.

Danish: Og her har hensynet til skibet og sejladsen vejet tungere end hensynet til den enkeltes ønsker... for vi skal have den bedst mulige besætning om bord på begge etaper".
English: Consideration of the ship and voyage have weighed more heavily than the wishes of the individual… since we must have the best possible crew aboard for both stages of the voyage”.

Danish: Overvejelser og valg af materialer, værktøj og metoder er de samme, uanset om der bygges et vikinge langskib på 30 meter som Skuldelev 2 (Havhingsten) eller et fiske- og fragtfartøj som Skuldelev 6.
English: Considerations about the selection of materials, tools and methods are the same, irrespective of whether the building process concerns a Viking longship of 30 metres, such as Skuldelev 2 (the Sea Stallion) or a fishing and cargo vessel such as Skuldelev 6.

Danish: Både af hensyn til besætningens sikkerhed og af hensyn til de forskningsmæssige resultater, vi ønsker at få ud af alle anstrengelserne,” siger Tinna Damgård-Sørensen, direktør på Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde.
English: Considering both the safety of the crew and the quality of the scientific results we aim to obtain in the course of the efforts”, says Tinna Damgård-Sørensen, director of the Viking Ship Museum.

Danish: I betragtning af de omfattende ressourcer, der krævedes til bygning og udrustning af store lastskibe, må det antages, at disse fartøjer var specielt bygget til handel, især med massegods, og at de ejedes af rige købmænd eller vigtige medlemmer af aristokratiet eller kirken.
English: Considering the vast resources needed for the building and equipping of large cargo ships, one may assume that these vessels were specifically designed for trade, primarily with bulk cargo, and that they were owned by rich merchants or by important members of the nobility or the clergy.

Danish: Resultatet af de skibsarkæologiske undersøgelser på B&W grunden og den efterfølgende analyse af de største vrag viser, at skibsbygningsmetoderne som anvendtes i det nordvestlige Europa var meget anderledes end dem der anvendtes i det sydlige Europa (ofte benævnt det Iberiske-Atlantiske område).
English: Considering the vast resources needed for the building and equipping of large cargo ships, one may assume that these vessels were specifically designed for trade, primarily with bulk cargo, and that they were owned by rich merchants or by important members of the nobility or the clergy.

Danish: Byggeskabelonerne er fremstillet efter tegningen, de skal sikre båden form, mens bordene sættes på.

English: Denmark would go on to concentrate and consolidate its secular and ecclesiastical power, taking possession of the southern Baltic Sea shore, Lübeck and northern Estonia, and thereby fully exploiting its pivotal location between the transport zones of the North and Baltic Seas.

Danish: Alt efter, hvornår du besøger museet, kan du komme i krigertræning, blive klogere på bådebygning, møde smeden eller være med til at udvinde tjære sammen med museets dygtige håndværkere og formidlere.
English: Depending on when you visit the museum, you can go for war training, learn boatbuilding, meet the black smith or help make wood tar with the museum's skilled craftsmen.

Danish: Henlæggelser af større mængder våben og andet udstyr fra hærenheder af varierende størrelse kendes fra adskillige pladser i det nordlige og centrale Europa, herunder Skandinavien.
English: Deposits of large amounts of weapons and other gear associated with armies that vary in size are known from a number of sites in Northern and Central Europe, including Scandinavia.

Danish: Beskriv, hvorledes en politisk magtkamp foregår i dag (eksempelvis præsidentvalg i USA).
English: Describe how a political power struggle is fought today (for example the Presidential Election in the United States.

Danish: Beskriv stridighederne om den danske kongemagt i midten af 1000–tallet, hvor Harald Hårderåde hærgede i Danmark.
English: Describe the dynastic strife in Denmark in the middle of the 11th century, when Harald Hardrada ravaged Denmark.

Danish: Beskriv deres alder, deres tøj, hvad de spiste, hvordan de boede, og hvad de lavede.
English: Describe their ages, their clothes, what they ate, how they lived and what they did.

Danish: Skjaldekvadenes beskrivelse af selve sejladserne er hyppige, men ikke detaljerede.
English: Descriptions of actual navigation are frequent in the scaldic verses but never detailed.

Danish: Design og produktion: Vikingeskibsmuseet i samarbejde med scenograf Sarah Piyannah Cederstrand og det digitale designbureau Yoke.
English: Design and production: The Viking Ship Museum in collaboration with scenographer Sarah Piyannah Cederstrand and the digital design agency Yoke.

Danish: Design dit eget vikingesmykke.
English: Design your own Viking ornament.

Danish: Alligevel stiller størstedelen af den nuværende besætning op til endnu en tørn.
English: Despite all this, most of the current crew want to take another spell anyway.

Danish: Skønt båden i århundreder lå begravet under silt og sand, var skrogets form overraskende velbevaret.
English: Despite centuries spent buried under layers of silt and sand, the shape of the hull was surprisingly well-preserved.

Danish: Gaia har trods sit hårde "politiske" program gennemført en række forskningsorienterede testsejladser.
English: Despite her hard "political" programme, Gaia has completed a series or research-oriented trial voyages.

Danish: Trods sit smalle skrog sejlede Havhingsten i op til 23 m/s og søer på 3-5 m m, uden at tage mere vand indenbords end det relativt let kunne pumpes ud igen.
English: Despite its narrow hull, the Sea Stallion could sail in winds up to 23 metres/sec and swells of 3-5 metres, without taking in more water than could be relatively easily pumped out again.

Danish: Trods sit smalle skrog sejlede Havhingsten i op til 23 m/s og søer på 3-5 m m, uden at tage mere vand indenbords end det relativt let kunne pumpes ud igen.
English: Despite its narrow hull, the Sea Stallion could sail in winds up to 23 metres/sec and swells of 3–5 metres, without taking in more water than could be relatively easily pumped out again.

Danish: På trods af de 800 år mellem byggeriet af Skuldelev 3 og Nordlandsbåde som Rana, findes der en speciel forbindelse mellem de to fartøjer.
English: Despite the 800 year gap between the construction of Skuldelev 3 and Nordland boats like Rana, the two vessels share a special connection.

Danish: På trods af omfattende nedbrydning af træværke,t kunne han fastslå at højen havde indeholdt et skib, som var bygget på samme måde som samtidens traditionelle norske fartøjer.
English: Despite the extensive disturbance and decay of the woodwork he was able to establish that the burial mound had contained a ship, built in the same fashion as contemporary Norwegian vessels.

Danish: Selv om båden var dårligt bevaret kunne det dog observeres, at den var bygget efter 1600-tals byggemetoder.
English: Despite the poor state of preservation, it was possible to observe that the boat was built according to 17th century shipbuilding methods.

Danish: På trods af titlen handler det om meget andet end Hamborg-Bremen Ærkebispesædes historie.
English: Despite the title, it deals with much more than the history of the Hamburg-Bremen Archiepiscopal See.

Danish: Alligevel er det et af de mest bemærkelsesværdige vikingeskibsfund, vi endnu har set.
English: Despite this it is one of the most remarkable Viking ship finds yet seen.

Danish: Detalje af dragespændet, som blev fundet nær Limerick.
English: Detail of head of Kite Brooch found near Limerick.

Danish: Detaljerne for hvordan Vikingeskibsmuseet efterfølgende finder frem til de bedst egnede, er endnu ikke på plads.
English: Details of how the Viking Ship Museum will decide the best qualified have not yet been worked out.

Danish: Udviklingen indenfor landbrug; pløjning, dyrkning, dræning af vådområder samt etableringen af nye skovområder har stor betydning for bevarelsen af fortidsminder og fund af oldsager.
English: Developments in agriculture such as ploughing, cultivation, draining of wetlands and establishment of new wooded areas have great importance for the preservation of artefacts and antiquities.

Danish: Udviklingen indenfor arbejdsteknikker og dokumentation
English: Developments in techniques and documentation

Danish: Diarre forekom på Norgestogtet, men værre tilfælde blev undgået ved hjælp af strenge hygiejneregler omkring madlavningen, uddeling af maden og toiletbesøgene.
English: Diarrhoea occurred during the voyage to Norway, but worse cases were avoided due to strict hygiene rules concerning cooking, serving of food and visits to the toilet.

Danish: Driver
English: Drifting

Danish: Dublin er tilsyneladende blevet grundlagt to gange af vikingerne.
English: Dublin appears to have been founded twice by the Vikings.

Danish: Dublin og det irske kulturministerium har påtaget sig et stort økonomisk ansvar.
English: Dublin City Council and the Irish Ministry of Culture have made generous contributions.

Danish: Dublin var i 900-tallet omkranset af en jordvold, og en ny, større vold blev anlagt rundt om bebyggelsen i 1000-tallet.
English: Dublin was enclosed by an earthen bank in the tenth century, and a second larger bank was built around the settlement in the eleventh century.

Danish: Liffey – Gudenåen i dobbelt størrelse og Dublins lange vandvej - var ved at gå over sine bredder både af begejstring og melankolske byger fra himlen.
English: Dublin’s long water motorway is double the size of Gudenåen and was about to overflow its banks with joy – and the tear drops from the sky!

Danish: Med en velvoksen check fra Carsten Brebøl-fonden er verdens største rekonstruktion af et vikingeskib - Havhingsten fra Glendalough - godt på vej til Dublin.
English: Due to a fat check from the Carsten Brebøl foundation the World's largest reconstruction of a Viking ship - the Sea Stallion from Glendalough - is well on its way to Dublin.

Danish: Med en velvoksen check fra Carsten Brebøl-fonden er verdens største rekonstruktion af et vikingeskib – Havhingsten fra Glendalough – godt på vej til Dublin.
English: Due to a fat check from the Carsten Brebøl foundation the World’s largest reconstruction of a Viking ship – the Sea Stallion from Glendalough – is well on its way to Dublin.

Danish: På grund af en vandstigning på 120 cm siden vikingetiden er bevaringsforholdene utroligt gode for træ og andet organisk materiale, som bevares bedst i fugtige iltfattige omgivelser.
English: Due to a rise in water level of 120 cm after the Viking Age, the conditions for preservation are extremely good for wood and other kinds of organic material, which is best preserved in damp surroundings poor in oxygen.

Danish: På grund af pladsmangel om bord må hovmestrene også købe ind undervejs i sejladsen.
English: Due to lack of space the stewards also have to shop en route during the voyage.

Danish: Med Susåens øgede sedimentation blev Karrebæksminde udhavn for Næstved senest engang i Renæssancen.
English: Due to the increased sedimentation of Susåen, Karrebæksminde became the outport for Næstved sometime during the Renaissance, at the very latest.

Danish: Og med 50-krone sedlens normale popularitet, bliver en af Vikingeskibsmuseets helt store attraktioner sendt ud i utallige hjem, lommer, sparebøsser og portemonnæer.
English: Due to the normal popularity of the DKK 50 note, one of the Viking Ship Museum's major attractions will be sent out to innumerable homes, pockets, money boxes, wallets and purses.

Danish: På grund af de våde og iltfattige omgivelser på og i havets bund, er de genstande der findes dernede meget ofte i en langt bedre stand end det som landjorden kan levere.
English: Due to the wet and oxygen-poor environment on and in the seabed, the objects that are found there are often in much better condition than can be found on land.

Danish: Af forskellige årsager flækkede bådens sider, så udspændningen blev afbrudt!
English: Due to various reasons, the sides of the boat cracked and the expansion was stopped!

Danish: Hertug Vilhelm havde vundet sit første slag på engelsk jord, men kampene skulle fortsætte.
English: Duke William had won his first battle on English soil, but the battles were to continue.
