Danish: Der indgår ikke sejlads i omvisningerne, kun i fantasien.
English: Duration: The Family tours last half an hour and are free for museum visitors.

Danish: Vi har i 10 år drømt om og planlagt at sejle Havhingsten til Dublin... og hjem igen.
English: During 10 years we have dreamed about and made plans for Sea Stallion to sail to Dublin... and back again.

Danish: Gennem 25 år har Werner Karrasch, som fotograf på Vikingeskibsmuseet, dokumenteret skibsbyggerier i mindste detalje, farefulde sejladser i høj sø, tjærebrænding i ekstreme temperaturer og fund fra undersøiske udgravninger.
English: During 25 years as photographer at the Viking Ship Museum, Werner Karrasch has documented shipbuilding in minute detail, risky voyages in high seas, tar burning in extreme temperatures and finds from underwater excavations.

Danish: Lübeck profiterede af en kort, men betydningsfuld periode under dansk overherredømme og protektion fra 1201 til 1225.
English: During a short but significant period of Danish dominance and protection from 1201 to 1225, Lübeck prospered.

Danish: Gennem seks ugers testsejlads vil alle dele af skibet blive grundigt gennemprøvet i de barske farvande, det oprindelige skib blev bygget til at besejle.
English: During a six-week period the ship will be thoroughly tested in the waters the original ship was built to conquer.

Danish: Under sejlads
English: During a voyage

Danish: Ved en arkæologisk udgravning i 1986 fandt man en hemmelig gang, samt et hus fra vikingetid eller middelalder, men kun meget lidt blev undersøgt.
English: During archaeological excavations in 1986 a secret corridor was found together with a house from Viking times or the Middle Ages, but only a small part of this was investigated.

Danish: Ved opstillingen af skibet stod rekonstruktørerne af skibet derfor, forståeligt nok, overfor nogle problemer, som de valgte at løse radikalt.
English: During assembly the reconstructors were understandably faced with problems, to which they applied radical solutions.

Danish: I løbet af fredagen blev mast og rå placeret.
English: During Friday the mast and yard was placed on to the ship aswell.

Danish: Han nåede inden sin død som 95-årig at bygge ca. 365 klinkbyggede både af egetræ i størrelser fra 4 m til 9 m. Jollen blev brugt til småfiskeri og fuglejagt hvortil den var ideel, fordi den med sit stiksværd trukket op kunne komme helt ind på "vandstøvledybde".
English: During his 95-year lifetime he produced some 365 clinkerbuilt boats of oak, ranging in length from 4 to 9 m. The dinghy was used for small-scale fishing and for hunting birds, a purpose for which it was ideally suited because with its daggerboard lifted it could float in extremely shallow water.

Danish: Det var i hans regeringstid, at vikingerne igen fik interesse for England og dermed også London.
English: During his reign the Vikings once more showed an interest in England - and London.

Danish: Det var i hans regeringstid, at vikingerne igen fik interesse for England og dermed også London.
English: During his reign the Vikings once more showed an interest in England – and London.

Danish: I sin regeringstid opførte Vilhelm borgen Tower of London i byens vestlige udkant.
English: During his reign William founded the Tower of London on the western outskirts of London.

Danish: Otte erfarne fritidssejlere med tilknytning til Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde begiver sig i juli og august ud på en rejse i nordboernes kølvand langs den grønlandske syd- og vestkyst.
English: During July and August, eight experienced sailors connected with the Viking Ship Museum will undertake a journey in the wake of the Norsemen along the southern and western coast of Greenland.

Danish: Under opstillingen blev nogle biter afkortet eller samlet af dele, som passede sammen.
English: During reassembly some biti were cut or were put together from parts that seemed to fit together.

Danish: Under opbygningen opstod der derfor vanskeligheder med at få de øverste bordgange, hvor skibet er bredest, til at nå frem til spunningen.
English: During reconstruction, they therefore experienced difficulties with the upper strakes - where the ship is broadest - which could not reach the rabbet.

Danish: Det var langskibe som Skuldelev 2, der i 1000-tallet gjorde det muligt for de danske konger at få fodfæste i England og Irland og som - i et kort tidsrum - med deres overlegne styrke, bandt Danmark, Norge, Sydsverige og England sammen i Knud den Stores Nordsø-imperium.
English: During the 1000’s, it was longships like Skuldelev 2 that made it possible for the Danish kings to gain a foothold in England and Ireland and allowed them – in a very short space of time – to use their superior strength to unite Denmark, Norway, Southern Sweden and England as Canute the Great’s North Sea empire.

Danish: Men i løbet af 1100-årene etablerede tyske købmænd deres egne handelsforbindelser i Østersøområdet.
English: During the 12th century, German merchants established trade relations of their own in the Baltic Sea area.

Danish: I løbet af 1100-tallet brød vikingebander ind i det forhistoriske gravkammer og graverede 30 indskrifter på væggene.
English: During the 12th century, Viking groups broke into this prehistoric tomb and carved 30 inscriptions into the walls.

Danish: I løbet af 1900-tallet blev færøbåden videreudviklet til maskinbåde og kaproningsbåde.
English: During the 20th century, the Faroe boats were developed further as motorboats and for rowing races.

Danish: I løbet af 970'erne beretter Inishfallen-annalerne, at Limericks vikingekonger boede på Scattery Island.
English: During the 970s the Annals of Inishfallen record that Norse kings of Limerick were resident at Scattery Island.

Danish: Sidst på eftermiddagen brød solen igennem skyerne og vi satte sejl i den milde vind.
English: During the afternoon the sun broke through the clouds and we set sail in the mild wind.

Danish: Ved ombygningen blev de oprindelige åreanlæg fjernet, og åretallet reduceret.
English: During the alteration, the original rowlocks were removed and the number of oars reduced.

Danish: Under byggeriet finder bådebyggerne nogle særlige og ukendte øksespor på en bite.
English: During the building process the boatbuilder found some unusual and unidentifiable axe marks on a biti.

Danish: Under byggeriet undersøgte bådebyggerne, hvor mange ressourcer i form af træ, tjære, jern, uld og hamp, der lev brugt til langskibet.
English: During the building process the boatbuilders examined how many resources such as wood, tar, iron, wool and hemp were used for the longship.

Danish: Med de sejladsmæssige udfordringer vi har budt skibet indtil nu, ser det ud til at det har fået en god og acceptabel fleksibilitet, fordelt jævnt gennem hele skibet.
English: During the challenges the ship has been through so far, it looks like we have attained a good and acceptable level of flexibility, evenly spread out down through the ship.

Danish: Alt efter, hvornår du besøger museet, kan du komme i krigertræning, blive klogere på bådebygning, møde smeden eller være med til at udvinde tjære sammen med museets dygtige håndværkere og formidlere.
English: During the craftmanstalk, a skilled craftsman tells you about a piece of craftsmanship, and you get an insight into the craftsman's knowledge and a feel of the cultural heritage and complex knowledge that is the basis of the craft.

Danish: Under craftmanstalk fortæller dagens dygtige håndværker om et stykke håndværk, og du får mulighed for at få et indblik i håndværkerens viden samt få en fornemmelse af den kulturarv og komplekse viden der ligger til grund for de enkelte håndværk.
English: During the craftmanstalk, a skilled craftsman tells you about a piece of craftsmanship, and you get an insight into the craftsman's knowledge and a feel of the cultural heritage and complex knowledge that is the basis of the craft.

Danish: Under craftmanstalk fortæller enten reblæggeren eller træskæren med udgangspunkt i et stykke håndværk fortælle om om et stykke håndværk, og du får mulighed for at få et indblik i håndværkerens viden samt få en fornemmelse af den kulturarv og komplekse viden der ligger til grund for de enkelte håndværk.
English: During the craftmanstalk, the ropemaker or the woodcarver will tell you about a piece of craftsmanship, and you get an insight into the craftsman's knowledge and a feel of the cultural heritage and complex knowledge that is the basis of the craft.

Danish: Om dagen er de fleste på frivagten vågne i starten af en længere sejlads.
English: During the day, most of those off duty are awake at the start of a longer stint.

Danish: Men vi planlægger at gå i land undervejs, så der bliver mulighed for at nyde den medbragte mad eller aftenkaffe.
English: During the evening, the boat will go ashore and allow participants to enjoy food and refreshments brought along.

Danish: Under optagningen og transporten var alt træværket blevet holdt vådt og vel understøttet.
English: During the excavation and transport to the museum, all the boat's timbers had been kept moist and well-supported.

Danish: Da man udgravede mindst ni skibe i Roskildes Havn i 1997 fandt man en runepind.
English: During the excavation of nine ships in Roskilde Harbour in 1997, a rune stick was found.

Danish: Under udgravningen blev alle skibsdele opmålt og dokumenteret, før de blev flyttet og opmagasineret i 2 år.
English: During the excavation, all ship parts were measured and documented before they were removed and placed in storage for 2 years.

Danish: På togtet til Norge i 2006 lærte bådebyggerne således, at skibet gav sig meget, når det sejlede i hårdt vejr.
English: During the expedition to Norway in 2006 the boat builders learnt, for example, that the ship flexes in rough weather.

Danish: I løbet af de første par uger besøgte 70.000 - 80.000 Havhingsten i museumsgården.
English: During the first couple of weeks 70,000 - 80,000 visitors came to see the Sea stallion at Collins Barrack.

Danish: I løbet af de første par uger besøgte 70.000 – 80.000 Havhingsten i museumsgården.
English: During the first couple of weeks 70,000 – 80,000 visitors came to see the Sea stallion at Collins Barrack.

Danish: I første weekend af juni afholdt Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde en stor evakueringsøvelse for besætningen om bord på Havhingsten fra Glendalough.
English: During the first weekend of June the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde held a evacuation drill for the crew members on board the Sea Stallion.

Danish: Ved de indledende øvelser med træforarbejdning blev der lavet padler, skjolde og en tofte, og øksernes ægvinkel blev fastlagt.
English: During the introductory practical woodwork, paddles, shields and a thwart were made, and the tool angle for the axes was determined.

Danish: Under dykkereftersøgningen fandtes endnu en planke, der kan stamme fra middelalderskibet, samt et kraftigt kølsvin fra et andet, yngre fartøj.
English: During the investigations by divers, another plank was found that may come from the medieval ship, as well as a heavy kelson from another, younger vessel.

Danish: Vikingeskibsmuseet har gennem de seneste 30 år bygget rekonstruktioner af alle de fem Skuldelevskibe.
English: During the last 30 years, the Viking Ship Museum has built reconstructions of all five of the Skuldelev ships.

Danish: I den sene vikingetid etableres et system af spærringer i Roskilde Fjord, der gør det muligt at kontrollere søvejen til en af Danmarks største konge- og kirkebyer.
English: During the late Viking Age, a system of barriers are established on Roskilde Fjord, making it possible to control the sea routes to one of Denmark's great royal and ecclesiastical cities.

Danish: I løbet af det næste århundrede blev London den vigtigste by i England.
English: During the next century London became the most powerful town in England.

Danish: I løbet af de næste par måneder, vil bådebyggerne udskifte slidt tømmer og rustne jernnagler.
English: During the next months, the boatbuilders will replace several of the timbers, which are worn, and some of the iron nails which have rusted.

Danish: Ved planlægningen blev følgende parametre prioriteret: autenticitet, seriøsitet, kvalitet og dokumentation, mens tidsfaktoren ikke blev fastlagt på forhånd.
English: During the planning phases, priority was given to the following parameters: authenticity, legitimacy, quality and documentation, while the amount of time, or time-factor, was not fixed in advance.

Danish: Senere, Under Edward Bekenderen og Harold Godwinson, får London endnu større indflydelse, og under Vilhelm Erobreren opnår byen særlige kongelige privilegier.
English: During the reigns of Edward the Confessor and Harold Godwinson, London's significance became even greater, and while William the Conqueror was on the throne, the town acquired special, royal privileges.

Danish: Under reparationen er bordgangen udskiftet med en ny planke, hvis eksisterende årehuller ikke passede til skibets tofter (robænke) og dermed oprindelige åreplacering.
English: During the repair the top strake was replaced with a new plank with oarports that did not fit the thwarts (rowing benches) and the original placement of the oars.

Danish: En vantnål sprang, umiddelbart uprovokeret, under sejladsen.
English: During the sailing a shroud pin broke -apparently unprovoked.

Danish: I samme periode skete der en hævning af de landområder, hvor isen allerede var smeltet.
English: During the same period, land areas from which the ice had already retreated gradually rose as the enormous weight of the ice was released.

Danish: Undervejs på Havhingstens Sejlads til Dublin fører Skipper en logbog.
English: During the Sea Stallion's voyage the Skipper will keep a logbook.

Danish: Undervejs på Havhingstens Sejlads til Dublin fører flere forskellige mennesker ombord en dagbog.
English: During the Sea Stallion's voyage to Dublin several people on board keep a diary.

Danish: I somrene 2005 til 2007 rekonstruerede og byggede Vikingeskibsmuseet tre både fra henholdsvis jernalder og vikingetid.
English: During the sommers from 2005 to 2007, the Viking Ship Museum reconstructed and built three boats from the Iron Age and Viking Age.

Danish: I sommeren 2016 gennemfører Skjoldungens bådelaug og Vikingeskibsmuseet, en forsøgsrejse i Nordboernes kølvand, 560 sømil langs den sydvestgrønlandske kyst fra Nanortalik til Nuuk.
English: During the summer of 2016 the Skjoldungen boatguild and the Viking Ship Museum complete a trial voyage in the wake of the Norse, 560 nautical miles along the southwest coast of Greenland from Nanortalik to Nuuk.

Danish: I sommersæsonen (maj - september) kan din gruppe udfordre hinanden til en dyst i bl.a. at kaste med Thors hammer, lave firtræk, styrte stang og meget andet på plænen foran museet.
English: During the summer season (May-September) your group can compete against each other in Viking games on the lawn in front of the Ship Hall.

Danish: I sommersæsonen udfordres børn og voksnes hænder, evner og sanser i skiftende værksteder, med fokus på vikingernes maritime håndværk.
English: During the summer season chrildren's and adults' hands, skills and senses are put to the test in different workshops, which focus on Viking Age maritime craftwork.

Danish: Gennem hele sommeren sætter vi på skift fokus på de mange forskellige maritime håndværk, vikingernes liv og særlige vikinge-sysler.
English: During the summer, there are different theme weeks at the Viking Ship Museum, where we set focus on the fascinating craftwork of the Vikings.

Danish: I løbet af sommeren er der forskellige temauger på Vikingeskibsmuseet, hvor vi sætter fokus på fascinerende vikingehåndværk.
English: During the summer, there are different theme weeks at the Viking Ship Museum, where we set focus on the fascinating craftwork of the Vikings.

Danish: Gennem hele sommeren sætter vi på skift fokus på de mange forskellige maritime håndværk, vikingernes liv og særlige vikinge-sysler.
English: During the summer, there are various different weekly themes here at the Viking Ship Museum, where we focus on the fascinating craftwork of the Vikings.

Danish: I løbet af sommeren er der forskellige temauger på Vikingeskibsmuseet, hvor vi sætter fokus på fascinerende vikingehåndværk.
English: During the summer, there will be weeks with special themes at the Viking Ship Museum, where we focus on the fascinating craftwork of the Vikings.

Danish: I somrene 2005 til 2007 rekonstruerede og byggede Vikingeskibsmuseet tre både fra henholdsvis jernalder og vikingetid.
English: During the summers from 2005 to 2007, the Viking Ship Museum reconstructed and built three boats from the Iron Age and Viking Age.

Danish: Under træningssejladsen i 2006 afprøvede Vikingeskibsmuseet tanken om at formidle Havhingstens sejlads elektronisk, mens den foregik.
English: During the test cruise in 2006 the Viking Ship Museum tried out the idea of electronically communicating the Sea Stallion’s endeavour as it happened.

Danish: I de tre uger sommertogtet varer, skal den 55 mand store besætning deles om den sparsomme plads om bord på skibet.
English: During the three weeks of the summer voyage, the 55-strong crew will share the limited space available on board the ship.

Danish: Under prøvesejladserne i 2001 foretoges målinger af spændingen i spændtovet og af skrogets vridning under sejlads i smult vande uden bølger.
English: During the trials in 2001, measurements were made of the tension in the stretched rope and the twisting of the hull under navigation in calm waters without waves.

Danish: Undervejs indfører forsøgslederen i forsøgsdagbogen særlige observationer af formodet betydning for resultatet.
English: During the trials, the trial leader will note in the trial log any special circumstances which may affect our interpretation of the results.

Danish: Besætningen skal i løbet af turen indsamle sejladsdata, der senere, i samarbejde med forskere, skal udfylde de huller, der er i vores viden om, hvor svært - eller let - det var at sejle langs den grønlandske kyst i et vikingeskib, der alene drives frem af årer og sejl.
English: During the trip, the crew will also collect sailing data, which will later be used in collaboration with researchers to fill in the gaps in our understanding of how difficult - or easy - it was to sail along the coast of Greenland in a Viking ship, propelled only by oars and sail.

Danish: I løbet af de to dage kombinerer vi teori og praksis, så du måske bliver inspireret til at arbejde videre hjemme.
English: During the two days, we will combine theory and practice, so you can be inspired to continue working further at home.

Danish: I vikingetiden fejrede stormændene et veloverstået togt med en rigtig fest.
English: During the Viking Age, chieftains celebrated a successful voyage with a big feast.

Danish: Gotland var i vikingetiden forbindelsen mellem øst og vest og en af de største handelspladser, hvor varer blev handlet og omladet.
English: During the Viking Age, Gotland was the connection between east and west and one of the major trading centres, where goods were traded and transferred.

Danish: Søfarten forbandt forskellige kulturer, formidlede vidt forskellige varer, og fremkaldte kulturelle forandringer på tværs af verden i vikingetiden.
English: During the Viking Age, seafaring connected different cultures, allowed the diffusion of widely varying trade goods, and ignited cultural changes across the globe.

Danish: I vikingetiden og middelalderen var jern, som blev produceret i Danmark, for det meste udvundet af myremalm.
English: During the Viking Age, the majority of the iron in Scandinavia was produced from bog ore.

Danish: Vikingeskibene blev i vikingetiden sænket på tværs af sejlrenden ind mod den vigtige handelsby Roskilde, som en spærring mod eventuelle indtrængende fjender.
English: During the Viking Age, the Skuldelev ships were scuttled across a sailing channel on the way to the important trading town at Roskilde, as a defence against seaborne enemies.

Danish: Undervejs på togtet vil Vikingeskibsmuseet være behjælpelig med pressemateriale og kontakt til skibet.
English: During the voyage the Viking Ship Museum will assist with press material and contact with the ship's crew.

Danish: Under forsøgsrejsen skal hvert rum dokumentere de funktioner og arbejdsrutiner, der udvikles under håndtering af sejlet, rejsning og lægning af masten, roning og håndtering af årer samt kommunikation gennem skibet.
English: During the voyage, each room will document the various functions and procedures developed while handling the sail, raising and lowering the mast, handling the oars, rowing, and communicating along the length of the ship.

Danish: Under rejsen vurderes skibet som en fungerende helhed.
English: During the voyage, the ship will be assessed as a functioning entity.

Danish: På vikingetidens togter var tørret og røget fisk og kød en fast del af kosten til søs.
English: During the voyages of the Viking Age, dried and smoked fish and meat were a regular part of the diet at sea.

Danish: Under hele forløbet er det muligt at få svar på naturlige spørgsmål:
English: During the week, you can get answers to questions:

Danish: Gennem hele perioden med nordiske vikingekonger i York havde man ærkebisper i byen.
English: During the whole period of Nordic kings in York there were also archbishops here.

Danish: Kongens tilknytning til Ribe understreges igennem hele perioden af en række fund af mønter.
English: During the whole period, the King's connection to Ribe is underlined by a series of finds of coins.

Danish: Under deres herredømme blev Dublin den vigtigste by i Irland og centrum for vikingernes udvidelsern og handel mod vest.
English: During their reign Dublin became the most important town in Ireland as well as a hub for the western Viking expansion and trade.

Danish: Under samme dramatiske omstændigheder mistede det store engelske linieskib St. George i øvrigt dets master og dets kæmpestore ror.
English: During these same dramatic circumstances, the large British ship of the line, St. George, also lost its masts and its enormous rudder.

Danish: Under disse togter sejler skibene kun under sejl og årer, bortset fra nogle få slæbestrækninger for motor.
English: During these voyages, the ships use only sail and oars, apart from a few stretches when they are towed under motor power.

Danish: I løbet af de fire uger i juli 2006 tilbagelagde Havhingsten ca. 830 sømil over grund (1.540 km) og kom så vidt omkring som Læsø, Bassholmen i Bohuslän i Sverige, Oslo, Tønsberg, Kristiansand, Thyborøn og Løgstør.
English: During those four weeks of July 2006 the Sea Stallion went approximately 830 nautical miles (1,540 kilometres), travelling as widely as Læsø, Bassholmen in Bohuslän in Sweden, Oslo, Tønsberg, Kristiansand, Thyborøn and Løgstør.

Danish: Hollandske og danske historiske kilder peger på en mulig identifikation af B&W 1 som værende vraget af den forlængede hollandske bojert De Jager, som er nævnt i auktionsprotokoller fra byen Edam.
English: Dutch and Danish historical sources point at a possible identification of B&W 1 as the wreck of a lengthened Dutch Bojer the De Jager, which appeared in auction books of the town of Edam.

Danish: Mail: ln@vikingeskibsmuseet.dk
English: E-mail: ln(at)vikingeskibsmuseet.dk

Danish: Billedarkivet kan kontaktes på e -mail: picturelibrary(a)vikingeskibsmuseet.dk
English: E-mail: picturelibrary(a)vikingeskibsmuseet.dk

Danish: E: kga(at)vikingeskibsmuseet.dk
English: E: as(at)vikingeskibsmuseet.dk

Danish: E: pwk(at)vikingeskibsmuseet.dk
English: E: nlk@vikingeskibsuseet.dk

Danish: E: lw(at)vikingeskibsmuseet.dk
English: E: sao(at)vikingeskibsmuseet.dk

Danish: Hvert besætningsmedlem har mindre end 1 m2 til rådighed, og kan højst medbringe 80 liter personligt udstyr.
English: Each crew member has less than 1 m2 at his or her disposal and personal belongings must take up no more than 80 litres.

Danish: Hver dag vil en stolt høvding fremvise sine våben og lære de unge krigere at kæmpe med sværd og skjold.
English: Each day, a proud chieftain will demonstrate his weapons and teach the young warriors to fight with sword and shield.

Danish: Tre af tårnene er fremstillet som vikinger, der er gået besærk.
English: Each figure has a dour expression on its face, with staring eyes and strong features.

Danish: Det enkelte skibsfund fortæller sin unikke historie, mens summen af dem alle fortæller samfundshistorie.
English: Each find of a ship tells its own unique story, but the sum of these stories tells the history of society.

Danish: Hver bundstok (den nederste del af spantet) ligger an på en klampe, der er hugget ud i kølen.
English: Each floor timber (the lowest part of the frame) lies in a clamp which is cut out of the keel.

Danish: Det er også dit laug, der søger for at båden passes og plejes, sættes i stand om foråret, bliver sat i vandet og om efteråret taget op igen og sat på land.
English: Each guild is responsible for maintaining their boat, getting it prepared for sailing each spring, launching the boat and taking it up and setting it on land again each autumn.

Danish: Hver enkelt skibsdel blev skåret ud i pap og samlet i en model i skala 1:10.
English: Each individual ship's part was then cut out of cardboard and assembled in a 1:10 scale model.

Danish: Til hvert måltid går der 13 kg kød, grøntsager og ris, pasta eller korn.
English: Each meal requires 13 kg of meat, vegetables and rice, pasta or cereal.

Danish: På hver enkelt skabelon er der en streg og et tal fra 1 til 12.
English: Each mould is marked with a line and a number from 1 to 12.

Danish: Hvert af de ret små får gav ca. 500 gr brugbar uld.
English: Each one of these rather small sheep yielded about 500 g of usable wool.

Danish: Hver person har sin faste plads og tofte at sidde på.
English: Each person has his or her regular seat and thwart to sit on.

Danish: Hver brik repræsenterer en menneskelig figur bortset fra bønderne, der er udformet som simple obelisker.
English: Each piece represents a human figure, except for the pawns, which are shaped as simple obolisks.

Danish: Hver planke blev omhyggeligt scannet og målt.
English: Each plank was carefully scanned and measured.

Danish: Hvert reb tager ca 125 cm af sejlets højde.
English: Each reef takes about 125 cm off the height of the sail.

Danish: Hvert rum har to rum-formænd – igen en til hver vagt”.
English: Each room has a chairman – again one for each shift”.

Danish: Hvert rum har to formænd (en til hver vagt).
English: Each room has to foremen (one for each watch).

Danish: Hvert rum har en formand, som sikrer at gasterne i rummet udfører deres arbejdsopgaver, overholder deres vagter og melder tilbage til skipper.
English: Each section has a foreman, who makes sure that the crew in their section carry out their duties, keep their watches and report back to the skipper.

Danish: Hvert rum har en formand, som sikrer, at gasterne i rummet udfører deres arbejdsopgaver, overholder deres vagter og melder tilbage til skipper.
English: Each section has a leader, who makes sure the crew carry out their tasks, observe their watches and report to the skipper.

Danish: Hvert rum, med 10 - 12 gaster, deler to frokostkasser med rugbrød, smør og pålæg, der kan holde sig i lang tid, såsom makrel i tomat, tun og røget spegepølse.
English: Each section of 10-12 men shares two lunch boxes with rye bread, butter and meat/fish of good keeping quality, such as tinned tuna, tinned mackerel in tomato sauce and smoked salami.

Danish: Hvert rum, med 10 – 12 gaster, deler to frokostkasser med rugbrød, smør og pålæg, der kan holde sig i lang tid, såsom makrel i tomat, tun og røget spegepølse.
English: Each section of 10-12 men shares two lunch boxes with rye bread, butter and meat/fish of good keeping quality, such as tinned tuna, tinned mackerel in tomato sauce and smoked salami.

Danish: Hver gang fibrene i stykket hugges over, forringes styrken.
English: Each time a cut is made across one of the fibres, the timber becomes weaker.

Danish: I alle weekender og dagligt fra den 27. juni tager en af museets dygtige bådebyggere en pause fra byggeriet og giver en særlig rundvisning på værftspladsen.
English: Each weekend - and every day from the 27th June - one of the Museum's skilled boatbuilders will take a break from the construction and give a special tour of the boatyard.

Danish: Jarl Vilhelm kom fra hinsides havet med stort følge af franskmænd og kongen modtog ham og så mange af hans ledsagere, som det syntes ham vel, og lod ham rejse igen.
English: Earl William came from beyond the sea with a great company of Frenchmen and the King received him and as many of his companions as he thought appropriate and then he let him depart again.

Danish: Tidligere uddybninger udfor de undersøgte kajer har været så kraftig, at der sandsynligvis heller ikke midt i havnebassinet forekommer intakte kulturlag fra Middelalder og Renæssance.
English: Earlier dredging opposite the examined quays has been so intensive that there are probably no intact culture layers from the Medieval period or the Renaissance.

Danish: Tidligere i sommer kløvede vi en fyrretræsstamme til bådens bordplanker.
English: Earlier in the summer, we had cleaved a pine log to make planks for the boat.

Danish: Tidlig fredag morgen blev skibet løftet over bygningerne og ind i den ca 700 kvadratmeter store gård.
English: Early Friday morning the ship was lifted again, this time over the buildings and into the 700 square metre big square in the middle.

Danish: Middelalderbåd bygges på bådeværftet - Fakta:
English: Early medieval boat reconstruction at the boatyard: info

Danish: Tidlig neste morgen gikk kongen og Torberg ut til skipet igjen.
English: Early next morning the king returns again to the ship, and Thorberg with him.

Danish: Tidlig torsdag morgen ankom Havhingsten til Berlin West Hafen.
English: Early on Thursday morning, Sea Stallion arrived to Berlin's West Hafen.

Danish: Tager let 10 personer.
English: Easily carries 10 people.

Danish: Påskeferie på Vikingeskibsmuseet 2018
English: Easter at the Viking Ship Museum 2018

Danish: Foredrag: Den sejlende kulturarv
English: Easter workshop - build your own king!

Danish: Spis frokost i strandkanten
English: Eat lunch by the water's edge

Danish: Spis frokost i strandkanten
English: Eat lunch by the water’s edge

Danish: Redigeret af Anton Englert & Athena Trakadas.
English: Edited by Anton Englert & Athena Trakadas.

Danish: Formidling er en vigtig del af projektet og der er enorm interesse for skibet, hver gang Havhingsten lægger til.
English: Education is central to the project and there is enormous interest in the ship everywhere the Sea Stallion comes.

Danish: Det specielle er at de lokale både har meget gamle træk i byggemåden.
English: Edvard has three such beams, two afore the hold, which is known as the "bunki", and one aft.

Danish: Edvards og hans gruppe er ikke de eneste der har taget fat i værktøjet i Gislingeprojektets kølvand.
English: Edvards and his group are not the only ones who've taken up tools in the wake of the Gislinge Project.

Danish: Edvards og hans gruppe er ikke de eneste der har taget fat i værktøjet i Gislingeprojektets kølvand.
English: Edvards and his group are not the only ones who’ve taken up tools in the wake of the Gislinge Project.

Danish: Edward Bekenderen og Harold Godwinson
English: Edward the Confessor and Harold Godwinson

Danish: Edward Bekenderen af England
English: Edward the Confessor of England

Danish: Edward var gift med Edith fra den magtfulde Godwin slægt, men de fik ingen børn, og den engelske trone blev derfor givet til Ediths bror Harold Godwinson, da Edward døde i 1066.
English: Edward was married to Edith from the powerful Godwin family but they had no children and the English throne passed to Edith's brother Harold Godwinson when Edward died in AD 1066.

Danish: Edward var meget religiøs og grundlagde blandt andet det store kloster ved Westminster: Westminster Abbey.
English: Edward was very religious and founded among others the great monastery at Westminster: Westminster Abbey.

English: Edward's many years in France had a great influence on his rule and he was known for speaking more French than English, for surrounding himself with French advisors and for using Norman troops in England.

English: Embla was built in 1992 by the Association "Embla - the women's ship row for peace", and is used as a symbol of their political visions: to promote peace and international understanding through regional and international initiatives.

Danish: Embla er bygget i 1992 af foreningen Embla – kvindeskibet ro for fred, og bruges som symbol på deres politiske visioner: at fremme fred og international forståelse gennem regionalt og internationalt arbejde.

Danish: Også i svag vind og diset regnfuldt vejr.
English: Even a light wind and misty, rainy weather.

Danish: Selv efter at englænderne tilbageerobrede York, var byen stadig præget af skandinaver, der levede og arbejdede i byen.
English: Even after the English recapture of York, the town was still characterised by the Scandinavians living and working there.

Danish: Selv efter at irerne i flere tilfælde havde generobret overherredømmet og vikingerne betalte skat til dem, blev mange skandinaver i Irland.
English: Even after the Irish had, on several occasions, regained supremacy and the Vikings paid taxes to them, many Scandinavians stayed in Ireland.

Danish: Selv 8 m. over jorden målte træet 85 x 85 cm.
English: Even at 8m above ground level, the tree still measured 85 x 85cm.

Danish: Allerede inden den endelige besætning er valgt, kan Vikingeskibsmuseet melde "klart følgeskib".
English: Even before completing the choice of crew, the Viking Ship Museum can say: “Support vessel ready”.

Danish: Mere eksotiske lande som Malaysia, Indien og Indonesien har bragt historier om projektet og besætningen har leveret live interviews til blandt andet australsk morgenradio.
English: Even far-off countries like Malaysia, India and Indonesia carried stories about the project and the crew gave live interviews to amongst others Australian morning radio.

Danish: Selv for et krigsskib af Havhingstens størrelse med sin 30 meters længde og rig og mast med en samlet vægt på 850 kilo er det en hverdagsmanøvre at henholdsvis lægge mast og rig ned - og rejse mast og rig.
English: Even for a warship of the Sea Stallion's size, with its length of 30 metres and rigging and mast weighing a total of 850 kg, it is an everyday manoeuvre to lower the mast and rigging - and raise them.

Danish: Selv for et krigsskib af Havhingstens størrelse med sin 30 meters længde og rig og mast med en samlet vægt på 850 kilo er det en hverdagsmanøvre at henholdsvis lægge mast og rig ned - og rejse mast og rig.
English: Even for a warship of the Sea Stallion’s size, with its length of 30 metres and rigging and mast weighing a total of 850 kg, it is an everyday manoeuvre to lower the mast and rigging – and raise them.

Danish: Hvis bare nogle få personer utilsigtet flytter sig fra deres plads, kan det få dramatisk betydning for skibets trim.
English: Even if only a few crew members make an unplanned movement from their places this can have a dramatic effect on the trim of the ship.

Danish: Endnu i 1070 hører vi om en dansk flåde på 200 skibe som angriber og plyndrer York.
English: Even in 1070 we hear of a Danish fleet of 200 ships attacking and plundering York.

Danish: Selv inde i den beskyttede fjord Slien kan der komme vind i sejlene.
English: Even in the protected fjord Schlei it is can get wind in the sail.

Danish: Selve målingen af solhøjden gjorde man allerede længe før vikingetiden i andre dele af verden med instrumenter som astrolaben eller kvadranten, men der er ikke belæg for, at de har været anvendt i Norden.
English: Even measurements of the sun's height were carried out long prior to the Viking Age in other parts of the world with instruments such as the astrolabe or quadrant but there is no evidence that these were used in the Nordic Countries.

Danish: Selve målingen af solhøjden gjorde man allerede længe før vikingetiden i andre dele af verden med instrumenter som astrolaben eller kvadranten, men der er ikke belæg for, at de har været anvendt i Norden.
English: Even measurements of the sun’s height were carried out long prior to the Viking Age in other parts of the world with instruments such as the astrolabe or quadrant but there is no evidence that these were used in the Nordic Countries.

Danish: Selv på moderne fartøjer, hvor man ikke bruger råsejl med en flytbar hals, bruger man udtrykkene styrbord og bagbord halse for at angive, hvordan fartøjet sejler i forhold til vindretningen.
English: Even on modern vessels, where use is not made of a square sail with a loose tack, the term starboard and port tack are used to denote how the vessel is sailing relative to the direction of the wind.

Danish: Selvom meget af Haralds hærgen virkede planløs, var han nok for stor en strateg til blot at tage på tilfældige plyndringstogter.
English: Even though much of Haralds ravaging of Denmark seems pointless today, he probably was too much of a strategist to take on casual raids.

Danish: Selvom kvadene blev videregivet mundtligt, blev enkelte af de mest populære nedskrevet.
English: Even though the verses were communicated orally, a few of the most popular ones were written down.

Danish: Selvom der sjældent var kvinder om bord på krigsskibene i Vikingetiden, er der i dag 18 kvindelige gaster om bord på Havhingsten, og der gælder ingen særregler for dem.
English: Even though women were rarely found on board warships in the Viking Age, there are 18 female gaster on the Sea Stallion, and they have no special privileges.

Danish: Selv med vores mandskab på "kun " 60 personer, er det altid en udfordring at skaffe overnatningspladser til alle i diverse havne, vi anløber.
English: Even with our crew of ‘only’ 60 people, finding overnight accommodation for everyone in all the harbours we call at is always a challenge.

Danish: Aftensejlads på strækket fra Wicklow til Torquay den 6. juli 2008.
English: Evening sailing on the leg from Wicklow to Torquay, 6th July 2008.

Danish: Aftenturene på Roskilde fjord er meget populære og er så absolut den perfekte måde at opleve sommerens lange lyse aftener.
English: Evening tours on Roskilde Fjord are very popular and are the perfect way to enjoy the long, bright summer evenings.

Danish: Lige siden arkæologerne i 1962 hentede resterne af 5 vikingeskibe op fra bunden af Roskilde Fjord, har drømmen om at genskabe skibene og give dem vind i sejlene været den drivende kraft i Vikingeskibsmuseets arbejde.
English: Ever since the archaeologists raised the remains of 5 Viking ships from the bottom of Roskilde Fjord in 1962, the dream of reconstructing the ships and putting wind in their sails has been a driving force for the work of the Viking Ship Museum.

Danish: Den grønne ø bugner af hoteller, bed and breakfasts og restauranter afhængige af turisme.
English: Every area houses hotels, bed and breakfasts, and restaurants dependant on the tourism market.

Danish: I den situation skal hver gast sikre sig, at hans eller hendes buddy er med, når skibet forlades.
English: Every crew member must make sure their buddy is with them when they leave the ship.

Danish: Bagefter kan du afprøve vikingernes kampteknik og udfordre de voksne til dyst.
English: Every day, the proud chieftain will display his weapons and teach the young warriors to fight with sword and shield.

English: Every day, the proud chieftain will display his weapons and teach the young warriors to fight with sword and shield.

English: Every day, the proud chieftain will display his weapons and teach the young warriors to fight with sword and shield.

Danish: Hver måned året igennem udpeges en eller flere personer som tilsammen udgør de nominerede til årets sejler.
English: Every month throughout the year, one or two people are nominated for the award of Sailor of the Year.

Danish: Flere arkæologiske fund tyder dog også på, at vikingerne tænkte over hygiejnen og gik op i deres udseende.
English: Every one of them blows his nose and spits in it and washes his face and hair in it.”

Danish: Hver eneste snyder næse, spytter i det og vasker sit ansigt og sit hår i det".
English: Every one of them blows his nose and spits in it and washes his face and hair in it.”

Danish: Hver deltager medbragte en brevdue, som blev sluppet løs fra et aftalt sted i Charlottenlund, hvor Brebøl boede.
English: Every participant brought a pigeon, which was let go from a designated place in Chalottenlund, where Brebøl lived.

Danish: Alle sejladser ledes af en erfaren sejladsinstruktør.
English: Every sailing trip is lead by an experienced sailing instructor.

Danish: Hver eneste sømil
English: Every single nautical mile

Danish: Hver sommer stævner Vikingeskibsmuseets skibe ud på sommertogter for at indsamle viden om, hvordan vikingeskibene sejler.
English: Every summer, the Viking Ship Museum's Viking ships set sail to gather knowledge about how well the Viking ships sailed.

Danish: Hver gang det lykkes en spiller at lave en mølle, må han fjerne én af modspillerens brikker - dog ikke én der står i en mølle.
English: Every time a player gets Nine Mens Morris he is allowed to take one of his opponent's pieces out of the game, but not one that is already in a Nine Mens Morris position though.

Danish: Vores dygtige bådebyggere, smede, rebslagere og vævere formidler hvert år deres viden og skaber dialog med gæsterne ved at fremvise de materialer og processer, der er forbundet med deres arbejde.
English: Every year, our skilled craft specialists share their knowledge and create a dialogue with visitors by demonstrating the materials and practices related to their work.

Danish: Hvert år arbejder bådebyggerne med at vedligeholde bådsamlingen, og dermed sikre at flåden til museets sejladstjeneste er i orden, og at de mange andre både og skibe, som sejles af de frivillig bådelaug, også er i god stand.
English: Every year, the boatbuilders maintain this collection, ensuring that the Museum's sailing service fleet is in order and that the many boats and ships sailed by the volunteer boat guilds are also ship-shape.

Danish: Hvert år formidler de deres viden og skaber en dialog med museumsgæster ved at fremvise de materialer og processer, der er forbundet med deres arbejde.
English: Every year, they share their knowledge and create a dialogue with visitors by demonstrating the materials and practices related to their work.

Danish: Ideelt set skal en gast på Havhingsten helst have begge kompetencer, men han eller hun skal i hvert fald være rigtig god til en af delene for at være med.
English: Everyone aboard Havhingsten should shine in both these attributes ideally, but each must be really good at one of them at least in order to win a place aboard.

Danish: Alle inddrages i fortællingen og bliver en del af historien.
English: Everyone becomes involved in the story and becomes a part of history.

Danish: Alle kan deltage i vikingernes værksteder, hvor børn kan få timer til at gå med at male skjolde med maling lavet af øl, slå sin egen mønt af sølv eller kobber og få den om halsen i en lædersnøre som lykkeamulet.
English: Everyone can take part in the Viking workshops, where children can make time fly whilst decorating a shield with paint made from beer or strike their own silver or copper coin to hang on a leather thong and wear around the neck as a good luck charm.

Danish: Hver person har under en kvadratmeter at leve på, og rejsen er præget af både manglende søvn og komfort men også fantastiske naturoplevelser og kammeratskab.
English: Everyone had less than one square metre as living space and the voyage was characterised by a lack of both sleep and comfort, but also by fantastic experiences of nature and comradeship.

Danish: Alle hjælper med at ro skibet ud af havnen og sætte sejlet.
English: Everyone helps to row the ship out of the harbour and raise the sail.

Danish: Alle om bord tager aktivt del i sejladsen, både når der skal ros og sættes sejl.
English: Everyone on board actively participates in the sailing, both with rowing and when setting sail.

Danish: Vores træskibe sejler flere gange dagligt ud på en times ture på den smukke Roskilde Fjord.
English: Everyone on board takes part in rowing, setting the sail and other ‘sailor's work'.

Danish: Alle deltager aktivt ombord med ro, sætte sejl og udføre andet "sømandarbejde".
English: Everyone on board takes part in rowing, setting the sail and other ‘sailor’s work’.

Danish: Alle deltager aktivt ombord med ro, sætte sejl og udføre andet 'sømandsarbejde'.
English: Everyone on board takes part in rowing, setting the sail and other ‘sailor’s work’.

Danish: Museets besøgende er skibets besætning og skal deltage aktivt om bord - ro skibet ud af havn, sætte sejl og måske bemande roret.
English: Everyone on board takes part in rowing, setting the sail and other ‘sailor’s work’.

Danish: Alle deltager aktivt i sejladsen, hvor forskellige manøvrer med råsejl gennemgås og afprøves med henblik på at lære vikingeskibets sejlegenskaber at kende.
English: Everyone participates actively in the sailing, where verious manoeuvres with square sails are introduced and tested in order to learn about the sailing characteristics of the Viking ship.

Danish: Alle deltager aktivt med at ro, sætte sejl og udføre andet 'sømandarbejde'.
English: Everyone participates actively with rowing, setting the sail and carrying out other sailors' work.

Danish: Alle deltager aktivt i sejladsen med ro, sætte sejl og udføre andet "sømandarbejde".
English: Everyone takes part in the activities on board such a rowing, setting the sail and other such sailors work.

Danish: Alle med adgang til et digitalkamera har mulighed for at deltage i konkurrencen, som går ud på at indfange det flotteste, sjoveste eller skøreste billede af Havhingsten på dens sejltur gennem de danske farvande.
English: Everyone with access to a digital camera has the chance to take part in the competition to take the most beautiful, the funniest or the weirdest picture of the Sea Stallion on its voyage through Danish waters.

Danish: Alt skal pakkes ekstra forsvarligt og særdeles vandtæt, for blot et lille hul på en pose kan give ødelagte fødevarer.
English: Everything has to be packed very securely and waterproof, for only a small hole on a bag can result in destroyed food.

Danish: Alt i båden er egetræ.
English: Everything in the boat is made of oak.

Danish: Alt er historie!
English: Everything is history!

Danish: Alt er minimeret i dimensioner og vægt uden at svække konstruktionens styrke.
English: Everything is minimised in dimension and weight without weakening the strength of the construction.

Danish: Alting, der ikke var surret eller fortøjet, er blevet flyttet rundt af vandet.
English: Everything that was not secured or anchored were relocated by the water.

Danish: De næste fire timer stod alt på den anden ende.
English: Everything was topsy-turvy for the next four hours.

Danish: Der, hvor Havhingsten kommer frem, vil besætningen invitere til 'åbent skib' og give publikum mulighed for at komme helt tæt på livet om bord og opleve det skib, der i 2007-08 gjorde den dramatiske sejlads til Dublin i Irland og retur.
English: Everywhere Sea Stallion docks, the public will be invited to the ‘open ship', where they can get close to life on board and experience the ship that undertook the dramatic sailing from Roskilde to Dublin in Ireland and back again in 2007 - 08.

Danish: ”Hvor 'Havhingsten' kommer frem, vil besætningen invitere til 'åbent skib' og give publikum mulighed for at komme helt tæt på livet om bord og opleve det skib, der i 2007-08 gjorde den dramatiske sejlads til Dublin i Irland og retur.
English: Everywhere Sea Stallion docks, the public will be invited to the ‘open ship', where they can get close to life on board and experience the ship that undertook the dramatic sailing from Roskilde to Dublin in Ireland and back again in 2007 - 08.

Danish: ”Hvor 'Havhingsten' kommer frem, vil besætningen invitere til 'åbent skib' og give publikum mulighed for at komme helt tæt på livet om bord og opleve det skib, der i 2007-08 gjorde den dramatiske sejlads til Dublin i Irland og retur.
English: Everywhere Sea Stallion docks, the public will be invited to the ‘open ship’, where they can get close to life on board and experience the ship that undertook the dramatic sailing from Roskilde to Dublin in Ireland and back again in 2007 – 08.

Danish: Sporene efter jernnagler, der omgav dyret og lå spredt rundt omkring gravanlægget, antyder, at en omvendt båd har dækket hele graven.
English: Evidence of iron rivets surrounding the animal and scattered about the grave-structure suggests that an overturned boat had covered the whole grave.

Danish: Der er også fundet spor af arbejde med jern på øen.
English: Evidence of iron working has also been found on the island.

Danish: Arkæologiske fund viser, at skibene i Dublin blev bygget efter skandinaviske metoder.
English: Evidence of ship-building has also been uncovered and clearly showed that in Dublin ships were built according to Scandinavian methods.

Danish: Evidence of specialised merchant seafaring prior the Hanseatic Period’ ved Anton Englert.
English: Evidence of specialised merchant seafaring prior the Hanseatic Period by Anton Englert.

Danish: Alt tyder på, at lindebast var det primære materiale i vikingetiden, suppleret med reb af gran og andre planter, skind af hvalros, sæl, elg, hjort eller okse, hår fra heste, kohaler eller gris og uld.
English: Evidence suggests that lime bast was the dominant material used in the Viking Age, supplemented with rope of spruce and other plants, skin of walrus, seal, elk, deer and ox, hair from horses, and cows’ tails and wool.

Danish: Netop på det her sted i Storstrømmen er, og har altid været, det oplagte sted at passere farvandet mellem Falster og Sjælland, et faktum, der forbinder os med fortidens folk”, slutter Morten Johansen.
English: Exactly here, at this point in Storstrømmen, has always been the perfect place to cross the straits between Falster and Sjælland, a fact that connects us with the people of the past" concludes Morten Johansen.

Danish: Siderorets fastgørelse til skroget var, på de større fartøjer, en udfordring som først blev løst efter rekonstruktioner af større skibe blev bygget og sejlet med sideror.
English: Exactly how the side rudder was attached to the hull, especially on the larger ships, was an issue that was first resolved after reconstructions of the larger ships were built and test-sailed with a side rudder.

Danish: Se også på figurer og billedsten.
English: Examine figures and picture stones.

Danish: Undersøg ud fra de gravfund der er omtalt her på siderne, hvordan vikingerne så ud; deres beklædning og deres smykker.
English: Examine the appearance of the Vikings, their clothing and their ornaments on the basis of the burial finds mentioned on this website.

Danish: Inspicerer tanden og ordinerer præcis den behandling vi allerede har i gang.
English: Examines the tooth and prescribes exactly the same treatment we are already giving.

Danish: Inspicerer tanden og ordinerer præcis den behandling vi allerede...
English: Examines the tooth and prescribes exactly the same...

Danish: Eksempel på en typologisk serie: Pilespidser fra stenalderen.

Danish: Man har også fundet eksempler på spillebrædder.
English: Examples have also been found of gaming boards.

Danish: "Det er længe siden at der blev skjult en skat her"; "Lykkelig er den, som finder en stor skat"; "Hakon bar selv den store skat ud fra højen".
English: Examples include; 'It is long ago that a great treasure was hidden here'; 'Happy is he who might find the great treasure'; 'Hakon alone bore the great treasure out of the mound'.

Danish: Eksempler på bundstokke fra Skuldelev 2.
English: Examples of floor timbers from Skuldelev 2.

Danish: Eksempler på dette er blandt andet den ovenfor nævnte sten fra Esta, som viser at betegnelsen også kunne bruges om besætningen ombord i et krigsskib.
English: Examples of this use include the above-mentioned stone from Esta, which shows that the term skipari could also be used of the crew on board a warship.

Danish: Udgravningerne afslørede også en krigergrav fra vikingetiden, der blandt andet indeholdt et sværd, en spydspids, en ringnål og en dølle til et spyd.
English: Excavation also revealed a Viking warrior burial containing a sword, spearhead, a ringed pin and a spear ferrule among other artefacts.

Danish: Udgravningerne gav også oplysninger om Dublins forsvarsanlæg.
English: Excavation also revealed evidence for town defences have also been found at Dublin.

English: Excavations of the area revealed the burial of a man with a horse, along with a selection of grave goods.

English: Exciting exhibitions - Films about the Viking ships and Sea Stallion fron Glendalough - Go on board Viking ships - Activities for children - Boatyard - Museum Harbour - Museum Shop with Scandinavian design - Eat New Nordic Viking Food.

English: Exeter fell to William in AD 1068 and three of Harold's sons, Godwin, Edward and Magnus, fled to Dublin where Harold's old supporter Diarmit mac Máel was king.

English: Experience black and white film from the excavation in 1962, witness the longship Sea Stallion battle a fierce gale on the Irish Sea in 2007 and dive on Dannebroge, a 17th century man-of-war, lying on the bottom of Køge Bay.

English: Experiences from the Sea Stallion's Ireland expedition showed that the Vikings needed a great deal of energy.

Danish: Oplevelser, der vækker nysgerrighed, sætter fantasien fri, begejstrer med ny viden og rokker ved vores forestillinger om fortiden.

English: Experiments with shaping handles for the tools led to the development of ‘the Hjortspring iron' for hewing off shingles against the grain.

English: Extensive excavations carried out by the National Museum of Ireland between 1962 and 1981 revealed a wealth of evidence for the post-917 settlement.

English: Extracts from the Log Book, August 11th 2007

Danish: Uddrag af logbogen, fredag den 3. august, 2007
English: Extracts from the log book, friday, August 3rd, 2007

Danish: Eyrbyggernes saga fra 1000-tallet fortæller, at der ofte blev trukket lod om, hvem der skulle lave mad på skibet.
English: Eyrbyggerne's saga from 11th century Iceland says lots were often drawn for who was to prepare food on the ship.

Danish: I Eyrbyggernes saga står:
English: Eyrbyggerne's saga tells us:

Danish: Kisterne kunne sandsynligvis flyttes rundt, og i Eyrbyggernes saga står der, at de to mænd i et rum skulle deles om kisten til opbevaring af deres proviant, tøj og våben.
English: Eyrbyggernes Saga relates that the men occupying a rum (or section of the ship) had to share a chest for storing their supplies, clothes and weapons.

Danish: Følg rejsen he r og se billeder på Instagram: @vikingshipmuseum #skjoldungen
English: F ollow the voyage here and see photos on instagram: @vikingshipmuseum #skjoldungen

Danish: Fakta:
English: Fact:

Danish: Fakta: I slutningen af 1000-tallet byggede man en stor og prægtig domkirke i marksten og frådsten viet til de søfarendes værnehelgen St. Nikolai, ca. 45 meter lang og 12 meter bred.
English: Fact: At the end of the 11th century a great and magnificent cathedral – c. 45 m long and 12 m wide – was built from boulders and travertine in honour of the seafarers’ patron saint, St. Nicolai.

Danish: Fakta: Allerede i vikingetiden var Avaldsnes et kendt sted i skjaldekvad og sagnhistorier.
English: Fact: Avaldsnes was already well known in Viking times, from skaldic epics and legends.

Danish: Fakta: Under en udgravning af en vikingetidsgård i Grønland fandt man i 1948 en del af en cirkulær skive med udskæringer, der kan være sådanne skyggekurver.
English: Fact: During an excavation of a Viking Age farm in Greenland in 1948 part of a circular disk with carvings was recovered which could be just such shadow curves.

Danish: Fakta: Sygeplejersken fører, på de lange togter, dagbog og nedskriver hvilke sygdomme, skader og småsår besætningen får, hvordan de behandles, samt sine erfaringer med hygiejneforholdene.
English: Fact: During every long expedition the nurse will keep diaries and write down which illnesses, injuries and minor cuts affect the crew and how these are treated, as well as experience with the sanitary conditions.

Danish: Fakta: Guld blev ikke brugt til mønter, men til smykker og andet.
English: Fact: Gold was not used for coins but for jewellery and other items.

Danish: Fakta: Maes Howe er ikke det eneste forhistoriske monument, der er blevet beskrevet med rune-graffiti.
English: Fact: Maes Howe is not the only prehistoric monument to have been marked by runic graffiti.

Danish: Fakta: Harefod blev ved sin død begravet i Westminster-kirken, men på befaling fra hans bror Hardeknud blev liget gravet op og kastet i Themsen.
English: Fact: On his death Harefoot he was buried in Westminster Church, but his brother Harthacnut ordered the body to be dug up and thrown into the Thames.

Danish: Fakta: Bådebyggernes notater i dagbogen bliver sendt hjem til Vikingeskibsmuseet og brugt til forskning i langskibets konstruktion.
English: Fact: The boat builder's diary will be sent back to the Viking Ship Museum and used for research purposes.

Danish: Fakta: I Flateyjarbogen fra 1300tallets Island står, at Leif og hans mænd under en sejlads til Østerø på Færøerne alle blev våde, fordi de skulle sikre, at Thora forblev tør.
English: Fact: The Icelandic Flateyjarbok from the 14th century relates how Leif and his men, during a voyage to Østerø on the Faroe Islands, all were soaked because they had to make sure that Thora remained dry.

Danish: Fakta: Det står også i lovene, at det var styrmandens job, at medbringe skibets ror.
English: Fact: The law texts also recount that it was the coxswain's job to bring the ship's rudder.

Danish: Fakta: Det står også i lovene, at det var styrmandens job, at medbringe skibets ror.
English: Fact: The law texts also recount that it was the coxswain’s job to bring the ship’s rudder.

Danish: Fakta: Limfjorden er egentlig ikke en fjord men et sund.
English: Fact: The Limfjord is not really a fjord but rather a sound - open at both ends.

Danish: Fakta: Byens navn peger på en hedensk fortid; Odense er en sammenstilling af ”Odin” og ”vi” og har oprindeligt betydet ”Odins helligsted.”
English: Fact: The name of the town indicates a pagan past - Odense is a collocation of the words "Odin" and "vi" which originally meant "Odin's sacred place".

Danish: Fakta: Vikingerne udbredte nye kunststile og gjorde formentlig brugen af sko med separat sål og overlæder populær - ligesom brugen af bukser.
English: Fact: The Vikings popularised new art styles and probably popularised the wearing of shoes with separate soles and uppers, as well as the wearing of trousers.

Danish: Fakta: Vikingerne udbredte nye kunststile og gjorde formentlig brugen af sko med separat sål og overlæder populær – ligesom brugen af bukser.
English: Fact: The Vikings popularised new art styles and probably popularised the wearing of shoes with separate soles and uppers, as well as the wearing of trousers.

Danish: Fakta: Ordet skjald stammer fra det gamle nordiske ord Skáld som kendes fra ældre Vikingetid.
English: Fact: The word scald derives from the old Nordic word Skáld, which dates from the Early Viking Age.

Danish: Fakta: Genstandene befinder sig i dag i hertugen af Northumberlands samling på Alnwick Castle.
English: Fact: These artefacts can today be found in the collection of the Duke of Northumberland at Alnwick Castle.

Danish: Fakta: Skriftlige kilder omtaler byen flere gange, og selvom den ofte kaldes Slisswich (Slesvig), Hædum og Haithabu, må vi gå ud fra, at det blot er den frankiske, angelsaksiske og norske betegnelse for Hedeby.
English: Fact: Written sources make several mentions of the town, and although it is often referred to as Slisswich (Schleswig) or Hædum, we must assume that these are merely alternative Frankish, Anglo-Saxon and Norwegian names for Haithabu.

Danish: Fakta om sejlturene:
English: Facts about the boat trips:

Danish: Fakta:
English: Facts:

Danish: Fakta: Havhingstens laug blev dannet i 2013 - og er museets største bådelaug med mere end 150 danske og udenlandske medlemmer i alderen fra ca. 18 til 70 år.
English: Facts: The boat guild of the Sea Stallion was formed in 2013 - and is the largest guild at the Viking Ship Museum with more than 150 Danish and foreign members between 18 and 70 years of age.

Danish: Fakta: Havhingstens laug blev dannet i 2013 - og er museets største bådelaug med mere end 150 danske og udenlandske medlemmer i alderen fra ca. 18 til 70 år.
English: Facts: The boat guild of the Sea Stallion was formed in 2013 – and is the largest guild at the Viking Ship Museum with more than 150 Danish and foreign members between 18 and 70 years of age.

Danish: Magsvejr i forskibet, hvor besætningen har tid til hygge og læsning.
English: Fair weather gave the crew time to relax and read.

Danish: Vi kan bare sige: Go vind på rejsen rundt på museet!
English: Fair winds on the your journey around the Museum!

Danish: Fakta: Kontakten til det fremmede betød ikke blot nye varer, men også kendskab til nye skikke og andre livsformer.
English: Faktum: Contact with foreigners did not just mean the introduction of new wares but also knowledge of new practices and other ways of living.

Danish: Fakta: Andre gravfund på Isle of Man inkluderer bådgraven ved Balladoole og gravhøje ved Gronk Moar.
English: Faktum: Other grave finds from Isle of Man include the boad grave at Balladoole and the burial mount at Gronk Moar.

Danish: Fakta: Den sidste vikingekonge i York blev dræbt i 954, men vikingerne i Danelagen blev antagelig i området og levede videre som hidtil.
English: Faktum: The last Viking king in York was killed in AD 954, but the Vikings of the Danelaw presumably stayed in the area and lived on much as before.

English: Falconer and birds of prey

English: Families with children in Viking clothes and fancy helmets cruise along side the ship in open-topped sports cars.

English: family or friends with you and enjoy a special experience, in safe and historical surroundings.

English: Fantastic stories, which will sweep you away, told by some of the world's best storytellers.

Danish: Vikingerne får nu æren for at starte bydannelsen i Irland og for at grundlægge øens vigtigste byer.
English: Far from being just raiders, Vikings can be credited with developing urbanism in Ireland founding the island's major towns.

Danish: Færøbåden findes i flere størrelser.
English: Faroe boats are found in different sizes.

Danish: Færøsk firemannafar
English: Faroese firemannafar

Danish: Fanget af museets dynamik og tværfaglige metode, kærligheden til en ung student i Skoletjenesten og uden at kunne tale et ord dansk, flyttede Werner Karrasch i 1991 til Danmark.
English: Fascinated by the Museum's dynamic and interdisciplinary approach, in love with young student from the School Service, and without speaking a word of Danish, Werner Karrasch moved to Denmark in 1991.

English: Fascinating ship stories

English: Fasten a plank (perhaps one you have made yourself) in a vice and carve out the motif using a chisel (c. 5 mm).

English: Fiddling Farewell: Danish and Irish traditional music on Tunet

English: Fillings are typically canned such as pâté, mackerel in tomato, tuna etc., smoked and dried meat, salami, humus.

English: Film and photo

English: Film showings in connection with group visits can be arranged by calling our booking service.

Danish: Film: Søsætning af Storkjoven - en storbåd fra Færøerne
English: Film: Launch of the Viking Ship Museum's latest boat, 'Storkjoven'

Danish: Film fra sejladser genskaber stemningen fra livet om bord, og rummet fyldes af stemmer, der fortæller om skelsættende begivenheder, udfordringer og opdagelser.
English: Films from the voyages recreate the atmosphere of life onboard and the room is filled with voices telling stories of major events, challenges and discoveries.

Danish: Film, 3D-optagelser og billedserier fra middelalderskibet
English: Films, 3D footage and photos from medieval ship

Danish: Filungar og bådebygger
English: Filungar and boat builder

Danish: Roskildes borgmester Poul Lindor Nielsen takkede besætningen for indsatsen og Paddy Burke overrakte en mindenål til alle besætningsmedlemmer.
English: Finally Paddy Burke was presenting the crew with a pin in memory of the visit and the voyage.

Danish: Endelig er en kraftig gren lige agten for mastesporet hugget til som en støtte, der går op i mastebjælken og forhindrer kølsvinet i at kæntre.
English: Finally, a thick branch just behind the step of the mast has been shaped to form a support which extends up to the mast beam and prevent the keelson from capsizing.

Danish: Endelig er det vores ambition, at udfærdige en manual til håndtering af Havhingsten under sejl og for årer.
English: Finally, it is also our ambition to produce a manual on the handling of the Sea Stallion under sail and when rowed.

Danish: Vi udfører opgaver for private kunder og andre museer i Danmark og internationalt.
English: Finally, the department undertakes construction projects for private clients and for other museums, both internationally and in Denmark.

Danish: Vidnesbyrdene fra de rene sejlskibe kan sammenholdes med de ovenfor drøftede indikatorer for professionel søhandel og kongelig administration i Danmark i tiden 1000- 1250, før hanseatiske købmænd begyndte at dominere søhandelen.
English: Finally, the evidence of pure sailing vessels can be listed together with the previously discussed indicators for specialised merchant seafaring and royal administration in Denmark from 1000 to 1250, before merchants from Hanseatic ports started to dominate large-scale trade.

Danish: Endelig kan brikkerne også blot være sten eller muslingeskaller som I finder på stranden.
English: Finally, the pieces could just as well be stones or shells which you find on the beach.

Danish: Til sidst bliver spundingen kalfatret med en bomuldstråd.
English: Finally, the rabbet is caulked with a cotton thread.

Danish: Endelig har sejladsforsøgene også som formål at optræne skibenes besætninger i at håndtere de store åbne både og udføre sikre manøvrer i næsten al slags vejr med den for længst glemte og derfor uvante enkeltråsejlsteknik.
English: Finally, the sailing trials also have the aim of training the ships' crews in handling these large open vessels and safely carrying out manoeuvres in all kinds of weather with the long forgotten and therefore unaccustomed single square rig technique.

Danish: Da antallet af vendinger har stor indflydelse på det samlede krydsforsøg et det vigtigt at varigheden noteres, så de kan udelades i en beregning af VMG.
English: Finally, the time and position at which the ship is once again fully trimmed and making headway on the new tack will be noted.

Danish: Endelig har Skoletjenesten på Vikingeskibsmuseet udgivet emneark, hæfter og bøger til brug for undervisning af skoleelever.
English: Finally, the Viking Ship Museum School Service publishes books, leaflets and other educational aids for school children.

Danish: Og endeligt har der været grænser for, hvor små detaljer, man kunne vise, hvis de fortsat skulle kunne ses når tapetet var hængt op, måske i en dårligt oplyst kirke.
English: Finally, there were limitations as to how small details could be shown, if they were still to be visible when the tapestry was hung up, perhaps in a poorly illuminated church.

Danish: Til sidst var hele skroget blev forhudet med et lag fyrretræsplanker, ligeledes lagt på et tykt lag tjærefilt.
English: Finally, this hull reinforcement had been covered with sheathing planks of pine (also laid on tar mat).

Danish: Find et centralt sted og prøv at sigte til forskellige genstande (hushjørner, osv.), som er afbildet på kortet.
English: Find a central place and try sighting to the various objects (house corners etc.), which are depicted on the map.

Danish: Find et centralt sted, hvorfra det er muligt at sigte til forskellige genstande (hushjørner, osv.) som er afbildet på kortet.
English: Find a central place from where it is possible to sight various conspicuous objects (house corners etc.), which are depicted on the map.

Danish: Læg et solkompas ovenpå kortet, og tegn sigtelinjerne ind på solkompasset (nummerer genstandene på kortet og på solkompasset).
English: Find a central place from where it is possible to sight various conspicuous objects (house corners etc.), which are depicted on the map.

Danish: Find en debatudsendelse eller en nutidig krimi fra TV.
English: Find a discussion programme or a modern detective story on television.

Danish: Find et passende kortudsnit.
English: Find a suitable section of map or chart.

Danish: Find og fjern fejlbehæftede data.
English: Find and remove erroneous data.

Danish: Fundkompleks 2 repræsenterer dele af bagbords skibsside af et lidt mindre fartøj, måske 9 meter langt, dateret dendrokronologisk til ca. 1336.
English: Find complex 2 represents parts of the port side of a slightly smaller vessel, which was about 9 metres long and has been dendrochronologically dated to about 1336.

Danish: Find beholden kurs og fart
English: Find course and speed made good

Danish: Find data fra en ro-etape og besvar følgende spørgsmål:
English: Find data from a rowing stage and answer the following questions:

Danish: Museets besøgende er skibets besætning og skal deltage aktivt om bord - ro skibet ud af havn, sætte sejl og måske bemande roret.
English: Find information on departure times at the ticket desk or by contacting the Viking Ship Museum’s booking office.

Danish: Find flere og nyere eksempler.
English: Find more - and more recent - examples.

Danish: Find selv på flere…
English: Find more examples yourself...

Danish: Find også andre gravfund på nettet og brug dem til opgaven.
English: Find other burial finds on the Internet and use them for further information.

Danish: Find også andre stjerner og stjernebilleder (afhængigt af årstiden).
English: Find other stars and constellations too (depending of the time of the year).

Danish: Undersøg, hvordan man lavede smykker i vikingetiden, og hvem der bar dem.
English: Find out how ornaments were made in the Viking Age and who wore them

Danish: Find ud af mere om danerne i eftertidens engelske folklore og litteratur/kunst.
English: Find out more about the Danes in English folklore, litterature and art.

Danish: Undersøg mere om vikingernes gravskikke før kristningen.
English: Find out more about the Vikings' burial practices before they became Christians.

Danish: Find ud af hvilke vagter der har været ombord på et krigsskib i vikingetiden.
English: Find out which watches there were onboard a warship in Viking times.

Danish: Find sejlet kurs og beholden fart
English: Find sailed course and speed made good

Danish: Find nogle gode mærker, og beskriv dem mundtligt for det andet hold, som så skal udpege dem.
English: Find some good marks and describe them orally for the other team who have then to identify them.

Danish: Find etaper, hvor Havhingsten har krydset mod vinden; enten ved hjælp af kortet på hjemmesiden eller ved at åbne datasættet i et GIS-program.
English: Find stages where The Sea Stallion has tacked against the wind, either with the aid of the map on the website or by opening the data set in a GIS programme.

Danish: Find gadenavne der kan fortælle om hvad der er foregået i området omkring gaden for flere hundrede år siden.
English: Find street names that can tell us what has happened in the area around the street several hundred years ago.

Danish: Sådan fungerer det i praksis
English: Find the answers in the text below.

Danish: Find den første og den sidste dato, hvor solkompasset kan bruges hele døgnet med et passende valg af radius og gnomon.
English: Find the first and last date when the sun compass can be used round the clock with a suitable choice of radius and gnomon.

Danish: Find den nødvendige information om lasteevne, mandskab, proviantforbrug m.v. her på siderne (tip: spil spillet!) og lav selv oplægget til spillet i form af et regneark, der lader dig variere mængden af drikkevarer, fødevarer og besætningens størrelse og udregner en aktionsradius-rose på baggrund heraf.
English: Find the necessary information concerning cargo carrying capacity, crew, consumption of supplies etc. here on the website (tip: play the game!) and make your own version of the game in the form of a spreadsheet which allows you to vary the quantities of food and drink and the size of the crew, and calculate an operational radius diagram on the basis of this.

Danish: Find Nordstjernen på nattehimlen.
English: Find the North Star in the night sky.

Danish: Find disse etaper i det downloadede datasæt.
English: Find these stages in the downloaded data set.

Danish: Fund af langskibe fra vikingetiden
English: Findings of longships from the Viking Age

Danish: Fund af pile fra vikingetid
English: Finds of arrows from Viking times

Danish: Fund af huse, krigergrave, sværd og mønter viser, at lejren var en vigtig skandinavisk base.
English: Finds of houses, warrior graves, swords and coins show that the camp was an important Scandinavian base.

Danish: Fund af køkkenredskaber viser os, at man i husholdningen havde stegespid, kogekar af træ, skind og ler, gryder af klæbersten og jernplader, dejtrug, sigter, kornkværne, smørkærne og et vallebræt, øser, skåle, håndøkser og knive.
English: Finds of kitchen utensils show us that Viking households had roasting spits, boiling vessels made of wood, leather and clay, pans made of soapstone and iron plate, kneading troughs, sieves, grain querns, butter churns and kneading boards, ladles, bowls, small axes and knives.

Danish: Arkæologiske skibsfund viser, at der må have stået relativt mange af disse træer i vikingetidens skove.
English: Finds of ships in archaeological contexts reveal that there were many such trees to be found in forests during the Viking Age.

Danish: Færdiggørelse af forstaget
English: Finishing the forestay

Danish: FYR OG FLAMMER

Danish: ilden rasede hen over mænds boliger
English: fire blazed over men's dwellings

Danish: Førstehjælp til hele besætningen
English: First Aid for the entire crew

English: First he went to Kiev, where he found protection with Prince Jaroslav, a descendant of some of the Vikings who settled there.

Danish: Første nyhedsbrev fra Havhingsten: Om research i Skotland og maling af sejl.
English: First newsletter from The Sea Stallion: About research in Scotland and coloring of the sail.

Danish: Først blev skibet tømt for ballast og masten blev lagt ned.
English: First the ship was emptied of ballast and the mast was taken down.

Danish: Først skal kilden beskrives; undersøg kildens:
English: First the source should be described; check its:

English: First they tighten the fore stay so the mast moves forward and the mast lock, which supports the lowest part of the mast, can be removed and the mast can be tilted backwards.

Danish: Først skubbede knapt 30 besætningsmedlemmer Helge Ask fra Begtrup Vig.
English: First, 30 members of the crew pushed Helge Ask from Begtrup Vig.

Danish: Først en inderstævn der er hulet ud, så at der er plads til at klinke bordspidserne på.
English: First, an inner stem which is hollowed out, so that there is room to attach the ends of the planks.

Danish: Først med tre mand ombord
English: First, it was tested with three men on board

Danish: Først rulles bomulden i...
English: First, the cotton is rolled in...

Danish: Kølen blev først hugget ned til sin maksimum bredde, og herefter begyndte arbejdet med at hugge de t-formede 'vinger'.
English: First, the keel was worked down to its maximum width and the work of shaping the t-shaped ‘wings' began.

Danish: Kølen blev først hugget ned til sin maksimum bredde, og herefter begyndte arbejdet med at hugge de t-formede ’vinger’.
English: First, the keel was worked down to its maximum width and the work of shaping the t-shaped ‘wings’ began.

English: First, the log was squared off.

Danish: Først opmåles de originale dele, derefter bygges 3D-model i pap.
English: First, the original parts are measured and the a 3-D model is made in cardboard.

Danish: For det første kan man ikke fjerne jorden med graveskeer og skovle.
English: First, you cannot remove earth using trowels and shovels.

Danish: I starten var sølvet som en vare, hvor man betalte efter vægt.
English: Firstly as a commodity, when payment was made by weight.

Danish: Som det første fremlægges vragenes bevaringstilstand og en beskrivelse af de bevarede vragdele.
English: Firstly, the preserved wreck parts are presented and a possible dating and origin of the wreck is attempted.

English: Five months before the largest reconstruction of a Viking ship is sailing from Roskilde to Dublin, a journey that will take seven weeks, half the budget has been

Danish: Fem reb
English: Five reefs

Danish: Hør har været brugt til at fremstille tekstiler i Skandinavien siden jernalderen.
English: Flax has been used to produce textiles in Scandinavia since the Iron Age.

Danish: Fleksibiliteten er meget svær at måle, og vi har alene koncentreret os om, at påvise at skibet bevæger sig, både set som en helhed, men også hvordan enkelte dele bevæger sig i forhold til hinanden.
English: Flexibility is very hard to measure, and we have concentrated on just demonstrating that the ship does move, both as a whole, and individual parts in relation to each other.

Danish: Fokus på Norges vikingetid
English: Focus on Norway's Viking Age

Danish: Folk er stimlet sammen på molen og straks efter at vi har smidt trossen i land er der folk som vil hjælpe.
English: Folk have gathered together on the pier and as soon as we have thrown the hawser in to land, people come to help.

Danish: Se dykkerne arbejde på udgravningen af Kalverevskibet
English: Follow divers work on the excavation of the Kalverev ship

English: Follow life on board an open ship, cpmplete with blisters and seasickness, tar and rope, the art of cooking in rough seas, stays in harbours, etc.

Danish: Følg med i bådebyggernes dagligdag og læs om de små og store oplevelser på Vikingeskibsmuseets værftsplads...
English: Follow the daily life at the Viking Ship Museum's boatyard, during the Gislinge Boat Project...

Danish: Følg med på dykkerens arbejde på havbunden - fra han kommer i vandet, til han er oppe igen en time senere!
English: Follow the diver's work on the seabed - from the time he goes in the water until he comes back an hour later!

English: Follow the voyage here and see photos on instagram: @vikingshipmuseum #skjoldungen

English: Following the advice of Odin, Sigurd set out to find the Fafni's gold.

English: Following the voyage, a column has been added giving information about the actual sail setting (or other method of propulsion) taken from the ship's log.

Danish: Efter togtet er der tilføjet en kolonne med oplysninger om den aktuelle sejlføring (eller anden fremdriftsmetode) hentet fra skibets logbog.
English: Following the voyage, a column has been added giving information about the actual sail setting (or other method of propulsion) taken from the ship’s log.
