English: Following, presentations of the now published seven volumes of the series.

Danish: Samtidig vil opgørelsen over mængden af madvarer og drikkevand give et indblik i den logistik, der var nødvendig for at proviantere til en 65 mand stor besætning.
English: Food and water consumption data will also give an insight into the logistics necessary to provision a ship with a 65 man crew.

Danish: Mad fra Vikingernes køkken
English: Food from the Viking's kitchen.

Danish: Mad fra Vikingernes køkken
English: Food from the Viking’s kitchen.

Danish: Mad i vikingetiden
English: Food in Viking times

Danish: Maden blev stegt eller kogt over bål, i en ovn eller opvarmet med kogesten, som først blev varmet op i ilden for dernæst at blive sænket ned i vand og supper.
English: Food was roasted or boiled over an open fire, in an oven or warmed using potboilersstones that were first heated in the fire before being put into water and soups.

Danish: I 24 timer havde vi mailet og lagt telefonbeskeder på borgmesterkontoret i Ramsgate.
English: For 24 hours we had e-mailed the mayor’s office in Ramsgate and we had also left phone messages.

Danish: Jeg har i 25 år sejlet med i lauget omkring Vikingeskibsmuseets første rekonstruktion, Roar Ege”.
English: For 25 years I have sailed with the guild for the Viking Ship Museum’s first reconstruction, Roar Ege.

Danish: På en stor del af turen havde skibet hård vestlig vind og op til tre meter høje atlanterhavsdønninger.
English: For a considerable part of the journey, the ship had strong westerly winds and up to three-meter-high Atlantic swells.

Danish: Hos den store del af befolkningen har hverdagskosten været grød (kogt af byg eller havre) surdejsbrød af rug og pålæg som smør, ost og evt. pølse.
English: For a large part of the population everyday food would have been porridge (made from barley or oats), sourdough rye bread with butter, cheese or possible sausage.

Danish: For en tid var mødets dagsorden afsporet.
English: For a while the meeting agenda was suspended.

Danish: Ved bookinger, der inkluderer sejlads forbeholder museet sig ret til at aflyse af sikkerhedsmæssige grunde, som fx stærk vind.
English: For bookings including a sailing trip, the museum reserves the right to cancel for safety reasons, such as strong winds.

Danish: Ved bookinger, der inkluderer gruppesejlads, betales en startpris svarende til minimum 8 voksne personer, uagtet at gruppen eventuelt omfatter færre personer.
English: For bookings that include a privately chartered boat, a starting price equal to a minimum of 8 adults will be paid, regardless of the group may include fewer people.

Danish: Ved bookinger, der inkluderer sejlads forbeholder museet sig ret til at aflyse, hvis gæsterne ikke overholder de gældende krav til sikkerhed om bord.
English: For bookings that include sailing, the museum reserves the right to cancel if guests do not comply with the safety requirements on board.

Danish: Spil har alle dage været et skattet tidsfordriv, ikke mindst om bord på skibe.
English: For centuries people have been passing time playing board games.

Danish: Til langskibe som Skuldelev 2, hvor der har været en besætning på 60-70 mand, har udrustningen været noget større, og man har medbragt mere beskyttende udrustning.
English: For chieftains' ships, such as Skuldelev 2 with a crew of 60-70 men, the equipment was more comprehensive and more defensive/protective equipment was taken along.

Danish: Til langskibe som Skuldelev 2, hvor der har været en besætning på 60–70 mand, har udrustningen været noget større, og man har medbragt mere beskyttende udrustning.
English: For chieftains’ ships, such as Skuldelev 2 with a crew of 60-70 men, the equipment was more comprehensive and more defensive/protective equipment was taken along.

Danish: For Claus er det hensynet til familien, der gør, at han i år har valgt at stå af på halvvejen.
English: For Claus it is out of consideration for his family that he has decided to stop halfway through this year.

Danish: Og for hver ny rekonstruktion vi bygger og sejler, lærer vi mere om skibenes betydning for datidens samfund.
English: For each new reconstruction we built and sail, we learn more about the importance om ships in Viking Age society.

Danish: De central- og vesteuropæiske bådfund fra bronzealderen har ingen træk tilfælles med Hjortspringbåden, og de fundne fartøjer fra Middelhavet er ligeledes af en helt anden konstruktion og stammer hovedsageligt fra egentlige fragtskibe.
English: For each wreck, a section of the hull of two to four metres in length was chosen, cut out with a chainsaw and subsequently lifted out of the shipwreck.

Danish: Bl.a. omtales en Grymer som i sin bejlen til en smuk ungmø, måtte bevise sit værd og holde sit sværd frisk i krigeriske våbenøvelser, bestige isbjerge, udføre styrkeprøver, spille godt skak, tyde stjerner, kaste med sten og udøve anden idræt.
English: For example a certain man Grymer who was courting a beautiful maid had to prove his worth through weapons exercises, climbing of icebergs, performing trials of strength, play chess well, interpret the stars and other sports.

Danish: Fx Sølvgade i København, som fortæller, at det var her sølvsmedene arbejdede i middelalderens København.
English: For example Sølvgade (Silver Street) in Copenhagen; this tells us that silversmiths worked here in medieval Copenhagen.

Danish: Her ses den mere end 120 cm i diameter store egetræsrod, der udstilles på værftspladsen.
English: For example this more than 120 cm in diameter large oak root that daily is on display at the shipyard.

Danish: For eksempel et kort, der med farver viser skibets hastighed.
English: For example, a map that uses colour to show the ship's speed.

Danish: For eksempel et kort, der med farver viser skibets hastighed.
English: For example, a map that uses colour to show the ship’s speed.

Danish: For eksempel skriver han, at der i Norden bor amazoner og monstre som cynocephali - mennesker med hundehoveder.
English: For example, he writes that the Nordic countries are the home of Amazons and monsters such as - humans with dog heads.

Danish: For eksempel skriver han, at der i Norden bor amazoner og monstre som cynocephali – mennesker med hundehoveder.
English: For example, he writes that the Nordic countries are the home of Amazons and monsters such as – humans with dog heads.

Danish: Det er for eksempel meget vigtigt at vide, hvilket jordlag en genstand kommer fra, da den kan være med til at datere andre fundne genstande i laget.
English: For example, it is very important to know what layer in the earth an artefact comes from, because this can help date other objects in the layer.

Danish: Således Knud den Store, der i England renndi langskipum útan at eyrar grunni, 'lod sine skibe løbe op på grunden af grus/sand'.
English: For example, Knut the Great, who in England renndi langskipum útan at eyra grunni ‘allowed his ships to run aground on gravel and sand'.

Danish: Således Knud den Store, der i England renndi langskipum útan at eyrar grunni, ’lod sine skibe løbe op på grunden af grus/sand’.
English: For example, Knut the Great, who in England renndi langskipum útan at eyra grunni ‘allowed his ships to run aground on gravel and sand’.

Danish: Læs f.eks. teksten om kilderne her på hjemmesiden, og diskutér, hvor sikre vi kan være på vores viden.
English: For example, read the text on sources here on this website and discuss how certain we can be of our knowledge.

Danish: For eksempel kan vindmåleren godt stå af uden at der behøver være fejl på de øvrige målinger.
English: For example, the anemometer may have malfunctioned without there necessarily being errors in the other measurements.

Danish: Blandt andet er kølsvinet det eneste spor efter sejlet.
English: For example, the keelson is the only trace of the sail.

Danish: For eksempel historien om, at Havhingsten sidste sommer var nyhedsstof i aviser i Malaysia, Sydafrika og Færøerne for blot at nævne tre eksotiske lokaliteter.
English: For example, the story about how last summer the Sea Stallion featured in newspapers in Malaysia, South Africa, and the Faroe Islands – just to mention three exotic places.

Danish: Mange mønter fra Harald Blåtands kongetid var med kors.
English: For example, there is a cross on many coins from the reign of Harold Bluetooth's.

Danish: Mange mønter fra Harald Blåtands kongetid var med kors.
English: For example, there is a cross on many coins from the reign of Harold Bluetooth’s.

Danish: Eksempelvis pryder en helt enestående figur agterstævnen på hertug Vilhelms skib: En menneskeskikkelse, der blæser i et horn og peger fremad med en lanse i hånden.
English: For example, there is a quite remarkable figure that decorates the aft-stem of Duke William’s ship: A human figure that is blowing a horn and pointing forward with a lance in his hand.

Danish: Mød for eksempel Museumsdirektør Tinna Damgård-Sørensen, som startede på museet i 1982 som studentermedhjælper.
English: For example, you can meet Museum Director Tinna Damgård-Sørensen, who started working at the museum as a student assistant in 1982.

Danish: Til udstilling på byggepladsen fremstilledes et sæt dragter med forlæg i periodens mosefund.
English: For exhibition at the building site, a set of Iron-Age costumes was prepared based on contemporary bog-finds.

Danish: Yderligere oplysninger hos pressekoordinator Lars Normann, Havhingsten.
English: For further information, contact press coordinator, Lars Normann, the Sea Stallion.

Danish: For søfolk, der havde rejst i månedsvis, var det mindre væsentligt, om rejsen blev nogle dage længere, hvis man derved kunne finde den sikreste havn og det bedste marked.
English: For seamen who had travelled for months, it made little difference if the journey was a few days longer if a safe harbour and the best markets were the end result.

English: For seven weeks a producer and a camera man from BBC Timewatch History was part of the crew on the Sea Stallion's accompanying vessel to follow the archaeological experiment, the sail and the experiences that crew had during the voyage.

Danish: Skibet havde i over seks uger været hjem for besætningen og for de fleste var det svært at forstå at det nu var ved at være slut.

English: For the frames and knees, naturally crooked timbers where the fibres run along the lines of the hull are preferred to strengthen the construction.

English: For the last few months, the 10m long Viking boat has been exhibited in the departures hall of Copenhagen Airport, where the vessel has attracted much attention.

English: For the next 300 years, Scandinavian Vikings formed a large part of English history - as plunderers, merchants, mercenaries, conquerors, settlers and kings.

Danish: De næste seks måneder kommer bådeværftet igen til at genlyde af økser, der hugger i egetræ.

Danish: Til vagtholdene om natten har vi en natkasse i hvert rum.

English: For the people flying the helicopter the biggest challenge on board the Sea Stallion is the of 13 metres and the rig – meaning the rope on the ship.

Danish: Ved arbejdet med omkonserveringen måtte alle dele på ny pakkes separat og behandles med endnu større forsigtighed end tidligere på grund af den beskadigede indre struktur.
English: For the re-conservation, all the parts of the boat once again had to be packed separately and treated with great care because of the damage to the inner structure of the wood.

Danish: For Vikingeskibsmuseet er rejsen et enestående videnskabeligt eksperiment, der vil besvare tusinder af spørgsmål, som længe har undret historikere, arkæologer og skibsbyggere.
English: For the Roskilde Viking Ship Museum, the voyage will be a unique scientific experiment - one which will answer thousands of questions long considered by historians, archaeologists and boatbuilders.

English: For the Roskilde Viking Ship Museum, the voyage will be a unique scientific experiment – one which will answer thousands of questions long considered by historians, archaeologists and boatbuilders.

English: From Hundested near Roskilde Fjord to Scotland and Orkney Islands, the well equiped ship will be companion vessel.

English: From Hundested to the Orkneys, the Sea Stallion will be escorted by the specialized ship 'Cable One' from JD-Contractor in Holstebro.

Danish: Fra 1. juli 2007 indledes realtids formidlingen af forsøgsrejsen, og fra september 2007 udbygges materialet til undervisningsbrug.
English: From July 1st 2007 the real-time communication of the endeavour commences, and from September 2007 the material will be expanded for use in teaching.

Danish: Fra min egen tid om bord ved jeg, at der er gaster, som vil sætte pris på togter til sydligere og lunere himmelstrøg.
English: From my own time on board, I know that there are crew members who would appreciate voyages to more southerly and warmer latitudes.

Danish: De foreløbige undersøgelser antyder, at der er tale om en vikingetids longphort, eller skibsborg, ligesom dem, der omtales i annalerne ved f.eks. Dublin og Annagassan.
English: From preliminary investigations, it appears to have been a Viking longphort, or ship fortress, similar to those described in the annals at locations such as Dublin and Annagassan.

Danish: Fra suppegryden til Knud den Store
English: From soup pots to Knud the Great

Danish: Fra 840´erne begyndte vikingerne at overvintre og danne befæstede baser, kaldet Longphorts, hvorfra de siden engagerede sig i handel, opkrævede skatter og deltog som lejetropper i irernes indbyrdes stridigheder.
English: From the AD 840s, the Vikings began to over-winter and created fortified bases called, from which they later became engaged in trade, collected taxes and participated in Ireland's internal conflicts as mercenaries.

Danish: Fra begyndelsen af projektet ønskede vi at få mulighed for at sejle skibet til Dublin i 2007.
English: From the beginning of the project, we wanted to be able to sail the ship to Dublin in 2007.

Danish: Visionen var fra start at skabe et levende museum.
English: From the beginning, the vision has been to create a living museum.

Danish: Oven på volden var øjensynlig opbygget en palisade af træpæle, således at man fra bunden af voldgraven skulle 7-9 m op for at trænge over volden og ind i byen.
English: From the bottom of the moat the enemy had to force his way 7-9 m up to get over the rampart and into the town.

Danish: Uddrag fra arkæologernes dagligdag
English: From the daily life of the archaeologists:

Danish: Fra den tidligste stenalder og frem til i dag har det i høj grad maritime danske landskab påvirket de mennesker som gjorde ophold eller var bosat i området.
English: From the Early Stone Age until today, the maritime landscape of Denmark has influenced the people camping or settling in the area, both in terms of traffic, food resources and general organisational aspects of society.

Danish: Fra slutningen af 900-tallet findes huse med nedgravede kældre og tømrede vægge, der kan have været brugt som salgsboder ud mod gaden.
English: From the end of the 10th century there are houses with excavated cellars and timbered walls– they may have been used as market stalls facing out towards the street.

Danish: Fra enden af strømvektoren afsættes med passer den sejlede fart indtil den skærer den beholdne kurs.
English: From the end of the current vector the sailed speed is added with a pair of compasses so that it cuts the course made good.

Danish: Fra slutningen af 900-tallet synes størrelsen på de grupper af skibe, man opererer med, at vokse og der er oftest tale om 20-60 skibe, hvad enten det nu drejer sig om angribende eller forsvarende flåder.
English: From the end of the tenth century the numbers of the groups of ships that are involved seem to grow and it is generally a case of 20-60 ships, whether the ships are attacking or defending.

Danish: Ud fra rustområdets udstrækning er antallet skønnet til et minimum på 10-12 ringbrynjer.
English: From the extent of this area, it is estimated that there were a minimum of 10-12 chain mail coats originally deposited in the bog.

Danish: Forfra er det: klyver, fok, gaffel-storsejl med topsejl og agterst, mesansejlet.
English: From the fore: jib, foresail, gaff with topsail and mizzen.

Danish: Fra Køkkenhaven: Karse, kommen og sennep
English: From the garden: Cress, cumin and mustard

Danish: Fra det øjeblik 'Havhingsten' smider den sidste fortøjning i Museumshavnen den 21. juli og til skibet lægger til ved Toldboden i København den 10. august i, kan du følge rejsen online på vikingeskibsmuseets hjemmeside.
English: From the moment Sea Stallion casts off the last mooring lines in the Museum harbour on the 21st July and until the ship docks at Toldboden in Copenhagen on the 10th August, you can follow the voyage online at the Viking Ship Museum's website.

Danish: Fra det øjeblik 'Havhingsten' smider den sidste fortøjning i Museumshavnen den 21. juli og til skibet lægger til ved Toldboden i København den 10. august i, kan du følge rejsen online på vikingeskibsmuseets hjemmeside.
English: From the moment Sea Stallion casts off the last mooring lines in the Museum harbour on the 21st July and until the ship docks at Toldboden in Copenhagen on the 10th August, you can follow the voyage online at the Viking Ship Museum’s website.

Danish: Fra det øjeblik 'Havhingsten' smider den sidste fortøjning i Museumshavnen den 5. juli og til skibet vender hjem igen den 18. juli, kan du følge rejsen online på vikingeskibsmuseets hjemmeside.
English: From the moment Sea Stallion casts off the last mooring lines in the Museum harbour on the 5th July and until the ship returns to Roskilde on the 18th July, you can follow the voyage online at the Viking Ship Museum's website.

Danish: Fra de yderste kajpladser blev der hilst med tågehornene fra de mange fragtskibe.
English: From the outer quay's, the longship was saluted by foghorns from the many coasters and cargo vessels in the harbour.

Danish: Fra kajpladsen i Sønderborg havde vi udsigt til kongeskibet Dannebrog - og de gode folk om bord havde aftalt med kasernen, at vi måtte låne soldaternes køjesenge.
English: From the quay in Sønderborg we could see the royal yacht Dannebrog, and the good people on board arranged that we could bunk at the military base.

Danish: Fra kajpladsen i Sønderborg havde vi udsigt til kongeskibet Dannebrog – og de gode folk om bord havde aftalt med kasernen, at vi måtte låne soldaternes køjesenge.
English: From the quay in Sønderborg we could see the royal yacht Dannebrog, and the good people on board arranged that we could bunk at the military base.

Danish: Fra det Sydkinesiske Hav til Nordatlanten var århundrederne frem mod år 1000 opdagelsernes første store tidsalder - en tid, hvor skibe fandt vej til nye farvande, hvor nye lande blev opdaget, og nye havnebyer voksede frem langs kysterne.
English: From the South China Sea to the North Atlantic, the centuries leading up to the year 1000 were exploration's first great age - a time when ships found routes to uncharted waters, new lands were discovered, and new ports sprang up along coasts.

Danish: De tre sprydstagssejl hedder fra agter: Mesan, storsejl og fok.
English: From the stern, the three spritsails are the mizzen, the mainsail and the foresail.

Danish: Fra værkstedet kan du kan se de professionelle bådebyggere arbejde på Gislingebåden.
English: From the workshop, you can see the professional boatbuilders working on the Gislinge Boat.

Danish: Fra år 897 findes dog en indirekte beskrivelse, idet kong Alfred gav ordre til at
English: From the year 897 there is an indirect description, however, for king Alfred gave orders to:

Danish: Herfra drog to sønner og en datter til Danmark, hvorfra Sven Estridsen både i 1069 og 1075 sendte flåder til England til støtte for Vilhelms modstandere.
English: From there, two sons and a daughter travelled to Denmark, where Sven Estridsen sent fleets to England in support of William’s opponents in both 1069 and 1075.

Danish: Det skulle være muligt at få et forholdsvist præcist indtryk af forholdene ombord...
English: From these photos youy should be able to see how life on board is.

Danish: Naglet sammen
English: From trunk to stem

Danish: Fra to telefoner til højteknologi
English: From two phones to high-tech

English: From VIKING to the SEA STALLION - rekonstructions of Viking ships through time

English: From VIKING to the SEA STALLION – rekonstructions of Viking ships through time

English: From wreck to reconstruction

English: Full sail

English: Full scale reconstruction.

Danish: Heldagskursus i at sejle vikingeskib
English: Full-day cours 'Learn to sail a Viking ship'

Danish: Dagskursus i sejlads
English: Full-day sailing course

Danish: Bælterne og Øresund blev dannet, og Østersøen blev salt.
English: Funen became an island, the Sound between Denmark and Sweden was formed, and the Baltic Sea became salt.

Danish: Fura, fyr, omtales derimod sjældent.
English: Fura ‘pine', on the other hand is rarely mentioned.

Danish: Fura, fyr, omtales derimod sjældent.
English: Fura ‘pine’, on the other hand is rarely mentioned.

Danish: I vikingetiden var der fri passage, så vikingerne kunne sejle mod England på togt.
English: Further East, near the ring fort, Aggersborg, the vikings probably had to haul their ships over to reach the open sea.

Danish: Formålet var at udføre sejladsforsøg for at klarlægge skibets sejlegenskaber og sødygtighed under forskellige vejrforhold i forskellige farvandstyper.
English: Further experiments was conducted to establish sailing characteristics and seaworthiness on different types of seas and weather conditions.

Danish: Yderligere oplysninger
English: Further Info

Danish: Det første private skibsværft var allerede blevet anlagt ved Grønnegaard Havn af den Skotske skibsbygmester David Balfour, som byggede flere skibe til Christian IV´s orlogsflåde.
English: Further investigation of the documented hull parts will provide new material relating to this ship type, that may be associated with the early flutes.

Danish: Hertil skal man regne med at den enkelte skibstype er ballastet og lastet rigtigt.
English: Further to all this, it is vital that the individual types of ship are ballasted and loaded correctly.

Danish: Derudover kom produktionen af tjære, tovværk, sejl, farver osv.
English: Further to this came the production of tar, rope, sail, dyes etc.

Danish: Derudover har sygeplejersken lavet sundhedsattester som samtlige besætningsmedlemmer har udfyldt.
English: Further to this the nurse and the skipper have produced bills of health to be completed by all members of the crew.

Danish: Derudover havde Havhingsten en del kommunikationsudstyr med på turen til Dublin.
English: Further to this the Sea Stallion will also carry a great deal of communications equipment on its expeditions.

Danish: Derudover har man tydelige spor efter smeden, ben- og kammageren, lædersmeden, smykkesmeden og møntmesteren.
English: Further to this there is clear evidence of the blacksmith, the bone worker, the comb maker, the leather smith, the jeweller and the mintmaster.

Danish: Herudover har kølsvinet været gjort fast med en række små knæ, der har siddet på siderne og tildels hen over kølsvinet og holdt det fast til bundstokkene.
English: Further to this, the keelson has been held in place by a series of small knees which were located on the sides and partially in over the keelson and which secured it to the floor timbers.

Danish: Derudover har krigerne beskyttet sig med:
English: Further to this, the warriors protected themselves with:

Danish: Der er derudover regler for grundig håndvask inden madlavning og efter alle toiletbesøg; også selvom man tisser ud over siden.
English: Further to this, there were rules concerning thorough washing of hands prior to cooking and after all visits to the toilet - also in the event of urinating over the ship's side.

Danish: Længere oppe er skibssiden blevet forstærket af stringere, lange kraftige lister, som var placeret på indersiden af en bordgangs overkant.
English: Further up, the ship's sides had been reinforced with stringers, long, robust wooden strips affixed to the inner surface of the upper edge of a strake.

Danish: Længere oppe er skibssiden blevet forstærket af stringere, lange kraftige lister, som var placeret på indersiden af en bordgangs overkant.
English: Further up, the ship’s sides had been reinforced with stringers, long, robust wooden strips affixed to the inner surface of the upper edge of a strake.

Danish: Der arbejdes desuden på at arrangere publikumsaktiviteter og vikingemarked på kajen.
English: Furthermore activities for the public and a Viking fair are being arranged on the pier.

Danish: Derudover skal vi undersøge livet om bord bl.a. besætningens sundhed, kost og vandforbrug samt søvn.
English: Furthermore we are examining life on board – the health of the crew, food, water consumption and sleep.

Danish: Endvidere er det usædvanligt at skibets jernnagler, i lighed med Roskilde 2’s, har pigge på undersiden af hovederne.
English: Furthermore, it is unusual that the ship’s iron dowels, like those in Roskilde 2, have spikes on the underside of the heads.

Danish: I øvrigt er det jo ikke givet, at vi skal sejle alle 360 sømil i ét stræk.
English: Furthermore, it isn’t certain that we will sail all 360 nautical miles in one stretch.

Danish: Fordi skibene ikke kunne bevares, da det blev anset for omkostningskrævende af den daværende rigsantikvar, blev det muligt ved hjælp at totalstationsopmålingen at producere en grundig dokumentation og forskningsdata af en høj kvalitet inden for den korte periode, som blev stillet til rådighed.
English: Furthermore, it was possible to explain how it had been possible to shape not only the bottom, but also the turn of the bilge, by means of cleats, which are wooden battens spiked across the planks to hold them together while the shell is assembled.

Danish: Modelbygningen gjorde det også mulig at afklare, hvordan det havde været muligt at bygge ikke kun bunden, men også kimmingen, ved hjælp af klamper, små træklodser, som sømmes på tværs af bordplankerne for at midlertidig fæstne dem indbydes under opførelsen af den kravelbyggede skal.
English: Furthermore, it was possible to explain how it had been possible to shape not only the bottom, but also the turn of the bilge, by means of cleats, which are wooden battens spiked across the planks to hold them together while the shell is assembled.

Danish: Desuden forandrer naturen sig konstant i henseende til øjeblikkelig vindstyrke, vindretning og bølgedannelse.
English: Furthermore, natural conditions change constantly with regard to the immediate wind force, wind direction and wave formation.

Danish: Mange havde endvidere medbragt våde klude til daglig afvaskning af ansigt, hænder m.m. og når besætningen bader, medbringer mange deres tøj og får det vasket samtidig.
English: Furthermore, several crewmembers had taken along wet wipes for daily washing of their face, hands etc. When the crewmembers went bathing, many took their clothes with them and washed them at the same time.

Danish: Projektet forsøgte samtidig at belyse en række kulturhistoriske spørgsmål vedrørende sammenhængen mellem langskibene og datidens samfund.
English: Furthermore, the project intended to provide a better public understanding of the importance of our maritime cultural heritage.

Danish: Skibsfundene er desuden eksempler på den særegne nordiske håndværks- og designtradition, der høster anerkendelse internationalt såvel i dag som i fortiden.
English: Furthermore, the ship-finds exemplify the unique Nordic craft and design tradition, which received as much acclaim in the past as it does today.

Danish: Endvidere udforsker vi skibets sejlegenskaber og belyser kulturhistoriske problemstillinger, der berører samspillet mellem fortidens skibe og samfund.
English: Furthermore, we investigate the ship's sailing characteristics and illustrate a number of cultural-historical issues that concern the interaction between ships and society in the past.

Danish: Endvidere udforsker vi skibets sejlegenskaber og belyser kulturhistoriske problemstillinger, der berører samspillet mellem fortidens skibe og samfund.
English: Furthermore, we investigate the ship’s sailing characteristics and illustrate a number of cultural-historical issues that concern the interaction between ships and society in the past.

English: Future archaeological research may shed more light onto the early history of Hanseatic seafaring in Danish waters and the kind of ships which were used by Danish and German merchants in the 13th century.

English: Gisle, as the boat was named, was built as the focus of the Museum's Gislinge Boat Open Source Boatbuilding Project - a new, multi-disciplinary approach to boatbuilding that sought to involve the public as much as possible in the boatbuilding process, both here at the Museum and online via social media.

English: Gislinge Project Update: To date, saw marks have never been found on ship finds from the Viking and early Middle Ages, even though small saws from this period have been found archaeologically.

English: Given the nature of archaeological remains, they are hardly representative in a statistical sense but their very existence and size make them significant bodies of evidence.

English: He cannot imagine putting down his camera, and already has his head filled with ideas, to be realised: small and peculiar maritime environments that deserve documentation - and which Werner Karrasch can photograph in his own unique way.

English: He was a thane in Norfolk and a benefactor of the St Benet’s Abbey, Holme, which probably provided the royal ship and whose abbot, Aelfweald, had served in King Harold’s coast guard against William and also had to seek refuge in Denmark.

Danish: Agt, fyrste, på - du kan og måversenes fald, blir der lyd i hal.

Danish: Citat: "Hvad betyder denne blodregn under fasten i st.

English: He wrote: "What means this rain of blood during Lent in St Peter's church in the town of York, which fell threateningly from the roof to the north, although the sky was cloudless?

English: Hear about the time spent waiting and being becalmed in Norway, the icy nights in Scotland, the stormy gales, seasickness and the fantastic reception when the ship reached the Danish coast after 13 month absence in 2008.

English: Heavy charring in many places on the hull reveal that it apparently had been filled with combustible material and sent out in flames into Hedeby's harbour - perhaps to set light to other ships which lay there.

English: Heavy charring in many places on the hull reveal that it apparently had been filled with combustible material and sent out in flames into Hedeby's harbour – perhaps to set light to other ships which lay there.

English: Here, we got the chance to explore details such as the diameter and section of rivet holes, and the roves that once held them in place, the decorative profiles on the floor timbers, the angles of the keel and the finer details of the wooden treenails that secured the frames to the hull.

English: If the pointer can be extended and retracted, or a number of circles are drawn on the plate, the instrument can be used at several latitudes.

Danish: Hvis resultaterne skal have kulturhistorisk værdi, må de endvidere gennemføres under realistiske forhold.
English: If the results are to have culturally historic value, they must be carried out in realistic conditions.

Danish: Bliver sejlet for bredt i forhold til skroget og skrogformen, søger skibet væk fra vinden - bliver lægirig - og kan ikke krydse op mod vinden.
English: If the sail is too broad relative to the hull and the shape of the hull, the ship seeks away from the wind - it has lee helm, and cannot tack against the wind.

Danish: Bliver sejlet for bredt i forhold til skroget og skrogformen, søger skibet væk fra vinden – bliver lægirig - og kan ikke krydse op mod vinden.
English: If the sail is too broad relative to the hull and the shape of the hull, the ship seeks away from the wind – it has lee helm, and cannot tack against the wind.

Danish: Bliver sejlet for lavt, er skibet for langsomt, og det sejler først ordentligt når det virkelig blæser.
English: If the sail is too low, the ship will sail too slowly and it will first sail properly when the wind is very strong.

Danish: Bliver sejlet for smalt, løber skibet op i vinden uden at roret kan hindre det - bliver luvgirig.
English: If the sail is too narrow, the ship turns into the wind without the rudder being able to prevent this - it has weather helm.

Danish: Bliver sejlet for smalt, løber skibet op i vinden uden at roret kan hindre det – bliver luvgirig.
English: If the sail is too narrow, the ship turns into the wind without the rudder being able to prevent this – it has weather helm.

Danish: Bliver sejlet og masten for højt, er belastningerne for store, og der skal rebes for tidligt.
English: If the sail, and with it the mast, is too high, the load is too great and it is necessary to reef the sail too early.

Danish: Ønskes det samme motiv til flere medier f.eks. tryk, e-bog samt web-spin-off af samme udgivelse, tillægges reproduktionsafgiften 50 % pr. medie.
English: If the same motif is required for multiple media such as print, e-book and web spin-off from the print or e-book publication, the reproduction fee is conferred with 50% per year media.

Danish: Hvis skibet ikke fungerer som helhed, eller hvis enkeltdele slår fra, må vi revurdere rekonstruktionen.
English: If the ship does not function well, as a whole or in part, we will have to re-evaluate the reconstruction.

Danish: Er skibet for svagt bygget, bøjer det for meget under disse påvirkninger og kan brydes i stykker.
English: If the ship is too slightly built, it flexes too much under these conditions and can break up.

Danish: Hvis kilden selv angiver disse, skal rigtigheden heraf testes.
English: If the source itself states these facts they should be checked.

Danish: Hvis træet er snoet, vil kløvet også sno.
English: If the tree is twisted, the cleaving will also follow this twist.

Danish: Hvis vejret er lidt råt, kan vi rebe sejlet, så er der mere ro på skibet, og vi går natten i møde med ro i sindet.
English: If the weather is a little raw, we can reef the sail so the ship is quieter and we can meet the night with serenity of mind.

Danish: Hvis vinden kommer fra vest og man sejler mod syd og skal "spidse op", hvad vej drejer man så - mod bagbord eller styrbord?
English: If the wind is coming from the west and the ship is sailing south and must luff, which way does it turn - to port or to starboard?

Danish: Efter et stop på Orkneyøerne vil skib og besætning stå overfor den vanskeligste del af rejsen, farvandene nord og vest for Skotland, som siges at være Europas farligste og nogle af de vanskeligste i verden at besejle.
English: If the wind is easterly The Sea Stallion will continue its expedition after a short stop at Kirkwall and set out for the most dangerous part; the challenging waters north and west of Scotland said to be the most dangerous waters in Europe.

Danish: Hvis der på samme tid er megen vind, kan det gøre sejladsen vanskeligere.
English: If there, at the same time is a lot of wind, sailing can be difficult.

Danish: Mødte de ikke op eller nægtede at sejle af sted, blev de pålagt en bøde.
English: If they did not report for duty or refused to sail they were issued with a fine.

Danish: Mødte de ikke op til sejladsen, eller nægtede de at tage afsted, fik de en bøde.
English: If they did not turn up, of if they refused to sail with the ship, they were issued with a fine.

Danish: Passer de ikke ordenligt sammen risikerer man at bordene flækker når de bliverklinket sammen - så bliver båden læk.
English: If they don't fit well together, you risk cracking the planks when they are nailed together - and then the boat will leak.

Danish: Hvis de ligger i områder, hvor landet falder tørt ved ebbe, er bunden på båden konstrueret så båden ikke vælter.
English: If they lie in areas where there is dry land at ebb tide, the bottom of the boat is constructed so it will not fall over.

Danish: Rettes dette ikke, er skibet farligt at sejle med, ja ubrugeligt som sejlskib.
English: If this is not corrected, the ship is dangerous to sail - in fact it is useless as a sailing vessel.

Danish: Rettes dette ikke, er skibet farligt at sejle med, ja ubrugligt som sejlskib.
English: If this is not corrected, the ship is dangerous to sail - in fact it is useless as a sailing vessel.

Danish: Rettes dette ikke, er skibet farligt at sejle med, ja ubrugeligt som sejlskib.
English: If this is not corrected, the ship is dangerous to sail – in fact it is useless as a sailing vessel.

Danish: Rettes dette ikke, er skibet farligt at sejle med, ja ubrugligt som sejlskib.
English: If this is not corrected, the ship is dangerous to sail – in fact it is useless as a sailing vessel.

Danish: Har to spillere højeste kort, vender alle et kort igen og så får den spiller med højeste kort alle kort, også fra den forrige omgang.
English: If two players have cards of the same value, then all the players turn another card and the player with the highest card this time takes all the cards - also those from the previous round.

Danish: Har to spillere højeste kort, vender alle et kort igen og så får den spiller med højeste kort alle kort, også fra den forrige omgang.
English: If two players have cards of the same value, then all the players turn another card and the player with the highest card this time takes all the cards – also those from the previous round.

Danish: Sejler vi ude midt i Nordsøen, ved vi, det vil vare cirka to timer, inden helikopteren er fremme.
English: If we are lying in the middle of the North See, it will take a least two hours before at helicopter will reach us.

Danish: Hvis vi skal krydse vil det blive en alt for urolig sejlads med risiko for at trampe på de sovende.
English: If we are to tack, it would a much too disturbed voyage with a risk of trampling on the sleepers.

Danish: Hvis vi går ud fra at hovedparten af den danske hær omkom, og i øvrigt vælger at tro på tallene i beskrivelsen, giver det en gennemsnitlig besætningsstørrelse på 37-38 personer.
English: If we assume that the greatest part of the Danish army was killed, and incidentally elect to believe the figures mentioned in the account, this would give an average crew size of 37-38 men.

Danish: Hvis vi bliver klogere på det, finder vi også ud af mere om samfundet dengang både politisk og økonomisk” siger forskningskoordinator ved Vikingeskibsmuseet Morten Ravn.
English: If we can gain a firmer understanding of this issue, we also stand to gain a greater insight into both the political and economic aspects of society at that time” tells Morten Ravn, Research Co-ordinator at the Viking Ship Museum.

Danish: Hvis vi kommer ind i en periode med højtryksvejr/sommervejr, hvor der bliver opbygget et højtryk over den Skandinaviske Halvø, kan det give problemer problemer for turen til Gotland.
English: If we enter a period with high pressure/summer weather, where a high pressure system forms over Scandinavia, this may lead to problems for the trip to Gotland.

Danish: Får vi den rigtige vind, er der faktisk en mulighed for, at vi går hele vejen til Portsmouth non stop.
English: If we get the right wind, there is in fact a chance that we will go all the way to Portsmouth non stop.

Danish: Hvis vi havde kløvet det samme træ ud, vil jeg tro, at vi kunne have fået 16 - 24 planker ud af det.
English: If we had cleaved the same tree, we estimate that we would only have gotten 16 - 24 planks out of it.

Danish: Hvis vi har en lignende båd i vores samling, kan du eventuelt få en tur, måske vil det hjælpe dig til, at træffe det endelige valg.
English: If we have a similar boat in our collection, we can take you out for a trip.

Danish: Hvis vi har indsat dele, der ikke fungerer, vil de gå i stykker, eller de vil slå fra ved ikke at virke efter hensigten.
English: If we have added pieces that do not work they will brake or not work intentionally.

Danish: Når der ses bort fra grafittien, er det tilsyneladende først i senmiddelalderen, at vi i Nordeuropa begynder at se forsøg på realistiske skibsafbildninger.
English: If we ignore graffiti, it is apparently not until the Late Middle Ages that we in Northern Europe began to see attempts at realistic ship-delineations.

Danish: Kobler vi det sammen med de arkæologiske kilders udsagn om, at skibene også synes at blive større og større, og dermed kan have flere og flere krigere ombord, får vi indtrykket at en krigsførelse, som vokser voldsomt i størrelse og omfang i løbet af vikingetiden.
English: If we link this with the evidence of the archaeological sources showing that the ships were becoming larger and larger, and hence able to have more and more warriors on board, we get the impression that the scale of warfare increased greatly both in respect to size and number as time went on.

Danish: Hvis vi sejlede et par gange til Dublin eller det engelske område om året i 25 år med Havhingsten, så tror jeg, at den ville være meget mere fleksibel at sejle med end den er nu, på grund af at alt har bevæget sig så mange gange.
English: If we sailed the Sea Stallion a couple of times a year to Dublin or the British Isles for 25 years, I think it would be much more flexible to sail with than it is now because everything would have moved so many times.

Danish: Er vi flere dage et sted (og vel at mærke, hvis vi ved, at vi er der flere dage), kan vi bestille varer.
English: If we spend several days in one place (and we know, we are going to stay there, mind you), we can order supplies.

Danish: Hvis vi vil opretholde en selvstændig dansk/nordisk kultur, må vi værne om den”.
English: If we want to preserve an independent Danish/Scandinavian culture, we must look after it.

Danish: Ved du allerede, hvilket laug du vil være medlem af, markerer du blot dit ønske i ansøgningsskemaet.
English: If you already know which guild you would like to be a part of note this in your application.

Danish: Hvis du er fiks på fingrene kan du lave samme øvelse med en træmodel.
English: If you are good with your hands you can try to carry out the same exercise with a wooden model.

Danish: Hvis du beder folk i dag om at beskrive, hvordan en viking ser ud, får du ofte følgende svar:
English: If you ask somebody today to describe the appearance of a Viking, you will often receive an answer along these lines:

Danish: Har du spørgsmål, så mød op til en snak og en smagsprøve på langskibets kunnen
English: If you have any questions, meet us for a talk or a taste of the longships abilities.

Danish: Hvis du har bestilt flere varer, og der i blandt er en vare, hvor der er leveringstid, vil vi kontakte dig for at aftale nærmere.
English: If you have ordered several items, and one of these has a longer delivery time, we will contact you to make an arrangement concerning delivery.

Danish: Spørgsmål vedrørende arkivet stilles til museumsinspektør Morten Ravn:
English: If you have quiries regarding the archices please contact curator Morten Ravn:

Danish: Hvis du har læst afsnittet om bestikregning, vil du vide, at det er yderst vigtigt hele tiden at vide hvor man er til søs - og hvis man ikke ved det med sikkerhed (for eksempel på grund at tåge), gælder det om at gætte så godt som overhovedet muligt!
English: If you have read the section on "Dead reckoning", you will know that it is crucial always to know your position when sailing - and if you cannot be absolutely sure (for example due to fog) then it is important to estimate as precisely as at all possible!

Danish: Hvis man har mulighed for at se strømmen løbe forbi en pynt, en bøje eller noget andet faststående, kan man med lidt øvelse skønne sig til dens styrke; helt på samme måde som man kan bestemme skibets egen fart.
English: If you have the opportunity to watch the current run past a point, a buoy or something else stationary, it is possible with a little practice to estimate its strength in exactly the same way as the ship's own speed can be determined.

Danish: Hvis man har mulighed for at se strømmen løbe forbi en pynt, en bøje eller noget andet faststående, kan man med lidt øvelse skønne sig til dens styrke; helt på samme måde som man kan bestemme skibets egen fart.
English: If you have the opportunity to watch the current run past a point, a buoy or something else stationary, it is possible with a little practice to estimate its strength in exactly the same way as the ship’s own speed can be determined.

Danish: Er du på besøg med mindre børn, kan de bygge deres egen model-båd i det åbne værksted, der ligeledes er at finde på værftspladsen.
English: If you have younger children with you, they are welcome to build their own model boat in the open workshop that's also located at the boatyard.

Danish: Hvis du ved, hvor meget vand og mad en given besætning forbruger pr. time, kan du regne fartrosen om til en aktionsradius-rose.
English: If you know how much water and food a given crew consumes per hour, the speed diagram can be converted to an operational radius diagram.

Danish: Hvis du gik rundt og troende, at vikingerne udelukkende åd råt kød, så bør du udfordre dine fordomme, når der serveres spidstegt vildsvin, lam og ged garneret med sirupsyltede hasselnødder og stikkelsbærkompot, salat af sommer- og spidskål med æbler, kvansirup samt fladbrød.
English: If you think that the Vikings only ate raw meat, then you should challenge your prejudices and treat yourself to spit-roasted wild boar, lamb and goat garnished with syrup-pickled hazelnuts and stewed gooseberries, salad made from summer and spring cabbage with apples, angelica syrup and flat bread.

Danish: Hvis man bruger opvarmede sten i forbindelse med madlavningen så husk, at det aldrig må være flintesten fordi de springer.
English: If you want to use pot boilers (heated stones) in your cooking, remember never to use flint stones because these explode and shatter when heated.

Danish: Ønsker I at jeres rundvisning skal være helt særlig, kan I booke en rundvisning efter lukketid og få den ekstra dimension til jeres besøg.
English: If you want your guided tour to be something really special, you can book a tour after closing time and add an extra dimension to your visit.

Danish: Hvis du ønsker dellevering, skal du oprette flere bestillinger.
English: If you wish several items to be delivered separately, you must order them individually.

Danish: Hvis du ønsker at bytte en vare til f.eks. anden størrelse, kan varen returneres med kopi af ordrebekræftelse og angivelse af bytteønsket.
English: If you wish to exchange the item (eg. to a larger size etc), the item can be returned with a copy of your order confirmation and a description of the item you wish to acquire in return.

Danish: Ønsker I en helt særlig rundvisning, hvor I har stor indflydelse på indholdet, er det muligt at bestille specialist-rundvisninger med en museumsinspektør eller bådebygger om et udvalgt emne til en særlig gruppe.
English: If you wish to have a special tour, where you can have an influence on the content, it’s possible to book a specialist tour on a specific subject for a specific group, with a museum curator or boatbuilder.

Danish: Vejer din forsendelse under 2 kilo, og har en værdi under 1000 kr, så sendes den som maxi-brev.
English: If your order weighs less than 2 kilos, and is valued at under 1000kr, it will be sent as a large letter.

Danish: Vejer din forsendelse over 2 kilo eller har en på værdi 1000 kr. eller derover, sendes den altid som pakke og du får automatisk muligheden for, som kunde, at følge dit køb via track-and-trace til pakken når din hoveddør eller nærmeste posthus.
English: If your purchase weighs over 2 kilos or is valued at more than 1000kr, it will always be sent as a package and you will automatically be able to follow your purchase via track-and-trace until the package is delivered to your door or the nearest post office.

Danish: Hvis dit skib på kurs 110°, 5 knob påvirkes af en sydgående (180°) strøm på 1,5 knob, tegner du den i forlængelse af den første vektor.
English: If your ship on course 110°, making 5 knots, is influenced by a southwards (180°) current of 1.5 knots, you draw this in extension of the first vector.

Danish: Hvis der undervejs bliver sejlet på mange (alle?) forskellige kurser i forhold til vinden, vil det efterfølgende være muligt at udarbejde fartroser baseret på et stort antal målinger.
English: If, during the voyage, the ship sails at many (or even all) angles to the wind, it will subsequently be possible to calculate speed roses on the basis of a large number of recordings.

Danish: Drejer man derimod op imod vinden, kaldes det en stagvending; man går over stag.
English: If, however, the boat turns up against the wind, this is termed tacking.

Danish: Skal man derimod finde ud af, hvad man skal styre for at ende på en bestemt kurs, bliver det lidt mere indviklet.
English: If, on the other hand, you want to find out how to steer to end up on a particular course, the situation becomes a little more complicated.

Danish: Sygdomme til søs
English: Illness at sea

Danish: Smukt Illustreret med fotos af Werner Karrasch og tegninger.
English: Illustrated with Photos of Werner Karrasch and drawings.

Danish: Tegning: Flemming Bau.
English: Illustration: Flemming Bau.

Danish: Illustrationer: Marianne Bloch Hansen
English: Illustrations: Marianne Bloch Hansen

Danish: Billeder og skrift på mønterne var nemlig en vigtig måde at viderebringe budskaber på.
English: Images and inscriptions on coins soon became an important way of communicating a message.

Danish: Havhingsten sejlads fra Liste til Egersund den 14. juli.
English: Images from Lista to Egersund, Norway on the 14th of July.

Danish: Billederne må ikke videresælges, kopieres eller udlånes til tredjemand uden Vikingeskibsmuseets skriftlige tilladelse.
English: Images may not to be sold, copied or borrowed to a third party without the written permission of the Viking Ship Museum.

Danish: Billederne må ikke udsættes for sammenklipning, sammenkopiering eller elektronisk manipulation uden Vikingeskibsmuseets skriftlige tilladelse.
English: Images must not be subject to any kind of superimposition, pasting, trimming or electronic manipulation without a written permission from the museum.

Danish: Sejladsbilleder fra det Irske hav
English: Images of the Sea Stallion sailing in the Irish Sea

Danish: Billeder på Internettet skal publiceres i lav opløsning, max. 1000 pixels bred.
English: Images used on the Internet are to be published in low-resolution only, max 1000 pixels wide.

Danish: Billeder på Internettet skal publiceres i lav opløsning.
English: Images used on the Internet are to be published in low-resolution only.

Danish: Forestil dig, at du levede I vikingetiden og var munk I klosteret ved Glendalough.
English: Imagine living in the Viking Age and being a monk in the monastery at Glendalough.

Danish: Forestil dig nu, at du fra 13:02 til 15:17 har sejlet i 3 knob sydgående strøm.
English: Imagine that from 13:02 to 15:17 you have sailed in a 3 knot southwards current.

Danish: Forestil dig, at du er en Viking.
English: Imagine that you are a Viking.

Danish: Forestil dig at du er landstræner for fodboldlandsholdet og skal sige de sidste ord til dine spillere inden de går på banen for at få dem til at give alt hvad de har i sig - find inspiration i skjaldedigte fra vikingetiden og skriv din tale til spilleren med skjaldens ord.
English: Imagine that you are the head coach of the national football team and you are having a final word with your players before they run on to the pitch; you want them to give their all in the game - look for inspiration in the skaldic epics from Viking times and write your speech to the players using the words of a skald.

Danish: Forestil dig, at du levede i vikingetiden og var munk i klosteret ved Glendalough.
English: Imagine that you lived in Viking times and were a monk in the monastery at Glendalough.

Danish: Forestil dig, at du levede I vikingetiden og var munk I klosteret ved Glendalough.
English: Imagine that you lived in Viking times and were a monk in the monastery at Glendalough.

Danish: Imme Gram blev det første skib i en lang række af danske vikingeskibsrekonstruktioner, bygget af spejderne.
English: Imme Gram became the first in a long series of Danish Viking ship reconstructions built by boy scouts.

Danish: Kursernes gennemførelse afhænger af antal tilmeldinger, som derfor er nødvendig.
English: Implementation of the course will depend on the number of participants, so advance registration is therefore required.

Danish: Importér sejladsdata i dit GIS-system.
English: Import the voyage data into your GIS.

Danish: Vigtige datoer:
English: Important Dates

Danish: Vigtigt med lokalt kendskab
English: Important local knowledge

Danish: Vigtige dele, som den nederste del af forstævnen samt kølsvinet, blev fundet i god stand.
English: Important parts, such as the lower part of the stempost and the keelson were found in a good state of preservation.

Danish: Vigtigt - Gem aldrig bålmad til næste dag, heller ikke i køleskab.
English: Important: Never keep campfire food until the next day, not even in a refrigerator.

Danish: I 1069 udløstes angreb mod England fra såvel Dublin som fra Danmark, hvorfra kongen sendte en stor flåde.
English: In 1069 new attacks were made on England from Dublin, and the same year King Sven of Denmark sent a large fleet.

Danish: Allerede i 1600 skrev Peder Claussøn Friis om kanalen i bogen ’Norriges oc Omliggende Øers Sandfærdige Bescriffuelse’.
English: In 1600 Peder Claussøn Friis wrote about the canal in ’Norriges oc Omliggende Øers Sandfærdige Bescriffuelse’.

Danish: Bl.a. oplevede den svenske naturhistoriker Carl von Linné i 1732 et nefatavl-lignende spil spillet i Lapland.
English: In 1732, the Swedish naturalist Carl von Linné encountered a game resembling nefatavl being played in Lapland.

Danish: I 1840 fandt nogle arbejdere, der var i færd med at bygge en jernbane langs kysten ved Larne, et mandsskelet og flere genstande.
English: In 1840 a male skeleton and a number of artefacts were discovered by workmen constructing a railway line along the seashore at Larne.

Danish: I 1852 startede den professionelle arkæologiske udforskning af vikingetidens skibsbyggeri.
English: In 1852 began professional archaeological research into Viking Age shipbuilding.

Danish: Under udgravningen af gravkammeret i 1861 var det umuligt for arkæologerne at komme ind ad den oprindelige indgang, så de måtte i stedet grave en skakt ned fra toppen af højen.
English: In 1861, when the burial chamber was being excavated, it was impossible for the archaeologists to get into the original entrance passage, so instead they had to cut a shaft from the top of the mound.

Danish: I 1882 blev et af de vigtigste vikingegravfund gjort i sandklitterne ved Kiloran Bay på nordvestkysten af Colonsay.
English: In 1882 one of the most important discoveries of a Viking burial site was found in the sand dunes at the Kiloran Bay on the northwest coast of Colonsay.

Danish: I 1902 fik Jens Peder Alfred Jensen en søn, Knud.
English: In 1902 Jens Peder Alfred Jensen had a son, Knud.

Danish: Den fremtrædende svenske filolog Hjalmar Falk fremlagde i 1912 sine studier af de overleverede maritime ord og betegnelser som fandtes i digtning og sagatekster.
English: In 1912, the prominent Swedish philologist Hjalmar Falk presented his studies of the maritime words and terms surviving in poems and saga texts.

Danish: I 1921-22 gennemførte konservator Gustav Rosenberg for museet en totalundersøgelse af den lille kedelmose på ca. 45 x 50 m, beliggende 42 m over havet og 3-4 km fra kysten.
English: In 1921-22, conservator Gustav Rosenberg, on behalf of the museum, undertook a thorough investigation of the small, ca 45 x 50 m bog, lying 42 m above sea level and 3.4 km from the coast.

Danish: I 1922 koncentreredes arbejdet om båden, der var stærkt beskadiget ved tørvegravning, men hvoraf der dog var bevaret betydelige partier over en længde på ca. 14 m med dele af begge stævne, orienteret nord-syd.
English: In 1922, attention was concentrated on the boat, which had been severely damaged by the peat digging, although considerable sections were preserved for a length of about 14 m with parts of both stems, indicating a north-south orientation.

Danish: I 1946, under udgravninger på den nordlige del af øen, fandt arkæologer en gravlagt vikingekriger dateret til 800-tallet.
English: In 1946, during excavations on the north of the island, archaeologists found a burried Viking warrior from 800 AD.

Danish: I 1962, blev resterne af fem vikingeskibe udgravet ved Skuldelev på Roskilde fjord.
English: In 1962, the remains of five Viking Age ships were excavated near Skuldelev on Roskilde Fjord.

Danish: I 1962 kom resterne af fem vikingeskibe op af dyndet på bunden af Roskilde Fjord.
English: In 1962, the remains of five Viking ships emerged from the mud at Roskilde Fjord.

Danish: Allerede en autoritet indenfor vikingetidens skibsbygning, besøgte Ole Crumlin-Pedersen Polen i 1964, hvor han vurderede skibsvragene fundet i 1933-34 og fastslog deres slaviske oprindelse.
English: In 1964 this scholar, already an authority on Viking Age shipbuilding, visited Poland and evaluated wrecks found in 1933-34, establishing their Slavonic provenance.

Danish: I 1965 blev værftet købt af aktieselskabet Roskilde Bådeværft A/S bestående af Klaus Baes, Søren Thorsen og Frederik Hansen.
English: In 1965 the boatyard was bought by the public company Roskilde Boatyard A/S, comprised of Klaus Baes, Søren Thorsen and Frederik Hansen.

Danish: I 1965 blev der skaffet midler til at nedtage båden og omkonservere alle dele ved udtrækning af alun, glycerin, voks mv. og nyimprægnering med polyætylenglykol (PEG).
English: In 1965, it was finally financially possible to dismantle the boat in order to re-conserve it with polyethylene-glycol (PEG).

Danish: I 1974 opbevarede Vikingeskibshallen sin mindre samling af traditionelle nordiske fartøjer ved Kattinge Værk ca. 6 km vest for Roskilde.
English: In 1974 the Viking Ship Museum stored its smaller collection of traditional Nordic vessels in Kattinge Værk, approximately 6km west of Roskilde.

Danish: I 1977 befordrede færgerne 1,3 millioner personer og 658.000 motorkøretøjer over sundet.
English: In 1977, the ferries carried 1.3 million persons and 658,000 vehicles over the sound.

Danish: Søren Thirslund blev pensioneret i 1981 og tilknyttet Handels og Søfartsmuseet på Kronborg i Helsingør som frivillig ekspert indenfor navigation.
English: In 1981 Søren Thirslund retired and became attached to the Danish Maritime Museum at Kronborg Castle, Elsinore as voluntary expert in navigation.

Danish: I 1982, tyve år efter udgravningen, begyndte Vikingeskibsmuseet på byggeriet af museets første rekonstruerede vikingeskib.
English: In 1982, twenty years after the excavation, the Viking Ship Museum began building its first Viking ship reconstruction.

Danish: I årene 1984 og 1985 foretoges testsejladser med Vikingeskibsmuseets første rekonstruktion af det bedst bevarede skib i Skuldelevfundet, det lille handelsskib Skuldelev 3.
English: In 1984 and 1985 trial voyages were carried out with the Viking Ship Museum's first reconstruction of the best preserved ship from the Skuldelev site - the small merchant ship Skuldelev 3.

Danish: I årene 1984 og 1985 foretoges testsejladser med Vikingeskibsmuseets første rekonstruktion af det bedst bevarede skib i Skuldelevfundet, det lille handelsskib Skuldelev 3.
English: In 1984 and 1985 trial voyages were carried out with the Viking Ship Museum’s first reconstruction of the best preserved ship from the Skuldelev site – the small merchant ship Skuldelev 3.

Danish: I 1985 lykkedes det at oprette en bådebyggerstilling, som blev besat af Freddy Kristiansen, der selv havde stået i lære på værftet sidst i 1940´erne.
English: In 1985 we succeeded in creating a boatbuilder position, which was filled by Freddy Kristiansen, who had himself been an apprentice in the boatyard in the 1940's.

Danish: I 1985 lykkedes det at oprette en bådebyggerstilling, som blev besat af Freddy Kristiansen, der selv havde stået i lære på værftet sidst i 1940´erne.
English: In 1985 we succeeded in creating a boatbuilder position, which was filled by Freddy Kristiansen, who had himself been an apprentice in the boatyard in the 1940’s.

Danish: I 1987 blev en fuld skala rekonstruktion, ’Dronningen’, bygget i Norge efter tegninger af det opstillede skib.
English: In 1987, a full-scale reconstruction, 'Dronningen', was built in Norway, using drawings based on the exhibited ship.

Danish: I 1990 påbegyndte Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde byggeriet af sin første langskibsrekonstruktion, ligeledes baseret på Skuldelev 5, og bragte hermed den eksperimentelle langskibsarkæologi ind i professionelle rammer.
English: In 1990, the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde began building its first reconstruction of a longship which was similarly based in Skuldelev 5 and, in so doing, brought experimental long ship archaeology within a professional framework.

Danish: I 1993 blev resterne af en båd fundet under drænarbejde ved Gislinge, en landsby beliggende på den inddæmmede Lammefjord.
English: In 1993, the remains of a boat were discovered during drainage works near Gislinge, a village located on the reclaimed Lammefjord.

Danish: I 1994 under udgravningen på Store Torv i Århus, fandt man en planke, hvor møllespillet var indridset i.
English: In 1994 when excavating the city square of the Danish city of Aarhus archaeologists found a plank with the game of Nine Mens Morris.

Danish: I 1997 forlod Vikingeskibsmuseet bådeværftet på Strandgade.
English: In 1997 the Viking Ship Museum left the boatyard on Strandgade.

Danish: I 1998 rekonstruerer museets bådebyggere Skuldelev 6, fiskerbåden fra Vestnorge.
English: In 1998, the museum's boatbuilders reconstructed Skuldelev 6, the fishing boat from western Norway.

Danish: I 1998 søsatte museets værft båden Kraka Fyr, som lige siden har sejlet med gæster på museet.
English: In 1998, the museum’s boatyard launched Kraka Fyr, which has sailed with guests at the museum since then.

Danish: I 1999 påbegyndtes byggeriet af Ottar, rekonstruktionen af det store havgående fragtskib fra Vestnorge.
English: In 1999, the work on Ottar began, a reconstruction of the large ocean-going cargo ship from western Norway.

Danish: I 1999 gennemførtes tre dages sejlforsøg med et hold uøvede padlere fra Roskilde og Als for at lære fartøjet nærmere at kende.
English: In 1999, trials were held for three days with a scratch crew of untrained paddlers from Roskilde and Als with a view to getting to know the vessel better.

Danish: I 2001 fandt konservator Frans-Arne Stylegar nye spor efter kanalen.
English: In 2001 conservator Frans-Arne Stylegar found new tracesof the old canal.

Danish: I 2001 afprøvedes bådens brug til to dages langturssejlads i stille, varmt vejr med samme hold som i 2000.
English: In 2001, the boat was tested in two, full-day voyages in warm, calm weather and with the same crew as in 2000.

Danish: I 2003 lavede UNESCO udkastet til 'Konvention til sikring af den immaterielle kulturarv'.
English: In 2003, UNESCO drafted the ‘Convention for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage'.

Danish: I 2003 lavede UNESCO udkastet til ’Konvention til sikring af den immaterielle kulturarv’.
English: In 2003, UNESCO drafted the ‘Convention for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage’.

Danish: I forbindelse med uddybning af Vordingborg Nordhavn har Vikingeskibsmuseet i 2005 foretaget mindre udgravninger og overvågning af uddybningsarbejdet.
English: In 2005, the Viking Ship Museum carried out minor excavations and monitoring in connection with the dredging of Vordingborg Nordhavn.

Danish: I 2006 lagde Vikingeskibsmuseets bådbyggere en afstivning i Havhingstens for at gøre skibet mindre fleksibilt.
English: In 2006 lthe boat builders at the Viking Ship Museum made the mast fish longer to prevent to much flexibility.

Danish: I 2006 henvendte Stiftelsen Nytt Osebergskip sig til Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde.
English: In 2006 ‘Stiftelsen Nytt Osebergskip’ contacted the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde.

Danish: I 2006 henvendte SNOS sig til Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde.
English: In 2006, SNOS (The New Oseberg Ship Foundation) approached the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde.

Danish: I 2006 blev Osebergskibet gennemfotograferet og scannet indvendigt og udvendigt med fotoscanning og med laserscanning.
English: In 2006, the Oseberg ship was systematically photographed and both the interior and exterior of the vessel were scanned using photo and laser scanning.

Danish: I 2006 gik turen op langs den svenske vestkyst til Oslo, ned langs den norske østkyst, hvorefter vi fik prøvet lidt af Nordsøen fra Kristiansand til Thyborøn.
English: In 2006, we sailed up along the Swedish west coast to Oslo, down the Norwegian east coast, and then a bit of the North Sea from Kristiansand to Thyborøn.

Danish: I 2007 gennemførte Havhingsten fra Glendalough en forsøgsrejse fra Roskilde, nord om Skotland til Dublin og hjem igen året efter, denne gang syd om England.
English: In 2007 the Sea Stallion completed a voyage from Roskilde, north of Scotland to Dublin and home again the year after.

Danish: I 2007 åbnede Vikingeskibsmuseet en særudstilling om Havhingsten fra Glendaloughs rejse fra skibsmodel til sejlads med verdens største rekonstruktion af et vikingeskib.
English: In 2007 the Viking Ship Museum opened a special exhibition about the Sea Stallion from Glendalough's voyage from reconstruction model to sailing with the worlds largest reconstructed Viking ship.

Danish: I 2007 sejlede Havhingsten fra Roskilde til netop Dublin på en lang og dramatisk sejlads nord om Skotland.
English: In 2007, the Sea Stallion sailed from Roskilde to Dublin on a long and dramatic voyage north around Scotland.

Danish: I 2008 vandt den lille dogme-lignende film 'Once' en Oscar for bedste originale sang.
English: In 2008 the Irish made low-budget film 'Once' earned an Oscar for best original song.

Danish: Vikingeskibsmuseet har rekonstrueret Skuldelev 6 (Skjoldungen 2012).
English: In 2012, the Viking Ship Museum built Skjoldungen, a reconstruction of Skuldelev 6.

Danish: I 2013 rykkede Peter Madsens verdenskendte tegneserie Valhalla ind i Vikingeskibshallen.
English: In 2013, Peter Madsen's world famous comic strip, Valhalla moved into the Viking Ship Hall.

Danish: I 800-tallet grundlagde vikingerne Tynwald, den ældste fungerende lovgivende forsamling i verden – som stadig eksisterer på øen den dag i dag.
English: In 800 AD the Vikings founded Tynwald, the oldest working parliament in the world.

Danish: I 967 blev Limerick indtaget af Ua Briain (Dál Cáis), hvorefter den irsk-nordiske by opstod.
English: In 967 Limerick was captured by the Ua Briain (Dál Cáis), after which time the Hiberno-Norse town emerged.

Danish: I et mørkt skatkammer voksede montrer op af gulvet.
English: in a dark treasure chamber, display cases rose up from the floor.

Danish: Da skjolddele forekommer i enkelte andre fund, hvor organisk materiale er bevaret, fremgår det, at skjoldformen også har været udbredt i området.
English: In a few other finds in which parts of shields have survived, it appears that the shape of those from Hjortspring was also widespread in the area.

Danish: På en række centrale steder er Havhingsten blevet forstærket for at være klar til krap sø og lange dønninger.
English: In a number of central places, the Sea Stallion has been reinforced to be ready for choppy sea and long swells.

Danish: I et lille vandkar, er havbunden genskabt med sten, muslingeskaller, knogler, keramik og træ gemt i sandet.
English: In a small tank of water, the seabed is recreated with stones, shells, bones, pottery and wood hidden in the sand.

Danish: I en særudstilling om marinarkæologernes arbejde inviterede Vikingeskibsmuseet - med en lydkulisse af en dykkers vejrtrækning, film fra undersøiske udgravninger, fund og aktiviteter for børn - ned i dybet til de sunkne historiske verdener.
English: In a special exhibition about the work of maritime archaeologists, the Viking Ship Museum invited guests into the deep to explore sunken historical worlds, accompanied by sounds effects of a diver breathing, film from underwater excavations, finds and activities for children.

Danish: I en vikingetids bådgrav fra Årby i Uppland fandtes et møllespil indridset i et træstykke, som måske har været en af bådens planker.
English: In a Viking ship burial from Årby in Uppland (Sweden) a game of Nine Mens Morris was found carved in a piece of timber, which was probably one of the strakes from the ship itself.

Danish: Under en velsmurt operation, blev Havhingsten i nat bragt tilbage til havnen i Dublin.
English: In a well-oiled operation last night, the Sea Stallion was returned to the harbour in Dublin.

Danish: I forlængelse af den oplysning, ville en af Havhingstens tre styrmænd, Poul Nygaard, gerne vide, hvor hurtigt et uvarslet lavtryk kan opstå.
English: In accordance to this, one of the Sea Stallion’s three masters, Poul Nygaard, wanted to know, how quickly a low-pressure could emerge, if not forecast.

Danish: I 1013 sejlede Svend Tveskæg endnu en gang mod England - Denne gang for at erobre landet.
English: In AD 1013, Svein Forkbeard sailed yet again for England but this time to conquer the country, in which he suceeded in the course of a few months.

Danish: I 1043 deltog Svend i Slaget ved Lyrskov Hede, hvor en stor vendisk invasionshær blev slået tilbage (Venderne boede i områderne ved Østersøens sydkyst).
English: In AD 1043, Svein took part in the Battle at Lyrskov Hede, where a great Wendic invasion army was driven back.

Danish: I 1047 stod et stort slag på Sjælland, hvor Svend led nederlag og måtte flygte.
English: In AD 1047 there was a great battle on Zealand where Svein was defeated and was forced to flee.

Danish: I 1065 støttede Harold kong Edward i kampen mod oprørere fra Northumbrien.
English: In AD 1065, Harold supported Edward in his fight against rebels from Northumbria.

Danish: I 793 angriber danske vikinger klosteret Lindisfarne i England og de næste 300 år er skandinaviske vikinger en stor del af den engelske historie, både som forfærdelige plyndringsmænd, som handelsfolk, som lejesoldater, som erobrere, bosættere og konger.
English: In AD 793 Danish Vikings attacked the monastery on Lindisfarne in England and for the next 300 years, Scandinavian Vikings were a great part of English history - as terrible plunderers, as merchants, as mercenaries, as conquerors, settlers and kings.

Danish: I 948 omtales den første biskop af Ribe, som deltager ved et kirkemøde i Tyskland.
English: In AD 948 the first Bishop of Ribe is mentioned as participating in a Synod in Germany.

Danish: Derudover bærer den en runeindskrift, som fortæller at Hér ferr hafdjarfr, 'her farer den havdjærve'.
English: In addition it bore a runic inscription that reads Hér ferr hafdjarfr ‘Here goes the sea-brave'.

Danish: Herudover har ankervagten en række praktiske opgaver med at sætte skibsteltet op, opsætte vores plancher og fortælle folk om vores skib og sejlads.
English: In addition the anchor watch has a number of practical tasks, for example putting up the ship’s tent, erecting our posters and telling people about the ship and the voyage.

Danish: Endvidere blev processen fastholdt ved foto- og videodokumentation.
English: In addition the process was recorded with photographs and videos.

Danish: Dertil kommer fire-fem forskelligt udformede sæt rytterudstyr, der har været mønstrede (ornamenterede) med indlægninger i tin, sølv og bly, samt seletøjet til et kobbel bestående af fire jagthunde.
English: In addition there were four or five sets of differently shaped riding equipment which had been decorated with inlays of tin, silver and lead, with the harness for a team of four hunting dogs.

Danish: Udover, at museets traditionelle, nordiske både sejler alle dage fra 1. maj - 30. september, er der også arrangeret specielle sejladser i Kraka Fyr.
English: In addition to all of the museum's traditional Nordic boats sailing every day from 1 May - 30 September, special sailings have also been arranged aboard Kraka Fyr.

Danish: Udover, at museets traditionelle, nordiske både sejler alle dage fra 1. maj – 30. september, er der også arrangeret specielle sejladser i Kraka Fyr.
English: In addition to all of the museum’s traditional Nordic boats sailing every day from 1 May – 30 September, special sailings have also been arranged aboard Kraka Fyr.

Danish: Udover de tre måltider om dagen, har rummene hver især en natkasse med the, kaffe, chokolade, kiks, æbler, nødder og tørret røget kød som fungerer som et depot for nattevagterne.
English: In addition to all this, each section has a night box containing tea, coffee, chocolate, biscuits, apples and nuts, serving as a store for the night watchmen.

Danish: 'Der Spiegel' har foruden artikler også lavet web-tv om turen på Spree.
English: In addition to articles, Der Spiegel has also made a web-tv broadcast about the trip on the Spree.

Danish: Udover et signal om forår, så er søsætningen også del af åbningsweekenden for kulturfestivalen Inuit Nu.
English: In addition to being a harbinger of spring, the launch is also part of the opening weekend for the Inuit Nu culture festival.

Danish: Udover bøger har Vikingeskibsmuseet fra 1993 til 2003 i fællesskab med Nationalmuseet udgivet 20 numre af Marinarkæologisk Nyhedsbrev fra Roskilde og dets internationale udgave Maritime Archaeology Newsletter from Roskilde.
English: In addition to books, from 1993 to 2003 the Viking Ship Museum together with the National Museum of Denmark issued 20 volumes of the Marinarkæologiske Nyhedsbrev fra Roskilde and its international edition, the Maritime Archaeology Newsletter from Roskilde.

Danish: Udover, at underholde gæster i kongen hal, kunne skjalden sandsynligvis følge med på større rejser.
English: In addition to entertaining guests in the King's hall the scald probably also took part in longer expeditions.

Danish: Udover at have fungeret i forbindelse med omladning af varer og som kontrolpunkt for trafikken på fjorden, kan Ladby have været overfartssted til Lille Viby på Hindsholm, hvor såvel arkæologiske fund som stednavne kan afspejle vigtige vikingetidslokaliteter.
English: In addition to having had a function in connection with the transfer of goods and as a control-point for traffic on the fjord, Ladby may have been a crossing point for Lille Viby on Hindsholm, where both archaeological finds and place-names may reflect important Viking-Age sites.

Danish: Foruden kopismykker har Museumsbutikken også et bredt udvalg af moderne smykker. inspireret af vikingetidens stil og Skandinaviske materialer.
English: In addition to replica jewellery, the museum shop also has a range of modern jewellery inspred by the style and materials of Scandinavia and the Viking era.

Danish: Udover Svend, som Adam fik masser af viden fra, har han sikkert talt med sømænd, rejsende og købmænd.
English: In addition to Svein, who supplied Adam with a great amount of information, he probably also spoke with sailors, travellers and merchants.

Danish: Udover, at munkene selvfølgelig gerne ville omvende så mange som muligt til kristendommen, var det også vigtigt for den frankiske kejser at få omvendt nordboerne.
English: In addition to the fact that the monks, of course, wished to convert as many people as possible to Christianity, conversion of the Nordic peoples was also important for the Frankish Emperor.

Danish: Ud over det sammenhængende vrag omfatter fundet også en række dele, hovedsageligt spantetømmer, af et andet fartøj, der muligvis lader sig datere til efter 1229, med proveniens i Nordtyskland.
English: In addition to the intact wreck, the find also includes a number of parts, mainly frame timbers from another vessel that may possibly be dated to after 1229 and which originated in northern Germany.

Danish: Ud over de bevarede vrag af langskibe er der også fundet en række vragdele og genanvendte skibsdele, som formodentlig kommer fra langskibe.
English: In addition to the surviving wrecks of longships, a number of wreck fragments and re-used ship's components have been found which probably originate from this type of vessel.

Danish: Ud over de bevarede vrag af langskibe er der også fundet en række vragdele og genanvendte skibsdele, som formodentlig kommer fra langskibe.
English: In addition to the surviving wrecks of longships, a number of wreck fragments and re-used ship’s components have been found which probably originate from this type of vessel.

Danish: Gasterne skal udover deres almindelige vagter også have kabystjans og bakstørn.
English: In addition to their ordinary watches, the men must also serve kabystjans and bakstørn.

Danish: Hjemme i Roskilde opsamles desuden samtidige og relevante vejrdata (vindretning og styrke) fra observationer modtaget fra DMI eller lignende, med henblik på at kunne sammenholde de aktuelle oplevede vejrforhold med sådanne observationer.
English: In addition, all relevant weather data (wind direction and speed in particular) will be collected by the Viking Ship Museum from the Danish Meteorological Institute and other sources in order to allow comparison with the weather actually experienced.

Danish: Desuden kan grupper booke særlige ture.
English: In addition, groups can book special tours.

Danish: Desuden blev en del af dæksarrangementet ført tilbage, til da båden blev brugt af Johs.
English: In addition, some of the deck was returned to the configuration it had when the boat was used by Johs.

Danish: Endvidere er arealet af den våde overflade beregnet med henblik på bestemmelse af fremdrivningsmodstanden ved forskellige dybgange, og koefficienter og konstanter er beregnet til sammenligning.
English: In addition, the area of the wet surface has been calculated with a view to determining the resistance to propulsion at different draughts, and coefficients and constants have been calculated for comparison.

Danish: Endvidere svarer tapetets farver og fremstillingsmåde til samtidigt engelsk broderi, som var meget populært blandt de europæiske fyrster i 1000-tallet.
English: In addition, the colours in the tapestry and its method of production correspond to contemporary English embroidery, which was very popular among reigning European princes in the eleventh century.

Danish: Desuden omtaler historikeren Olaus Magnus i 1555 en Nauticus Gnomon, som kan være et solkompas.
English: In addition, the historian Olaus Magnus mentions in 1555 a Nauticus Gnomon, which could also be such a compass.

Danish: Desuden registreres det sejlede spor (og dermed kurs og fart) på små uafhængige lomme-GPS'er.
English: In addition, the route followed (and thus also course and speed) will be tracked using independent pocket-size GPS devices.

Danish: Desuden registreres det sejlede spor (og dermed kurs og fart) på små uafhængige lomme-GPS’er.
English: In addition, the route followed (and thus also course and speed) will be tracked using independent pocket-size GPS devices.

Danish: Hertil koger de to kokke i kabyssen varmt vand til te og kaffe.
English: In addition, the two cooks in the galley heat water for tea and coffee.

Danish: Derudover varetager teamet det landsdækkende Marine Arkiv.
