English: In addition, this team runs the national maritime archaeological archives, Det Marine Arkiv.

Danish: Som helhed repræsenterer Hjortspringbåden en avanceret beherskelse af den teknologi, der var til rådighed i førromersk jernalder.
English: In all aspects the Hjortspring boat represents an advanced exploitation of the available technology of the Pre-Roman Iron Age.

Danish: Prisen for det samlede Storstrømsprojekt er budgetteret til 4,2 mia. kr.
English: In all, the Storstrøm project is budgeted to cost 4.2 billion kroner

Danish: Og i økonomisk henseende gik det Carsten Brebøl særdeles godt.
English: In an economic sense Carsten Brebøl did remarkably well.

Danish: Ved evalueringen af fart og rejsehastighed kan man bruge de følgende definitioner:
English: In an evaluation of boat speed and travel speed during a voyage use can be made of the following definitions:

Danish: Ud fra de fåtallige skriftlige kilder til 1000-tallets danske historie er det nærliggende at pege på den norske Kong Harald Hårderådes hærgninger af de danske kyster frem til 1064 som en mulig anledning til anlæg af første fase, mens anden fase kan have sin baggrund i tronstridighederne efter Svend Estridsens død i 1074 eller 1076.
English: In analysing the few textual sources about Danish history in the 11th century, it is tempting to point to King Harald Hardrada’s ravaging of the Danish coast until 1064 as a possible reason for the building of the first stage, while the second stage may reflect the struggles for the throne after the death of Sven Estridsson in 1074 or 1076.

Danish: Under alle omstændigheder er det interessant, at skandinaverne i Dublin i 1042 - som på daværende tidspunkt havde sluttet stærke kontakter med det omgivende samfund - stadig byggede skibe på en udpræget skandinavisk måde.
English: In any case, it is interesting that the Scandinavians in Dublin in AD 1042 - which at that time had made strong contacts with the surrounding population - still built ships in a characteristically Scandinavian way.

Danish: Under alle omstændigheder er det interessant, at skandinaverne i Dublin i 1042 – som på daværende tidspunkt havde sluttet stærke kontakter med det omgivende samfund – stadig byggede skibe på en udpræget skandinavisk måde.
English: In any case, it is interesting that the Scandinavians in Dublin in AD 1042 – which at that time had made strong contacts with the surrounding population – still built ships in a characteristically Scandinavian way.

Danish: Under alle omstændigheder må der være tilstrækkeligt udstyr om bord til at sikre besætningens liv og helbred.
English: In any circumstance there must be sufficient equipment on board to ensure the life and health of the crew.

Danish: I april besøgte ansatte fra det nationale museum og besætningsmedlem fra Havhingsten, museumsinspektør Louise Kæmpe Henriksen, skoler i Dublin og omegn.
English: In April, staff from the National Museum and a member of the Sea Stallion crew, museum curator Louise Kæmpe Henriksen, visited schools in Dublin and its surroundings.

Danish: Det hører til sjældenhederne at skibene bliver fundet med et ror monteret, men sådan var det på de norske vikingeskibe fra Oseberg og Gokstad.
English: In archaeological contexts, it is rare to find a ship with the rudder still in position, yet luckily, this was the case with the Norwegian Viking ships from Gokstad and Oseberg.

Danish: I arkæologisk rekonstruktion gøres ingen vurdering af skrogets egenskaber på forhånd.
English: In archaeological reconstruction, no interpretations of the hull's capabilities should be made in advance.

Danish: I arkæologisk rekonstruktion gøres ingen vurdering af skrogets egenskaber på forhånd.
English: In archaeological reconstruction, no interpretations of the hull’s capabilities should be made in advance.

Danish: I august 2008 kom Havhingsten hjem fra den store rejse til Dublin og skibet har siden hjemkomsten, været genstand for stor interesse blandt museets besøgende.
English: In August 2008, the Sea Stallion returned home from its epic voyage to Dublin and since its return, the ship has been the object of a great deal of interest from visitors to the museum.

Danish: I tilfælde af hårdt vejr har den kunnet bjærge sig til søs eller søge land.
English: In bad weather the crew would have been able to cope well enough at sea or take refuge on land.

Danish: Mellemmåltider.
English: In between meals.

Danish: I begge tilfælde er arbejdsmetoden og tolkningen af fundet en process, hvor der sker en udvælgelse mellem væsentlige og mindre væsentlige genstande, detaljer og informationer.
English: In both cases the working method and interpretation of the finds are subjective processes where there is selection between important and less importance objects, details and information.

Danish: Der tages forbehold for ændringer ved sygdom mv.
English: In case of illness the schedule might change.

Danish: Ved sygdom eller lignende kan det forekomme at der er en anden håndværksformidler på tunet.
English: In case of illness there might be a different craftsman in the workshop than planned.

Danish: I tilfælde af sygdom, sår eller skader undervejs, er det sygeplejerskens opgave at pleje og behandle den syge.
English: In case of illness, wounds or injuries during the voyage it is the nurse's task to treat and take care of the patient.

Danish: Sygeplejersken indgår i den almindelige vagt-turnus, og er med til at ro og sejle skibet.
English: In case of serious illness or an accident on board the nurse is excused from other duties in order to give first aid.

Danish: Var der ikke nok unge mænd, skulle de bønder, som havde arbejdsfolk, sejle med.
English: In cases where there were not enough young farm hands, the farmers who employed the workmen had to join the ship for the voyage.

Danish: I kystegne har man suppleret med fisk som sild, hornfisk, laks, torsk, fladfisk, muslinger og østers.
English: In coastal areas, the diet was supplemented with fish such as herring, garfish, salmon, cod, flatfish, mussels and oysters.

Danish: Kunstner og designer Helle Hove har i samarbejde med museet skabt en installation, der har fokus på det legende og undersøgende - hvor alt er tilladt og intet er ligegyldigt.
English: In collaboration with the Museum, artist and designer Helle Hove has developed an installation, which focuses on the playful and exploratory, where anything goes and nothing is trivial.

Danish: Kombineret med den mundtlige overlevering er det er derfor muligt at udføre rigrekonstruktioner af de enkelte skibsfund indenfor ret snævre rammer.
English: In combination with oral tradition, it is therefore possible to produce rigging for the individual ship finds within very narrow constrains.

Danish: Sammenholdt med de skriftlige og billedlige kilder får den arkæologiske kilde en kildeværdi, der går ud over den konkrete genstand.
English: In combination with written and pictorial sources, an archaeological source acquires a value greater than that of the specific object itself.

Danish: I forhold til Johannessens tegning er der 12 cm mere kølbugt og 3 cm dybere spring i Tilia.
English: In comparison with Johannessen's drawing, the rocker is 12 cm greater and the sheer 3 cm deeper in Tilia.

Danish: I forhold til Johannessens tegning er der 12 cm mere kølbugt og 3 cm dybere spring i Tilia.
English: In comparison with Johannessen’s drawing, the rocker is 12 cm greater and the sheer 3 cm deeper in Tilia.

Danish: I sammenligning med fartroser udarbejdet under forsøgssejladserne med Roar Ege vil usikkerhed som følge af vindskift under gennemsejling af en fartrose være elimineret.
English: In comparison with the speed roses prepared during the sea trials with Roar Ege, inaccuracies caused by changes in wind direction during data collection will be largely eliminated.

Danish: I forbindelse med smededage afholdes en craftmanstalk, hvor smeden vil præsentere et stykke arbejde og fortælle om sit håndværk.
English: In connection to the blacksmithing days the skilled blacksmith will present a piece of craftwork and tell the audience about his craft.

Danish: I forbindelse med bådebyggerdagene vil der hver eftermiddag blive afholdt en crafmanstalk, hvor en af vores dygtige bådebyggere vil præsentere et stykke arbejde og fortælle om sit håndværk.
English: In connection to the boatbuilding days the Viking Ship Museum will organize a craftmanstalk, where one of our skilled boatbuilders will present af piece of his work.

Danish: I forbindelse med håndværkerdagene afholder rebslageren eller træskæreren en workshop, hvor du kan prøve kræfter med de gamle håndværk.
English: In connection to the craftmandays you can participate in a workshop with either the ropemaker og the woodcarver.

Danish: I forbindelse med løb-bindingsdage afholdes en craftmanstalk, hvor løb-binderen vil præsentere et stykke arbejde og fortælle om sit håndværk.
English: In connection to the wickerworker days the skilled wickerworker will present a piece of craftwork and tell the audience about her craft.

Danish: I forbindelse med træskærerdagene afholdes der en træskærer workshop, hvor du kan prøve kræfter med håndværket.
English: In connection to the woodcarver days you can try your hand at the old craft.

Danish: I forbindelse med træskærerdagene afholdes en craftmanstalk, hvor træskæreren vil præsentere et stykke arbejde og fortælle om sit håndværk.
English: In connection to the woodcarvingdays the skilled woodcarver will present a piece of craftwork and tell the audience about her craft.

Danish: I forbindelse med uddybningsarbejder ved etableringen af en museumshavn ved Roskilde blev der d. 5. september 1996 opgrabbet en forstævn og tilhørende bordhalse fra et højmiddelalderligt fartøj.
English: In connection with dredging work when building a museum harbour at Roskilde, a stem and associated hooding ends originating from a medieval vessel were lifted from the seabed 5 September 1996.

Danish: I forbindelsen med byggeriet i 1996-97 af en museumshavn på arealer tidligere benyttet til havneforplads og parkeringsplads ved Roskilde havn etableredes arkæologisk overvågning af udgravnings- og uddybningsarbejder foran og i de nye havnebassiner.
English: In connection with the construction in 1996-97 of a museum harbour in an area previously used as a harbour apron and car park at Roskilde Harbour, archaeological monitoring of the excavation and dredging work inside and at the front of the new harbour basins was established.

Danish: I forbindelse med byggeriet af broen skal der anlægges en arbejdskanal gennem revet, og netop derfor er det ikke muligt at bevare skibet på stedet, som ellers er det mest almindelige at gøre, når der bliver fundet skibsvrag i danske farvande.
English: In connection with the construction of the bridge, a working channel must be dug through the area, making it impossible to preserve the ship in situ, which is the most common method used when shipwrecks are found in Danish waters.

Danish: I anledning af særudstillingen 'The World in the Viking Age', kan du også klæde dig som en arabisk købmand og male smukke, fremmedartede mønstre.
English: In connection with the special exhibition, 'the World in the Viking Age', you can also dress up as an Arabic merchant and paint beautiful and exotic patterns.

Danish: I forbindelse med løb-bindingsdagene afholdes der en løb-bindingsworkshop, hvor du kan prøve kræfter med den oldnordisk sy-teknik, hvor man binder strå eller halm sammen til kurve og lignende.
English: In connection with the wickerworker days you can try your hand at wickerwork in the wickerworkshop.

Danish: I forbindelse med denne dokumentation er gjort en række iagttagelser af værktøjsspor og udkløvning, der har tjent som udgangspunkt for byggeriet af skibskopierne.
English: In connection with this documentation a number of observations were made of traces left by tools and the cleaving of the timber; these have served as starting-points for the building of the Skuldelev full-scale reconstructions.

Danish: Et dagkursus i at sejle vikingeskib giver nye oplevelser for både den uerfarne sejler og den, der søger nye udfordringer og vinkler på sin sejlererfaring.
English: In contrast to Bermuda sails and gaff sails, the square sail is placed in front of the mast, and it often requires some getting used to for sailors with experience from the more modern types of rigging.

Danish: I modsætning til bermuda- og gaffelsejl, er råsejlet eksempelvis placeret foran masten, og det kræver ofte en del tilvænning for især sejlere med stor erfaring med de mere moderne skibstyper.
English: In contrast to Bermuda sails and gaff sails, the square sail is placed in front of the mast, and it often requires some getting used to for sailors with experience from the more modern types of rigging.

Danish: I modsætning til bermuda- og gaffelsejl, er råsejlet eksempelvis placeret foran masten, og det kræver ofte en del tilvænning for især sejlere med stor erfaring med de moderne rigtyper.
English: In contrast to Bermuda sails and gaff sails, the square sail is placed in front of the mast, and it often requires some getting used to for sailors with experience from the more modern types of rigging.

Danish: I modsætning til bermuda- og gaffelsejl, er råsejlet eksempelvis placeret foran masten, og det kræver ofte en del tilvænning og giver den moderne sejler sjove 'aha-oplevelser'.
English: In contrast to Bermuda sails and gaff sails, the square sail is placed in front of the mast, and it often requires some getting used to for sailors with experience from the more modern types of rigging.

Danish: I modsætning til bermuda- og gaffelsejl, er råsejlet placeret foran masten, og det kræver ofte en del tilvænning for sejlere fra de mere moderne rigtyper.
English: In contrast to Bermuda sails and gaff sails, the square sail is placed in front of the mast, and it often requires some getting used to for sailors with experience from the more modern types of rigging.

Danish: I modsætning til i Skandinavien var det i kristne og muslimske områder almindeligt at skrive begivenheder ned i Annaler (årbøger), krøniker, levnedsbeskrivelser og rejsebeskrivelser.
English: In contrast to Scandinavia, it was commonplace in Christian and Muslim areas to record events in Annals (year books), chronicles, biographies (life histories) and travelogues.

Danish: Puck 2 hovedsageligt samlet med små trænagler, og ikke med klinknagler af jern, som de skandinaviske vikingeskibe.
English: In contrast to the Scandinavian finds of ships from the Viking Age, Puck 2 was largely assembled using small treenails and not iron rivets.

Danish: Der stod ikke en værdi på mønterne, som vi kender i dag.
English: In contrast to the situation today no value was shown on the coins.

Danish: På Ottar, Abhara og Theodosios' tid var mange steder derimod blevet samfund, der producerede efterspurgte varer og bød handlende velkommen.
English: In contrast, by the time of Ohthere, Abhara, and Theodosios, many of these places had become societies producing wares that were in high demand and where traders were welcome.

Danish: På Ottar, Abhara og Theodosios’ tid var mange steder derimod blevet samfund, der producerede efterspurgte varer og bød handlende velkommen.
English: In contrast, by the time of Ohthere, Abhara, and Theodosios, many of these places had become societies producing wares that were in high demand and where traders were welcome.

Danish: Sammen med middelalder-arkæolog og madekspert Bi Skaarup, har Vikingeskibsmuseet lagt op til en kulinarisk rejse tilbage i tiden, baseret på arkæologisk og historisk viden om datidens råvarer, afgrøder, urter, importerede handelsvarer og madtraditioner.
English: In cooperation with medieval archaeologist and food expert, Bi Skaarup, the Viking Ship Museum has prepared for a culinary journey back in time based on archaeological and historical knowledge about the raw materials, crops, herbs, imported goods and food traditions.

Danish: På dansk og norsk kunne de hedde tønder eller varder, og kendes fra stednavne som Tønsberg og Vardø.
English: In Danish and Norwegian they could be called tønder or varder and appear in place names such as Tønsberg and Vardø.

Danish: I Danmark er der spor efter huggeteknikken på Roskilde 5 skibet fra middelalderen.
English: In Denmark the carving technique is found on the medieval 'Roskilde 5' ship.

Danish: I Danmark findes et eksempel fra Slusegård på Bornholm hvor der er fundet aftryk af 43 både i denne byggeteknik fra ca. år 300 e.
English: In Denmark, imprints of 43 boats of this type, dated to about 300 AD, have been found at Slusegård on Bornholm.

Danish: I Danmark findes et eksempel fra Slusegård på Bornholm hvor der er fundet aftryk af 43 både i denne byggeteknik fra ca. år 300 e.Kr.
English: In Denmark, imprints of 43 boats of this type, dated to about 300 AD, have been found at Slusegård on Bornholm.

Danish: I hver side ligger der en oplænger som overlapper bundstokken.
English: In each side, there is a futtock that overlaps the floor.

Danish: I Afrika samledes kongeriger, og fra de nye kystbyer udførtes bl.a. guld, slaver og elfenben.
English: In East Africa, kingdoms were being established and commodities such as gold, slaves and ivory began to be exported from the new coastal towns.

Danish: I England var vikingernes betydning både direkte og indirekte.
English: In England, the Vikings' influence was both direct and indirect.

Danish: I England var vikingernes betydning både direkte og indirekte.
English: In England, the Vikings’ influence was both direct and indirect.

Danish: I Erik den Rødes Saga fortælles i kapitel 14, at man i sagatiden brugte at smøre skibene i bunden med “sæltjære”, for at pæleorm (“skelmaddiker”) ikke skulle gennemgnave træet og derved sænke skibene.
English: In Erik the Red's Saga we are told in chapter 14 that in saga times the bottoms of ships were painted with 'seal tar' in order that shipworms would not gnaw through the wood and thereby sink the vessels.

Danish: Ved bedømmelsen af forsøgsresultaterne må man nøje sikre, at rekonstruktionen er udført optimalt, og at besætningen har haft det fornødne grundlag til at give realistiske resultater af afprøvningen.
English: In evaluating the results it is necessary to check whether the reconstruction has been optimally manufactured and the boat's crew has had the necessary qualifications for providing realistic results of the sea trials.

Danish: Om præcis otte måneder sejler verdens største rekonstruktion af et vikingeskib fra Roskilde til Dublin.
English: In exactly eight months' time the world's largest ever reconstruction Viking ship will sail from Roskilde to Dublin.

Danish: Om præcis otte måneder sejler verdens største rekonstruktion af et vikingeskib fra Roskilde til Dublin.
English: In exactly eight months’ time the world’s largest ever reconstruction Viking ship will sail from Roskilde to Dublin.

Danish: Der er præcis en uge, til vi skal være i Dublin.
English: In exactly one week, we will be in Dublin.

Danish: Som konsekvens af den kolossale interesse for projektet satser Vikingeskibsmuseet nu endnu mere på kommunikation.
English: In followance of such colossal interest, the Roskilde Viking Ship Museum is putting yet more emphasis on communication and information.

Danish: I de udenlandske krøniker og rejseberetninger var vikingerne ofte det sekundære emne, og historieskrivningen om Nordens befolkning, traditioner og skikke var farvet af forfatterens egen kultur.
English: In foreign chronicles and travelogues, the Vikings were not usually the main theme, and the history written about the people, traditions and customs of Scandinavia was coloured by the author's own cultural background.

Danish: I de udenlandske krøniker og rejseberetninger var vikingerne ofte det sekundære emne, og historieskrivningen om Nordens befolkning, traditioner og skikke var farvet af forfatterens egen kultur.
English: In foreign chronicles and travelogues, the Vikings were not usually the main theme, and the history written about the people, traditions and customs of Scandinavia was coloured by the author’s own cultural background.

Danish: Generelt
English: In general

Danish: Den 30 meter lange rekonstruktion af vikingeskibet Skuldelev 2 er i det hele taget på god fod med det danske kongehus.
English: In general the Sea Stallion - a 30 metre long Skuldelev 2 reconstruction - is in friendly footing with the royal family of Denmark.

Danish: I Tyskland pulserende hovedstad er Havhingsten et af mange indslag i rækken af events, optog og demonstrationer, der foregår side om side over alt i byen.
English: In Germany's vibrant capital, Sea Stallion is just one of the many events, parades and demonstrations that take place all across the city.

Danish: I Grønhaug (Grønhøj) blev der fundet resterne af en fornem skibsbegravelse, fra ca. år 930.
English: In Grønhaug (Green Mound), the remains were found of a distinguished ship burial dating from around AD 930.

Danish: I havn efter en fin sejlads.
English: In harbor after a good day's sailing.

Danish: Midtskibet arbejder med sejlet
English: In harbor after a good day's sailing.

Danish: Tran afkogt af sælspæk har i historisk tid fundet megen anvendelse til træbeskyttelse, idet det indeholder flerumættet fedt ligesom lindolie.
English: In historical times, train oil rendered from seal blubber, was much used as a wood preservative as it contains polyunsaturated fat in much the same way as linseed oil.

Danish: På Island ved vi, at det var Altinget (stormændenes råd), der besluttede at man skulle være kristne.
English: In Iceland we know that it was the Alting - the Chieftains's Council - which decided that people should become Christian.

Danish: På Island ved vi, at det var Altinget (stormændenes råd), der besluttede at man skulle være kristne.
English: In Iceland we know that it was the Alting – the Chieftains’s Council – which decided that people should become Christian.

Danish: I Irland fik skibet og dets besætning en modtagelse, der var en Stormand værdig med 100.000 mennesker langs Liffey i Dublin.
English: In Ireland, the ship and its crew received a welcome worthy of a chieftain, with 100,000 people lining the banks of the river Liffey in Dublin.

Danish: I Isefjorden mødte vi en anden eventyrer; Troels Kløvedal og Nordkaperen.
English: In Isefjord we met another adventurer; Troels Kløvedal and his ship Nordkaperen.

Danish: I sin simpleste form kan man så styre lidt kontra imod strømmen, men det løser ikke problemet med påvirkningen af skibets hastighed.
English: In its simplest form it is possible to steer a little into the current but this does not solve the problem of the influence on the ship's speed.

Danish: I juli sejler Havhingsten ud i det danske sommerland på et tre ugers jubilæumstogt
English: In July, Sea Stallion will sail out into the Danish summer on a three-week anniversary sailing.

Danish: Der er også gjort fund af barberknive fra Bronzealderen, og selvom man ikke kender til lignende fund fra Vikingetiden, findes der flere billeder, statuetter og træfigurer som viser vikingen med velplejet hår og veltrimmet skæg.
English: In Kaupang in Norway, a bowl has been found which it is thought Vikings used to wash their hands before meals, because the runes engraved on the dish say: ‘I Muntlauki' (hand-washing bowl).

Danish: I Kaupang i Norge har man fundet et fad, hvori man mener vikingerne vaskede hænder før måltiderne, da fadet har indridset runerne: I Muntlauki (håndvaskefadet).
English: In Kaupang in Norway, a bowl has been found which it is thought Vikings used to wash their hands before meals, because the runes engraved on the dish say: ‘I Muntlauki’ (hand-washing bowl).

Danish: I Kerteminde går Gill Meller, Steven Lamb og fotografen Tom Zinoveiff om bord på Havhingsten.
English: In Kerteminde, Gill Meller, Steven Lamb and photographer Tom Zinoveiff will go on board the Sea Stallion.

Danish: I Kongespejlet nævnes den udrustning et krigsskib bør medbringe og heriblandt finder man bådebyggerens værktøj; en almindelig håndværksøkse, et huljern, et bor samt en del andet værktøj, som ikke er nærmere forklaret.
English: In Kongespejlet there is a list of equipment that a warship should have, and here the boat builder’s tools are mentioned: an ordinary craftsman’s axe, a gouge, a drill, and other tools which are not specified in detail.

Danish: På Samsø lagde omkring 4000 mennesker lagde vejen forbi det 30 meter lange krigsskib og besøget blev afsluttet med et festmåltid tilberedt af lokale råvarer fra Samsø, blandt andet makrel, gutefår, løg og strandkål.
English: In Langør on the island Samsø around 4000 people visited the 30-meter long warship and the stay ended with a feast prepared from local produce from the island, including mackerel, Gute sheep, onion and sea kale.

Danish: Konferencerne afholdes almindeligvis i samarbejde med andre forsknings- og formidlingsinstitutioner.
English: In many cases, the conferences are organised and conducted in collaboration with other institutions.

Danish: I mange beskrivelser af søslag kan vi nemlig læse, at det er vanskeligt at angribe dem med mindre skibe, fordi de er meget højere.
English: In many descriptions of sea-battles we read that it is difficult to attack these because they are much higher.

Danish: På mange måder mindede han om Simon Spies," fortæller Bent Lindgaard.
English: In many ways he was akin to Simon Spies,” Bent Lindgaard reveals.

Danish: I marts 2016, besøgte projektholdet Nationalmuseets bevaringsafdeling, for at undersøge de bevarede elementer af den oprindelig Gislingebåd.
English: In March 2016, the project team visited the conservation department of the National Museum in order to examine some of the surviving elements of the original Gislinge Boat.

Danish: I maj 1986 gæstede Kojan Kavang, en bådebygger fra Borneo, Vikingeskibsmuseet for her at demonstrere hvordan hans folk, Punan Bah, byggede deres langbåde af udhulede og sidenhen udspændte træstammer.
English: In May 1986, Kojan Kavang of the Punan Bah people in Borneo visited the Viking Ship Museum demonstrating the traditional methods used by his people when building dugout or longboats.

Danish: I maj 2009 åbnede Vikingeskibsmuseet en særudstilling om netop den fantastiske rejse og det er stadig muligt at se og opleve rejsen i tekst, billeder og film.
English: In May 2009, a special exhibition opened on the fantastic journey and it is still possible to see and experience the journey in text, pictures and film.

Danish: I maj var målet skoler i Waterford, Wexford og Arklow.
English: In May it was the turn of schools in Waterford, Wexford and Arklow.

Danish: Denne flådes skibe regnedes ifølge middelalderens saga- og lovtekster fra "13-sessen" som det mindste op til "35-sessen".
English: In medieval sagas and law texts the ships of this (fleet were accounted for according to the number of thwarts they had, the smallest vessel being a "13-sesser", the largest a "35-sesser".

Danish: Vikingeskibsmuseet havde midt i oktober fornemt besøg af den irske præsident og Bhutans premierminister.
English: In mid October, the Viking Ship Museum received distinguished visits from the Irish president and Bhutan's prime minister.

Danish: I nyere tids bådebygning ville man have dampet træet med vanddamp, i en svedekiste, for at få det blødt og medgørligt.
English: In modern boatbuilding, the timber would be heated in a steam chest in order to make it soft and pliable.

Danish: I den nyere tids traditionelle, klinkbyggede, åbne råsejlsbåde, havde bådebyggerne, og de folk der sejlede med bådene, opnået så stor erfaring med fleksibilitet, at de ved at ”ryste” båden i den ene stævn, kunne bedømme om båden var en god, en mindre god eller måske en dårlig båd.
English: In more recent traditional, clinker built open square-rig boats, the builders and the people who sailed them acquired considerable experience with flexibility, and they could “shake” the boat at one end and judge whether the boat was a good, not so good or perhaps even a poor boat.

Danish: I Norge kan sprett-telgjing også findes på Osebergskibet fra vikingetiden, stavkirker og huse fra middelalderen.
English: In Norway sprett-telgjing is also found on the Viking Age Oseberg ship, stave churches and in houses from the Middle Ages.

Danish: I den norske ledingslovgivning, både Gulatingloven og Frostatingloven, indgår reb af såvel hår som hud i rig og sejl som noget selvfølgeligt.
English: In Norwegian legislation for the equipment of warships, comprising both the Gulating Law and the Frostating Law, rope of both hide and hair in rigging and sail is included as a matter of course.

Danish: BBC udsender i løbet af november (opdatering; februar 2008) et 90 minutters dokumentarprogram om sejladsen og museet forventer at udsendelsen igen vil bringe Havhingsten i front som et levende bevis på, at Vikingeskibsmuseets forskning i eksperimental arkæologi er af international klasse.
English: In November (update; February 2008), the BBC will be sending a 90-minute documentary on the voyage, and we expect the broadcast will again bring the Sea Stallion to the fore as living evidence that the Viking Ship Museum's research in experimental archaeology is of international class.

Danish: I Nydam mose har man ligeledes fundet flere pincetter, både til almindelig hygiejne, såsom at fjerne uønsket hår, men også pincetter som kunne anvendes til, at holde sammen på et sår under behandling.
English: In Nydam bog, several pairs of tweezers were found, which were used in connection with personal hygiene, such as in the removal of unwanted hair, but others were for holding the edges of a wound together during treatment.

Danish: I Olav Trygvasons saga beskriver Snorre bygningen af ORMR INN LANGI således:
English: In Olaf Tryggvason's saga Snorri describes the building of ORMR INN LANGI as follows:

Danish: I Olav Trygvasons saga beskriver Snorre bygningen af ORMR INN LANGI således:
English: In Olaf Tryggvason’s saga Snorri describes the building of ORMR INN LANGI as follows:

Danish: Snorre Sturlasson skriver i Olav Trygvesons saga om byggeriet af langskibet Ormen hin Lange i 1000tallet:
English: In Olav Trygvesons Saga, Snorre Sturlasson tells us about the building of the longship Ormen hin Lange in the 11th century:

Danish: I den ene ende var pinden primitivt udskåret, som et dyr eller en fugl.
English: In one end the stick had been rudely carved as a mammal or bird.

Danish: Et enkelt sted foran for masten kan tælles mindst ni sådanne rækker i styrbords side, hvilket fortæller os, at dette har været det mindste antal bordgange, skibet har haft.
English: In one place in front of the mast, at least nine of these rows could be counted on the starboard side.

Danish: Et enkelt sted fik vi via John fra følgeskibet Island Fox fået nogle lokale til at skaffe os grillkød af hhv. kronhjort, skotsk lam og kvæg samt sørge for grillkul, bål og salat.
English: In one place, John from the escort ship Island Fox had some locals provide us with meat from crown deer, Scottish lamb and beef, plus barbeque charcoals and salad.

Danish: På en enkelt kordel var 15 garn trukket over!
English: In one strand 15 yarns were broken!

Danish: For at bivoksen kunne få en viskositet, så den kunne trænge ind i træet, blev den opvarmet til 70 - 80 °C, og samtidig blev træet så blødt, at det kunne formes.
English: In order for the beeswax to become sufficiently viscous to penetrate into the wood, it was heated to 70-80° C, and this also made the wood so soft that it could be shaped.

Danish: For at bivoksen kunne få en viskositet, så den kunne trænge ind i træet, blev den opvarmet til 70 – 80 °C, og samtidig blev træet så blødt, at det kunne formes.
English: In order for the beeswax to become sufficiently viscous to penetrate into the wood, it was heated to 70-80° C, and this also made the wood so soft that it could be shaped.

Danish: For at opnå en større forståelse af baggrunden for skibsgravens tilstedeværelse blev der foretaget en undersøgelse af gravpladsen ved skibsgraven og den mulige tilhørende bosættelse samt af bebyggelsesudviklingen i lokalområdet fra omkring Kristi fødsel til tidlig middelalder.
English: In order to achieve a deeper understanding of the background for the existence of the ship-grave, an investigation was carried out of the burial site where the ship-grave is situated and of the possibly associated settlement, as well as of the settlement-development in the local area from around the time of the birth of Christ to the early Middle Ages.

Danish: For at opnå skrogets linjer skal plankerne opvarmes, før de placeres på konstruktionen.
English: In order to achieve the sweeping lines of the hull, the planks have to be heated before they are set in position.

Danish: For at tjekke bordets rette hældning forskellige steder i båden, bruger vi en træplade med et lille lod.
English: In order to check the correct slope of the plank at different places in the boat, we use a wooden board with a small plumb.

Danish: For at kunne kløve den massive egestamme, åbner bådebyggerne først en lille flække i stammens rodende, og så langsomt - med større og større kiler og masser af tunge slag med muggerter - tvinger de fibrene i egetræet fra hinanden, indtil den massive stamme splittes i to.
English: In order to cleave the massive log, the boatbuilders first create a small split in the root end of the log and then slowly – using larger and larger wedges and lots of heavy blows from mallets – they force the fibres in the oak to separate until the massive log splits in two.

Danish: For at dette skulle kunne lade sig gøre, afkortede de nogle af biterne i forskibet.
English: In order to do this, several of the biti in the foreship were shortened.

Danish: Det foregik ved, at tegninger af delene blev printet i skala 1:10 på papir og limet på pap i samme nedskalerede tykkelse som skibsdelene for at sikre, at alle dele kunne samles korrekt.
English: In order to do this, the 1:10 scale drawings were printed on paper and then glued onto cardboard with the same scaled-down thickness as the ship's parts, ensuring that the planks could be assembled correctly.

Danish: For at sikre sig mad hele vinteren blev meget af sommerens høst på marken og i haven, samt kød gemt til vintertide.
English: In order to ensure enough food for the whole winter, much of the summer's harvest from field and garden was, together with meat, saved for the winter.

Danish: For at undersøge omfang og betydning af dansk og tysk handel samt de øvrige østersønationers søfart i middelalderen er det nødvendigt både at opmuntre og styrke det professionelle studium og bevaringen af kulturarven i hele Østersøområdet.
English: In order to examine the range and significance of Danish and German trade as well as the seafaring activities of the other Baltic Sea nations in the Middle Ages, it is vital to encourage and strengthen the professional study and preservation of maritime heritage in the entire Baltic Sea area.

Danish: For at udnytte dette potentiale dokumenteres siden 2002 alle sommertogter.
English: In order to exploit this potential, since 2002 all summer cruises have been logged.

Danish: For at passe bordplankerne til i den rette facon bliver de varmet over ild og gløder.
English: In order to fit the strakes properly, they are heated over flames and embers.

Danish: For at skræmme indbyggerne til ikke at støtte Asbjørn i et oprør, havde Vilhelm i mellemtiden brændt marker og huse af i området.
English: In order to frighten the inhabitants into not supporting Asbjörn in a revolt, William had in the meantime burnt fields and houses in the area.

Danish: For rigtigt at kunne se den nye båds potentiale var den færøske roklub 'Knørrur' inviteret til søsætning og den første rotur.
English: In order to fully explore the new boat's potential, the Faroese rowing club, 'Knørrur' were invited to take part in the launch and the first rowing trip.

Danish: For at belyse de mange spørgsmål i forbindelse med byggeriet besluttedes det at lave to udsnit af båden i fuld størrelse, en 1,4 m lang midtsektion og en 5 m lang stævnsektion.
English: In order to illuminate the many questions connected with the actual construction, it was decided to build two full-size sections of the boat, a 1.4 m-long amidships section and a 5 m-long stem section.

Danish: For at forstå det, må vi kigge på sejlets facon.
English: In order to understand this we have to look at the form of the sail.

Danish: Sagt med andre ord, mail eller ring og få en snak om muligheder og priser.
English: In other words, e-mail or ring us for a chat about the possibilities and the prices.

Danish: Med andre ord, så er det ikke givet, at Havhingstens sejl er overensstemmende med det sejl, der engang i anden halvdel af 1000-tallet bragte det fartøj, vi i dag kalder "Skuldelev 2" fra Irland til Roskilde Fjord.
English: In other words, it is not granted that the Sea Stallion's sail is consistent with the sail that, sometime in the second half of the 11th century, brought the vessel, we today call 'Skuldelev 2', from Ireland to Roskilde Fjord.

Danish: Èn gang er med andre ord ingen gang.
English: In other words: Once is not at all!

Danish: Det vil med andre ord sige, at historien om verdens største rekonstruktion af et vikingeskib skal fortælles til publikum, mens sejladsen finder sted.
English: In other words: the story about the world's biggest reconstruction of a Viking ship is communicated to the public while the ship is sailing.

Danish: Og alene det faktum mener vi, er nok til med EU-direktivet i hånden at kræve skibet udleveret til Danmark som en del af vores umistelige kulturarv," slutter Tinna Damgård-Sørensen.
English: In our opinion this fact alone is sufficient to claim the ship back to Denmark as part of our cultural heritage, according to the EU directive," finishes Tinna Damgård-Sørensen.

Danish: Sideløbende blev skibs-graven sammenlignet med lignende samtidige fund og med vikingetidsgrave generelt, fortrinsvis fra det sydskandinaviske område.
English: In parallel a comparison was made of this ship-grave with other similar contemporary finds, and with Viking-Age graves in general, chiefly from the South Scandinavian region.

Danish: I praksis indgår i energiregnskabet også kraftforbruget ved at løfte padlen og føre den frem, hvilket giver en mekanisk virkningsgrad på ca. 0,8.
English: In practice, lifting the paddle and taking it forward also consumes energy, giving a mechanical efficiency of ca 0.8.

Danish: Havhingsten er konstrueret til at kunne lægge masten ned og således reducere vindmodstanden under roning.
English: In practice, rowing trials will be performed immediately before and/or after the beating trials.

Danish: Det betyder i praksis, at forsøgssejladser må gennemføres i naturens konstant foranderlige elementer - vind, strøm og sø.
English: In practice, that means the trial voyages must be carried out in nature' s constantly changing elements, i.e. wind, current and sea.

Danish: Det betyder i praksis, at forsøgssejladser må gennemføres i naturens konstant foranderlige elementer - vind, strøm og sø.
English: In practice, that means the trial voyages must be carried out in nature’ s constantly changing elements, i.e. wind, current and sea.

Danish: Vurderingen foregår i praksis ved, at skibets bådsmand (en af de to ovennævnte bådebyggere) dagligt gennemgår skibet systematisk.
English: In practice, the ship will be systematically inspected on a daily basis by the boatswain (one of the two shipwrights mentioned above).

Danish: I praksis vil hertil komme bølgeslag mod bådsiden og andre skiftende påvirkninger.
English: In practice, there would also be the impact of waves on the sides of the boat and other varying stresses.

Danish: I praksis er det selvfølgelig de dyrearter, der efterlader sig et spor når de dør, nemlig skallerne.
English: In practice, this involves of course those animal species which leave evidence when they die, i.e. their shells.

Danish: I praksis er dette et ideal, som ikke kan nås; men vi må forvente at komme tættere på idealet i forbindelse med sejladsen til Dublin, hvor besætningen dels har haft lejlighed til at øve håndtering af skibet gennem tre sæsoners træningssejladser og dels ”sejler sig i form” undervejs.
English: In practice, this is of course an unachievable ideal, but the chances of approaching the ideal are greatest in connection with the experimental voyage to Dublin as the crew have had three years of practice in handling the ship and will be able to fine tune their skills along the way.

Danish: Da forsøg med udspænding af to prøvestykker mislykkedes efter kogning i vand, valgtes det i stedet at øge plankens bredde med pålimede plankestykker.
English: In prehistory, the timber would have had to be hollowed out from the tree trunk and expanded to acquire the shape and dimensions required.

Danish: Vagten starter principielt kl. 8 morgen og slutter den efterfølgende dag ved samme tid.
English: In principle the watch starts at 8 in the morning and ends the following day at the same time.

Danish: I realiteten faldt imperiet da Edward Bekenderen i 1065 lå for døden.
English: In reality the Empire fell when Edward the Confessor lay close to death in AD 1065.

Danish: I de sidste måneder har Vikingeskibsmuseet i samarbejde med den danske ambassade i London, foretaget forskellige vurderinger af, om museets kronjuvel Havhingsten fra Glendalough, skulle lægge vejen forbi London og Tower Bridge, når skibet vender hjem til Danmark næste sommer.
English: In recent months the Viking Ship Museum has carried out several evaluations in collaboration with the Danish embassy in London of how the Museum's crown jewel, the Sea Stallion from Glendalough, could fit in a visit to London and Tower Bridge on its way home to Denmark this summer.

Danish: I de seneste måneder har de frivillige bådelaug brugt mange timer på at reparere, male og tjære både og rig.
English: In recent months, the volunteer boat guilds have spent many hours repairing, painting and tarring the boats and their rigging.

Danish: Sejlene er i nyere tid blevet fremstillet af bomuld, men tilbage i tiden er hør og hamp også benyttet til sejldug.
English: In recent years, sails have been made of cotton, but in the old days, linen and hemp were also used to make sail canvas.

Danish: De seneste år har Vikingeskibsmuseet, Havhingsten fra Glendalough og den gæve besætning om bord gang på gang bevist, at fortællingen om vore stolte forfædres fænomenale sømandskab kan nå ud i selv de fjerneste kroge af verden.
English: In recent years, the Viking Ship Museum, the Sea Stallion from Glendalough and the doughty crew on board have time and again demonstrated that the stories about our proud forefathers' phenomenal seamanship can reach out to even the remotest parts of the world.

Danish: I dagens anledning har vi samlet nogle af de smukkeste billeder fra Havhingstens mange rejser.
English: In recognition of the day, we have collected some of the most beautiful photos from Sea Stallion's many voyages.

Danish: Ved rekonstruktionen af Havhingstens sejl har det således været nødvendigt i høj grad at basere sig på erfaringer fra tidligere rekonstruktioner samt funktionalistiske beregninger.
English: In reconstructing the Sea Stallion's sail it has therefore been necessary, to a great degree, to work on the basis of experience gained from previous reconstructions as well as functional calculations.

Danish: Med et nyt EU-direktiv om den nationale kulturarvs ukrænkelighed har Irland gjort krav på at få udleveret Skuldelev 2-vraget, resterne af et 30 meter langt vikingetids krigsskib, som i dag er udstillet på Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde.
English: In relation to a new EU-directive about the inviolability of the national cultural heritage Ireland has claimed the handing over of the Skuldelev 2-wreck, the remains of a 30m-long Viking ship, which today is on display in the Viking Ship Museum Roskilde.

Danish: I forhold til de beregnede koefficienter, der afspejler Tilias større spring og lidt rundere bund, skal det bemærkes, at skrogets smidighed giver mulighed for mange forskellige variationer af formen og dermed af koefficienterne, alt efter hvordan skroget er båret oppe.
English: In relation to the calculated coefficients, which reflect Tilia's greater sheer and slightly rounder bottom in cross-section, it should not be forgotten that the flexibility of the hull offers the possibility of many different variations in shape and hence in the coefficients, according to how the hull is supported.

Danish: I forhold til de beregnede koefficienter, der afspejler Tilias større spring og lidt rundere bund, skal det bemærkes, at skrogets smidighed giver mulighed for mange forskellige variationer af formen og dermed af koefficienterne, alt efter hvordan skroget er båret oppe.
English: In relation to the calculated coefficients, which reflect Tilia’s greater sheer and slightly rounder bottom in cross-section, it should not be forgotten that the flexibility of the hull offers the possibility of many different variations in shape and hence in the coefficients, according to how the hull is supported.

Danish: Vi lover til gengæld et aspirantforløb med fokus på uddannelse og søsikkerhed samt et hav af eventyrlige oplevelser.
English: In return we promise an aspirant course focusing on education and safety at sea, as well as an ocean of adventurous experiences.

Danish: Sejlads i hårdt vejr: Skibet ligger ofte for uroligt til at have gasblussene tændt og gryderne fulde af varm mad.
English: In rough weather: The ship is very unstable and it is dangerous to light the gas rings and have pots filled with hot food.

Danish: Hjort, hare og vildsvin har nok i de sydskandinaviske egne mere været luksusmad, mens sæler, hvaler, fuglevildt og rener i Nordskandinavien har været en stor del af kosten
English: In Scandinavia, deer, hare and wild boar were probably luxury foods, whereas seals, whales, wild fowl and reindeer made up a large part of the diet in Northern Scandinavia

Danish: I Skandinavien var produktionen af uldklæde og jern af høj kvalitet blevet vigtige erhverv.
English: In Scandinavia, production of woollen cloth and high-quality iron became important industries.

Danish: I Scar på Orkney er fundet en skibsgrav med tre personer i; skriv deres biografi.
English: In Scar on Orkney, a ship burial has been found containing the bodies of three people; write their biographies.

Danish: I september 1066 angreb og indtog den norske konge Harald Hårderåde byen York.
English: In September 1066 AD Harald Hardrada attacked and took the town of York.

Danish: I september 1066 angreb den norske konge, Harald Hårderåde England.
English: In September AD 1066, the Norwegian king Harold Hardrada attacked England.

Danish: På lavt vand kan skibsvrag og faste konstruktioner afsløres ved hjælp af luftfoto; enten ved studier af offentligt tilgængelige fotos eller ved observationer og optagelser gjort til lejligheden fra fly eller drone.
English: In shallow water wrecks and built structures can be seen on aerial photos; either by studying publicly available photos or by observations and pictures taken from an aircraft or unmanned drone.

Danish: Vinden skubber i sejlet og driver båden fremad.
English: In simple terms, the wind pushes the sail and drives the boat forwards.

Danish: I Snorre Sturlassons Olav Trygvasons saga findes vigtige informationer om skibsbyggeri, skibenes udseende og organiseringen af bådvæft og bådebyggere, og i Mangnus Erlingssøn saga er der beskrivelser af skibsprovianten.
English: In Snorri Sturluson’s Saga of Olav Trygvason, there is important information about shipbuilding, what the ships looked like, and how boat wharfs and boat building was organised, and in Magnus Erlingssøn’s saga, we learn about ship provisions.

Danish: Nogle steder er fiskene måske ligefrem også blevet en handelsvare
English: In some places the fish may even have been traded

Danish: I nogle byer ejede kongen jord og rådede over forskellige embedsmænd til opkrævning af told og til forsvar af byen.
English: In some towns the king owned the land and commanded various public servants responsible for the collection of taxes and the defence of the town.

Danish: I Sydøstasien gjorde disse rejser stræderne mellem Sumatra, Malaysia og Java til et nyt brændpunkt for handel og kulturel udveksling.
English: In Southeast Asia, these journeys transformed the straits between Sumatra, Malaysia, and Java into a new hot spot for trade and cultural exchange.

Danish: På trods af, at skibsgraven blev omhyggeligt publiceret af Knud Thorvildsen for godt 40 år siden, har der siden vist sig mange uafklarede forhold.
English: In spite of the fact that the ship-grave was painstakingly published by Knud Thorvildsen over 40 years ago, it has since become clear that there are many unexplained elements.

Danish: Skibsgraven blev omhyggeligt publiceret af Knud Thorvildsen for godt 40 år siden, men siden har der vist sig mange uafklarede forhold.
English: In spite of the fact that the ship-grave was painstakingly published by Knud Thorvildsen over 40 years ago, it has since become clear that there are many unexplained elements.

Danish: På trods af disse problemer er der alligevel mange oplysninger at hente i Bayeux tapetet for den der interesserer sig for vikingetidens langskibe.
English: In spite of these problems there is still a large amount of information to be gained from the Bayeux tapestry for those who are interested in the longships of the Viking Age.

Danish: I sådanne tilfælde vil der ikke blive opkrævet betaling for sejladsen.
English: In such cases, no payment will be charged for the sailing trip and prepaid sailing trips will be refunded.

Danish: I sådanne tilfælde vil der blive opkrævet betaling for sejladsen.
English: In such cases, payment will be charged for the sailing and prepaid sailing trips will not be refunded.

Danish: Om sommeren og efteråret har man tørret årets høst af korn, grøntsager, frugt og bær.
English: In summer and autumn, the year's harvest of grain, vegetables, fruit and berries was dried.

Danish: I 1060'erne eller 1070'erne var der hårde kampe mellem angelsaksere, nordmænd, danskere og normannere om den engelske trone.
English: In the 1060s or 1070s there were fierce battles between Anglo-Saxons, Norwegians, Danes and Normans for the English throne.

Danish: I 1060erne er skibet repareret med planker fra et egetræ, der ligeledes er fældet på de britiske øer.
English: In the 1060s the ship was repaired with planks from an oak that was also felled in the British Isles.

Danish: I 1100-årene fik Ribe et nyt stort forsvarsværk mod øst: En 12 meter bred og 2 meter dyb voldgrav med en 8 meter bred vold på indersiden.
English: In the 12th century Ribe had a new, massive fortification towards the east: A 12 m wide and 2 m deep moat with an 8 m wide rampart on the inner side.

Danish: I publikationen fra 1917 nævnes det, at flere dele måtte dampes op til tre gange for at de kunne presses tilbage til deres oprindelige form.
English: In the 1917 publication, it is noted that some parts had to be steamed up to three times in order to press them back into their original shape.

Danish: I 1060'erne, da der var hårde kampe mellem angelsaksere, nordmænd, danskere og normannere om den engelske trone, sejlede Skuldelev 2-skibet fra Dublin til Roskilde.
English: In the AD 1060s, when there were fierce battles between Anglo-Saxons, Norwegians, Danes and Normans for the English throne, the Skuldelev 2-ship sailed from Dublin to Roskilde.

Danish: I 1060'erne, da der var hårde kampe mellem angelsaksere, nordmænd, danskere og normannere om den engelske trone, sejlede Skuldelev 2-skibet fra Dub­lin til Roskilde.
English: In the AD 1060s, when there were fierce battles between Anglo-Saxons, Norwegians, Danes and Normans for the English throne, the Skuldelev 2-ship sailed from Dublin to Roskilde.

Danish: Agters - bagerst - i det lange skib befinder skipper, styrmænd og rorgængere sig.
English: In the aft - the rear of the ship - the skipper, mates and helmsmen are found.

Danish: I analysen af bådens hydrodynamiske forhold er fremdrivningsmodstanden beregnet med følgende komponenter: friktionsmodstand, der afhænger af arealet af den våde overflade, restmodstanden forårsaget af bølgedannelse og grænselag, modstand pga. bundens ruhed, og endelig rormodstand samt luftmodstanden for mandskabet og bådens overvandsskrog.
English: In the analysis of the boat's hydrodynamics, the resistance to propulsion was calculated with the following components: frictional resistance, which depends on the area of the wet surface, residuary resistance caused by the formation of waves and a boundary layer, resistance resulting from the roughness of the bottom, and finally the resistance of the steering oar and the air resistance caused by the crew and the part of the hull above water.

Danish: I efteråret 2010 søsatte Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde en nybygget traditionel fiskerbåd fra Smålandsfarvandet, en åledrivkvase.
English: In the autumn of 2010, the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde launched a newly built eel-drifter (åledrivkvase), a type of fishing boat traditionally used on the waters between Zealand, Lolland and Falster.

Danish: Udstilling og Havhingsten på Langør havn.
English: In the Background the mobile exhibition and the Sea Stallion.

Danish: I begyndelsen af 800-tallet lå der en 2-3 meter bred grøft omkring byen.
English: In the beginning of the 9th century Ribe was enclosed within a 2-3 m wide ditch.

Danish: Filmen viser på bedste måde, hvilke strabadser og udfordringer skib og besætning blev udsat for undervejs fra Roskilde til Dublin.
English: In the best possible way, the film shows the difficulties and challenges that the ship and crew faced on the voyage from Roskilde to Dublin.

Danish: I smedens værksted kan du forme det glødende jern og slå hovedet på sømmet.
English: In the blacksmith's workshop you can forge the red-hot iron and hit the nail on the head.

Danish: I smedens workshop kan du smede følgende:
English: In the blacksmith's workshop you can make the following:

Danish: I gravhøjen fandt man en fuld påklædt mand i en kiste med kappe, kniv, sværd og et spænde til kappen.
English: In the burial mount was a fully dressed man in a coffin with a cloak, knife, sword and a pin for the cloak.

Danish: Ved genoptryk betales 50 % af den aktuelle billedpris.
English: In the case of a reprint, 50% of the current reproduction fee is to be paid.

Danish: I krisesituationer kan det nemlig være farligt for gasterne, at være pakket ind i soveposer, de ikke hurtigt kan komme ud af.
English: In the case of an emergency it can be too dangerous for the men to be inside sleeping bags, which they are not able to get out of quickly.

Danish: I de tilfælde, hvor der omtales skjolde på skibene - som 'pansring' - ligger de stille eller omtalen er allegorisk.
English: In the cases where shields are mentioned on the ships - as ‘armouring' - they lie still or the reference is allegorical.

Danish: I de tilfælde, hvor der omtales skjolde på skibene – som ’pansring’ – ligger de stille eller omtalen er allegorisk.
English: In the cases where shields are mentioned on the ships – as ‘armouring’ – they lie still or the reference is allegorical.

Danish: I indsamlingsarbejdet er det desuden vigtigt at kende til skibenes længde, bredde, trætyper, dato for sidste tjæring og bundmaling, dato for søsætning og logbog med informationer om sommerens sejlruter.
English: In the collection work, it is also important to know a ship's length, width, type of wood, date last tarred and painted, date launched, and information from the ship's log book on the summer's sailing routes.

Danish: Denne forbindelse vil i de kommende år blive styrket med etableringen af den nye bane København-Ringsted og det kommende anlæg af Femern Bælt-forbindelsen.
English: In the coming years, this connection will be strengthened even further with the establishment of the new line from Copenhagen to Ringsted and the forthcoming works with the Femern Belt connection.

Danish: I løbet af ca. 300 år udviklede samfundet sig på afgørende måder: De nordiske riger samledes i kongedømmer.
English: In the course of approx. 300 years, society developed is decisive ways.

Danish: I løbet af 1700-tallet blev området omkring vraget opfyldt og der blev bygget en kaj og en bro over det sted hvor det sank.
English: In the course of the 18th century the area was partly filled and a bridge and revetment was built over the wreck.

Danish: I løbet af germansk jernalder (400-750 e.Kr). kan der iagttages en begyndende tendens til, at bosættelserne igen rykker ud til kysterne.
English: In the course of the Germanic Iron Age (AD 400-750) it is possible to discern the beginnings of a tendency for settlements to move out to the coasts again.

Danish: Ved 1921-undersøgelsen optog Rosenberg fundets store mængder af våben af jern og ben samt skjolde og andet udstyr af træ.
English: In the course of the investigation in 1921, Rosenberg excavated large amounts of weapons of iron and bone, as well as shields and other wooden equipment.

Danish: I tapetets forløb er det også muligt at se, hvordan detaljerigdommen i skibsafbildningerne gradvist aftager.
English: In the course of the tapestry’s narrative it is also possible to see how the richness of detail in the delineation of the ships gradually diminishes.

Danish: I løbet af disse ti år udviklede dansk marinarkæologi en førerposition i det internationale forskersamfund”.
English: In the course of those ten years, Danish marine archaeology developed a leading position in the international research community.

Danish: I træets krone var der meget krumvokset træ, som skovarbejderne tog ned, for at det ikke flækkede og blev ødelagt, når træet blev fældet.
English: In the crown of the tree, there were many crooked timbers, which were cut by tree surgeons so that they wouldn't crack or be damaged when the tree was felled.

Danish: I de danske kilder fremkommer et fartøj benævnt Hollands Jæger, som sejlede for orlogsflåden mellem 1620 og 1623, hvorefter det forsvinder fra skibsoptegnelserne.
English: In the Danish sources a Hollands Jæger (Dutch Jager) appeared between 1620 and 1623.

Danish: Sådanne skibe blev bygget i tidlig middelalder som pligtydelse af befolkningen for at stå til rådighed for kystforsvar, transport og militære ekspeditioner.
English: In the early Middle Ages, the population was obliged to build these ships which then stood ready for coastal defence, transport and military expeditions.

Danish: De første år sejlede Havhingsten med ufarvet sejl, her er skibet fotograferet på forsøgsrejsen til Norge i 2006.
English: In the early years, Sea Stallion sailed with an undyed sail: here, the ship can be seen on the trial voyage to Norway in 2006.

Danish: Sidst har vi forsøgt at gøre gældende, at skibet blev udgravet i 1960'erne, og at Danmark ikke var medlem af EU eller EF som det hed dengang.
English: In the end we raised the issue that the ship was excavated in the 1960ies when Denmark was not even a member of the EU (or EC, how it was called then).

Danish: I opgaven Bestikregning skulle du sejle fra Sjælland til Jylland, og du fik kun at vide, hvor lang tid der var gået og hvilken kurs og fart du havde holdt.
English: In the exercise "Dead reckoning" you were to sail from Zealand to Jutland and you were only told how much time had elapsed and which course and speed you had held.

Danish: I opgaverne om sejlegenskaber: tophastighed, roning, krydsegenskaber, vendinger, fartrosen og den tilhørende GIS-opgave får du mulighed for selv at udføre den forskning, som Vikingeskibsmuseets medarbejdere nu skal i gang med som opfølgning på Havhingstens togt.
English: In the exercises about sailing abilities: maximum speed, rowing, tacking abilities, turns, the speed diagram and the accompanying GIS exercise, you are given the opportunity to carry out yourself the research which the Viking Ship Museum's staff are now to embark upon following The Sea Stallion's voyage.

Danish: I første omgang måske som vinterhi og evt. slavemarkeder, men siden som blomstrende handelsbyer med en stor produktion af daglige brugsgenstande og omfattende international handel.
English: In the first instance perhaps as winter quarters and possibly slave markets but later as blossoming trading towns with a great production of everyday consumer articles and extensive international trade.

Danish: Skibets størrelse overraskede i første omgang arkæologerne, og det blev antaget at der var tale om to fartøjer.
English: In the first instance the size of the ship surprised the archaeologists and it was presumed to represent the remains of two vessels.

Danish: De spillede i første omgang en essentiel rolle for udviklingen af handlen og siden for kongemagtens administration.
English: In the first instance they played an essential role in the development of commerce and later in the administration of royal power.

Danish: Målet for vikingerne er i første omgang de velhavende klostre med deres kirkeskatte.
English: In the first instance, the Vikings' targets were the wealthy monasteries with their church treasures.

Danish: I det følgende har vi samlet de spørgsmål som knytter sig til det engelske område.
English: In the following we have assembled some questions relating to the situation in England.

Danish: I det følgende har vi samlet de opgaver, som omhandler Irland.
English: In the following we have collected some exercises about Ireland.

Danish: I det følgende har vi samlet opgaver og spørgsmål som knytter sig til de skotske områder.
English: In the following we have collected some exercises and questions connected with Scotland.

Danish: Nedenfor følger præsentationer af de hidtil fire udkomne bind i serien
English: In the following, the first four volumes of the series are presented

Danish: I forskibet har denne karakter af et dyrehoved af samme karakter som dem vist på stavens modsatte side, mens agterstævnens motiv er vanskeligere at bestemme i dag.
English: In the fore-stem this has the character of an animal head of the same type as those shown on the other side of the stick, while the motif on the aft-stem is more difficult to define today.

Danish: I det fjerde århundrede f.Kr. fik meget mobile enheder af krigere i både af Hjortspringtype øjensynlig stor betydning i Østersøområdet og Sydskandinavien.
English: In the fourth century BC, very mobile army units of fleet-infantry transporting themselves in Hjortspring-type boats had great significance in the Baltic area and south-western Scandinavia.

Danish: I gravhøjen var skibssiderne blevet presset ned, og bunden af skibet lå på højde med rælingen.
English: In the grave mound, the sides had been pressed down so that the bottom of the hull was at the same height as the sheerstrake.

Danish: I de havne skibet anløber, vil der blive arrangeret udstillinger og 'åbent skib' hvor publikum får mulighed for at gense det skib, som i 2007-08 gjorde den dramatiske sejlads til Dublin i Irland.
English: In the harbours the ship calls to, the public will get the chance to visit the ‘open ship' and see exhibitions about the dramatic voyage to and from Dublin in Ireland, that Sea Stallion undertook in 2007-08.

Danish: I de havne skibet anløber, vil der blive arrangeret udstillinger og 'åbent skib' hvor publikum får mulighed for at gense det skib, som i 2007-08 gjorde den dramatiske sejlads til Dublin i Irland.
English: In the harbours the ship calls to, the public will get the chance to visit the ‘open ship’ and see exhibitions about the dramatic voyage to and from Dublin in Ireland, that Sea Stallion undertook in 2007–08.

Danish: De hedenske grave er de ældste arkæologiske spor efter Vikingerne i Irland.
English: In the late tenth century the Irish Vikings adopted the local Christian faith.

Danish: Det var vigtig for en konge at kontrollere den mægtige vikingeflåde i Dublin, hvis han skulle have stor magt.
English: In the late Viking age control of and its powerful fleet became a prime concern to any hopeful holder of kingship of Ireland.

Danish: I lyset af disse forandringer fremstår perioden mellem 1150 og 1250 som en overgangstid, ikke kun angående byggestilen men hele konceptet for lastskibsbyggeri i Danmark.
English: In the light of these changes, the period between 1150 and 1250 stands out as a time of transition, not only of building style but of the entire concept of cargo shipbuilding in Denmark.

Danish: Imedens forberedte Hertug Vilhelm af Normandiet også et angreb på England.
English: In the meantime, William, Duke of Normandy, also prepared to attack England.

Danish: Ved opmåling og registrering af et stolpehul indtastes nogle givne punkter i hullet på GPS'en og den skaber derefter selv en rundt hul.
English: In the measurement and recording of a post hole, some points in the hole are entered into the GPS, which then draws a round hole.

Danish: I menuen til højre kan du læse mere om fundsteder, forskning og resultater.
English: In the menu to the left you can read more about find spots, research and results.

Danish: I midten af 900-årene blev der opført en 1300 meter lang vold omkring byen, der nogle steder er op til 10-11 meter høj.
English: In the middle of the 10th century a 1300 m long earth bank, in some places was up to 10-11 m high, was build around Haithabu.

Danish: I midten af 1600-tallet kan en bonde ved navn Benjamin Guttesen på Mykines have ejet en sådan båd.
English: In the middle of the 17th century, a farmer by the name of Benjamin Guttesen may have owned such a boat.

Danish: Midtskibs er der til gengæld ingen problemer, da kølsvinet – det store stykke tømmer, som holder masten på plads – stabiliserer skibet på midten.
English: In the middle of the ship there’s no problem because the keelson – a large piece of oak holding the mast – is stabilizing the ship.

Danish: I det nye bind fortolker tredive forskere fra syv lande den originale kilde og præ-senterer dens geografiske, kulturelle, nautiske og økonomiske kontekst i lyset af de seneste undersøgelser.
English: In the new volume, thirty scholars from seven countries interpret the original source and present its geographical, cultural, nautical and economic context in the light of recent investigations.

Danish: På den næste - og sidste - serie sejladsbilleder er det invasionsflåden som vises, men nu med meget forenklede, trekantede sejl, og med rigningen reduceret til to, tre eller fire støttetove - kun Vilhelms flagskib har fortsat seks vanter og stag.
English: In the next – and final – series of pictures of ships under sail it is the invasion fleet that is shown but now with very simplified, triangular sails and with the rigging reduced to two, three or four supporting ropes – only William’s flagship still has six shrouds and stays.

Danish: I 1800tallet blev Danmarks fortidsminder registreret ved landsdækkende sognebeskrivelser.
English: In the nineteenth century, Denmark’s historical monuments were recorded in parish descriptions nationwide.

Danish: På den nordlige halvkugle er det nemlig sådan, at lavtryk drejer om sig selv modsat urets retning.
English: In the Northern hemisphere it is like this: low-pressures are spinning counterclockwise.

Danish: I de norske skibsgrave Oseberg og Gokstad fandt man store kar, det ene kunne indeholde 500 liter og det andet 750 liter, og flere kilder nævner, at der som minimum skulle være 4 liter pr. person pr. dag.
English: In the Norwegian ship graves, Oseberg and Gokstad, large troughs were found that could hold 500 litres and 750 litres, and several sources mention that there had to be a minimum of 4 litres per person per day.

Danish: Færøbådene var nemlig tilpasset de farlige strømforhold i farvandene mellem øerne.
English: In the old days, the boatbuilder travelled between villages and built to order.

Danish: I gamle dage drog bådebyggeren rundt til de forskellige bygder for at bygge på bestilling.
English: In the old days, the boatbuilder travelled between villages and built to order.

Danish: I tiden omkring og lige efter normannernes erobring af England vokser flådestyrkernes størrelse yderligere.
English: In the period around and just after the Norman Conquest of England the size of the fleets increase further.

Danish: På billedet ses Christian Nielsen med hele sin familie og en nybygget drivkvase i baggrunden.
English: In the photo you can see Christian Nielsen and his family, with a newly built drifter in the background.

Danish: Ved al offentliggørelse skal fotografens eller illustratorens navn og Vikingeskibsmuseets copyright anføres på denne måde: Copyright: Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde.
English: In the publication, it must be clearly stated that the reproduced image belongs to The Viking Ship Museum, Denmark and, if available, the photographer's or the illustrator's name must be provided: Copyright: The Viking Ship Museum, Denmark.

Danish: Ved al offentliggørelse skal fotografens eller illustratorens navn og Vikingeskibsmuseets copyright anføres på denne måde: Copyright: Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde.
English: In the publication, it must be clearly stated that the reproduced image belongs to The Viking Ship Museum, Denmark and, if available, the photographer’s or the illustrator’s name must be provided: Copyright: The Viking Ship Museum, Denmark.

Danish: I forskningsmæssig sammenhæng må rekonstruktionen – skibet, betragtes som en hypotese om det originale skib Skuldelev 2; vores tolkning af skibet og dets manglende dele.
English: In the research context, the reconstruction must be regarded as a hypothesis about the original ship, Skuldelev 2; the Sea Stallion is our interpretation of what remains of that ship.

Danish: Både i den rige skibsgrav Gokstad og på en dæksplanke fra et skib fundet i Århus har man dog indridsede spillebrædder, hvorpå Mølle og vikingespillet nefatavl kunne spilles.
English: In the rich ship burial of Oseberg and on a reused deck plank found in Aarhus a gaming board has been found which could be used for the games of morris and nefatavl.

Danish: Max Vinner har i Roar-rapporten gjort forskellige sådanne sammenligninger.
English: In the Roar Report, Max Vinner made several such comparisons.

Danish: I tovværkstedet håndlægger museets rebslager skibets rig af lindebast, hud fra sæl og hvalros.
English: In the rope workshop, the museum's rope-maker takes care of the ship's rigging of lime bast and skin from seals and walrus.

Danish: I tovværkstedet håndlægger museets rebslager skibets rig af lindebast, hud fra sæl og hvalros.
English: In the rope workshop, the museum’s rope-maker takes care of the ship’s rigging of lime bast and skin from seals and walrus.

Danish: I skjaldedigtningen kan besætningen på et skib kaldes for skipun, sogn og sókn, hvoraf det første korresponderer til runestenenes brug af skiparar.
English: In the scaldic verses the crew of a ship can be called skipun, sogn or sókn.

Danish: Half a century ago, archaeology entered a new field of work with the excavation of ancient ships found under water.
English: In the Scandinavian societies of the Viking Age the ship was omnipresent.

Danish: I de skandinaviske vikingetidssamfund var skibet allestedsnærværende.
English: In the Scandinavian societies of the Viking Age the ship was omnipresent.

Danish: Skibet var allestedsnærværende i de skandinaviske vikingetidssamfund.
English: In the Scandinavian societies of the Viking Age the ship was omnipresent.

Danish: Viking-Age War Fleets
English: In the Scandinavian societies…

Danish: I andet kapitel redegør fundets udgravere kort for fundets tidlige historie (2.1) samt undervandsundersøgelserne i 1957-59 og udgravningen i 1962 (2.
English: In the second chapter, the primary excavators of the find give a short account of the early history of the find (2.1), as well as the underwater investigations in 1957-59 and the excavation in 1962 (2.

Danish: I andet kapitel redegør fundets udgravere kort for fundets tidlige historie (2.1) samt undervandsundersøgelserne i 1957-59 og udgravningen i 1962 (2.2-2.3).
English: In the second chapter, the primary excavators of the find give a short account of the early history of the find (2.1), as well as the underwater investigations in 1957-59 and the excavation in 1962 (2.2-2.3).

Danish: I anden halvdel af 1100-tallet lægges de første sten til Domkirken, der endnu står som Ribes vartegn.
English: In the second half of the 12th century the first stones were laid for the Cathedral, which still stands as Ribe's landmark.

Danish: Der er lavet en udstilling der bliver vist ved siden af byggeriet, på Vikingskibsmuseets bådeværft.
English: In the second picture, you can see the clamps where the frames will lie.

Danish: I skibsgraven fandt man i hvert fald både heste og hunde.
English: In the ship burial both horses and dogs were found.

Danish: I de slaviske fartøjer er mastesporet ofte lavet i forbindelse med et mastespant, mens det i de skandinaviske for det meste findes i et kølsvin.
English: In the Slavic vessels, the step of the mast is often made in association with a mast rib, whereas in the Scandinavian examples it is usually found in a keelson.

Danish: I den sydlige del kunne udskilles 2 fundkoncentrationer 10- 20 cm. under nuværende havbundsniveau, på en vanddybde på ca. 1,2 m., i bevarede kulturlag på op til 50 cm. tykkelse.
English: In the southern part, 2 find concentrations could be isolated 10-20 cm under the current seabed level in 1.2 metres of water in preserved culture layers of up to 50 cm thickness.

Danish: I fartrosen plotter man en serie af relative vindretninger/hastigheder ved samme vindstyrke og sejlareal og optegner kurven mellem punkterne.
English: In the speed diagram a series of wind directions and speeds at the same wind speed and area of sail is plotted and a course drawn between the points.

Danish: I efteråret 2004 blev Havhingsten fra Glendalough søsat og i de efterfølgende fire år, sejlede skibet i over 160 dage.
English: In the spring of 2004, the Sea Stallion from Glendalough was launched and over the following four years the ship sailed for over 160 days.

Danish: I foråret indgik Vikingeskibsmuseet en række aftaler med blandt andet Danmarks Radio, BBC og Politiken om at følge sejladsen tæt.
English: In the spring, the Viking Ship Museum entered into a number of agreements with amongst others Danmarks Radio, the BBC, and the Danish newspaper, Politiken, to come along and cover the voyage.

Danish: Til historien fra Havhingsten kan klassen læse nyhedsbrevene her på hjemmesiden eller læse avisartikler for at finde frem til den måde en journalist skriver på.
English: In the story for the Sea Stallion, the class can read the newsletters here on the website and also newspaper articles to discover the style and form in which a journalist writes.

Danish: Til historien fra Havhingsten kan klassen læse nyhedsbrevene her på hjemmesiden eller læse avisartikler for at finde frem til den måde en journalist skriver på.
English: In the story from the Sea Stallion, the class can read the newsletters here on the website and also newspaper articles to discover the way in which a journalist writes.

Danish: Ved den efterfølgende behandling af data er der flere muligheder for at beregne et resultat.
English: In the subsequent analysis, the recorded data can be used in several ways to calculate results.

Danish: I de følgende århundreder forsøgte den danske kirke at frigøre sig yderligere fra den tyske indflydelse.
English: In the subsequent centuries, the Danish church attempted further to free itself from German influence.

Danish: I de efterfølgende måneder plyndrede og nedbrændte Vilhelm flere byer i Sydengland og overtog herredømmet.
English: In the subsequent months, William plundered and burned a number of towns in Southern England and took over control.

Danish: I vikingeskibenes efterkommere, de nordeuropæiske råsejlsbåde, kan helt identiske forhold følges.
English: In the successors to the Viking ships, the North European square-rigged boats, identical conditions can be traced.

Danish: I sommeren 1996 blev Helge Ask, Vikingeskibsmuseets rekonstruktion af det lille krigsskib Skuldelev 5, som et forsøg, slæbt over netop Draget ved Helgenæs.
English: In the summer of 1996, Helge Ask, the Viking Ship Museum's reconstruction of the small warship, Skuldelev 5, was hauled over Draget at Helgenæs as an experiment.

Danish: I sommeren 1996 blev Helge Ask, Vikingeskibsmuseets rekonstruktion af det lille krigsskib Skuldelev 5, som et forsøg, slæbt over netop Draget ved Helgenæs.
English: In the summer of 1996, Helge Ask, the Viking Ship Museum’s reconstruction of the small warship, Skuldelev 5, was hauled over Draget at Helgenæs as an experiment.

Danish: I det efterfølgende skema kan du se hvilke slags kød, grøntsager, korn, frugt og bær, og krydderurter man kendte i vikingetiden.
English: In the table below, you can see which kinds of meat, vegetables, grain, fruits, berries and culinary herbs were known in Viking times.

Danish: I 900-tallet grundlagde vikingerne byer ved Dublin, Waterford, Limerick, Wexford og muligvis også Cork.
English: In the tenth century, Vikings established towns at Dublin, Waterford, Limerick, Wexford and possibly Cork.

Danish: De bliver centrum for handel, den kongelige administration og den nyetablerede kristendom.
English: In the towns, the kings activities including the minting of coins, the collection of tolls and taxes and the assembling of their leding (army).

Danish: På overgangen mellem vikingetid og tidlig middelalder (ca. 1050) opstår der imidlertid et behov for beskyttelse, hvilket fremgår af den nyligt fundne spærring mellem Kerteminde Fjord og Kertinge Nor fra netop denne periode.
English: In the transition between the Viking Age and the early Middle Ages (ca 1050), however, there arose a need for protection, as can be seen from the recently-found barrage between Kerteminde Fjord and Kertinge Nor from exactly that period.

Danish: Under de egentlig testsejladser starter et krydsforsøg altid direkte til læ for et nærmere defineret ”mål”.
English: In the true sea trials, the ship will always start by beating to leeward towards a predetermined "target", a buoy or randomly selected waypoint.

Danish: I det øverste bord kunne de oprindelige årehuller kun delvist genanvendes i Skuldelev 5, da åreafstanden har været forskellig i de to skibe.
English: In the uppermost strake, not all the oarports from the original ship could be re-used for rowing Skuldelev 5, since the distance between the oars was different.

Danish: I vikingetid kan der iagttages en øget og tydeligvis forskellig interesse for kystområderne end tidligere.
English: In the Viking Age an increased and clearly different type of interest in the coastal areas can be observed.

Danish: I vikingetiden havde man professionelle historiefortællere som blev kaldet skjalde.
English: In the Viking Age there was something called a Scald.

Danish: Vestnorges naturforhold gav i vikingetiden muligheder for mange høvdingedømmer.
English: In the Viking Age, the natural resources of Western Norway gave the opportunity for several chiefdoms.

Danish: I Vikingetiden var det bestemt ved lov, hvilke våben der skulle være om bord på et krigsskib.
English: In the Viking Age, the weapons to be carried on board a warship were decreed by law.

Danish: I Vikingeskibshallen vises i perioden en mindre særudstilling om vikingerne på Grønland og den moderne besætnings eventyr.
