Danish: Se flere billeder fra stormdøgnet
English: More photos from the storm

Danish: Men i de seneste år har arkæologiske fund ved Middelhavet og omkring Det Indiske Ocean afdækket en verden, som hidtil kun har været kendt i glimt fra rejseberetninger.
English: More recently, archaeological finds in the Mediterranean and around the Indian Ocean have uncovered a world that was previously only known from passing references in travel accounts.

Danish: For mere end 1000 år siden sejlede Erik den Røde med 25 vikingeskibe og 700 mand fra Island til Grønland.
English: More than 1,000 years ago, Eric the Red sailed from Iceland to Greenland with 25 Viking ships and 700 men.

Danish: Over 1300 søfolk druknede.
English: More than 1,300 seamen drowned.

Danish: Mere end 10 millioner hjem får mulighed for at følge med på Havhingstens sejlads fra Roskilde til Dublin, når Viasat History har premiere på BBC-programmet "Vikingeskibets skjulte gåder".
English: More than 10 million homes will be able to follow the Sea Stallion's journey from Roskilde to Dublin when Viasat History premieres the BBC TV Timewatch programme ‘Viking Voyage'.

Danish: Mere end 11 nationaliteter fra alderen 14 til 65 år af begge køn og fra alle typer erhverv har brugt op til 185 dage sammen, svarende til et halvt år.
English: More than 11 nationalities aged from 14 to 65, men and women from all kinds of backgrounds have spent up to 185 days or six months together.

Danish: Mere end 15.000 mennesker tog imod.
English: More than 15,000 people were there to welcome it.

Danish: Mere end 4000 personer besøgte i løbet af dagen 'Vikingernes Samsø' og Havhingsten.
English: More than 4000 people visited the Sea Stallion during the day in Langør

Danish: Mere end 4000 personer besøgte i løbet af dagen ’Vikingernes Samsø' og Havhingsten.
English: More than 4000 people visited the Sea Stallion during the day in Langør

Danish: Mere end 90 medier har skrevet om eller bragt indslag fra Havhingstens tur gennem Berlin og nyheden nåede også ZDF's 'Heute', der Tysklands mest sete TV-nyheder.
English: More than 90 media organisations have written or made broadcasts about Sea Stallion's tour through Berlin and the story also made it onto ZDF's 'Heute', Germany's most-watched TV-news.

Danish: Mere sejlads øger ikke formidlingsværdien.
English: More voyages do not increase the communication value.

Danish: Mere sejlads med Havhingsten giver ikke afgørende nye forskningsresultater.
English: More voyages with the Sea Stallion will not produce important new research results.

Danish: Flere kiler blev sat ind i siden af stammen, og med en fornyet energi og med støtte fra en voksende flok tilskuer, fortsatte bådebyggerne støt, slag for slag, indtil stammen endelig flækkede hele vejen fra bund til top.
English: More wedges were inserted into the side of the oak, and with a renewed energy and the support of a growing crowd of spectators, the boatbuilders continued steadily, blow after blow, until the split had finally worked its way along the length of the oak.

Danish: Desuden blev der langs kysten, såvel på land, som på lavt vand, opsamlet kraftigt vandrullet og stærkt patineret flint.
English: Moreover, along the coast both on land and in shallow water, extremely water-worn and very patinated flint was collected.

Danish: Samtidig er det afgørende for validiteten af de testsejladser, vi skal foretage i Limfjorden, at vi kan lægge og rejse masten rutinemæssigt og hurtigt.
English: Moreover, it is vital for the validity of the test sailing we are going to do in the Limfjord that we can lower and raise the mast quickly and with routine.

Danish: Morgentur på Museumsøen lørdag den 7. december, Fotos: Mette Kryger
English: Morning at the Museum Island on Saturday 7 December Photos: Mette Kryger

Danish: 'Viking-Age War Fleets' af museumsinspektør Ph.d. Morten Ravn udkommer 24. oktober 2016
English: Morten Ravn udkommer 24. oktober 2016

Danish: Morten Sørensen kunne i øvrigt fortælle sit publikum den lidt overraskende anekdote, at vejrudsigter generelt er mere sikre, når vejret kommer fra øst, end når det kommer fra vest.
English: Morten Sørensen also had the surprising anecdote to share with his audience that weather reports are usually more reliable, when the weather comes from the East, than is the case, when it comes form the west.

Danish: Moskeer dukkede op i Afrika og Indien, i Skandinavien byggedes missionskirker, og på Java og Sumatra vandt buddhisme og hinduisme frem.
English: Mosques began to appear in Africa and India, missionary churches were built in Scandinavia, and Buddhism and Hinduism became popular on Java and Sumatra.

Danish: Vigtigste af alt, blev også arbejdstegningerne til Gislingebåden gjort tilgængelige for gratis download, så alle kunne bygge deres egen version af båden.
English: Most importantly, the working drawings for the Gislinge Boat were made available for free download so that others could also attempt their own reconstruction of the boat.

Danish: Det meste af vores viden stammer fra de spor, som byen og dens indbyggere har efterladt sig i jorden.
English: Most of our knowledge comes from the remains left by the town and its inhabitants in the soil.

Danish: Størstedelen af den 65 mand store besætning er danskere, men i alt er sejlere fra 11 nationer samlet ombord.
English: Most of the 65-person crew were Danes, but people from altogether 11 nations were on board.

Danish: De fleste omtaler fra det sene 9. og det 10. århundreder nævner overfald og plyndringer af små grupper på under en snes skibe, f.eks. i årene 885, 897, 981, 982.
English: Most of the accounts from the late 9th and the 10th centuries refer to attacks and plundering by small groups of fewer than a score of ships, e.g. in the years 885, 897, 981, 982.

Danish: Langt de fleste arabiske kilder om vikingerne er rejseberetninger.
English: Most of the Arab sources about the Vikings are travelogues.

Danish: De fleste af genstandene fra gravene er fundet ved grusgravning og etableringen af jernbanelinien i 1840erne, 50erne og 60erne.
English: Most of the artefacts from the graves were recovered in the course of gravel digging and in the building of the railway line in the 1840s, 50s and 60s.

Danish: Nogle steder har arkæologerne fundet rester fra syv forskellige byggeperioder oven på hinanden.
English: Most of the houses in Waterford were of the three-aisled type, with clay floors and wattle walls, again comparable to the type found in Dublin.

Danish: De fleste vittigheder er allerede fortalt og genfortalt.
English: Most of the jokes have been told and retold.

Danish: Det meste af den originale stævn var bevaret, men det meste af den øverste del manglede.
English: Most of the original stem was preserved, but most of the upper parts were missing.

Danish: De fleste af spørgsmålene indgår også i andre opgaver på hjemmesiden.
English: Most of the questions are also included in other task-sheets here on the website.

Danish: De fleste middelalderlige sagafortællinger er nedskrevet på Island og omhandler norske stormænd, høvdinger og konger.
English: Most of the sagas from the middle ages were written down in Iceland and are about Norse lords, chiefs and kings.

Danish: Hovedparten af de sagaer, der er bevaret fra den tidlige middelalder, er nedskrevet på Island og handler især om de norske konger - det er derfor også de norske langskibe, som vi hører om.
English: Most of the sagas that survive from the Early Middle Ages were written down in Iceland and deal with the Norwegian kings in particular – and it is therefore also the Norwegian longships that we hear about.

Danish: Størstedelen af disse tekster er skrevet på latin og ofte på baggrund af politiske, militære eller religiøse konfrontationer med vikingerne.
English: Most of these texts are written in Latin and often against the background of political, military or religious confrontation with the Vikings.

Danish: Også på andre tidspunkter af dagen har de fleste mennesker en omtrentlig fornemmelse af verdenshjørnerne ud fra solens stilling.
English: Most people also have an approximate perception of the points of the compass at other times of the day, based on the position of the sun.

Danish: De fleste mennesker kan uden problemer forstå, at en sejlbåd kan sejle med vinden.
English: Most people can easily understand that a sailboat can sail downwind.

Danish: Det mest overraskende og nærmest skræmmende er, at hele forskibet og agterskibet bevæger sig 20 - 50 cm. op og ned og til siderne.
English: Most surprising and almost scary is the way the whole fore ship and stern move 20-50 cm up and down and to the sides.

Danish: Det mest overraskende og nærmest skræmmende er, at hele forskibet og agterskibet bevæger sig 20 – 50 cm. op og ned og til siderne.
English: Most surprising and almost scary is the way the whole fore ship and stern move 20–50 cm up and down and to the sides.

Danish: Primært danskere, også en dansk/canadier og en dansk/schweizer
English: Mostly Danes, but also a Danish-Canadian and a Danish-Swiss

Danish: Mstislav og Christinas datter Ingeborg blev gift med Knud Lavard og moder til Valdemar den Store.
English: Mstislav and Christina’s daughter Ingeborg married Knud Lavard and was mother to Valdemar the Great.

Danish: Meget af forskningen har derfor fokuseret på hvad vikingerne har kunnet have haft af instrumenter, med de materialer og den teknologi, de havde til rådighed.
English: Much of the research has therefore focused on what instruments the Vikings could have had with the materials and the technology that they had available.

Danish: Byttehandel var almindeligt i vikingetiden.
English: Much of the trade was based on barter.

Danish: Også krus og kaffepulver findes frem og det varme vand.
English: Mugs and instant coffee are also found and hot water.

Danish: Muireann Nic Amhlaoibhr har vundet adskillige priser både med Danú og som sangerinde.
English: Muireann Nic Amhlaoibhr has won many prizes, both as a singer and with Danú.

Danish: Fælles ejerskab af skibe og varer samt kodificering af maritim lovgivning.
English: Multiple ownership of ships or their cargo and the codification of maritime law.

Danish: Munkebo, der i ældre middelalder fungerede som havn for Odense, kan samtidig have overtaget Ladbys rolle som den vigtigste lokalitet ved Kerteminde Fjord og Kertinge Nor.
English: Munkebo, which in the early Middle Ages functioned as the harbour of Odense, may at this time have taken over Ladby's role as the most important site near Kerteminde Fjord and Kertinge Nor.

Danish: Museumshåndværker
English: Museum artisan

Danish: Museumsinspektør Louise Henriksen, der er besætningsmedlem på 'Havhingsten', skriver rejsebreve undervejs om livet om bord.
English: Museum curator and crewmember on Sea Stallion, Louise Henriksen, will be writing a travel log about life on board during the sailing.

Danish: Museumsinspektør Anne Sørensen tog imod premierministeren fra Bhutan Mr. Jigmi Y. Thinley og viste ham og hans delegation rundt på Vikingeskibsmuseet
English: Museum curator Anne Sørensen welcomed the prime minister of Bhutan, Mr. Jigmi Y. Thinley and showed the prime minister and his delegation around the Viking Ship Museum.

Danish: De mange filmklip, fotos og blogtekster, som løbende bliver delt under projektet, er en integreret del af den open-source filosofi, museet havde anvendertil projektet.
English: Museum curator, Tríona Sørensen, who was responsible for the open source element of the Gislinge Boat Project, explains the idea behind it, “The boatyard has always been a huge draw for guests at the Museum.

Danish: Direktør for Vikingeskibsmuseet, Tinna Damgård-Sørensen er slet ikke i tvivl.
English: Museum Director Tinna Damgård-Sørensen does not doubt - she sees the glass as almost filled:

Danish: Gæsterne kan også selv prøve at smede nagler og slå hoved på sømmet.
English: Museum guests can also try their own hand at making an iron nail.

Danish: Museumsgæsterne kunne se film fra sejladsen på storskærm, læs logbogen og skriv deres egen logposition, finde ud af hvad de 60 besætningsmedlemmer spiste, se toilettet der stod om bord og komme tæt på Havhingsten.
English: Museum guests could see footage from the voyage on big screen, read the log book and write their own log position, find out what the 60 crew members ate, see the toilet and get close to the enourmous vessel.

Danish: Deltagerne er skibets besætning og skal alle medvirke aktivt om bord - med at ro skibet ud af havn, sætte sejl og måske bemande roret.
English: Museum guests crew the boat and have to take an active part in the sailing, including rowing out of the harbour, setting the sail and perhaps also manning the rudder.

Danish: Museumsbutik og café
English: Museum shop and café

Danish: Museumsbutikspersonalet mødte ind til synet af plastikindpakkede vikingeskibe i strålende vintersol.
English: Museum shop staff arrived to the sight of plastic wrapped Viking ships in brilliant winter sun.

Danish: Museumsgæsterne inviteres med på en rejse gennem 50 års passioneret arbejde med vikingernes skibe - fra de hektiske uger i sommeren 1962, hvor de fem skibe dukkede frem under flere lag af dynd og muslingeskaller til i dag, hvor en flåde af rekonstruerede vikingeskibe ligger i museumshavnen eller sejler på togter i vikingernes kølvand.
English: Museum visitors are invited on a journey trough 50 years of passionate work with the ships of the Vikings - from the hectic weeks during the summer of 1962 when five ships emerged from layers of silt and seashells until today, when a fleet of reconstructed Viking ships lie in the Museum harbour and sail on voyages in the wake of the Vikings.

Danish: Publikum kan prøve kræfter med at optegne skibsdele på folie og samle en rekonstruktionsmodel.
English: Museum visitors can try their hand at drawing ship parts on drafting foil and assembling a reconstruction model.

Danish: Musée: museum(at)vikingeskibsmuseet.dk
English: Museum: museum(at)vikingeskibsmuseet.dk

Danish: Malmö Museer
English: Museums in Malmö, Sweden

Danish: Musikere, kunstnere og forfattere sætter ord på nutidens associationer til vikingetid og middelalder og giver deres bud på, hvad fortiden kan bruges til for nutidsmennesker.
English: Musicians, artists and writers will put provide their interpretations of our present-day associations with the Viking and Middle Ages, and give their opinion on how the past can be used by people today.

Danish: Her kom musikere, dansere, skjalde og markedsfolk fra hele egnen og fjerne lande.
English: Musicians, dancers, minstrels and market people came from the whole area and from abroad.

Danish: Skal vi i stedet tænke på en indvendig løsning?
English: Must we instead think about an inside solution?

Danish: Mit bedste råd er at gå ind på Havhingstens hjemmeside.
English: My best advice is to enter the website of the Sea Stallion.

Danish: Min konklusion på vores situation er altså, at det mest fornuftige er at have is i maven, væbne sig med tålmodighed og vente til sydvestenvinden før eller siden kommer.
English: My conclusion in our situation is therefore that the most sensible thing is to remain calm, arm ourselves with patience, and wait until the southwesterly wind comes, sooner or later.

Danish: Min far og jeg stangede ål fra den jolle vi havde på slæb eller strøg rejer, når det var sæson for det.
English: My father and I would catch eels and shrimp from a dinghy we towed behind the motorboat when they were in season.

Danish: Neglen pegede vinkelret ud fra fingeren og blodet løb.
English: My fingernail was poiting perpendicular from the finger with blood rushing out.

Danish: Min morfar havde en motorbåd og i weekenderne, hele sommerhalvåret, sejlede vi fjorden tynd.
English: My granddad had a motorboat and during summer weekends we would sail on the fjord.

Danish: Min morfar monterede det på en plade og det kom op på væggen.
English: My granddad mounted it on a board and put it up on the wall.

Danish: Min mobiltelefon er død.
English: My mobile phone is dead.

Danish: Det våde sejlertøj blev hængt til tørre i maskinrummet og jeg fik et langt varmt bad.
English: My waterproofs was dried in the engine room and I got a hot shower.

Danish: Nakskov Sejlrende & Barneholm
English: Nakskov Channel & Barneholm

Danish: Navn Byggested og år Bygherre Antal rum
English: Name Site and date Builder Number of rum

Danish: Smalle sunde med stærk strøm, dybe fjorde og stejle fjelde med risiko for kraftige kastevinde kan gøre det vanskeligt at manøvrere for sejl.
English: Narrow sounds with strong currents, deep fjords and steep fells with the risk of strong squalls can make it difficult to manoeuvre by sail.

Danish: NaSk: Nationalmuseets Marinarkæologiske Bibliotek
English: NaSk: Library of Maritime Archaeology of the National Museum

Danish: Natur- eller sansenavigation
English: Natural or intuitive navigation

Danish: Natur- eller sansenavigation
English: Natural or sense navigation

Danish: Selvfølgelig vil det på mange måder foregå fjernt fra vikingetidens handelsrejser, men skipper på første del af rejsen, Ole Sand peger alligevel på centrale ligheder med datidens vilkår til søs.
English: Naturally, in many ways this voyage will be very different from the trading voyages of the Viking Age, but the skipper on the first leg of the journey, Ole Sand, can point out a number of similarities with the past regarding conditions at sea.

Danish: Sejlads i skjaldekvadene
English: Navigation in the scaldic verses

Danish: Navigation i vikingetiden
English: Navigation in the Viking Age

Danish: Og læs om navigation i vikingetiden
English: Navigation in the viking age.

Danish: Forsøg med navigation uden brug af moderne hjælpemidler er svært, tidskrævende og fordrer koncentration.
English: Navigation without the use of modern instruments is difficult, time consuming and challenge our concentration.

English: Neither Puck 2 nor Roskilde 6 have been fully analysed and both wrecks could yet produce many surprising contributions to our knowledge of longships from the Viking Age in and around the Scandinavian countries.

English: Nettle rash is also a result of the hard physical work, and the limited opportunities to wash and rinse away sweat led to rashes and itching.

English: New aims and objectives need to be defined for research into Viking Age vessels and navigation where – despite the advances of recent decades – exciting questions remain unanswered.

Danish: Det et projekt, hvor museet inviterer museets gæster til at opleve de fem originale vikingeskibe i Vikingeskibshallen på nye måder - gennem måltidsoplevelser, der forbinder måltidet, maritim historie og råvarer anvendt i vikingetiden.
English: New Nordic Viking Food is a project where the museum shows museum visitors new ways to experience the five original Viking ships that are displayed in the Viking Ship Hall, through food experiences that link the meal, maritime history and the commodities used during the Viking Age.

Danish: Ny Nordisk Vikingemad formes efter fire dogmer:
English: New Nordic Viking Food was founded on the basis of four dogmas:

Danish: Ny Nordisk Vikingemad er blevet til ud fra fire dogmer; der anvendes råvarer fra vikingetiden - også de råvarer vikingerne bragte med hjem fra andre lande; maden er en nyfortolkning, med nutidig smag, anretning og tilberedningsmetoder; det er naturligt at bruge lokale og sæsonbetonede råvarer; måltidet bringer historien om de fem vikingeskibe i Vikingeskibshallen til live.
English: New Nordic Viking Food was founded on the basis of four dogmas: commodities from the Viking Age are used, including the ingredients that the Vikings brought back from other countries; the food is a new interpretation with contemporary flavours, presentation and cooking methods; it is natural to use local and seasonal ingredients; the meal brings to life the story of the five Viking ships in the Viking Ship Hall.

English: New techniques give archaeologists the possibility to trace the origin of increasing numbers of artefacts from these emporia and to understand the widespread maritime network that they represent.

English: Now we are gathering our video production in a dedicated Web TV station with many hours of broadcasts.

English: Now we are resting our vocal cords, sleeping in the afternoon sun, drying rain gear and wool blanckets, eating ice cream and preparing for an early start tomorrow.

Danish: Nu starter vi på en måde forfra; giver farvelkram og siger velkommen på samme tid.
English: Now we are sort of starting over, saying goodbye and welcoming new crew at the same time.

Danish: Nu kan vi sikre et meget højt sikkerheds- og kommunikationsniveau med den meget professionelle besætning ombord på Cable One.”
English: Now we can be sure of a very high level of safety and communication with the very professional crew on board Cable One.

Danish: Nu fik vi endelig prøvet alle rutinerne og procedurerne af.
English: Now we finally get the chance to test the routines and procedures on board.

Danish: Nu tager vi skridtet fuldt ud: Hvis sidste års hjemmeside var en hestekærre, bliver dette års hjemmeside en formel 1-racer,” fortæller projektleder Preben Rather Sørensen, som samtidig er webmaster for hjemmesiden.
English: Now we go full-blown: If last year’s homepage was a horse cart, this year we will have a formula 1 race car,” leader of the project Preben Rather Sørensen declares.

Danish: Nu har vi nye erfaringer, vi kan tage med i skoven til næste forår, hvilke træer vi skal vælge, og hvilke vi skal lade stå.
English: Now we have experience we can use in the forest next spring about which trees to pick and which to leave.

Danish: Nu venter der en god og lang nats søvn - før vi åbner skibet for gæster i morgen.
English: Now we look forward to a good and long night sleep, before opening the ship for guests tomorrow.

Danish: Nu troede vi, at det ville være let at tage rorvidjen ud af roret, men det viste sig, at den var trukket meget fast.
English: Now we thought that it would be easy to pull the rudder withy out of the rudder, but it appeared that it had been pulled very tight.

Danish: Nu med foredrag
English: Now with lectures

English: Now you can try your hand at wickerwork, an Old Norse sewing technique, where you tie straw together in order to make baskets and the like.

Danish: Nu skal to af flådeegene i Jægersborg Hegn alligevel fældes til det formål, som de oprindelig var tiltænkt.
English: Now, two of the fleet oaks from Jægersborg Hegn will be felled to fulfil their original purpose.

Danish: Nu nærmer vi os den spektakulære kulmination.
English: Now, we are nearing its spectacular conclusion.

English: Nowadays the old church boats are used mostly for boat races at the mid-summer festivals in Leksand and Västanvik.

Danish: Ingen andre steder i Storbritannien skinner vikingernes indflydelse så stærkt igennem som her.
English: Nowhere in Britain does the Viking influence shine through as strongly as here.

Danish: Nu får du chancen for at komme helt tæt på bygningen af et vikingeskib i fuld skala.
English: Now’s your chance to get close to the construction of a Viking ship in full scale.

Danish: Så det er selvsagt ikke en løsning, vi kan bruge i år, hvor vi vil krydse Nordsøen og sejle langs meget øde kyster nord og vest for Skotland,” forklarer Preben Rather Sørensen.
English: Obviously we had to come up with another solution for this year, crossing the North Sea and sailing along very desolate shores north and west of Scotland,” Preben Rather Sørensen explains.

English: Official departure of the Sea Stallion from Glendalough with speeches, Fiddling Farewell: ”The Sea Stallion”

Danish: Mønter, frimærker, statistiske rapporter og breve til fremtiden fra en række fremstående irske embedsmænd som Dublins borgmester, den irske ambassadør til Danmark og kulturministeren repræsenterer det officielle Irland.
English: Official Ireland is represented by several letters to the future from Irish officials such as the Lord Mayor of Dublin, The Irish Ambassador til Denmark and the Minister of Arts, Sport and Tourism.

Danish: Ofte kendes en by fra de skriftlige kilder i forbindelse med, at der er givet tilladelse til at opføre en kirke, eller at byen er blevet nævnt som bispesæde.
English: Often a town appears in the written sources in connection with the granting of permission for the erection of a local church or because the town has been named as an episcopal residence.

Danish: Ofte havde flere skib fælles proviant, eller også var egentlige proviantskibe en del af flåden.

Danish: Ofte var skibet symbolsk og helt anonymt - det skulle blot være tilstede og kunne genkendes som et skib, men det behøvede ikke at ligne et konkret eksempel.
English: Often the ship was symbolic and quite anonymous - it only had to be present on the coin and to be recognisable as a ship.

Danish: Ofte var skibet symbolsk og helt anonymt - det skulle blot være tilstede og kunne genkendes som et skib, men det behøvede ikke at ligne et konkret eksempel.
English: Often the ship was symbolic and quite anonymous – it only had to be present on the coin and to be recognisable as a ship.

Danish: Det er dog ikke altid at man kan holde helt fri på vagten.
English: Often, however, it is not possible to have the entire shift off.

Danish: Der er ofte flere ting der skal laves om bord og mange gaster hjælper på deres frivagt til med, at udføre småreparationer på tovværk og sejl.
English: Often, however, it is not possible to have the entire shift off. There are always things that need doing on board, and many crew members use their time off to mend the sail and cordage.

English: Ohthere brought walrus tusks as an exotic gift for the king of England.

Danish: Ottar fortalte om sit liv som høvding i Nordnorge og om sine sørejser fra Det Arktiske Hav til Danmark.
English: Ohthere told about his life as a chieftain in northern Norway and his sea voyages from the Arctic Ocean to Denmark.

Danish: Siden da er der fremkommet vigtige arkæologiske fund og indhentet erfaringer med rekonstruktion af skibsfund, der kan kaste nyt lys over denne vigtige historiske kilde.
English: Ohthere's and Wulfstan's accounts are, therefore, our oldest sources concerning the geography of Scandinavia and also give the earliest written confirmation of a number of Nordic place names.

Danish: Ohthere’s Voyages, redigeret af J. Bately og A. Englert.
English: Ohthere’s Voyages, edition J. Bately and A. Englert.

English: Okay then - Donsö it is

English: OLAVSSUDEN Unknown Birkebeiner (rebels) 32

Danish: Gammelt skib og nyt træ
English: Old ships and new timbers

Danish: Ole fortæller: ”Vi sejler langs Sjællands nordkyst, ned gennem Øresund og op i Østersøen.
English: Ole explains: “We will sail along the north coast of Zealand, down through the Oresund strait and up into the Baltic.

Danish: Olof Skötkonung kalder byen Situne Dei (guds by) på sine mønter, og Adam af Bremen omtaler byen som bispesæde i 1070.
English: Olof Skottkonung called the town Situne Dei - "God's town" - on his coins and Adam of Bremen refers to the town as an Episcopal residence in AD 1070.

Danish: Olsen, Olaf & Ole Crumlin-Pedersen 1990: Five Viking Ships from Roskilde Fjord (kun 2. udgave).
English: Olsen, Olaf & Ole Crumlin-Pedersen 1990: Five Viking Ships from Roskilde Fjord (2nd edition only).

Danish: Den 1. maj åbner museet dørene for årets sæson med en lang række aktiviteter:
English: On 1 May, the museum will open its doors for the summer season with a variety of activities:

Danish: Den 13. oktober kommer landets statsoverhoved forbi museet for at gense skibet.
English: On 13 October, the country's head of state will visit the museum to see the ship again.

Danish: Den 14. oktober 1066 udkæmpede Vilhelm (Erobreren) af Normandiet og Harold Godwinson af England Slaget ved Hastings.
English: On 14th October AD 1066 William (the Conqueror) of Normandy and Harold Godwinson of England met at the Battle of Hastings.

Danish: Den 14. oktober mødte den normanniske hær de engelske tropper i Slaget ved Hastings, hvor Harold Godwinson blev dræbt og Vilhelm startede sin erobring af England.
English: On 14th October the Norman army met the English troops at the Battle of Hastings, where Harold Godwinson was killed and William began his conquest of England.

Danish: Den 2. april søsatte Vikingeskibsmuseet en stor del af den store bådsamling, heriblandt Havhingsten fra Glendalough.
English: On 2 April, the Viking Ship Museum launched a major part of it large boat collection, including the Sea Stallion from Glendalough.

Danish: Vilhelm ankom den 28. september til Sussex i Sydengland med en stor flåde og hær.
English: On 28th September William reached Sussex in Southern England with a great army and fleet.

Danish: Den 30. maj går det den anden vej, når Havhingsten igen skal have vand omkring kølen.
English: On 30 May this year it will go the other way, and the Sea Stallion will once again sink its keel into water.

Danish: Den 6. december blev Vikingeskibsmuseet ramt af ekstremt forhøjet vandstand
English: On 6 December, the Viking Ship Museum was hit by extremely high water levels

Danish: På en smuk forårsdag i april ved den fredfyldte Roskilde Fjord kan det være svært at forestille sig dramatisk uvejr eller en krisesituation.
English: On a beautiful day in April by the peaceful Roskilde Fjord it may be difficult to imagine dramatic and foul weather or a crisis situation.

Danish: På et langskib som Havhingsten er dette langskibs trim uhyre vigtigt at holde sig for øje på grund af den lange vægtarm og de 65 frie viljer ombord.
English: On a longship such as the Sea Stallion, it is of crucial importance to be aware of this longitudinal trim due to the long leverage effect and the 65 free souls (and wills) on board.

Danish: På eventyr med vikingerne
English: On a Viking adventure

Danish: På alle skibsafbildningerne er bordplankernes forløb antydet med linier, men ellers afhænger detaljeringsgraden af de enkelte fartøjers størrelse i afbildningen.
English: On all the ship-representations the strakes are indicated by strokes but otherwise the amount of detail in the individual ships depends on their size in the depiction.

Danish: Det er utroligt svære vilkår for museets presseansvarlige at håndtere medier på et åbent skib i øsende regnvejr seks ud af syv dage om ugen.
English: On an open ship in pouring rain six out seven days a week, the Museum's press officers had incredibly difficult conditions in which to deal with the media.

Danish: Det er utroligt svære vilkår for museets presseansvarlige at håndtere medier på et åbent skib i øsende regnvejr seks ud af syv dage om ugen.
English: On an open ship in pouring rain six out seven days a week, the Museum’s press officers had incredibly difficult conditions in which to deal with the media.

Danish: Ved Ansgars død i sygeseng i 865, havde kristendommen ikke fået noget egentligt fodfæste i Norden.
English: On Ansgar's death, in his sick bed in AD 865, Christianity had not become particularly well established in the Nordic Countries.

Danish: Ved ankomsten til Normandiet tages sejlet ned, og masten lægges
English: On arrival in Normandy the sail is dropped and the mast laid down

Danish: Ved mindst tre lejligheder er skibet repareret med egeplanker.
English: On at least three occasions the ship was repaired with oak planks.

Danish: Hun havde på Ramsgate vegne påtaget sig at arrangere ophold og overnatning for Havhingstens 60 besætningsmedlemmer.
English: On behalf of Ramsgate she had taken on the responsibility of arranging the stay and overnight accommodation for the Sea Stallion’s 60 crew.

Danish: Ombord på Havhingsten fører hovmesteren, sygeplejersken, en bådebygger og pr-medarbejderen også dagbog, hvori de nedskriver oplysninger om kosten ombord, sygdom og hygiejne, reparationer, samt oplevelser undervejs.
English: On board the Sea Stallion the chief steward, the nurse, a boat builder and the PR officer also keep a diary.

Danish: Posten som rorgænger (den som styrer skibet) bliver på Havhingsten fordelt på få sejlkyndige personer fra løftingen - det rum på skibet, hvor skipper og styrmænd befinder sig - og de skifter også hver fjerde time.
English: On board the Sea Stallion the position of helmsman, the person responsible for steering the ship, is divided between a small number of people with navigation skills from the lofting - the section of the ship with the skipper and coxswains.

Danish: Ombord på Havhingsten deltager 65 frivillige gaster.
English: On board the Sea Stallion there is a crew of 65 volunteer hands.

Danish: I dag om bord på Havhingsten er kosten noget mere varieret, men det er stadig vigtigt, at de madvarer man har med kan holde sig i længere tid.
English: On board the Sea Stallion today the diet is more varied but it is still important that provisions on board are able to be kept fresh for a longer period of time.

Danish: Til et mindre krigsskibe skulle hver kriger medbringe: en bredøkse, et sværd, et spyd, samt skjold, og han fik 3 øre i bøde for hvert manglende våben.
English: On board the smaller warships each free man of age was to present a broad-axe, a sword, a spear and a shield, and he would be fined 3 øre for each missing weapon.

Danish: Om bord var Svends egen bror Asbjørn.
English: On board was Svein's own brother Asbjørn.

Danish: Med om bord er 60 frivillige besætningsmedlemmer og en masse fortællinger om vikingeskibene.
English: On board will be a crew of 60 volunteers and a world of stories about Viking ships.

Danish: Juledag samme år blev Vilhelm kronet til konge af England i Westminster Abbey i London.
English: On Christmas Day of that same year, William was crowned king in Westminster Abbey in London.

Danish: Til fods kan du se, hvor længe du selv er om at gå en kendt distance.
English: On foot you can see how long it takes you to walk a known distance.

Danish: Fredag den 15. oktober om formiddagen tog museumsinspektør Anne C. Sørensen imod premierministeren fra Bhutan Mr. Jigmi Y. Thinley og Minister of Works and Human Settlement Mr. Zimba.
English: On Friday morning the 15th October, museum curator Anne C. Sørensen received the prime minister of Bhutan, Mr. Jigmi Y. Thinley, and the Minister for Works and Human Settlement, Mr. Zimba.

Danish: På Haralds skib kan vi se at de sidder fast, og ikke blot bliver holdt af besætningen, da denne her er travlt optaget af at tage sejlet ned.
English: On Harold’s ship we can see that they sit fixed and are not simply held by the crew, since these men are busy hauling down the sail.

Danish: På dødslejet overlod han den norske trone til sin onkel Harald Hårderåde og den danske til Svend .
English: On his deathbed, he gave over the Norwegian throne to his uncle Harald Hardrada and the Danish throne to Svein.

Danish: På forsøgsrejsen sejlede Havhingsten med ca. 10 tons udstyr og ballast under dørken.
English: On its trial voyage, the Sea Stallion sailed with about 10 tonnes of equipment and ballast under the deck.

English: On Java and Sumatra, rare items such as camphor and spices were prepared for export.

Danish: 24. juni sejlede det store havgående handelsskib Ottar af sted fra Roskilde med kursen sat mod Norge.
English: On June 24, the large ocean-going trader 'Ottar' sailed from Roskilde with the course set for Norway.

Danish: Til lands: Prøv det samme på en bustur.
English: On land: Try the same exercise on a bus trip.

Danish: På mange af dem findes der graffiti i form af indridsede skibsbilleder, men oftest er det kun stævne og ikke hele skibe, der er afbildet.
English: On many of these are found graffiti in the form of carved ship-representations but it is most often only the stems and not whole ships that are depicted.

Danish: Mandag den 2. juli 2007 stævner det 30 meter lange krigsskib Havhingsten fra Glendalough og dets 65 mand store besætning ud fra Vikingeskibsmuseets havn i Roskilde.
English: On Monday the 2nd July 2007 the 30metre long warship Havhingsten fra Glendalough and her 65 strong crew will cast off on her way.

Danish: På vej hen til jollen, der lå for anker, nærmest faldt jeg over noget, der ved nærmere øjesyn viste sig at være stævnen fra en båd eller jolle.
English: On my way back to the dinghy that lay at anchor, I almost fell over something that, with a closer look, proved to be the stem from a boat or dinghy.

Danish: På en af Århusstenene er forsiden dekoreret med en kæmpe ansigtsmaske med vrængende mund, strittende skæg og store runde øjne.
English: On one of the Aarhus stones, the front is decorated with a huge face mask showing a grimacing mouth, spiky beard and large, staring eyes.

Danish: I vores pilotrigninger (første prøverigninger) bruges som regel hampetov i den stående rig og også hampetov i den løbende.
English: On our reconstructions we generally use hemp rope in both the standing and the running rigging.

Danish: Lørdag den 14. oktober rykkede Vilhelms hær ud af Hastings og mødte Harolds tropper på højdedraget Senlac Hill ti kilometer fra byen.
English: On Saturday 14th October William’s army evacuated Hastings and met Harold’s troops on high ground, Senlac Hills, ten kilometres from the town.

Danish: På lørdag får han lidt mere at se til.
English: On Saturday he will have even more to look out for.

Danish: På lørdag vil fire 2-spand gøre opgaven efter med Havhingsten.
English: On Saturday, four pairs will perform the same task for the Sea Stallion.

Danish: 9. september 2014 åbnede Schiffe der Wikinger i Martin-Gropius-Bau udstillingshus i Berlin.
English: On September 9th, 2014, Schiffe der Wikinger opened in Martin-Gropius-Bau exhibition house in Berlin.
