English: On Shakespeare, place-names, and the Battle of Stamford Bridge

Danish: På Skuldelev 6 bruges vidjerne til at fastholde årerne til båden.
English: On Skuldelev 6, the withies are used to fasten the oars to the boat.

Danish: På nogle originale både ses værktøjsspor fra øksen, på andre ses høvlspor.
English: On some boats, tool marks from axes can be seen while others bear traces of the use of planes.

Danish: Den sejlende festival drager søndag den 21. juli af sted fra Roskilde videre ud mod nye havne og nye vinkler på vores fælles historie.
English: On Sunday the 21st July, the water-borne festival will leave Roskilde to sail onwards towards new harbours and new perspectives on our common history.

Danish: Søndag efter søsætningen af Havhingsten var det så tid at skylle overskudsfarven ud af sejlet.
English: On Sunday, after the Sea Stallion was launched, it was time to rinse off the extra colour.

Danish: Ved den lejlighed fremførte Erik Andersen, der har designet Havhingstens sejl og rig, en vigtig pointe: at sejlads i Nordsøen med en rekonstruktion af denne kaliber absolut ikke er en spøg, og at man derfor – i denne forbindelse – skal være varsom med at teste uafprøvede sejltyper.
English: On that occasion Erik Andersen who designed the Sea Stallion's sail and rigging, made an important point: Sailing in the North Sea with a reconstruction of this calibre, is no joke, and as a consequence is it necessary to be cautious when trialling untested types of sail.

Danish: Ved den episode var besætningen meget hurtige til at trimme op i luv, på trods af at vi ikke var trænet...
English: On that occasion, the crew was very quick to trim up to windward, even without training…

Danish: På den tur havde vi ikke fået fremstillet klapperne foran årehullerne, så da Havhingsten lagde sig i en vindøgning, stod der 30 lårtykke vandstråler ind i skibet.
English: On that trip, we had no covers on the oar holes, so when the Sea Stallion leaned over in a gust of wind, 30 streams of water as thick as thighs poured into the ship.

Danish: Den 14. oktober udkæmpede Vilhelm af Normandiet og Harold Godwinson af England Slaget ved Hastings.
English: On the 14th October, William of Normandy and Harold Godwinson of England fought the Battle of Hastings.

Danish: Den 18. december 2001 blev museets plader og planker ophængt parvis (fyr og eg) i henholdsvis Skærbæk havn, hvor saltholdigheden i vandet, der er afgørende for tilstedeværelsen af pæleorm, normalt er lav, og i Hirtshals havn, hvor saltholdigheden derimod er meget høj efter danske forhold.
English: On the 18th December 2001 the museum's hull sections and planks were hung up in pairs (pine and oak), respectively in Skærbæk harbour where the salt content of the water, which is crucial for the presence of shipworms, is normally low, and in Hirtshals harbour, where the salt content is very high by Danish standards.

Danish: Den 18. december 2001 blev museets plader og planker ophængt parvis (fyr og eg) i henholdsvis Skærbæk havn, hvor saltholdigheden i vandet, der er afgørende for tilstedeværelsen af pæleorm, normalt er lav, og i Hirtshals havn, hvor saltholdigheden derimod er meget høj efter danske forhold.
English: On the 18th December 2001 the museum’s hull sections and planks were hung up in pairs (pine and oak), respectively in Skærbæk harbour where the salt content of the water, which is crucial for the presence of shipworms, is normally low, and in Hirtshals harbour, where the salt content is very high by Danish standards.

Danish: Skibet blev søsat den 4. september 2004 og navngivet af Hendes Majestæt Dronning Margrethe II.
English: On the 4th September 2004 the long ship Havhingsten fra Glendalough - Sea Stallion from Glendalough was launched.

Danish: Den 4. september 2004 blev Havhingsten fra Glendalough navngivet af Hendes Majestæt Dronningen og derefter søsat af den 60-mand store besætning med hjælp af Vikingeskibsmuseets frivillige bådelaug.
English: On the 4th September 2004, Sea Stallion from Glendalough was named by Her Majesty Queen Margrethe and afterwards launched by the 60-strong crew with help from the Viking Ship Museum's volunteer boatguilds.

Danish: Den 4. september 2004 blev Havhingsten fra Glendalough navngivet af Hendes Majestæt Dronningen og derefter søsat af den 60-mand store besætning.
English: On the 4th September 2004, Sea Stallion was named by Her Majesty Queen Margrethe and afterwards launched by its 60-strong cew.

Danish: Som aftalt mødte jeg op ved skranken, og der blev ringet op til Ole Crumlin, der kort efter kom og tog imid mig.
English: On the agreed day I was to show up and introduce myself and then someone from the musum would take care of me.

Danish: På grundlag af en 14C datering i sidste del af 1200-tallet er det muligt, at tredje fases pæle og faskiner eller nogle af disse er anbragt til at afværge norske angreb som dem, der i 1288 ramte byer ved Isefjorden efter mordet på Erik Klipping.
English: On the basis of a single 14C date, it is assumed that at least some of the posts and fascines of the third phase are indicative of events in 1288, following the murder of King Erik Klipping, which included sea-borne raids from Norway into the Isefjord complex, of which Roskilde Fjord is a part.

Danish: Ud fra skibenes byggetidspunkter og et skøn over deres levetid i aktiv tjeneste antages det, at første fase af Peberrende-spærringen er anlagt i 1060erne og at anden fase er fra 1070erne, mens tredje fase er senere.
English: On the basis of the dates of construction of the ships and an estimate of their life-span in active service, it can be assumed that the first phases of the Peberrenden barrier was built in the 1060s, and a second phase in the 1070s, and the third phase with several poles post-dates this.

Danish: Der er ingen grænse for en oldsags størrelse, så længe den fundne genstand kan transporteres fra fundsstedet.
English: On the basis of the dimensions of a ship, it is possible to interpret its sailing qualities, cargo capacity, rigging and crew, as well as assess where the ship could have sailed.

Danish: Ud fra skibenes størrelse kan man fortolke dets sejlegenskaber; herunder skibets lasteevne, toværk og mandskab samt vurderer hvor skibet kan have sejlet.
English: On the basis of the dimensions of a ship, it is possible to interpret its sailing qualities, cargo capacity, rigging and crew, as well as assess where the ship could have sailed.

Danish: På grundlag af opmålingen fra 2000 beregnedes den faktiske metacenterhøjde til at være noget højere end den, der udregnedes for Johannessens rekonstruktion.
English: On the basis of the measurements from 2000, the actual metacentric height was calculated to be rather higher than that calculated on the basis of Johannessen's reconstruction.

Danish: På grundlag af opmålingen fra 2000 beregnedes den faktiske metacenterhøjde til at være noget højere end den, der udregnedes for Johannessens rekonstruktion.
English: On the basis of the measurements from 2000, the actual metacentric height was calculated to be rather higher than that calculated on the basis of Johannessen’s reconstruction.

Danish: På baggrund af scanningerne blev der fremstillet 2D tegninger af alle skibsdele.
English: On the basis of the scans, 2D drawings of all of the ship's parts were made.

Danish: Ud fra deres placering og ved hjælp af sporene efter det forrådnede træ har det været muligt at rekonstruere skibets oprindelige form og byggemåde.
English: On the basis of their distribution, and with the aid of traces of the rotten wood, it has been possible to reconstruct the original form and construction of the ship.

Danish: På baggrund af alle disse iagttagelser var det muligt at tilføre nogle ændringer til skrogformen, som kan være afgørende for sejlegenskaberne.
English: On the basis of these observations it was possible to stipulate some changes in the hull form that might be crucial for the sailing performance of the ship.

Danish: I dette blev der fremstillet linjetegninger i 3D samt en 3D solid model.
English: On the basis of this, a 3-D lines drawing and a 3-D solid model were produced.

Danish: I bestyrelsen blev vi ramt i solar plexus af projektet omkring Havhingsten.
English: On the board we were hit in the gut by the project about the Sea Stallion.

Danish: Tværtimod har spærringerne i Peberrenden og de øvrige render øjensynlig udgjort et større kompleks, anlagt og udbygget flere gange med henblik på at afværge angreb udefra.
English: On the contrary, the barriers in Peberrenden and the other channels seemed to have formed a major complex, erected and expanded on several occasions with a view to warding off enemy attacks.

Danish: Tværtimod risikeres det at udvande og komplicere historien om Havhingsten, at ødelægge oplevelsen af helhed, og at forstyrre offentlighedens sammenkædning af skibet med det fantastiske og det ekstraordinære.
English: On the contrary, there is a risk of diluting and complicating the story of the Sea Stallion, of destroying the sense of unity and disturbing the publics association of the ship with the fantastic and the extraordinary.

Danish: På kurset arbejder vi med de mest centrale elementer i bådebygning.
English: On the course, we will work with the most central elements of boatbuilding.

Danish: Den dag varerne bliver afsendt, vil du modtage en ny mail med angivelse af den stregkode, der er på pakken, så du selv kan følge leveringen via et link til Post Danmarks hjemmeside.
English: On the day the order is dispatched, you will receive an email containing the barcode which will also be on the parcel itself, so you can follow its progress via a link to Post Danmark's website.

Danish: Den dag varerne bliver afsendt, vil du modtage en ny mail med angivelse af den stregkode, der er på pakken, så du selv kan følge leveringen via et link til Post Danmarks hjemmeside.
English: On the day the order is dispatched, you will receive an email containing the barcode which will also be on the parcel itself, so you can follow its progress via a link to Post Danmark’s website.

Danish: Øen har i det hele taget været afhængig af Orkeny med hensyn til forsyninger af blandt andet madvare og bygningsmaterialer.
English: On the east of the island, remains have been found of a very large hall-house with a sauna or bath-house attached.

Danish: Deltagerne får også indblik i kunsten at sejle med råsejl.
English: On the evening tour, you get an insight into the art of sailing with a square sail.

Danish: På aftenturen får du indblik i kunsten at sejle med råsejl.
English: On the evening tour, you get an insight into the art of sailing with a square sail.

Danish: På baggrund af forekomsten af en skjoldbule, en spore og et bundt pile kan der ikke herske tvivl om, at den gravlagte var en mand, og undersøgelser af det ganske vist meget beskedne knoglemateriale viser, at skibsgraven efter alt at dømme er anlagt til én person, i alderen 20 til 50 år.
English: On the evidence of the shield-boss, a spur and a bunch of arrows there can be no doubt that the buried person was a man, and the investigation of the extremely limited bone material showed that the ship-grave was constructed, as far as can be judged, for one person, in the age-range 20 to 50.

Danish: På Færøerne bliver bådene stadig bygget på klamp og øjemål, det vil sige helt uden skabeloner.
English: On the Faroe Islands, boats are still built by eye and rule of thumb, in other words, without any moulds.

Danish: På Færøerne har hele den færøske kultur stærke bånd til fortiden, direkte tilbage til vikingetiden.
English: On the Faroes, each facet of Faroese culture has a strong connection to the past, directly linked to the Viking Age.

Danish: Første dag strakte sig over 42,3 km med 4 timer og 45 minutters sejltid og 45 minutters pause, svarende til en gennemsnitsfart på 4,2 knob (7,7 km/ timen) og 4,8 knob (8,9 km/timen) henholdsvis brutto og netto.
English: On the first day, the distance covered was 42.3 km with 4 hours 45 minutes spent underway and a break of 45 minutes, corresponding to an average speed of 4.2 knots (7.7 km/h.) including the break and 4.8 knots (8.9 km/h.) without the break.

Danish: Efter de første sejladser i bl.a. hård vind i Skagerrak, oplevede vi Havhingstens meget fleksible skrog.
English: On the first trips in strong winds in the Skagerrak, we experienced the Sea Stallion’s very flexible hull.

Danish: På den flade side er vist stævnene af 48 skibe, på række, overlappende, og gradvist aftagende i størrelse mod højre, så man får indtrykket af at betragte en mægtig flåde af skibe, liggende side ved side.
English: On the flat side are seen the stems of 48 ships, in a line, overlapping each other and gradually decreasing in size towards the right so that one gets the impression of looking at a mighty fleet of ships, lying side by side.

Danish: Her på fjerdedagen er der endelig tid til at få lagt billeder og historier frem fra den fantastiske sejlads op gennem Kattegat og over Skagerrak.
English: On the fourth day of sailing the computers are finally plugged in and are able to send photos and stories from the fantastic sail through Kattegat and across Skagerrak home to the website.

Danish: På Øen Lewis har man fundet i alt 78 udskårne skakbrikker i hvalrostand.
English: On the island of Lewis a total of 78 carved chessmen made of walrus ivory were found.

Danish: På Øen Lewis fandt man i 1831, 93 skakbrikker af Hvalrostand.
English: On the Isle of Lewis 93 chessmen mede of walrus ivory were found in 1831.

Danish: På de større krigsskibe var styresmanden ofte udvalgt af kongen og havde ansvar for skibet både før, under og efter sejlads.
English: On the larger warships the coxswain was often selected by the King, and was responsible for the ship both before, during and after the voyage.

Danish: På undersiden af kølsvinet findes udtag for bundstokkene, som kølsvinet har været fældet ned over.
English: On the lower surface of the keelson there are notches for the floor timbers, which the keelson has been slotted down over.

Danish: På markedspladser og i byerne var der behov for en garanti for fred og orden, ellers kom handelsmændene ikke.
English: On the market places and in the towns there was a requirement for a guarantor of peace and order; otherwise the merchants would not come.

Danish: På det næste billede vises, ligeledes livagtigt, hvordan sejlet sænkes ved faldet, og bjerges indenbords af ivrige hænder.
English: On the next picture is shown, similarly vividly, how the sail is hauled down with the halyard and taken in by willing hands.

Danish: I anledning af 50-året for udgravningen af Skuldelevskibene har vi stillet en række eksperter indenfor vikingetids historie, arkæologi og søfart spørgsmålet:
English: On the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the excavation of the Skuldelev ships we have asked several experts in Viking history, archaeology and navigation the question:

Danish: I anledning af møntudgivelsen afholder Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde en reception på museet.
English: On the occasion of the coin’s issue, the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde will be holding a reception.

Danish: På de gamle åledrivkvaser var der ydermere gjort plads til (en nod), at der kunne slåes en tynd bomuldstråd ind mellem plankerne, udefra.
English: On the old eel drifters, place was made to allow a thin cotton thread to be beaten into the space between the planks, from the outside.

Danish: Ude på åbent hav var vi afskåret fra at skrive historier til hjemmesiden.
English: On the open sea we were cut off from writing anything for the homepage.

Danish: De øvrige dage i efterårsferien bages der pandekager med æbler og honning.
English: On the other days during the autumn holiday, pancakes will be baked with apples and honey.

Danish: Derimod har en række af stenskibene skjolde langs rælingen, hvilket fortæller os at de skal forestille krigsskibe.
English: On the other hand a number of stone ships have shields along the gunwale and this reveals that they are intended to represent ships for warriors.

Danish: Til gengæld kan der være ”huller” i resultaterne i form af kurser, der ikke er sejlet på under en given vindstyrke.
English: On the other hand, however, the data may contain "holes" as not all angles to the wind will necessarily be sailed in all wind strengths.

Danish: Til gengæld er bevaringsforholdene meget bedre end på land.
English: On the other hand, the conditions for preservation are much better underwater than on dry land.

Danish: Til gengæld vil vi meget gerne høre hvad folk tænker om indholdet og se bud på, hvad de synes den skulle indeholde.
English: On the other hand, we are very interested in hearing what people think of the contents and what they think should have been included.

Danish: På planken ses en mølle indridset.
English: On the plank, nine men's morris is engraved.

Danish: På hjemrejsen skiftes halvdelen af besætningen ud med friske folk i Sydengland lige før det lange ben over Nordsøen, hvor skipper Carsten Hvid, regner med at sejle nonstop i mindst tre døgn over Nordsøen.
English: On the return journey, half the crew will be replaced with fresh people in southern England, just before the long leg across the North Sea, when Skipper Carsten Hvid expects to sail non-stop for at least three days.

Danish: På pindens rundede side er dels vist et enkelt, tydeligvis stort, fartøj i profil, og en figurgruppe med tre delvist overlappende stævne.
English: On the rounded side of the stick are shown both a single, clearly large, ship in profile and a group of three stems, partly overlapping each other.

Danish: På trækket tilbage til Begtrup Vig blev der spændt fire islandske heste foran skibet, mens 18 besætningsmedlemmer stod ved rafterne.
English: On the route back to Begtrup Vig, four Icelandic horses were harnessed on front of the ship, while 18 members of crew stood at the laths.

Danish: På Havhingstens togt blev skibets position hvert tiende sekund observeret ved hjælp af en GPS satellitnavigator.
English: On The Sea Stallion's voyage the ship's position was recorded every ten seconds by way of a GPS satellite navigator.

Danish: På Havhingsten er der også gået feriestemning i hele mandskabet og alt foregår i slowmotion i den trykkende men behagelige sommervarme.
English: On the Sea Stallion, the holiday mood has captured the whole crew and everything is taking place in slow motion in the sultry but pleasant summer heat.

Danish: På Østersøens sydkyst lå store handelspladser, som skandinaverne gerne besøgte, og fyrster på begge sider af Østersøen giftede deres døtre bort til hinanden.
English: On the southern coast of the Baltic there were great trading places, which Scandinavians eagerly visited, and princes on both sides of the Baltic gave away their daughters to each other.

Danish: På sommertogtet til Norge i 2006 var det dog de kvindelige gaster, der var hårdest ramt af søsyge!
English: On the summer expedition to Norway in 2006 it was, however, the female crew members who were the most badly affected by seasickness..!

Danish: Du mærker de følelser, der er i spil, når man er fuldstændig afhængig af vikingeskibets sødygtighed som dit eneste holdepunkt midt ude på det uendelige, oprørte hav.
English: On the trading ship, iron bars, slate, antlers, silk, polar bear skin and amber bear witness to the merchants' networks and sailing routes.

Danish: På handelsskibet vidner jernbarrer, skifer, gevirer, silke, isbjørneskind og rav om handelsmandens netværk og sejlruter.
English: On the trading ship, iron bars, slate, antlers, silk, polar bear skin and amber bear witness to the merchants’ networks and sailing routes.

Danish: På sejladsen fra Irland, rundt om Lands End, var vinden ikke over 12-13 m/s, men søen kom fra alle sider, fordi den var påvirket af vinden fra en side og tidevandet fra en anden.
English: On the voyage from Ireland and round Lands End, the wind was no more than 12–13 metres/sec., but the swell came from all sides, affected by the wind from one side and the tide from another, making it unpleasant sailing for both ship and crew.

Danish: På den pågældende rejse angives det at kongen havde ikke mindre end 280 mand ombord, mere end otte mand pr rum.
English: On the voyage in question it is reported that the king had no fewer than 280 men on board, that is more than eight men per rum.

Danish: På turen tilbereder de et måltid med smag af vikingetiden til langskibets 55 besætningsmedlemmer.
English: On the voyage they will prepare a meal with a taste of the Viking Age for the longship's 55 crew members.

Danish: På togtet til Dublin var det rorstroppen der var svag og knak, hvilket betød, at skibet mistede styreevnen.
English: On the voyage to Dublin it was the rudder and the rudder strap that was weak and snaped.

Danish: På turen til Dublin lærte vi skibet ordentligt at kende, vi følte større og større tryghed ombord.
English: On the voyage to Dublin, we got to know the ship properly and safer and safer on board.

Danish: På krigstogtet bliver du en del af vikingehæren under vikingekongen Svend Tveskægs erobring af England og på handelsrejsen møder du købmanden 'Ottar' på sin rejse fra det nordlige Norge til handelsbyen 'Hedeby' i det sydligste Danmark.
English: On the War Expedition, you can be a part of the Viking army during the Viking king Svend Forkbeard's conquest of England and go on the Trading Voyage, you'll meet the merchant Ottar on his journey from Northern Norway to the trading port at Hedeby in Southern Denmark.

Danish: På vejen sydpå fra Dublin med kurs mod den engelske kanal og mod Danmark igen gjorde skibet holdt i Wicklow på den irske østkyst.
English: On the way south from Dublin, on a course for the English Channel and home to Denmark, the ship made a stop in Wicklow on the east coast of Ireland.

Danish: Undervejs til Dublin vil en lille gruppe af besætningsmedlemmer arbejde med at dokumentere skibets funktioner og procedurer ombord.
English: On the way to Dublin, a group of crew members will be working on documenting the functioning of the ship and procedures on board.

Danish: Undervejs laves felter, hvor man enten kan slås tilbage eller hjælpes frem.
English: On the way, squares can be made where the player is either sent backwards or moved forwards.

Danish: På turen passerede skibet nogle af byens store attraktioner, her på vej mod Berliner Dom.
English: On the way, the ship passed some of the city's great attractions; here it is on the way past the Berlin Cathedral.

Danish: Vi har på hjemmesiden valgt at sidestille vikingernes skjald med nutidens pr-medarbejdere eller journalist.
English: On the website we have chosen to equWrite two stories about a dangerous voyage.

Danish: Her diskuteres også materialevalg, byggeproces og tolkninger af det originale fund.
English: On the website, we discuss the choice of materials, construction process and interpretation of the original find.

Danish: I weekenden den 16. - 17. oktober tager Roskilde Slagteriskole pølsemaskinen med på museum og serverer hotdogs som de blev spist i vikingetiden.
English: On the weekend of 16-17 October, the Danish Meat Trade College will bring its sausage machine to the museum and serve hot dogs as they were eaten during the Viking Age.

Danish: I det hele taget var det tydeligt, at premierministeren havde glædet sig til besøget, og både han og resten af delegationen talte længe med blandt andet bådebygger Erik Jochumsen.
English: On the whole, it was clear that the prime minister had looked forward to the visit, and both he and the rest of the delegation spoke at length with, among others, boat-builder Eric Jochumsen.

Danish: På Anløbsbroen kan du klæde dig på som en viking og lege dig tilbage til vikingetiden.
English: On the ‘Jetty' you can dress up as a Viking and imagine yourself back in the Viking Age.

Danish: På Anløbsbroen kan du klæde dig på som en viking og lege dig tilbage til vikingetiden.
English: On the ‘Jetty’ you can dress up as a Viking and imagine yourself back in the Viking Age.

Danish: På disse sider sætter vi fokus på langskibene og langskibsforskningen.
English: On these pages we focus on longships and longship research.

Danish: Der tale om unikke både, som hver har deres særlige historie og egenskaber.
English: On these pages, you can read about each boat, it's history, features and background.

Danish: Angiveligt skulle den engelske konge Æthelred på denne dag gennem et dygtigt hemmeligholdt komplot have foranstaltet nedslagtningen af de danske indvandrere.
English: On this day the English King Æthelred allegedly conspired to massacre the Danish immigrants.

Danish: I denne anledning vil museumsinspektør ved Nationalmuseet Jens Christian Moesgaard tale om mønter med skibsmotiv.
English: On this occasion museum curator Jens Christian Moesgaard from the National Museum will give a talk on coins with ship motifs.

Danish: Ved den lejlighed vil besætningen træne, hvordan den skal forlade skibet hurtigt og effektivt i tilfælde af forlis.
English: On this occasion the crew will learn how to abandon ship quickly and effectively in the event of ship wreck.

Danish: På denne side vises Havhingstens rejse fra Dublin til Roskilde.
English: On this page you can follow the voyage of the Sea Stallion from Dublin in Ireland to Roskilde in Denmark.

Danish: Her på siden kan du læse de afrapporteringer skibets besætning sender hjem til Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde.
English: On this page you can read the reportings ship's crew sent home to the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde.

Danish: På denne side vises Havhingstens rejse fra Roskilde til Dublin.
English: On this page you can see the voyage of the Sea Stallion from Roskilde in Denmark to Dublin in Ireland.

Danish: På sommerens togt til Norge kunne besætningen flere gange observere skibets fleksibilitet ved selvsyn.
English: On this summers sail to Norway the crew could occasionally observe the flexibility of the ship.

Danish: Tirsdag den 6. maj drog et research-team bestående af skipper Carsten Hvid, projektleder Preben Rather Sørensen og værftchef Søren Nielsen til den engelske kanalkyst.
English: On Tuesday 6 May, a research team consisting of skipper Carsten Hvid, project leader Preben Rather Sørensen, and shipbuilder Søren Nielsen set off to the English Channel coast.

Danish: Til søs: Opmål afstanden mellem to steder for og agter i båden.
English: On water: Measure the distance between two places in the boat - one at the stem, one at the stern.

Danish: Til søs: Opmål afstanden mellem to steder for og agter i båden.
English: On water: Measure the distance between two places in the boat – one at the stem, one at the stern.

Danish: På onsdag den 6. september kløves den største af stammerne.
English: On Wednesday 6th September, the first of the logs will be cleaved.

Danish: Ved hvilken kurs til vinden sejler skibet hurtigst?
English: On which course to the wind does the ship sail fastest?

Danish: På hvilken af disse kurser krænger skibet mest?
English: On which of these courses does the ship heel most?

Danish: På hvilken af disse kurser sejler skibet hurtigst?
English: On which of these courses does the ship sail fastest?

Danish: På hvilken halse sejler et skib som sejler mod nord med en vind fra øst?
English: On which tack is a ship on if it is sailing north with the wind from the east?

Danish: En gang om året mødtes Carsten Brebøl med en flok venner i deres brevdueforening.
English: Once a year Carsten Brebøl met up with some friends at their messenger pigeon club.

Danish: Når al bagage er pakket og provianten og vandet er stuvet på plads, er vi klar til at sejle.
English: Once all the baggage has been packed and the provisions and water have been stowed away, we are ready to sail.

Danish: I havn ventede helstegt pattegris.
English: Once ashore, roasted pork awaited.

Danish: På museet kom der, med jævne mellemrum, en konservator fra - tror jeg - Ribe.
English: Once in a while a conservator from Ribe came to the museum.

Danish: Ind i mellem kan de faktisk også svare på Louises spørgsmål, der nok mest har til formål at dæmpe gemytterne lidt.
English: Once in a while they actually also answer Louise’s questions, which really have the purpose of dampening the excitement a little.

Danish: Så snart bådebyggerne var tilfredse, blev et lag tjæret uld placeret i landet i skråskaret, og samlingen blev fastgjort med tre jernnagler og en trænagle.
English: Once the boatbuilders are satisfied with the fit, a layer of tarred wool is placed between the two faces of the joint and it is sealed using three iron rivets and one treenail of willow.

Danish: Når alt det øvrige materiale var fjernet, blev trapperne hugget ud.
English: Once the excess material had been removed, the steps were cut into the blank for the stem.

Danish: Kølbordene får lov at afkøle, og stivne i den rigtig form hen over natten.
English: Once the first board was in place, the second plank is brought over and the clamping process begins again.

Danish: Når masten er lodret tottes den en ekstra tand op med forstaget, så mastelåsen kan sættes i.
English: Once the mast is vertical, the fore stay is tightened a little more so that the mast lock can be put in place.

Danish: Efter at fundområdet er beskrevet, tegnet og fotograferet, tages genstandene forsigtigt op og pakkes til transport.
English: Once the site has been described, drawn and photographed, the objects are carefully lifted to the surface.

Danish: Så snart stævnene var færdige, var det tid til at strække kølen.
English: Once the stems were complete, it was time to lay the keel in preparation for raising the stems.

Danish: Så snart stævnene var rejst, kunne bådebyggerne koncentrere sig om at nå den næste fase: Fremstilling af planker.
English: Once the stems were raised, the boatbuilders could begin focusing on the next phase: plank production.

Danish: Når vi først har passeret Falsterbo og drejer øst på, er chancerne for pålidelig og brugbar vind ganske gode.
English: Once we have passed Falsterbo and turn east, there is a good chance of getting reliable and useful winds.

Danish: En som skjald fra Vikingetiden hvor historien skal hædre kongen eller høvdingen om bord og en som pr-medarbejder på Havhingsten som henvender sig til pressen.
English: One as a skald from Viking times, where the story praises the king or chieftain on board, and one as PR officer on the Sea Stallion, addressed to the media.

Danish: En som skjald fra Vikingetiden hvor historien skal hædre kongen eller høvdingen om bord og en som pr-medarbejder på Havhingsten, som henvender sig til pressen.
English: One as a skald from Viking times, where the story praises the king or chieftain on board, and one as PR officer on the Sea Stallion, addressed to the media.

Danish: En enkelt Belgierhest deltager også.
English: One Belgian horse will also participate.

Danish: Deri kan man kun være enig.
English: One can only agree.

Danish: Den ene type kredser i 800 kilometers højde rundt om jorden fra pol til pol. Et omløb tager cirka halvanden time.
English: One circumnavigates the globe from pole to pole at an altitude of 800 metres.

Danish: Den anden indeholder køkkenudstyr; pander, gryder, skærebræt og knive samt krydderier og olie.
English: One contains two gas rings, which allow the stewards - in contrast to the Viking cooks - to cook while the ship is sailing.

Danish: Den ene indeholder to gasblus, så hovmestrene, i modsætning til Vikingetidens madsvend, kan lave mad mens skibet sejler.
English: One contains two gas rings, which allow the stewards – in contrast to the Viking cooks – to cook while the ship is sailing.

Danish: Et besætningsmedlem har fået en pusansamling mellem to tæer.
English: One crew member has an accumulation of pus between two toes.

Danish: Et besætningsmedlem har udviklet rødme omkring et flåtbid.
English: One crew member has developed a reddish rash around a tick bite.

Danish: En gast på grund af en knæskade og tre gaster på grund af søsyge og kulde.
English: One crew member with an injured knee and three cold and seasick.

Danish: Et kritikpunkt af brugen af GPS er, at elektronikken skaber et idealbillede af felten.
English: One criticism of the use of GPS is that the technology creates an idealised image of the site.

Danish: Dagen inden havde Morgenavisen Jyllands-Posten en stort opsat artikel i avisens kultursektion.
English: One day earlier the newspaper ‘Morgenavisen Jyllands-Posten’ printed a large scale piece in the culture section.

Danish: Et døgn med østenvind er ikke nok til at bringe os den lange vej fra Sydnorge over Nordsøen til det nordlige Skotland.
English: One day is not enough to bring us across the North Sea from the southern parts of Norway to the northern parts of Scotland.

Danish: Det ene stempel er helt intakt.
English: One die is damaged while the other is completely intact.

Danish: Også en Eadric, som var styresmand på kong Edward Bekenderens skib, flygtede til Danmark.
English: One Eadric, who was helmsman on Edward the Confessor’s ship, also fled to Denmark.

Danish: Et eksempel er Egtvedpigen fra Bronzealderen:
English: One example is the Egtved Girl from the Bronze Age.

Danish: En af undtagelserne er stavkirken fra Fortun, hvor den lange, slanke profil af et krigsskib dominerer indridsningerne på indersiden af kirkeskibets nordvæg.
English: One exception is the stave church from Fortun, where the long, slender profile of a warship dominates the carvings on the inside of the north wall of the nave.

Danish: Et sidste lille løft og Havhingsten var på plads i hjørnet af den store gård.
English: One final and smaller lift and the Sea Stallion was at its place in the corner of the big square.

Danish: En historie er dermed slut, og en ny begynder.
English: One history ends and another begins.

Danish: En særlig parameter, nemlig søens højde og øvrige karakteristika, vil kun blive registreret i logbogen i form af den enkelte navigatørs bedømmelse af forholdene.
English: One important parameter, sea conditions (wave height, swell, etc.), will only be recorded in the ship's logbook in the form of observations made by individual navigators.

Danish: Et enkelt sent, anonymt digt, omtaler at et skib tilhørende den norske kong Magnús berfœttr (1093-1103) har en mast på ikke mindre end 70 fod – omkring 21 m – hvilket kan sammenlignes med Skuldelev 2-rekonstruktionen HAVHINGSTENS mastelængde på 15 m. Mastetoppen var, ligesom stævnen, en del af skibet som fik særlig opmærksomhed i digtningen.
English: One late, anonymous verse refers to a ship belonging to the Norwegian king Magnús Barefoot (1093-1103) that has a mast of no less the 70 feet – about 21 metres – which can be compared with the Skulelev 2 reconstruction, THE SEA STALLION’s mast-length of 15 metres.

Danish: En af Lokes Frimænd.
English: One of Lokes warriors.

Danish: Det ene anker var i fare for at blive ødelagt af byggeriet af vindmøllerne og det blev derfor besluttet, at bjærge dette, få det konserveret og bevaret for eftertiden.
English: One of the anchors was in danger of being destroyed by the construction of the wind turbines and it was therefore decided to salvage it, conserved it and save it for posterity.

Danish: Et af de områder der lægges vægt på, under den immaterielle kulturarvs banner, er det traditionelle håndværk: Det maritime håndværk, som bliver udført på museets bådeværft, er en perfekt eksempel på dette.
English: One of the areas they include under the banner of intangible heritage is traditional craftsmanship; of which the maritime craftsmanship carried out at the Museum's boatyard is a prime example.

Danish: Et af de områder der lægges vægt på, under den immaterielle kulturarvs banner, er det traditionelle håndværk: Det maritime håndværk, som bliver udført på museets bådeværft, er en perfekt eksempel på dette.
English: One of the areas they include under the banner of intangible heritage is traditional craftsmanship; of which the maritime craftsmanship carried out at the Museum’s boatyard is a prime example.

Danish: Den 4. oktober 1710 fandt et af Danmarkshistoriens blodigste søslag sted i Køge Bugt.
English: One of the bloodiest naval battles in Denmark's history took place in Køge Bay on 4 October 1710.

Danish: En af de opdagelsesrejsende, hvis navn blev berømt, var kaptajn Abhara, en hyrde fra det persiske højland, der endte som langfartskaptajn på Indien og Kina.
English: One of the explorers whose name became famous was Captain Abhara, a shepherd from the highlands of Persia who ended as a long-haul captain and navigator between India and China.

Danish: Det, der gør kølsvinet spændende, er blandt andet den måde, dets to dele er samlet på.
English: One of the features, which make the keelson of great interest, is the way in which its two parts are joined together.

Danish: Et af de få steder, hvor langskibet fra Irland adskiller sig fra tilsvarende skibe, bygget i Skandinavien, er i udformningen af spanterne.
English: One of the few places where the longship from Ireland differs from corresponding ships built in Scandinavia, is in the form of its ribs.

Danish: En anden af rytterne sagde: ”Din broder Harold sender dig sin hilsen og med den løftet om fred og hele Northumberland.
English: One of the horsemen said: "Your brother Harold sends you greetings and with that a promise of peace and the whole of Northumberland.

Danish: En af rytterne råbte: ”Er Tostig Jarl i denne hær?”
English: One of the horsemen shouted: "Is Earl Tostig in this army?".

Danish: Vikingerne introducerede nye våbentyper i Irland, såsom sværd og spydspidser - kvaliteten af deres jernarbejde var langt bedre end den irske, især vedrørende fremstillingen af klingerne.
English: One of the legacies of the Vikings in Ireland was the introduction of new weapon types - new forms of swords and spearheads - and a higher quality of ironworking, particularly in the area of blade production.

Danish: Et af formålene med projektet er at afprøve, hvor meget vi kan involverer vores publikum i de forskellige processer, som bådebygning indebærer.
English: One of the main ambitions with the project is to push the boundaries for how much we can involve the public in the various processes involved in the construction of the boat.

Danish: En af de mange aspekter der kan undersøges med hjælp af rejsedokumentation er hastighedsbegrebet.
English: One of the many aspects which can be investigated with the aid of voyage documentation is the term speed.

Danish: En af museets marinarkæologer på arbejde.
English: One of the marine archaeologists at work.

Danish: Et af de mere overraskende elementer i billedfremstillingen er, at transporten af hærens heste ser ud til at ske i langskibe.
English: One of the more surprising elements in the tapestry is that the transport of the army’s horses seems to take place in rowing-ships.

Danish: En af de sværeste er at forklare, at vikingerne i modsætning til os byggede på øjemål og ud fra nedarvede tommelfingerregler.
English: One of the most difficult is to explain how the Vikings, unlike us, built by eye, using rules-of-thumb that were passed down.

Danish: En af de mest kendte er Bayeuxtapetet, hvor en scene udspiller sig, da Vilhelm Erobreren beordrer sin flåde bygget.
English: One of the most famous is the Bayeux Tapestry, on which there is a scene showing William the Conqueror ordering the building of his fleet.

Danish: Søndag den 1. juli åbner en af landets særeste spisesteder.
English: One of the most peculiar restaurants is opening Sunday the 1st of July.

Danish: En af de mest betydningsfulde udgravninger i Danmark kan begynde...
English: One of the most significant excavations in Denmark can begin...

Danish: Et af de mest bemærkelsesværdige fund er en skibsbegravelse fra 700-tallet i Storhaug (Storhøj).
English: One of the most spectacular finds is a ship burial from Storhaug (Great Mound), dating from the 8th century.

Danish: Et af de mest spektakulære fund var en gravlagt kvinde fra vikingetiden som tydeligvis nød høj status i samfundet.
English: One of the most spectacular finds was a burried pagan lady from the Viking Age with an obvious high status in society.

Danish: Et af de bemærkelsesværdige forhold ved Skuldelev 5 er, at store dele af skibet er bygget af genanvendt tømmer.
English: One of the remarkable aspects of Skuldelev 5 is that the ship was, to a great extent, built of re-used timber.

Danish: Den ene stævn er færdig og den anden er godt på vej.
English: One of the stems is completed and the other is well on the way.

Danish: Vikingerne har også sat deres spor på en af de store sten i stensætningen 'Ring of Brodgar' som er ligeså gammel som Maes Howe.
English: One of the stones of the 'Ring of Brodgar' has also been marked by the Vikings.

Danish: Den spidse hjelm var typisk nordisk, og er også afbilledet på de gotlandske billedsten samt på en lille benskulptur fra Sigtuna i Sverige.
English: One of the tapestries depicts a procession performed at a great religious festival in early spring, which celebrated the diser, the goddesses.

Danish: Der er kun meget få omtaler af skibskokken og en af disse findes i Orkneyinga saga.
English: One of the very few mentions of a ship's cook is in the Orkney sagas.

Danish: En af weekendens øvrige højdepunkter bliver lørdag aftens koncert med musikere fra de to store irske bands Danú og Altan, som begge er verdensnavne indenfor den traditionelle og originale irske musiktradition.
English: One of the weekend's other highlights will be Saturday night's concert with musicians from the two big Irish bands Danú and Altan, who are both world famous names in traditional and original Irish folk music.

Danish: En af weekendens øvrige højdepunkter bliver lørdag aftens koncert med musikere fra de to store irske bands Danú og Altan, som begge er verdensnavne indenfor den traditionelle og originale irske musiktradition.
English: One of the weekend’s other highlights will be Saturday night’s concert with musicians from the two big Irish bands Danú and Altan, who are both world famous names in traditional and original Irish folk music.

Danish: En af dem er John Nicholl fra Irland.
English: One of them is John Nicholl from Ireland.

Danish: Èn af dem fik ved et uheld et loganbrød i hovedet, og det slog ham nærmest i gulvet!
English: One of them was accidently hit on the head with a Logan Bread, and almost hit the deck!

Danish: Det ene, Foteviken 3, kan dateres til midten af 1000-tallet, mens det andet, Foteviken 5, er sænket for at blokerere spærringens sejlbare åbning, og dette fartøj kan være så sent som fra 1100-tallet.
English: One of them, Foteviken 3, can be dated to the middle of the 11th century, while the other, Foteviken 5, was sunk in order to block the navigable opening in the barrage; this vessel could date to as late as the 12th century.

Danish: En af dem går ud på at mindes hans navn.
English: One of these concerns the commemoration of his name.

Danish: Et sådan billede findes på Bayeuxtapetet, et broderet vægtæppe fra 1070'ernes Frankrig.
English: One of these pictures is in the Bayeux Tapestry, an embroidered wall hanging from the 1070s in France.

Danish: Et sådan billede findes på Bayeuxtapetet, et broderet vægtæppe fra 1070’ernes Frankrig.
English: One of these pictures is in the Bayeux Tapestry, an embroidered wall hanging from the 1070s in France.

Danish: En svensk runesten indtager en helt særlig plads.
English: One particular Swedish rune stone occupies a quite special position.

Danish: En træsort kan for eksempel godt have en stor brudstyrke, men en lille bøjningsstyrke.
English: One particular type of wood can for example have a very high breaking strength, but very little flexibility.

Danish: En person med erhvervskompetence fra en større virksomhed, udpeget af Dansk Industri
English: One person with business experience from a large Company - suggested by Dansk Industri

Danish: En person med relevant kompetence for museets strategiplan, udpeget af Vikingeskibsmuseets Venner
English: One person with relevant competence in terms of the Museum's strategic planning - suggested by the Friends of the Viking Ship Museum

Danish: En person med forskningskompetence, udpeget af Vikingeskibsmuseets Venner
English: One person with the relevant competence in terms of research - suggested by the Friends of the Viking Ship Museum

Danish: Èt reb
English: One reef

Danish: Ét reb fra oven
English: One reef from above

Danish: Èt reb fra neden
English: One reef from below

Danish: Èt reb fra neden og ét reb fra oven
English: One reef from below and one reef from above

Danish: Èt reb fra neden og to reb fra oven
English: One reef from below and two reefs from above

Danish: På den ene side motiver af danske broer og på den anden side, billeder af fund fra Danmarks oldtid.
English: One side features motifs of Danish bridges and the other side has pictures of Danish archaeological finds.

Danish: Én bordgang (planke der går fra stævn til stævn i skibets skrog) var væsentlig tykkere, og smallere end de øvrige.
English: One strake was significantly thicker and narrower than the others.

Danish: På den ene side, har håndværkernes indsats et materielt resultat: Træ bliver kløvet, hugget og høvlet, reb bliver lagt, jern bliver udvundet og smedet, uld bliver spundet, og, del for del, bliver et skib til.
English: One the one hand, the efforts of the craftsmen have a tangible result: wood is cleaved, cut and shaped, rope is laid, iron is smelted and forged, wool is spun and woven, and piece by piece, a vessel comes into being.

Danish: En ting står dog klart, vi skulle ikke have samlet essingen midtskibs, med et skar i vantområdet.
English: One thing is clear though, we should not have used a scarf to assemble the sheer midships near the shrouds.

Danish: Og en ting er sikkert: De vil alle få en central placering i fortællingen om rejsen i den kommende udstillingsbygning.
English: One thing is for sure: they will all have a central place in the story of the voyage in the coming exhibition buildin

Danish: En ting er dog helt sikkert: Som skipper skal man tage en beslutning."
English: One thing is quite certain, however - as skipper, the decision is mine."

Danish: En ting er dog helt sikkert: Som skipper skal man tage en beslutning.
English: One thing is quite certain, however – as skipper, the decision is mine.

Danish: Dog står det klart, at skibet har paralleller både bagud i tid, til vikingetidens skibe og også har detaljer, der peger frem mod højmiddelalderens fartøjer.
English: One thing they can be sure of now, however, is the fact that the ship has parallels both looking back to the ships of the Viking Age and also forwards to the vessels of the high Middle Ages.

Danish: En til tre personer med specifikke relevante kompetencer, udpeget af bestyrelsen selv
English: One to three people with specific areas of expertise - suggested by the board itself

Danish: En blæsende efterårsdag havde bådebyggerne lånt den nye Frederikssundsjolle, Anaselma af den nye ejer.
English: One windy autumn day, the boatbuilders borrowed the new dinghy, Anaselma.

Danish: Kun få dage efter Slaget ved Stamford Bridge kom der melding om, at Hertug Vilhelm af Normandiet var gået i land i Sydengland for at fratage Harold den engelske trone.
English: Only a few days after the Battle at Stamford Bridge, news came that Duke William of Normandy had landed in Southern England in order to take the English throne from Harold Godwinson.

Danish: Kun en mindre del af lokaliteten blev udgravet, hvorefter det blev besluttet at den planlagte vej skulle flyttes.
English: Only a portion of the site was excavated, after which it was decided that the road would be re-routed.

Danish: Der er kun ca. 20% bevaret af skibet, men de fundne dele fordeler sig over hele skroget, hvorfor det er muligt at angive skibets størrelse indenfor snævre grænser.
English: Only about 20% of the ship is preserved, but the parts that are extant are from various places in the hull, so it has been possible to calculate the size of the ship within narrow limits.

Danish: Først herefter udgraves fundet, hvis det ikke kan bevares på stedet; for eksempel ved at føre kabler og lignende udenom.
English: Only after this is the find excavated, if necessary, for example by rerouting cables, etc. around it.

Danish: Derimod støtter de spinkelt og elegant tildannede mesolitiske padler og stammebåde tanken om en tidlig selvstændig udvikling i Sydskandinavien af letbyggede træbåde.
English: Only by sampling the four hulls and recording the timbers, was it possible to establish the presence of spijkerpennen - small wooden pegs on the surfaces of the planks.

Danish: Kun for nørder!
English: Only for real nerds!

Danish: Kun store lastskibe er fundet uden for sikre havne.
English: Only large cargo ships were found outside sheltered harbours.

Danish: Der er kun udført begrænsede undersøgelser af fartøjerne, men to ud af de foreløbigt fem erkendte skibe fortolkes som værende langskibe af over 20 m længde.
English: Only limited analysis of the vessels has been carried out, but two out of the five ships recognised so far are interpreted as being longships of more than 20 m in length.

Danish: Langskibet var stillet ovenpå gravkammeret.
English: Only the rivets were preserved.

Danish: Kun vinden og hårdt slid med årerne bringer os frem.
English: Only the wind and tough work at the oars will move us forward.

Danish: Først herefter kan man stille kilden, eller rettere kildesættet, de spørgsmål, man ønsker.
English: Only then can you begin to pose the questions you want to the source, or more correctly: the set of sources.

Danish: Kun to af forekomsterne er i forbindelse med fredelige aktiviteter, de øvrige er militære.
English: Only two of the occurrences are in connection with peaceable activities, the others are all military.

Danish: Åbent dagligt kl. 10.00 - 16.00
English: Open daily: 10.00 - 16.00

Danish: Åbent skib på Havhingsten.
English: Open ship on the Sea Stallion.

Danish: Tag på aftentur på Roskilde Fjord
English: Open ship: Come aboard the Sea Stallion

Danish: 'Open Source bådebygning'
English: Open source boatbuilding

Danish: Bygget i det fri
English: Open-air building

Danish: Åbning 27. marts 2015.
English: Opening 27th 2015.

Danish: Åbningen af Spangereid-kanalen
English: Opening the Spangereid-canal

Danish: Åbningstid: 10.00 - 17.00
English: Opening times: 10.00 - 17.00

Danish: Overfor os sad tre embedsfolk fra ministeriet.
English: Opposite us sat three civil servants from the ministry.

Danish: Eller omvendt: Hvad er tophastigheden i forskellige vindstyrker og ved forskellig sejlføring?
English: Or conversely: What is the maximum speed with various wind speeds and various sail settings?

Danish: Eller følg museets bådebyggere i arbejdet med at bygge Frederikssundsjollen, Åledrivkvasen og den lille Gokstadbåd.
English: Or follow the museum’s boat builders in their work building the Frederikssund dinghy, the Eel Drifter and the small Gokstad boat.

Danish: Eller mød Ole Crumlin Pedersen, som var museets første direktør.
English: Or meet the museum’s first director, Ole Crumlin Pedersen.

Danish: Eller måske blot legetøj?
English: Or perhaps just a toy?

Danish: Eller historien om at Havhingstens ankomst til Dublin blev vist på storskærme på Times Square i New York.
English: Or the story of how the Sea Stallion's arrival in Dublin was shown on gigantic TV screens in Times Square, New York.

Danish: Eller var det den taktiske manøvredygtighed, muligheden for at kunne bevæge sig en kort strækning mod vinden for at få en bedre udgangsposition, som var vigtig?
English: Or was it tactical manoeuvrability that was crucial – the ability to travel short distances against the wind in order to gain a strategic advantage?

Danish: "Nordbomønstre" er en praktisk og længe ventet bog for alle som vil sy deres egen nordbodragt.
English: Or were they unusually successful merchants, extortionists, and pioneer explorers?

Danish: Eller man kan ankre op, kaste snøren ud og se om brakvandsgedden kan logges på krogen.
English: Or you can anchor, throw out a line and see if you can tempt a pike onto your hook!

Danish: Eller, hvis der er for meget vind til at ro, hvorfor krydser vi så ikke hjem.
English: Or, if there’s too much wind for rowing, why don’t we tack?

Danish: Eller sagt med andre ord: Hvilken muligheder gav disse skibes konstruktion, lasteevne, sejlegenskaber og sødygtighed for datidens transport og kommunikation?
English: Or, in other words: what opportunities were provided by the construction, cargo-carrying capacity, sailing abilities and seaworthiness of these ships for contemporary transport and communication?

Danish: Tegn dig til en tur med Havhingsten
English: Order the working drawings

Danish: Pressemeddelse - Tegn dig til en tur med Havhingsten
English: Order the working drawings for the Gislinge boat

Danish: Organiske materialer som træ, stof, hud og hår går hurtigere i forrådnelse hvis der er tilgang af ilt.
English: Organic materials such as wood, cloth, skin and hair start to rot more quickly if they are in contact with oxygen.

Danish: Organisation ombord
English: Organisation onboard

Danish: Arrangør Lasse Gustavsen
English: Organizer Lasse Gustavsen

Danish: Arrangør Ole Sand
English: Organizer Ole Sand

Danish: Oprindelig åretal: 14
English: Original no. of oars: 14

Danish: Oprindeligt (omkring år 1900) har der være brugt galvaniserede jernnagler.
English: Originally (around 1900), galvanised iron nails would have been used.

Danish: Originalt er formentlig anvendt lette skarøkser til udhugningen, men dette har krævet større øvelse, og der skønnedes ikke at være væsentlig forskel på resultatet.
English: Originally, light adzes were probably used for hewing but this would have called for extensive training and it was estimated that there would be no very great difference between the finished results.

English: ORMR (the short) Nordland før 999 Raud 30

English: ORMR INN LANGI Nidaros 999-1000 Olav Tryggvason 32 or 34

English: Orthophotomosaic 3D-footage
