English: The flax is then retted (submerged in water for 1-2 weeks, or laid on a meadow for 4-8 weeks), to loosen the fibres from the pith

Danish: Flåden trækkes ad floderne ned til havet, hvor den samles
English: The fleet is dragged along the rivers to the sea, where it assembles

Danish: Flåden sejler ud.
English: The fleet sails out.

Danish: Bundstokken er ikke fastgjort hertil, i modsætning til det store Gokstadskib hvor bundstokkene var surret til disse klamper med strimler, skåret ud af hvalbarder...
English: The floor timber is not made fast here, in contrast to the large Gokstad ship where the floor timbers were lashed onto the clamps using strips of baleen plates ...

Danish: Bundstokkene er ca. 10-12 cm brede og lidt mere i højden.
English: The floor timbers are ca. 10-12cm wide and slightly higher than they are broad.

Danish: Bundstokkene er ligeledes meget fragmenterede.
English: The floor timbers were also very fragmentary.

Danish: Bundstokkene, som er betegnelsen for det nederste tømmer i spantet, er usædvanligt lave og brede.
English: The floor timbers, the term for the lower timber in the ribs, are unusually shallow and broad.

Danish: Vandstrømningen omkring skroget var bemærkelsesværdig forskellig mellem de to modeller.
English: The flow of water around the hull was remarkably different in the two scale models.

Danish: Følgende dage er planlagt:
English: The following dates are planned:

Danish: Dagen efter ankom Havhingsten til Roskilde efter det 13 måneder lange togt til Dublin og retur.
English: The following day, the Sea Stallion arrived at Roskilde after the 13-month voyage to Dublin and back.

Danish: Følgende fire aspekter diskuteres som mulige indikatorer for professionel søhandel:
English: The following four aspects were discussed as possible indicators of specialised merchant seafaring:

Danish: Følgende bidrog med genstande
English: The following institutions contributed with artefacts

Danish: Her gengives et dansksproget resumé af: 'Ladby.
English: The following text is a summary of: Ladby.

Danish: Her gengives et dansksproget resumé af: ’Ladby.
English: The following text is a summary of: Ladby.

Danish: Her gengives udvalgte dele af det engelsksprogede forord fra: 'Skinboats of Greenland' ved H.
English: The following text is an abstract of the author's foreword in: 'Skinboats of Greenland' ved H.

Danish: Her gengives udvalgte dele af det engelsksprogede forord fra: ’Skinboats of Greenland’ ved H. C. Petersen.
English: The following text is an abstract of the author’s foreword in: ’Skinboats of Greenland’ ved H. C. Petersen.

Danish: Følgeskibet Cable One fra JD-Contractors følger Havhingsten fra Glendalough når skibet returnerer til Roskilde i juli-august 2008
English: The following wessel Cable One from JD-Contractors will follow the Sea Stallion from Glendalough when the ship returns to Roskilde in July-August 2008

Danish: Året efter, i 1069, forsøgte de igen og det kom til kampe i Devon og Cornwall i det sydvestlige England.
English: The following year, in AD 1069, they attempted again, leading to battles in Devon and Cornwall in Southwest England.

Danish: Maden forbinder maritim historie og vikingernes råvarer og inviterer museets gæster til at opleve de fem originale vikingeskibene på nye måder.
English: The food connects maritime history and Viking commodities and invite museum visitors to experience the five original Viking ships in new ways.

Danish: Maden sørger bare for, at "maskinerne" kører og at det blir sjovere og mere behageligt.
English: The food just keeps the "engines" running and everything funnier and more comfortable.

Danish: Mad skal laves siddende, under åben himmel i skibets kabys, der består af to, store trækasser med gasblus og køkkenudstyr.
English: The food must be prepared while sitting in the open air in the ship's galley, which consists of two large wooden boxes with a gas hob and kitchenware.

Danish: For en gennemsnitlig familie har maden i sær bestået af egne produkter fra husdyr, mark eller køkkenhave og indsamlede bær og planter, samt kød fra jagt eller fiskeri.
English: The food of an average family would have consisted, in particular, of their own produce from livestock, field and garden and collected berries and plants, together with meat from hunting or fishing.

Danish: Fodboldklubben har lånt besætningen to store grill og 60 – 70 personer ligger stopmætte i græsset og nyder et glas.
English: The football club has loaned the crew two large grills and 60 – 70 people are lying quite full in the grass and enjoying a drink.

Danish: Vadestedet skabte en naturlig færdsel gennem området, da ådalen var besværligere, at komme over længere inde i landet.
English: The ford created opportunities for natural traffic through the area as the river valley was difficult to traverse further inland.

Danish: Forstævnspartiet på dette skib har en speciel rund og fyldig form, hvor de øverste planker hælder indover foroven ('tumblehome').
English: The fore stem section of this ship has a specially full and rounded form, where the two topmost planks lean in over at the top ('tumble home').

Danish: Forstævnspartiet på dette skib har en speciel rund og fyldig form, hvor de øverste planker hælder indover foroven (’tumblehome’).
English: The fore stem section of this ship has a specially full and rounded form, where the two topmost planks lean in over at the top ('tumble home').

Danish: Prognosen siger, at vandstanden skal stige til omkring 170 cm.
English: The forecast says that the water level will rise to about 170 cm.

Danish: Prognosen siger, at vandstanden skal stige til omkring 170 cm. Det blev til hele 206 cm!
English: The forecast says that the water level will rise to about 170 cm. It ended up an entire 206 cm above sea level!

Danish: Forlukafet er indrettet med to køjer og gode stuverum til sejl og andet grej.
English: The forecastle is fitted with two berths and good storage space for the sail and other gear.

Danish: Vejrudsigterne er stabile, og vi satser på en nonstop sejlads fra Den Helder til Thyborøn på 260 sømil.
English: The forecasts are stable and we reckon on non-stop sailing from Den Helder to Thyborøn – 260 nautical miles.

Danish: Det udenlandske kildemateriale kan opdeles i:
English: The foreign source material can be divided into:

Danish: Det forreste krumme stævnbord er ved at blive tilpasset.
English: The foremost curved hood-end is adjusted to fit.

Danish: Besætningen i forskibet spiser markant mest, fordi forskibet er det koldeste og vådeste sted på Havhingsten.
English: The foreship crew eat considerably more, because the foreship is the coldest and wettest place on the Sea Stallion.

Danish: Gislinge II's forstævn var en anelse bredere og der er også kommet ændringer i forhold til vinklen af 'trapperne' og den måde linjerne løber ind i stævnens øverste kant.
English: The forestem of Gislinge II was slightly broader and changes have also been made in terms of the angle of the ‘steps' and the run of the lines into the upper edge of the stem.

Danish: Det tidligere Roskilde Amt har støttet projektet
English: The former County of Roskilde has supported the project

Danish: Det forreste knæ får også fire spændbolte.
English: The forward knee is also secured with four bolts.

Danish: Fonden har finansieret rekonstruktionsmodellen og støtter Projekt Fuldblod på Havet
English: The foundation has funded the reconstruction model and supports the project Thoroughbred of the Sea

Danish: Fonden har syv formålsparagraffer.
English: The foundation has seven paragraphs of purpose.

Danish: Fonden har støttet den filmiske dokumentation af byggeriet af Havhingsten fra Glendalough
English: The foundation has supported the film documentation of the building of The Sea Stallion from Glendalough

Danish: Fonden støtter projekt Fuldblod på Havet
English: The foundation is supporting the project Thoroughbred of the Sea

Danish: Skibsreder Carsten Brebøl's Fond støtter Projekt Fuldblod på Havet og forsøgsrejsen
English: The foundation is supporting the project Thoroughbred of the Sea as well as the expedition

Danish: Fonden støtter den interaktive udstilling om projekt Fuldblod på Havet
English: The foundation supports the interactive exhibition of Thoroughbred of the Sea

Danish: JL-Fondet støtter projekt Fuldblod på Havet
English: The foundatiopn is supporting the project Thoroughbred og the Sea

Danish: I fjerde kapitel redegøres for den vanskelige konservering af skibene (4.1).
English: The fourth chapter gives a description of the difficult process of conserving the ships (4.1).

Danish: Spanterne er ved at være færdige.
English: The frames are almost complete.

Danish: Spantrammerne er klare eksempler på en vægtbesparende udformning, der overfører besætningens vægt effektivt til skroget.
English: The frames are clear examples of a weight-saving design that effectively transfers the weight of the crew to the hull.

Danish: Spanterne er surret fast til klamper, der på forhånd blev udhugget i plankerne og i den udspændte båd.
English: The frames are lashed to clamps, that were fashioned on the planks and the expanded log.

Danish: Spanterne er lavet af enebærgrene.
English: The frames are made of juniper.

Danish: Spanterne er i gran.
English: The frames are of spruce.

Danish: Spanterne på den nye Åledrivkvase er fremstillet af krumvokset egetræ.
English: The frames on the new eel drifter are produced from crooked oak

Danish: Spanterne er fastgjort til bordene med trænagler.
English: The frames were attached to the planks using treenails.

Danish: Spanterne blev indsat i den færdige skrogskal og surret til bordklamperne.
English: The frames were fitted into the finished hull-shell and lashed to the cleats on the strakes.

English: The freeboard is grey, the 'rangjord' is green and the toerail is white.

Danish: Webloggen 'Gislinge blog' handler om dagligdagens små og store oplevelser på Vikingeskibsmuseets værftsplads i forbindelse med Projekt Gislingebåd.
English: The Gislinge blog is about daily life at the Viking Ship Museum's boatyard, during the Gislinge Boat Project.

Danish: Gislingebåden er en 7,7 meter lang hverdagsbåd fra Middelalderen, der blev fundet og udgravet i 1993 ved Gislinge i den inddæmmede og tørlagte Lammefjord.
English: The Gislinge Boat is a 7.7m long working boat from the Middle Ages, which was found during excavation near Gislinge in 1993, a reclaimed part of the Lammefjord.

Danish: Gislingebåden Open Source Project 2016 vil se den genfortolkning af Gislingebåden blive til en virkelighed.
English: The Gislinge Boat Open Source Project 2016 will see this re-interpretation of the Gislinge Boat become a reality.

Danish: Projekt Gislingebåd
English: The Gislinge Boat Project

Danish: Gislingebådsprojektet gør det muligt at vise museets gæster hele processen med at rekonstruere en båd, så den bliver så tæt på det oprindelige fund som muligt.
English: The Gislinge Boat Project allows us to show our guests the entire process involved with reconstructing a boat.

Danish: Gislingebåds Projektet går ud på at rekonstruere båden så tæt på den oprindelige som muligt, samtidigt med at vi bygger med det oprindelige værktøj.
English: The Gislinge Boat Project focuses on reconstructing the vessel as close to the original as possible, while using all the known authentic tools to do so.

Danish: Ordet Havhingsten får én til at tænke på eventyr, styrke og skumsprøjt.
English: The Gislinge Boat Project is about open source boatbuilding.

Danish: Gislingebåden var en 1100-tals brugsbåd, sandsynligvis anvendt til både fiskeri og transport af mennesker og gods.
English: The Gislinge boat was a 12th century working boat, most likely used for fishing and transporting both goods and people.

Danish: Gislingebåden var meget slidt, da den endte sine dage på bunden af Lammefjorden.
English: The Gislinge boat was well-worn by the time it ended its days in shallow waters on the bottom of the Lammefjord.

Danish: Gislingebåden – en lidt overset båd fra den tidlige middelalder – har fået et nyt liv i den digitale tidsalder.
English: The Gislinge Boat – a slightly overlooked boat from the early Middle Ages – has been given a new lease of life in a very digital age.

Danish: Fremstilling af lindebastreb til Gislingebåden
English: The Gislinge Boat's rig

Danish: Gislingebådens sejl: Behandling og produktion af fibre fra hør
English: The Gislinge Boat's sail: processing and production of flax fibres

Danish: Gislingebådens historie, dens samtid og brug
English: The Gislinge Boat’s history: its context and use

Danish: Gislingebådens køl var 5,6 meter lang og var t-formet i tværsnit.
English: The Gislinge Boat’s keel was 5.6m long and was T-shaped in section.

Danish: Glasset er halvt fyldt!
English: The glass is almost filled!

Danish: Målet er Portsmouth - 400 sømil nonstop
English: The goal is Portsmouth – 400 nautical miles non-stop.

Danish: Målet er at læseren kan opleve skibet som en rekonstruktion af et langskib fra vikingetiden, og får indsigt i den forskning som ligger bag skibet og forsøgsrejsen til Irland.
English: The goal is that the reader should encounter the ship as a reconstruction of a Viking age longship and gain insight into the research behind the ship and the voyage to Ireland.

Danish: Målet er en sejlende fuldskala rekonstruktion, som kan bidrage til ny indsigt i vikingetidens skibe, bygningen af dem og hvordan de blev brugt.
English: The goal is to achieve a full-scale sailing reconstruction that can contribute new insights into Viking Age ships, how they were built and how they were used.

Danish: Vikingeskibsmuseet har ikke til formål at oparbejde overskud eller at drive kommerciel virksomhed.
English: The goal of the Viking Ship Museum is not to generate a profit or run a commercial business.

Danish: Den gang gjaldt det om at finde vej ved hjælp af simpel navigation, som vikingerne gjorde det for tusind år siden.
English: The goal that time was to find their way using simple navigation, as the Vikings did a thousand years ago.

Danish: Formålet med årets tur er at få så mange sømil under kølen, som muligt.
English: The goal with this year's tour is to get as many sea-miles under the keel as possible.

Danish: På vikingernes smykker ses guderne eller deres kendetegn ofte afbilledet.
English: The gods, or their symbols, are often seen depicted on Viking jewellery.

Danish: Godwinson-familien måtte flygte til Exeter, som i de følgende år var hovedbase for oprøret mod Vilhelm.
English: The Godwinsson family was forced to flee to Exeter, which in the subsequent years became the headquarters for the rebellion against William.

Danish: Da Harold var død og med ham en stor del af Englands adel, var Godwinson-slægten så svækket, at Vilhelm kunne igangsætte sin erobring af hele England.
English: The Godwinsson family was so weakened that William was able to initiate his conquest of the whole of England.

Danish: Gokstadbåden er flyttet indenfor på bådeværftet.
English: The Gokstad boat has been moved inside to the boatyard.

Danish: Gokstadbåden er bygget fortrinsvis af eg, men det øverste bord er fyrretræ.
English: The Gokstad boat is predominantly built of oak, but the uppermost strake is made from pine.

Danish: Gokstadbåden blev navgivet Freydis Joanna.
English: The Gokstad boat was given the name Freydis Joanna.

Danish: Gokstadrekonstruktionen Viking var bygget for at repræsentere Norge ved verdensudstillingen i Chicago i 1893.
English: The Gokstad reconstruction Viking was built to represent Norway at the World Exhibition in Chicago in 1893.

Danish: Gokstadskibet, og Norges ældste by Kaupang ved Larvik er andre vikingetidsfund.
English: The Gokstad ship and Norway's oldest city, Kaupang near Larvik, are other Viking finds.

Danish: Gokstad-spillebrættet med mølle på den ene side og nefatavl på den anden side.
English: The Gokstad-game board with Nine Mens Morris on one side and Nefatavl on the other.

Danish: Graven indeholdt desuden resterne af et fornemt bordservice omfattende en forgyldt sølvtallerken, et - måske to bronzefade, mindst to spande samt et lille med guld og sølv udsmykket knivsæt i en trææske.
English: The grave also held the remains of a distinguished table service consisting of a gilt silver plate, one or perhaps two bronze dishes, at least two buckets and a little knife-set, decorated in gold and silver, in a wooden case.

Danish: I 1903 blev der ved Ballyholme, fundet en grav, der indeholdt et sæt bronzespænder, en skål, et stykke af en kæde og nogle tekstilrester.
English: The grave found at Ballyholme in 1903 contained a pair of bronze brooches, a bowl, fragment of chain and some textile.

Danish: Graven indeholdt flere rige gravgaver, heriblandt en perlehalskæde.
English: The grave had several rich grave goods, including a necklace made of beads.

Danish: Graven var måske hvilested for kong Harald Hårfager.
English: The grave may have been the final resting place of King Harold the Fair-haired.

Danish: Graven var en simpel nedgravning i sandet i et niveau af 1,5 m over mæket til højvande.
English: The grave was a simple pit dug into the sand about 1.5m above the level of the high water mark.

Danish: Graven blev fundet ved anlægsarbejde i forbindelse med byggemodning.
English: The grave was discovered during landscaping for a housing development.

Danish: Graven har efterfølgende været udsat for en omfattende forstyrrelse, og da der tilsyneladende ikke var spor af den eller de afdøde, er forstyrrelsen forsøgt tolket som spor efter translatio, dvs. en flytning fra en hedensk til en kristen grav.
English: The grave was subsequently subjected to extensive disturbance, and since there was apparently no trace of the dead person or persons, the disturbance has been interpreted as the result of translatio, i.e. removal from a heathen to a Christian grave.

Danish: Gravgodset er gennemgående af høj kvalitet, hvilket sammen med de repræsenterede genstandskategorier taler for, at den gravlagte har haft en høj social status.
English: The grave-goods are throughout of high quality, and this, together with the categories of object represented, suggests that the buried person had had high social status.

Danish: Månens (og til dels solens) tyngdekraft og jordens centrifugalkraft trækker i vandet og giver højvande og lavvande ca. to gange i døgnet.
English: The gravitational pull of the Moon (and of the Sun) and the earth’s centrifugal force pull the water and give high and low tides approx. twice a day.

Danish: Månens (og til dels solens) tyngdekraft og...
English: The gravitational pull of the Moon (and of...

Danish: Skrogets store fleksibilitet betød, at dette kunne variere meget i form, alt efter dets understøtning.
English: The great flexibility of the hull meant that it could vary greatly in shape, depending on its support.

Danish: Sommerens store interesse for Havhingstens forsøgsrejse har sat gang i Vikingeskibsmuseets foredragsvirksomhed.
English: The great interest in the Sea Stallion's experimental voyage this summer created a demand for lectures from the Viking Ship Museum.

Danish: Langt hovedparten af dem, omkring 90%, står i Sverige, mens de resterende fortrinsvis findes i Danmark og Skåne, og i mindre grad i Norge, på Isle of Man, i England og Skotland.
English: The great majority of them, about 90%, stand in Sweden, while most of the others are to be found in Denmark and Skåne, with a few in Norway, the Isle of Man, England and Scotland.

Danish: Netop antallet af mænd og heste menes at være årsagen til Vilhelms sejr, da Harolds hær havde lidt svære tab i Slaget ved Stamford Bridge kort tid forinden.
English: The great number of men and horses is thought to lie at the root of William's victory as Harold's army had suffered heavy losses at Stamford Bridge only a short time previously.

Danish: Netop antallet af mænd og heste menes at være årsagen til Vilhelms sejr, da Harolds hær havde lidt svære tab i Slaget ved Stamford Bridge kort tid forinden.
English: The great number of men and horses is thought to lie at the root of William’s victory as Harold's army had suffered heavy losses at Stamford Bridge only a short time previously.

Danish: Det største slid ligger på den nederste blok, her er akselen (ø=32 mm) 2-3 mm tyndere, der hvor hjulet løber.
English: The greatest wear is clearly on the lower block; here, the axle (diameter of 32 mm) is worn 2-3 mm where the wheel runs.

Danish: Grønlandstogtet sker i samarbejde med forskere fra Vikingeskibsmuseet og Nationalmuseet i Grønland.
English: The Greenland voyage is the result of collaboration between researchers from the Viking Ship Museum and the National Museum of Greenland.

Danish: Gruppen består af:
English: The group consists of:

Danish: Gruppen kommer med ideer til madplanen, hjælper med at udtænke en pakkeplan for kabyssen og hjælper til med indkøb og tilberedning af mad undervejs.
English: The group supplies ideas for the meals, helps devising a plan for stowing the galley as well as purchasing the supplies and preparing the meals.

Danish: Den opblomstring af søfart, handel, pirateri, og udforskning, som begyndte at tage fart i 700-tallet, er dog ikke begrænset til Europas nordlige have, men modsvares i andre dele af verden på den samme tid.
English: The growth in seafaring, trade, piracy, and exploration that began to gather momentum during the 8th century was not limited to Europe’s northern seas; it was also echoed in other parts of the world at the same time.

Danish: Vagthold holdt løbende øje med vandstanden og skibenes tilstand gennem natten.
English: The Guard teams regularly checked the water level and the ship's condition through the night.

Danish: Gæsterne om bord er en del af skibets besætning og deltager aktivt ved årerne og når der skal sættes sejl.
English: The guests on board will form part of the ship’s crew and will participate actively at the oars and when the sails have to be set.

Danish: Guidebogen tilbyder et overordnet indblik i, hvad en turist - dansk såvel som udenlandsk - kan opleve rundt omkring i landet.
English: The guidebook provides a general insight into what a tourist, from at home or abroad, can experience around the country.

Danish: Beretningerne foregår i lugten af tov og tjære, hvor besætningen sov, spiste, roede, håndterede sejlet, fik vabler og solstik eller blev ramt af dønninger og søsyge.
English: The guided tour will take place with the odour of rope and tar where the crew slept, ate, rowed, handled the sail, suffered from blisters and sunburn or from the effects of high waves and sea sickness.

Danish: Rundvisningerne varetages af museets guider, der alle er historie- eller arkæologistuderende.
English: The guided tours are conducted by history and archaeology students.

Danish: Tag med på familieomvisning, hvor der er sat fokus på vikingernes togter.
English: The guided tours are conducted by history and archaeology students.

Danish: Vores dygtige guider fortæller om vikingernes skibe og de lange rejser til søs.
English: The guided tours are conducted by history and archaeology students.

Danish: Rundvisningerne varer ca. 45 minutter og kan ikke reserveres på forhånd.
English: The guided tours take about 45 minutes and cannot be booked in advance.

Danish: Lauget sejler flittigt med båden i hele sejlsæsonen fra maj til september og der findes allerede mange erfaringer med bådtypen.
English: The guild sails the boat frequently throughout the season from May to September and a great deal of experience has already been obtained with this type of boat.

Danish: Gulatinget var det gamle hovedting for Vest- og Sydnorge.
English: The Gulating was the main assembly for western and southern Norway.

Danish: Den nye ejer gav champangne på ringdækket, da vi afleverede den nye jolle.
English: The gunwale is painted green using linseed oil paint.

Danish: Essing, essingknæ og bjælkerne til ringdækket sidder nu på plads.
English: The gunwale, gunwale knee and beams for the ring deck are now in place.

Danish: Langskibet fra Hedeby havn, udgravningsplan
English: The Haithabu Harbour longship.

Danish: Hedeby var en af de vigtigste byer i vikingetidens Skandinavien og derfor også en af de mest undersøgte vikingebyer.
English: The Haithabu settlement was one of the most important towns in Viking Age Scandinavia and is, therefore, also one of the best investigated.

Danish: De halvfærdigt huggede bord er sat på til den første tilpasning, og Björkebåden blev en helt anden båd at se på.
English: The half-finished planks are set in position for the first adjustments and the Björke boat suddenly takes on a whole new appearance.

Danish: Halv-stammen blev kløvet ned til kvarte- og derefter ottendedele.
English: The half-log was cleaved down to the quarters and then eighths.

Danish: Under ind- og udrebning skal draget bemandes, og i en nødsituation skal sejlet hurtigt ned, så folk skal altid være ”klar ved draget”.
English: The halyard must be manned when reefing in and out, and in an emergency situation the sail must be run down quickly, so the crew must always be ‘ready at the halyard’.

Danish: Dragtaljen består af to taljeblokke med hver to hjul, hvorigennem dragløberen går.
English: The halyard tackle is made up of two tackle blocks, each with two wheels through which the halyard runner passes.

Danish: Havnemiljøet og de omgivende udstillinger og aktiviteter, understreger den direkte sammenhæng mellem Skuldelevskibene i Vikingeskibshallen og deres efterfølgere - og bygger bro mellem historie og tradition.
English: The harbour environment and the associated exhibitions and activities underline the direct connection between the Skuldelev ships in the Viking Ship hall and the successors - building a bridge between history and tradition.

Danish: Havnene har få gæstepladser og lystbådene ligger lag på lag, især i de havne som har sluseporte og ikke henligger som en mindre ørken ved lavvande – også en ny udfordring for Havhingsten.
English: The harbours have few berths and visiting boats soon pile up, especially in harbours that have lock gates and don’t look like small deserts when the tide goes out – another challenge for the Sea Stallion.

Danish: "De forskellige typer havne, som vi kommer til at ligge i, vil både blive moderne marinaer og gamle industrihavne.
English: The harbours we will put into will vary in type from modern marinas to old industrial harbours.

Danish: Hårdt vejr på åbent hav skal bestemt ikke undervurderes, men stærk strøm, voldsomt tidevand og ufordudsigeligt vejr, tæt på uvejsomme og klippefyldte kyster, indeholder endnu større udfordringer for et åbens sejlskib som Havhingsten.
English: The hardships at open sea in a ship like the Sea Stallion are not to be neglected – yet strong currents, violent tides and unpredictable weather close to unfriendly rocky shores are even greater risks for a sailing ship.

Danish: Efterårets barske sejlervejr er perfekt til at teste et nyt skib, og hurtigt dukkede der nogle spørgsmål op: Kunne bådens fribord – den del af skibet, der er over vandet - forhøjes?
English: The harsh sailing conditions of the Danish autumn are perfect for testing a new boat and several questions quickly arose: could the height of the freeboard – the part of the boat above the water – be increased?

Danish: Hodet og kroken var helt forgylte; og det var like høyt til relinga som et havskip.
English: The head and the arched tail were both gilt, and the bulwarks were as high as in sea-going ships.

Danish: Hjertesnittet kan ses i midten af forhugget som et lille snit med kædesaven.
English: The heart cut can be seen in the centre of the section as a little cut made with a chain saw.

Danish: De hedenske barbarer
English: The heathen barbarians

Danish: Mastefoden går gennem dækket.
English: The heel of the mast extends through the deck.

Danish: En af Søværnets redningshelikoptere var i området og besætningen om bord på Sikorsky-helikopteren benyttede lejligheden til at øve en evakuering.
English: The helicopter was already in the area and the crew on board the Sikorsky-helicopter used the opportunity to practise an evacuation.

Danish: Rorgængeren kaldtes Stjórnari.
English: The helmsman was also called Stjórnari.

Danish: Heltene fra 'Cable One'
English: The heroes of 'Cable One'

Danish: Fartøjets høje kvalitet, både i materialer, design og udførelse, lader os tro at det må have tilhørt en konge, en hertug eller en anden fra samfundets absolutte top.
English: The high quality of the vessel, seen in the materials used, its design and execution leads us to believe that it must have belonged to a king, an earl or someone else from the very highest echelons of society.

Danish: Højvande bar Havhingsten væk fra Irland og 200 - 400 sømil venter forude
English: The high tide bore the Sea Stallion away from Ireland with 200-400 nautical miles ahead

Danish: Dagens højdepunkter fremgår af programmet nedenfor.
English: The high-points of the day are listed in the programme below.

Danish: Historikeren skal også kunne formidle en sammenhængende fortælling om fortidige sagsforhold.
English: The historian must also be able to communicate a coherent story about past events and situations.

Danish: Historikeren må have en skepsis overfor kildematerialet til en bestemt historisk periode, en bestemt hændelse eller forskellige opfattelser af samme oplevelse og derefter teste de skriftlige kilders troværdighed.
English: The historian must be sceptical about the source material for a particular historical period, a particular event, or various understandings of the same experience, and must test the reliability of the source.

Danish: Der er jo det særlige ved historikerens kildemateriale, at det - bevidst eller ubevidst - ikke altid taler sandt.
English: The historian's source material is peculiar in that it does not always speak the truth - conscoiusly or unconsciously.

Danish: Fundets historiske baggrund blev analyseret af en gruppe, der bl.a. studerede de topografiske vilkår for at lande med en flåde på øen.
English: The historical background of the find was analysed by a group in the guild who studied, among other subjects, the topographical conditions necessary for a fleet of Hjortspring-type boats to land on the island.

Danish: De historiske kilder som omhandler skibsbyggeriet viser at der kendes meget lidt til det private skibsbyggeri i den undersøgte periode i kontrast til informationerne om Orlogsflådens skibsbyggeri.
English: The historical context shows that little is known about private shipbuilding, in contrast with the information relating to State-controlled shipbuilding activities.

Danish: De historiske overleveringer bekræfter, at der var en passage mod Nordsøen i 1026-27 og igen i 1085, da Knud den Hellige samlede sine skibe ved Vestervig forud for et planlagt angreb på England.
English: The historical evidence confirme that the passage was open in AD 1026-27 and again in 1085, when Cnut the Holy gathered his ships off Vestervig in advance of a planned attack on England.

Danish: Havhingstens historiske rejse fra Roskilde til Dublin er for længe siden blevet en historie, som medier langt uden for Danmarks grænser holder øje med.
English: The historical sail of the Sea Stallion from Roskilde to Dublin has already become a major story that the media outside the Danish borders are following.

Danish: De historiske kilder
English: The historical sources

Danish: Historien om de rekonstruerede vikingeskibe begynder kort efter udgravningen af Gokstadskibet i 1880.
English: The history of reconstructed Viking ships begins shortly after the excavation of the Gokstad ship in 1880.

Danish: Hjortspringfundet står med sin samlede deponering omkr. 350 f.Kr. i en særstilling i forhold til de andre store jyske og fynske våbenofferfund fra Illerup, Vimose, Thorsbjerg, Ejsbøl og Nydam, der alle repræsenterer flere nedlæggelser af våbenudstyr, og som dateres indenfor perioden 200-500 e.Kr. Fælles for disse fund er tolkningen som ofring af krigsbytte fra en overvundet hær.
English: The Hjortspring find, which was deposited all at one time in about 350 BC, stands out from the other great weapon-deposits in Jutland and Fyn (those from Illerup, Vimose, Thorsberg, Ejsbøl and Nydam), all of which represent repeated deposits of weapons and date to the period 200-500 AD.

Danish: Spantrammerne er klare eksempler på en vægtbesparende udformning, der overfører besætningens vægt effektivt til skroget.
English: The hogging truss from fore to aft was useful in the building phase and also assisted later in keeping the boat in shape and evening out the tension in hogging conditions.

Danish: Spændtovet er nyttigt under bygningen og i den sårbare hogging situation, hvor båden rider på en bølgetop.
English: The hogging truss was useful during the construction phase and in the vulnerable hogging conditions at sea.

Danish: En buksetveje ligner et par omvendte korte bukser og er velegnet til dette formål, fordi træets fibre "følger med rundt" i tvejen.
English: The hole for the rudder withy, which is either made from rope or a branch that has been twisted until pliable, is used to attach the rudder to the side of the bulkhead.

Danish: Hullet i midten er til at fæstne roret til båden med, og slidsen i toppen er til rorpinden.
English: The hole in the centre is to attach the rudder to the boat, and the slot at the top is for the tiller.

Danish: Hullerne til klinknaglerne var slidt store så skibet ville være utæt, og der vil være skiftet og repareret en del bord, stringere og knæ.
English: The holes for the clinch pins would be worn so big the ship would leak, and a lot of boards, stringers and braces would have been replaced or repaired.

Danish: Hjemmesiden spiller aktivt med i Folkeskolens og Gymnasiets undervisning med over 220 artikler og opgaver målrettet historie, dansk, billedkunst, matematik, osv.
English: The homepage contributes actively to teaching in primary and secondary schools, with over 220 articles and assignments relating to history, Danish, art, mathematics etc.

Danish: På hjemmesiden kan du se en 2 minutters præsentation af filmen på.
English: The homepage features a 2 minute presentation of the film.

Danish: Hjemmesiden skal være så informativ og fyldt med oplevelser, at et besøg på www.havhingsten.dk næsten bliver, som at være om bord på skibet.
English: The homepage must be sufficiently informative and so stacked with quality stuff that a visit to www.seastallion.dk will be almost like the real thing, being onboard the ship.

Danish: Hagelasken viser os således både, at kølsvinet havde andre funktioner end blot at optage vægten af masten, og at den vikingetidige skibsbygger meget vel var klar over de særlige problemer, der var forbundet med at bygge meget lange, smalle skibe - og havde løsninger på dem.
English: The hooked scarf shows us that the keelson had other functions than just bearing the weight of the mast and that the Viking shipbuilders were very well aware of the special problems associated with building very long, narrow ships - and had solutions to these problems.

Danish: Hagelasken viser os således både, at kølsvinet havde andre funktioner end blot at optage vægten af masten, og at den vikingetidige skibsbygger meget vel var klar over de særlige problemer, der var forbundet med at bygge meget lange, smalle skibe – og havde løsninger på dem.
English: The hooked scarf shows us that the keelson had other functions than just bearing the weight of the mast and that the Viking shipbuilders were very well aware of the special problems associated with building very long, narrow ships – and had solutions to these problems.

Danish: Spændtovet fra for til agter var nyttigt under byggefasen og kunne også senere gøre nytte til at fastholde formen og udligne spændinger i 'hogging condition.'
English: The horns have not proved to be of significance for the strength of the boat, but the forward keel ex-tension is useful when beaching the vessel.

Danish: Bådens markante kølforlængelser blev lavet af buede lindegrene fæstet til kølplanken med en veldokumenteret lås, og en tilsvarende løsning valgtes for de øvre horn.
English: The horns of the boat were made of curved linden branches fastened to the keel projections with a lock and a corresponding solution was selected for the upper horns.

Danish: Hesten lå udenfor det afgrænsede område.
English: The horse was outside the enclosure.

Danish: Det var vigtigt, så man kunne lave våben og redskaber.
English: The house had no byre in the end like the traditionel longhouses from the Viking Age.

Danish: Den omfangsrige respons tyder på, at besøget var en succes.
English: The huge response suggests that the visits were a success.

Danish: Fribordet på Anaselma "ligger meget ud", det kan tydeligt ses der hvor Ture og Simon sidder.
English: The hull doesn't extend vertically downwards, rather it curves in and then down towards the keel.

Danish: Skroget er én side af sagen, mens rig og sejl er en anden.
English: The hull is one aspect, whereas the rigging and sail are another.

Danish: Roar Ege' s skrog er, som de øvrige rekonstruktioner af skuldelevskibene, bygget med vikingetidens egen teknologi, d.v.s. helt uden brug af sav.
English: The hull of Roar Ege was built using the technology of the Vikings, i.e. completely without the use of saws of any kind.

Danish: Skroget til den nye rekonstruktion bygges efter samme grundprincipper som de øvrige rekonstruerede vikingeskibe på museet; med respekt for originalskibets design og form, og med samme håndværksmetoder.
English: The hull of the new reconstruction will be built on the same basic principles as the other reconstructed Viking ships at the museum, with respect for the original ship's design and shape, and with the same methods of craftsmanship.

Danish: Skroget til den nye rekonstruktion bygges efter samme grundprincipper som de øvrige rekonstruerede vikingeskibe på museet; med respekt for originalskibets design og form, og med samme håndværksmetoder.
English: The hull of the new reconstruction will be built on the same basic principles as the other reconstructed Viking ships at the museum, with respect for the original ship’s design and shape, and with the same methods of craftsmanship.

Danish: Skroget skal nu studeres og dokumenteres i detaljerne, for at få den fulde forståelse af skibets aldringsproces og forfald.
English: The hull will now be studied and recorded in detail, in order to gain a thorough understanding of the processes of age and decay.

Danish: Skrogformen er her den som vi kender fra de arkæologiske skibsfund, selvom vi ikke er i stand til at se stævnafslutningerne på billedet.
English: The hull-form here is the same as that with which we are familiar from the archaeological ship-finds, although we cannot see the ends of the stems on the picture.

Danish: Samtidig spiller det menneskelige element ind - kan vi måle os med datidens kunnen og kundskab?
English: The human element also plays its part: can we as modern people even compare to the levels of skill and ability of people

Danish: Samtidig spiller det menneskelige element ind - kan vi måle os med datidens kunnen og kundskab?
English: The human element also plays its part: can we as modern people even compare to the levels of skill and ability of people in the past?

Danish: Den hydrauliske virkningsgrad er bestemt til ca. 0,75.
English: The hydraulic efficiency has been calculated to ca 0.75.

Danish: Hypotesen afspejler vores tolkninger af det originale skib og dets manglende dele.
English: The hypothesis reflects our interpretation of the original ship and its missing pieces.

Danish: Istiden var tæt på sin afslutning, men meget havvand var stadig bundet i enorme mængder is langt mod nord.
English: The Ice Age was coming to an end and much of the ocean's water was still trapped in the large ice caps to the north.

Danish: Den isbåd han lærte det i, er også en del af samlingen på museet.
English: The ice boat in which he learned to sail is also a part of the collection at the museum.

Danish: Isbåden blev trukket hen over isen, hvor isen kunne bære, og sat i vandet og roet, når det var nødvendigt.
English: The ice boat was pulled across the ice where the ice is strong enough and is placed in the water and rowed where necessary.

Danish: De sejlførende isbåde er forsynet med meder, så de kan ”sejle” på isen.
English: The ice boats with sails are equipped with runners so that they can “sail” on the ice.

Danish: Den islandske sagaskriver Snorre Sturlasson skriver, at Harald Hårderåde i 1061 flygtede fra Svend Estridsen ind i Limfjorden.
English: The Icelandic saga author Snorri Sturlasson writes that Harald Hardrada, during his military campaigns in Denmark in AD 1061, fled from Svein Estridson into the Limfjord.

Danish: Ideen til byggeriet fødtes i 1990, da Nordborg by opmuntrede til projekter, der kunne gøre byen og egnen kendt.
English: The idea for building the reconstruction arose in 1990, when the town of Nordborg encouraged the development of projects that would make it and the region more widely known.

Danish: Idéen er enkel nok.
English: The idea is simple enough.

Danish: Besætningen er klar og der venter dem igen en spændende og farefuld færd hjem til Danmark.
English: The idea is to make the boatbuilding process as open, and accessible, to as many people as possible.

Danish: Ideen om en tidskapsel til markering af aftalen og Havhingstens rejse opstod efterfølgende på den Kongelige Danske Ambassade i Dublin.
English: The idea of a time capsule to commemorate the agreement and the Sea Stallion's journey arose later at the Danish embassy in Dublin.

Danish: Ideen om en tidskapsel til markering af aftalen og Havhingstens rejse, opstod efterfølgende på den Kongelige Danske Ambassade i Dublin.
English: The idea of a time capsule to commemorate the agreement and the Sea Stallion’s journey arose later at the Danish embassy in Dublin.

Danish: Sygdommen gør, at man bliver trist og ligeglad.
English: The illness generates sadness and indifference.

Danish: Under billederne er det muligt at downloade højopløselige udgaver i 25 x 20 cm, 300 ppi, RGB-farver.
English: The images are in 300 ppi, 20 x 25 cm in size and in RGB colours.

Danish: Billederne er optaget under sejlads fra Isle of Man til Port Orley på den irske kyst.
English: The Images are taken during the sailing from Isle of Man to Port Orley on the Irish Coast.

Danish: Billederne tilhører Vikingeskibsmuseet og må kun anvendes i direkte forbindelse med redaktionel presseomtale af Havhingsten, jubilæumstogtet og vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde
English: The images belong to the Viking Ship Museum and may only be reproduced in direct connection with the editorial press coverage in news medias of the Sea Stallion, anniversary voyage and Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde.

Danish: Avaldsnes' betydning i forhold til skibstrafikken endte ikke med vikingetiden.
English: The importance of Avaldsnes relative to navigation did not end with the Viking Age.

Danish: De importerede varer bestod både af færdige produkter, men også mange råmaterialer blev videreforarbejdet i York.
English: The imported commodities comprised some finished products, but also large quantities of raw materials were converted into finished products in York.

Danish: Den øgede kontakt til fremmede lande, både gennem handelsfolk, men også gennem, bragte mange gode varer til Danmark, især meget sølv.
English: The increased contact with foreign areas, not just through merchants who came to the town but also through trading and pillaging expeditions, resulted in many quality wares, in particular large quantities of silver.

Danish: De enkelte skibsbilleder skal ikke ses som naturalistiske gengivelser, men derimod som symboler.
English: The individual ship representations are not to be looked upon as naturalistic reproductions but rather as symbols.

Danish: De oplysninger, som er indsamlet undervejs vil danne grundlag for en større indsigt i vikingetidens skibsbygning.
English: The information gathered during the voyage will form the basis for a greater insight into Viking ship building.

Danish: De oplysninger, du afgiver ved betaling bliver altid beskyttet under overførslen fra din egen computer.
English: The information you provide when making payments will always be protected when making transfers from your own computer.

Danish: Råvarerne, der bliver brugt, er kendt fra vikingetiden.
English: The ingredients in use are all known from the Viking Age.

Danish: Ingvarr-ekspeditionen er et af flere eksempler fra runestenene på, at ekspeditioner med flere skibe blev ledet af en konge eller stormand.
English: The Ingvarr expedition is one of several examples on the rune stones of expeditions with several ships being led by a king or a magnate.

Danish: Første kløvning til to halvdele gik som det skulle, og tog kun 50 minutter fra start til slut.
English: The initial cleave into halves went smoothly and took just 50 minutes from start to finish.

Danish: Den indledende skepsis overfor de smalle Hjortspringpadler afløstes af accept efter sejladsen i 2000 i hård vind og høj sø.
English: The initial scepticism towards the narrow Hjortspring paddles changed to acceptance, following the 2000 trials in strong winds and high seas.

Danish: Den første indsejling og træning af mandskabet fandt sted i 2005 og 2006.
English: The initial sea trials and crew training took place in 2005 and 2006.

Danish: Skroget er meget bøjeligt, specielt overfor vridning, men spændingerne ligger på et acceptabelt niveau.
English: The initial stability of the boat is very low but satisfactory for the vessel when loaded.

Danish: Indsatsen strækker sig fra oktober 2014 til maj 2015.
English: The initiative runs from October 2014 - May 2015.

Danish: Indersiden af skibet er dog mere irregulært med mange fragmenterede dele og den indvendige konstruktion viser tegn på manipulation.
English: The inside of the ship, however, is more irregular, with several cracks and fragmentary pieces.

Danish: Indersiden blev scannet med en laserscanner, som scannede 0,3 pkt/mm2 med 6,0 mm nøjagtighed.
English: The inside was scanned with a laser, scanning at a rate of 0.3 points/mm2 and with 6.0 mm accuracy.

Danish: Udstyret sender automatisk information til andre fartøjer om Havhingstens identitet, position, rute, fart og antal ombordværende.
English: The instruments automatically send information to other vessels about the identity, position, route, speed, and the amount of crew of the Sea Stallion.

Danish: Interessen i Irland er stærkt tiltagende.
English: The interest in Ireland is building up fast.

Danish: Interessen for Havhingstens historiske togt fra Roskilde til Dublin er stor.
English: The interest in the historic voyage of the Sea Stallion to Dublin is great.

Danish: Interessen var stor, og omkring 4000 mennesker lagde vejen forbi det 30 meter lange krigsskib.
English: The interest was great, and around 4000 people stopped by the 30-meter-long warship.

Danish: Den internationale rejseguide 'Lonely Planet' er en vigtig introduktion til Irland og det irske liv.
English: The internationally available travel guide 'Lonely Planet' is a very important book about Ireland and every facet of life.

Danish: Invasionsflåden ligger ved stranden, masterne er taget ned og det samme gælder stævnenes udsmykninger.
English: The invasion fleet is lying at the beach, the masts have been laid down and the decorations on the stems have also been removed.

Danish: Invasionen førte som bekendt til vikingernes endeligt og betragtes af mange danskere som afslutningen på vikingetiden.
English: The invasion led to the final decline of the Vikings, and is considered by many Danes as the end of the Viking Age.

Danish: Undersøgelsen begynder med en oversigt over den aktuelle historiske forskning i søhandel i danske farvande og i den vestlige Østersø mellem 1000 og 1250 (kapitel 2).
English: The investigation began with a presentation of the current state of historical research on merchant seafaring in Danish waters and in the western Baltic Sea between 1000 and 1250 (Chapter 2).

Danish: Undersøgelserne begynder
English: The investigation begins

Danish: Undersøgelsen af Roskilde Havn 4 frilagde de temmelig velbevarede rester af et ca. 20,5 meter langt fragtskib fra begyndelsen af 1100-tallet.
English: The investigation of Roskilde 4 revealed the quite well preserved remains of an approximately 20.5 metre long cargo ship from the beginning of the 12th century.

Danish: Undersøgelsen af Roskilde Havn 6 frilagde resterne af et ca. 36 meter langt langskib fra midten af 1000-tallet.
English: The investigation of Roskilde Harbour 6 revealed the remains of an approximately 36 meter long longship from the 11th century.

Danish: Undersøgelsen af Roskilde Havn 9 frilagde resterne af et ca. 11 meter langt fragtskib fra 1171.
English: The investigation of Roskilde Harbour 9 revealed the remains of an approximately 11 meter long cargo ship from 1171.

Danish: Undersøgelsen af Roskilde Havn vrag 2 frilagde et ca. 16,5 meter langt og 4,5 meter bredt klinkbygget fragtfartøj med en dybgang på ca. 1,1 meter og et skarpt bygget undervandsskrog.
English: The investigation of Roskilde Harbour wreck 2 revealed an approximately 16.5 metre long and 4.5 metre wide clinker-built vessel with a draught of about 1.1 metres and a sharply built underwater hull.

Danish: Undersøgelsen af Roskilde Havn vrag 3 frilagde et ca. 20 meter langt klinkbygget fartøj, bygget af eg og med anvendelse af fyr til trænagler.
English: The investigation of Roskilde Harbour wreck 3 exposed an approximately 20 metre long clinker-built vessel, built from oak and with wooden dowels made of pine.

Danish: Resultatet bliver en dokumentarfilm tilgængelig på River Cottage hjemmeside.
English: The invited participants will be the crew of the Sea Stallion and local producers.

Danish: Den irske ambassadør Joe Hayes og Roskildes borgmester Poul Lindor Nielsen løfter ved fælles hjælp Tidskapslen på plads
English: The Irish ambassador, Joe Hayes, and Roskilde’s mayor, Poul Lindor Nielsen, helped each other to lift the time capsule into place

Danish: Den irske forbindelse
English: The Irish connection.

Danish: Det irske ministerium for kunst, kultur, sport og turisme støtter projektet
English: The Irish Department of Arts, Sport & Tourism is supporting the expedition

Danish: Det irske Nationalmuseum havde inviteret til et velkomstarrangement med skibet og besætningen i centrum.
English: The Irish National Museum had arranged a welcome with the ship and crew as honnor guests.

Danish: Glendalough er et sagnomspundet område i de smukke Wicklow-bjerge og en af Irlands mest populære turistattraktioner.
English: The Irish term was suggested, because Glendalough is a legendary area in the beautiful Wicklow-mountains and one of Ireland’s most popular tourist attractions.

Danish: Isle of Lewis var i vikingetiden en af de største og mest tætbefolkede kolonier i det vestlige Skotland.
English: The Isle of Lewis was the most densely populated Viking colony in the west of Scotland.

Danish: Isle of Man lå centralt placeret på sejlruten mellem Skandinavien og Irland.
English: The Isle of Man had a central locationwas on the sailing route from Scandinavia to Ireland.

Danish: Arbejdet med kontrol af bådens symmetri og form under opbygningen var vigtigt.
English: The joints were glued with polyurethane glue instead of resin, as in the original.

Danish: Samlingerne limedes med polyuretanlim i stedet for harpiks som i originalen.
English: The joints were glued with polyurethane glue instead of resin, as in the original.

Danish: Rejsen tog afsæt i bevarede beretninger fra tre af 800-tallets sørejsende.
English: The journey began in surviving accounts of three voyagers from the 9th century.

Danish: Rejsen kan begynde
English: The journey can begin

Danish: Havhingstens forsøgssejlads – og de mange års forudgående arbejde – er en milepæl indenfor marinarkæologien.
English: The journey to Dublin and the test sail – with years of preparation – is a milestone in maritime archaeology.

Danish: Forventningens glæde
English: The joy of expectation

Danish: Køl og stævne er lagt på værkstedets gulv, så mål og vinkler kan kontroleres fra tegningen.
English: The keel and stem and stern are laid on the floor of the workshop, so that measurements and angles can be checked against the drawings.

Danish: Køl og stævne står som de skal.
English: The keel and stem are in the correct position.

Danish: Kølen og stævnene var næsten færdig, så bådebyggerne flyttede deres opmærksomhed over på fremstilling af Gislingebådens bordplanker.
English: The keel and stems almost complete, the boatbuilders attention turned to the production of Gislinge Boat's planks.

Danish: Kølen og stævnene var næsten færdig, så bådebyggerne flyttede deres opmærksomhed over på fremstilling af Gislingebådens bordplanker.
English: The keel and stems almost complete, the boatbuilders attention turned to the production of Gislinge Boat’s planks.

Danish: Køl og stævne er samlet med et skråskar og tre jernnagler.
English: The keel and stems are joined using a scarf joint and three iron nails.

Danish: Køl og stævne blev samlet med et skråskar, og fastgjort med tre jernnagler i hver ende.
English: The keel and stems were joined using scarf joints which are fastened with three iron rivets each.

Danish: Kølen og de færdige stævne er lagt på gulvet på bådeværftet.
English: The keel and the finished stems are lain on the floor in the boatyard.

Danish: Kølen til Helge Ask, museets rekonstruktion af det lille krigsskib Skuldelev 5, lægges i 1990.
English: The keel for the museum's reconstruction of Skuldelev 5, Helge Ask, was laid in 1990.

Danish: Om få dage lægges kølen til det, der skal blive rekonstruktionen af Skuldelev 6 - det lille fiske- og fragtfartøj fra Sognefjorden i Vestnorge.
English: The keel has been laid for what will become the reconstruction of Skuldelev 6, the small fishing and cargo vessel from Sognefjord in western Norway.

Danish: Kølen er hugget groft ud af en egestamme, med marven i midten, ligesom på den originale båd og mange andre køle fra vikingetiden.
English: The keel is roughed out of an oak trunk with the pith in the centre, as seen on the original boat and on many other keels from the Viking Age.

Danish: Kølen er T-formet i tværsnit, idet den har ”vinger” eller spunding, hvorpå kølbordene er klinket.
English: The keel is t-shaped in section, with ‘wings’ where the garboards were fastened.

Danish: Kølstykket er kun ét blandt mange.
English: The keel piece is only one of many.

Danish: Køltræet blev fældet med tidens værktøj og derefter transporteret til værftspladsen, hvor arbejdet med at forme træet til, de klinkbyggede bådes karakteristiske T-form begyndte.
English: The keel piece is then cut down using period tools, before it is transported to the boatyard to be shaped into the characteristic T-shape of the clinker-built boats.

Danish: Kølen blev færdig før stævnene, så den blev omhyggeligt smurt med linolie og opbevaret i skygge, så den ikke skulle tørre ud og flække under solens varme.
English: The keel was finished some time before the stems, so it was given liberal coatings of linseed oil and stored in the shade to prevent the oak from cracking.

Danish: I 2010 blev kølen lagt, og stævnene sat.
English: The keel was laid and the stems were set in 2010.

Danish: Dog bliver stemmejern også brugt til at markere specifikke punkter på overfladen og til at forme de svingende 'vinger', som løber langs kølens kanter.
English: The keel was made from an oak trunk, which was gradually cut down to size: first it was roughly cut into a square profile and from there, the more detailed work in shaping the keel begins.

Danish: Køl og stævne laves på gulvet, efter opmåling af den gamle Frdedrikssundjolle.
English: The keel, stem and stern are made on the floor, based on the measurements of the old Frederikssund dinghy.

Danish: Køl og stævne bliver tildannet og rejst.
English: The keel, stem and stern post are fashioned and raised.

Danish: Køl, stævn og agterspejl er fremstillet i eg.
English: The keel, stem and stern-frame are made of oak.

Danish: Køl, stævne, bord og spanter er altsammen af egetræ.
English: The keel, stem, stern, planks and frames are all made of oak.

Danish: Kølsvinet i Roskilde 6 med de elegante kølsvinsknæ.
English: The keelson from Roskilde 6 with the elegant keelson knees.

Danish: Kølsvinet fra Skuldelev 2.
English: The keelson of Skuldelev 2.

Danish: Ansvaret for freden i havn og til søs bæres af kongen eller en anden centralmagt, der til gengæld opkræver afgifter.
English: The keeping of the peace in harbour and at sea falls under the responsibility of the king or another central form of government which receives duties in return.

Danish: Ved at afmærke punkter på bådsiden og padlen og derefter registrere bevægelserne over tid på video fra en følgebåd kunne bevægelserne i det enkelte tag kortlægges nøje.
English: The kinematics of a paddler in action was recorded by marking points on the paddle and along the rail and record the movements over a full stroke on video from a tender.

Danish: Kongemagt og samfund
English: The King and the State

Danish: Kongen gikk bort og så det var sant.
English: The king asked “what was the matter?”

Danish: Kongen spurte hvorfor de stod slik.
English: The king asked “what was the matter?”

Danish: Han kalte det Ormen lange og det andre Ormen stutte.
English: The king called this ship the Long Serpent, and the other the Short Serpent.

Danish: Kongen af Danmark
English: The king of Denmark

Danish: Landets konge, Harold Godwinson, blev da dræbt og hans efterkommere måtte flygte og søge tilflugt i Dublin.
English: The King of England, Harold Godwinson, was killed and his sons and daughter had to take flight.

Danish: Nå gikk Torberg bort og telgde bordet slik at alle snei- hoggene ble borte.
English: The king says, “Thou must restore it all to the same condition as before, or thy life shall pay for it.”

Danish: Kongen var ikke tilfreds med dets størrelse og beordrede det derfor forlænget med 12 alen på et tidspunkt hvor byggeriet var vidt fremskredent.
English: The king was not satisfied with its size and commanded it to be lengthened by 12 ells at a point when the construction was far advanced.

Danish: De imponerende rovfugle kan opleves på helt nært hold fem dage i efterårsferien.
English: The king's falconer will have their hunting birds on display.

Danish: Kongens isbåd
English: The King’s ice boat

Danish: Knarren optræder før 1000 som krigsskib, men senere som fragtskib på Nordatlanten og ind i Østersøen.
English: The knar appears before 1000 as a warship but later as a cargo-ship on the North Atlantic and in the Baltic.

Danish: Knæene og nogle af bundstokkene er lavet af krumvokset træ og fastgjort til skroget med håndsnittede, ottekantede trænagler.
English: The knees and some of the floor timbers are made from crooked timber and fastened to the hull using hand-carved, octagonal treenails.

Danish: Knæene mellem kølen og stævnene er også passet til
English: The knees between the keel and the stem and stern are also adjusted.

Danish: Alle figurerne har tillukkede ansigtsudtryk med stirrende øjne og stærke træk.
English: The knights are mounted on small horses, carrying spears and shields.

Danish: Den viden, de opnåede her, blev taget med hjem og fik, på verdensplan, indflydelse på udviklingen af marinarkæologien og sat fokus på videnskabens hovedformål - gamle skibsvrag.
English: The knowledge acquired there was taken back home and influenced the development of maritime archaeology and the knowledge of its main object - wreck of an ancient ship - worldwide.

Danish: Den viden, de opnåede her, blev taget med hjem og fik, på verdensplan, indflydelse på udviklingen af marinarkæologien og sat fokus på videnskabens hovedformål – gamle skibsvrag.
English: The knowledge acquired there was taken back home and influenced the development of maritime archaeology and the knowledge of its main object – wreck of an ancient ship – worldwide.

Danish: Allerede Koldingkoggen fra 1189 overgik de store nordiske, klinkbyggede fartøjer med sin lasteevne på ”70 eller flere tons” og en dybgang på mindst 2 m.
English: The Kolding cog of 1189 had already surpassed the cargo capacity of the large Nordic clinker-built vessels with a cargo capacity of “70 tons or more” and a deep draught of 2 m or more.

Danish: Manglen på skriftlige vidnesbyrd om frie købmand og brug af handelsskibe kan sandsynligvis forklares med den i samtiden lavt udviklede rutine for skriftelighed og arkivering.
English: The lack of written evidence for free merchants and the operation of merchant ships before the second half of the 12th century is probably a result of low contemporary standards of literacy and archive keeping.

Danish: Ladbyskibet under udgravning 1936
English: The Ladby ship during exczvation in 1936.

Danish: Ladbyskibet blev analyseret og publiceret første gang i 1957, og selvom rekonstruktionen af skibet senere er blevet revideret på afgørende punkter, viste det allerede dengang skibet som et langt og slankt fartøj, helt forskelligt fra de norske vikingeskibe.
English: The Ladby ship was analysed and published for the first time in 1957 and although the reconstruction of the ship was later revised on several major points, even then it could be seen to be a long slender vessel, very different from the Norwegian Viking ships.

Danish: Ladbyskibet blev fundet på Fyn i 1934 og udgravet de to følgende år.
English: The Ladby ship was discovered on Funen in 1934 and it was excavated in the two subsequent years.

Danish: Lammene blev pakket ind i tang fra stranden.
English: The lamb roast wrapped in seaweed from the beach.

Danish: Som tiden gik, hævede landet sig fortsat, men omkring år 7000 smeltede isen så hurtigt, at havstigningen overgik landhævningen.
English: The land level continued to rise as time passed, but around 7000 BC, the ice melted so rapidly that the sea rose faster than the land.

Danish: Landskabet ændrer sig ved flod og ebbe.
English: The landscape changes with flood and ebb tides.

Danish: Sproget kan dog være vanskeligt at forstå og forstå rigtigt.
English: The language, however, can be difficult.

Danish: Den store mængde viden er i gang med at blive analyseret og efterfølgende publiceret.
English: The large body of knowledge was analysed and subsequently published.

Danish: Størstedelen af året kan museets omfattende bådsamling ses i Museumshavnen.
English: The large collection of traditional Nordic wooden boats is berthed at the harbour on Museum Island.

Danish: Den store Gokstadbåd
English: The large Gokstad boat

Danish: Det største sejl har bom under og er placeret agter.
English: The larger sail has a boom below and is positioned aft.

Danish: Ved store ror kommer der en stor påvirkning på rorvidje og skib.
English: The larger the rudder, the greater the impact on the rudder withy and ship.

Danish: Det største værktøjsfund er Mästermyrkisten udgravet i en mose i Gotland, Sverige.
English: The largest find of tools is the Mästermyr box, which was excavated from a bog in Gotland, Sweden.

Danish: Det største af skibene på afbildningen er udstyret med stævnfløj, men herudover også med en fane, sat på en stage lige bag forstævnen.
English: The largest of the ships in the picture is equipped with a weather-vane but in addition to that also with a pennant, set on a post just before the fore-stem.

Danish: Sidstnævnte gælder den norske Gulatinglov.
English: The last applies to the Norwegian Gulatinglov.

Danish: Den sidste øl inden omsen står stadig midt i det gamle udgravningsfelt, og neglen på min finger har siden været tynd og knækker let.
English: The last beer before sales tax is still out there, in the middle of the old excavation area, and the nail on my finger has been thin and weak ever since.

Danish: Solen kaster sine sidste stråler over Vikingeskibsmuseets havn.
English: The last bit of sun is casting its rays on the Viking Ship Museum harbour.

Danish: Den sidste bro skal passeres.
English: The last bridge is passed.

Danish: Den sidste fundgruppe, ringbrynjerne, er den dårligst bevarede.
English: The last group of weapons, the chain mail coats, is the least well-preserved.

Danish: De sidste sømil
English: The last miles at sea

Danish: Den sidste opgave kræver oftest at hele lageret af madvarer "graves" op fra skibets bund under udførsel af indviklede akrobatiske øvelser.
English: The last task often requires all the stock of food supplies to be "excavated" from the bottom of the ship, requiring intricate acrobatic maneuvers.

Danish: Prøvesejladserne de seneste tre år har ikke kun været en test af Havhingsten, men også af hver enkelt person for at se, om han eller hun passede ind i det hold, der i dag sejler Havhingsten.
English: The last three years of sailing hasn't just been a test of the ship, but also each crew member, to see if he or she had the ability to be part of the crew already selected for the Sea Stallion.

Danish: De seneste to arbejdsweekender har Havhingstens egen sygeplejerske, Susanne Malmstrøm, undervist alle gaster om bord på Havhingsten i førstehjælp.
English: The last two weekends were the crew has been gathered to work on the Sea Stallion the nurse, Susanne Malmstrøm has also been teaching first aid.

Danish: De store våbenofferfund, som Nydam, Thorsberg, Vimose, Ejsbøl og Illerup Ådal viser, at den militære og politiske organisation i tredje til femte århundrede e.Kr. må have strakt sig over større territorier, og det ser ud til, at hele regioner var i stand til at organisere hære med en stærkere ledelse på et højere niveau.
English: The later, great weapon sacrifices such as Nydam, Thorsbjerg, Vimose, Ejsbøl and Illerup Ådal, demonstrate the military and political organisation that must be assumed to have extended over large territories, and it would seem that whole provinces were capable of organising armies with a more superior and stronger leadership.

Danish: Listen er, som på originalbåden, syet fast med granrødder.
English: The lath is sewn on using spruce roots, as on the original boat.

Danish: The Swilkie udgår fra en pynt på den lille ø Stroma, hvis navn også er nordisk: ”Strøm-ø”.
English: The latter also sometimes creates a maelstrom or whirlpool.

Danish: De sidste har stadig ansvaret for, at masten ikke svinger ud til siderne under rejsningen af masten til toppunktet.
English: The latter must again make sure that the mast does not swing to the sides while it is raised to its top position.

Danish: Søsætning
English: The launch

Danish: Søsætningen er kulminationen
English: The launch is the culmination

Danish: Lovens opbygning og indhold har sandsynligvis været forbillede for den tidligste islandske lov Ulvljotslovi fra ca. 930.
English: The law's construction and content was probably the model for the earliest Icelandic law, Ulvljotslovi, from about 930.

Danish: Lovens hovedtekst indeholder flere kapitler om bådbygning, skibsstyring, besætningsregler og våbenregler som i dag henføres til vores tolkning af vikingetidens skibsbygning og organiseringen af flåder.
English: The law’s main text contains several chapters on boat building, navigation, and rules on weapons, which add to our understanding today of Viking Age shipbuilding and the organisation of fleets.

Danish: Lagene indeholdt endvidere knogler af landdyr og havdyr, bl.a. sæler og for denne periode hidtil ukendte arter som sværdfisk, stør og tun.
English: The layers also contained bones of terrestrial and marine animals, including seals and previously unknown species for this period such as swordfish, sturgeon and tuna.

Danish: Halvtagsbygningen blev lejet ud til reparation af bådmotorer, indtil værftet i 1980 blev købt af importør Arne Nielsen og fabrikant Knud Reidl, der året efter solgte til Vikingeskibshallen.
English: The lean-to was leased for repairing boat engines, until the boatyard was bought in 1980 by the importer Arne Nielsen and the manufacturer Knud Reidl, who sold it one year later to the Viking Ship Museum.

Danish: De mindre ihærdige er for længst faldet fra.
English: The less eager dropped out long ago.

Danish: Skakbrikkerne fra Lewis
English: The Lewis Chessmen

Danish: Skakbrikkerne fra Lewis © The Trustees of the National Museums of Scotland
English: The Lewis Chessmen © The Trustees of the National Museums of Scotland

Danish: Den udleverede redningsvest skal bæres under hele turen.
English: The life jacket must be worn during the entire boat trip.

Danish: Liffey blive aldrig den samme igen.
English: The Liffey will never be the same again.

Danish: Desuden er prammen let at få på en trailer.
English: The lighter is also easy to lift onto a trailer.

Danish: Lindestammen er en småbladet lind fundet i Vindeholme skov på Lolland.
English: The linden log is from a small-leaved linden, found in Vindeholme skov on Lolland.

Danish: Stregen viser, hvor overkanten af bordplanken skal gå til.
English: The line shows there the upper edge of each strake should fit.

Danish: Kølen blev fremstillet fra en lang egestamme, som var gradvist hugget ned til den rigtige størrelse.
English: The lines along the sides of the stem - where the planks 'merge' into the stem - were marked out and the initial carving was done with a chisel.

Danish: Linjerne langs siden af stævnen - der, hvor bordene 'fletter' sammen med stævnen - er markeret og den første udskæring er gjort med et stemmejern.
English: The lines along the sides of the stem - where the planks 'merge' into the stem - were marked out and the initial carving was done with a chisel.

Danish: Linjerne langs siden af stævnen – der, hvor bordene ’fletter’ sammen med stævnen – er markeret og den første udskæring er gjort med et stemmejern.
English: The lines along the sides of the stem - where the planks 'merge' into the stem - were marked out and the initial carving was done with a chisel.

Danish: Linjetegningerne, som dannede grundlag for bygningen af fuldskala rekonstruktionen 'Dronningen', var ikke korrigeret for dette kollaps.
English: The lines drawings used for building the full-scale reconstruction 'Dronningen' were not amended to allow for this difference.

Danish: Linjetegningerne, som dannede grundlag for bygningen af fuldskala rekonstruktionen ’Dronningen’, var ikke korrigeret for dette kollaps.
English: The lines drawings used for building the full-scale reconstruction 'Dronningen' were not amended to allow for this difference.

Danish: Den lille jolle har været med os i generationer og har været brugt til alle slags formål.
English: The little dinghy has been with us for generations and has been used for a wide range of purposes.

Danish: Den lille Gokstadbåd er en sjov båd at sejle.
English: The little Gokstad boat is a fun boat to sail.

Danish: a. tale om en pligt for ledingsbønderne til at levere materialer til skibsbyggeriet, og denne byrde har man åbenbart søgt at komme så let om ved som muligt.
English: The local farmers had, for example, the duty of providing materials for the building of the ship and it would seem that they tried to cut as many corners as possible when doing this.

Danish: Logbogen
English: The log book

Danish: Logbogen er skibets væsentligste dokumentations journal, og føres af skipper Carsten Hvid og styrmændene Vibeke Bischoff og Kjetil Sildnes.
English: The log book is the ship’s most important documentary record and is kept by the skipper, Carsten Hvid, and the mates, Vibeke Bischoff and Kjetil Sildnes.

Danish: Logbogen rummer alle informationer af betydning for skibets sejlads, og vil dermed indgå i analysen af rekonstruktionens troværdighed, skibets sejlegenskaber og organisationen ombord.
English: The log book records all significant information about the voyage and will be used in the analysis of the reliability of the reconstruction, the ship’s sailing qualities, and the organisation on board.

Danish: Egestammen har en anslået vægt på 7,5 - 8 tons og en længde på 8 meter.
English: The log has a weight of 7.5-8 tons and a length of 8 meters

Danish: Dagbogen føres af Jens Kristian Knudsen Jensen, der er uddannet slagter, og Solvej Lyng-Jørgensen, der har fungeret som hovmestre ombord på Havhingsten siden 2004.
English: The log is kept by Jens Kristian Knudsen Jensen, a qualified butcher, and Solvej Lyng-Jørgensen, who have acted as stewards aboard the Sea Stallion since 2004.

Danish: Logbogen
English: The logbook

Danish: Logbogen er en dagbog, hvori nedskrives forskellige oplysninger om sejladsen.
English: The logbook is a diary in which various information about the voyage is written down.

Danish: Logbogen er en dagbog, hvori nedskrives forskellige oplysninger om sejladsen.
English: The logbook is a diary in which various information is written down about the voyage.

Danish: Det lange, bredbladede, tveæggede sværd var et prestigevåben, der ofte havde et udsmykket fæste og sommetider bar smedens stempel på klingen.
English: The long broad-bladed double-edged sword was the prestige weapon which often had an ornate hilt and sometimes bore a maker's mark on the blade.

Danish: Forsøgsrejsen Roskilde-Dublin tur/retur i 2007-2008 blev kulminationen på mange års arbejde.
English: The long distance trial voyage to Dublin and back in 2007 - 2008 was the culmination of years of work.

Danish: De lange bordplanker til skibssiden er kløvet ud i lange, lige egestammer, mens det krumme indtømmer er hugget ud af i forvejen krumvokset træ fra egenes kroner.
English: The long planking for the ship's sides, the strakes, were cleaved from long, straight oak trunks, while the inner and more curved timbers were made from parts of the oak tree crown that had already grown into more or less the correct form.

Danish: Lang vej til start
English: The long road to the starting line

Danish: Skibets lange og smalle form samt enorme sejl gav et stort fartpotentiale.
English: The long, narrow shape of the ship and the enormous sail allowed at great speed.

Danish: Det seneste fund af et langskibs blev gjort da der skulle anlægges en museumshavn til Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde i 1997, og skibet bærer betegnelsen Roskilde 6.
English: The longest longship was discovered during the construction of the Museum Harbour for the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde in 1997, and bears the name Roskilde 6.

Danish: Longphort'en, nu kendt som Dublin, eksisterede i over 60 år og lå i et skandinavisk beboet område, men i 902 blev vikingerne, for en periode, drevet ud af området.
English: The Longphort now known as Dublin existed for more than 60 years and lay in a Scandinavian occupied area, but in AD 902 the Vikings were driven out of the area for a while.

Danish: Langskibet blev verdenskendt, da det i 2007 sejlede til Dublin og retur til Roskilde året efter.
English: The longship became world-famous when it sailed to Dublin in 2007 and home again to Roskilde the following year.

Danish: I forbindelse med større militæroperationer sikrede flåden formentlig desuden, at forsyningslinjer kunne opretholdes.
English: The longship design - long and with a narrow beam - makes communication difficult.

Danish: Langskibet fra Hedeby havn
English: The longship from Haithabu Harbour

Danish: Langskibet i middelalderens sagatekster
English: The longship in the medieval saga texts

Danish: Langskibet i de skriftlige kilder
English: The longship in written sources

Danish: Langskibet er let at genkende med sine karakteristiske blå, gule og røde bordgange.
English: The longship is easy to recognize with its characteristic blue, red and yellow strakes.

Danish: Langskibet er essensen af vikingetiden - skibene bragte krig og ufred - men også orden og statsmagt.
English: The longship is the essence of the Viking Age - the ships brought war and instability, but also order and political power.

Danish: Langskibet er essensen af vikingetiden - skibene bragte krig og ufred - men også orden og statsmagt.
English: The longship is the essence of the Viking Age – the ships brought war and instability, but also order and political power.

Danish: Langskibene er essensen af vikingetiden.
English: The longship is the very essence of the Viking Age.

Danish: Langskibet Havhingsten fra Glendalough er det største skib Vikingeskibsmuseet endnu har bygget.
English: The longship, Sea Stallion from Glendalough (in Danish Havhingsten fra Glendalough), is the largest vessel the Viking Ship Museum has build so far.

Danish: Onsdag aften gik det videre til City Hall, Dublin hvor byen borgmester Paddy Burke tog imod.
English: The Lord Mayor Paddy Burke was hosting and he and the Mayor of Roskilde held speeches of appreciation for the crew members.

Danish: Den underste kant af bundstokkene og de udhuggede klamper i bordet, som de hviler på, er faldet sammen.
English: The lower edges of the floor timbers and the protruding cleats upon which they sit had collapsed.

Danish: De underste sideplanker blev lavet så brede som stammerne kunne give, mens rælingsplankerne måtte øges ved limning.
English: The lower of the side strakes were made as broad as possible, while the sheerstrakes had to be increased in size by gluing on additions.

Danish: De forreste undervanter slækkes også.
English: The lower shrouds furthest forward are also loosened.

Danish: Den nederste, vandfyldte ende af fartøjet blev brugt til rådning af hør – en vigtig proces i hørproduktionen – mens en lille bålplads blev indrettet i den øvre, tørre ende, hvor skibssiderne gav læ for vinden i det åbne, flade landskab.
English: The lower, water-filled part of the vessel was used for the retting of flax – an important process in the production of linen – while a small open hearth was established in the upper, dry end, where the sides of the ship gave shelter from the wind in the open flat landscape.

Danish: Ture og Erik sætter fenderlisten på.
English: The Lynæs dinghy is now fully covered.

Danish: Magnetometeret slæbes altid efter skibet for at undgå elektromagnetisk påvirkning.
English: The magnetometer is always towed behind the vessel to eliminate electromagnetic noise.

Danish: Magnetometeret registrerer ændringerne, der vises på en skærm eller en skriver i skibet.
English: The magnetometer records such changes, displaying them on a monitor or printer onboard the survey vessel.

Danish: Sammenlignet med kombinerede ro- og sejlskibe ligger de rene sejlskibes største fordel i deres lasteevne og sødygtighed, som begge tiltager med skibsstørrelsen.
English: The main advantage of pure sailing vessels when compared with combined rowing-and-sailing ships can be seen in their cargo capacities and their seaworthiness, both of which improve with an increase in vessel size.

Danish: En anden grund kunne være at de danske skibsbyggere ikke var trænet i at lave konstruktionstegninger eller læse disse, et forhold som også gjaldt til et stykke ind i 1800-tallet.
English: The main aim of the research was to establish which specific shipbuilding methods were in use in North Western Europe in the period defined, as the question had not previously been examined archaeologically in a Danish context.

Danish: Striden om hans forfatterskab - meningen med hans tekster, kendsgerninger om hans liv og sammenhængen mellem disse - har været aktuel gennem mere end 250 år.
English: The main disputes - the ultimate meaning of his writing, the facts of his life, and their relationship - have continued unabated for more than 250 years.

Danish: Beboelsesområdet var et bredt areal, der strakte sig mellem de to døre og mellem de to forhøjninger langs siderne, som ofte blot var hævede siddepladser eller senge.
