English: The main living area was a wide strip which ran between the doorways and between two raised side areas, which were often no more than raised seats or beds.

Danish: På stormasten føres et lavt luggersejl hvor den øverste "trekant" kan rebes væk, så sejlet fremtræder som et lille råsejl.
English: The main mast is rigged with a low lugs ail, the upper "triangle" of which can be reefed so that the sail becomes a small square sail.

Danish: Tumleren har i modsætning til tidligere, en tør dam og bruges udelukkende til lystsejlads.
English: The main mast is rigged with gaffsail, foresail, jib and topsail, while the mizzen mast is rigged

Danish: Den overvejende del af vores viden om Limerick i vikingetiden stammer fra historiske kilder.
English: The majority of the evidence comes from historical sources.

Danish: De fleste svømmer på ryggen, men enkelte forsøger sig med brystsvømning.
English: The majority swim back strokes, but some try breast strokes.

Danish: Vikingegraven ved Larne
English: The male burial at Larne

Danish: Manden, som tydeligvis var kriger, var begravet med et tveægget vikingesværd, placeret tværs over brystkassen, og med grebet nær hans højre hånd.
English: The man, clearly a warrior, had been buried with a double-edged Viking type sword, which was placed across his chest with the handle towards the right hand.

Danish: Den mand, hvis due kom sidst til målet, skulle give frokost på et værtshus på Ordrupvej.
English: The man, whose pigeon was the last to reach goal, would have to buy lunch in a pub on Ordrupvej.

Danish: Vikingeskibsmuseets ledelse har besluttet, at Havhingsten skal have en ny fremtid i et hus, hvor skibet kan udstilles med alt dets udstyr, og hvor historien om det eksperimentalarkæologiske arbejde, bygningen af skibet, og den fantastiske forsøgsrejse fra Roskilde til Dublin og retur kan fortælles.
English: The management of the Viking Ship Museum have decided that the Sea Stallion shall have a new future in a house where the ship can be exhibited with all its equipment and where the history of the experimental archaeological work, the construction of the ship and the fantastic trial voyage from Roskilde to Dublin and back can be told.

Danish: Manøvreringen af den lette båd med padlerne var hurtig og effektiv med acceleration på 30 sekunder til topfart og opbremsning herfra på 5 sekunder.
English: The manoeuvring of the light boat with the paddles was quick and effective with acceleration to top speed in 30 seconds and braking from this speed in 5 seconds.

Danish: Fremstillingen af det 90 m2 uldsejl til Ottar var et projekt i sig selv med bidrag fra tekstilforskere i Danmark, Norge, Sverige, England og Skotland.
English: The manufacture of the 90 m2 woollen sail for Ottar was a project in itself during which assistance was received from textile researchers in Denmark, Norway, Sweden, England and Scotland.

Danish: De mange beretninger i Den angelsaksiske krønike om vikingernes overfald giver os god mulighed for at følge med i, hvordan vikingeflådernes størrelse skifter.
English: The many accounts in the Anglo-Saxon Chronicle of Viking attacks give us a good chance of following the changes in the size of the Viking fleets.

Danish: Mange perler, hals- og armringe og fine spænder i de rige vikingers grave vidner om, at vikingerne var ganske pyntesyge.
English: The many beads, neck and arm rings and fine brooches in rich Vikings' graves show that the Vikings were inordinately fond of finery.

Danish: De mange både skal i vandet - endelig kan vi ryste vinteren af os.
English: The many boats will be returned to the water and we can finally shake off the winter.

Danish: De mange forskellige byggeprojekter som bliver udført på værftet varierer meget.
English: The many different building projects carried out at the boatyard vary greatly in their nature.

Danish: Men alt det materiale som blev udgivet af museet, samt de mange film og billeder, som blev delt online, har været endnu vigtigere for os”.
English: The many film clips, photos and blog texts shared during the project were an integral element of the open source philosophy the Museum adopted for the project.

Danish: De mange fotos tager publikum tilbage i tiden og ned i udgravningen.
English: The many photos take museum visitors back in time and into the excavation.

Danish: De talrige - og ofte langstrakte -forskningsprojekter har involveret forskere med vidt forskellige kompetencer.
English: The many, and often long-lasting, projects have involved researchers with a broad range of knowledge and skills.

Danish: Marinarkæologerne undersøger og udgraver fundsteder fra alle tidsperioder - fra stenalder til nyere tid.
English: The maritime archaeologists investigate and excavate sites from all time periods - from the Stone Age to the present.

Danish: Marinarkæologerne fortsætter deres arbejde med at dokumentere skibvraget i dansk farvand i yderligere tre uger.
English: The maritime archaeologists will work on documenting the wreck in Danish waters for three more weeks.

Danish: Teamet Marinarkæologiske Undersøgelser sagsbehandler og undersøger kulturarven i det danske søterritorium øst for Storebælt.
English: The Maritime Archaeology team manages and investigates the cultural heritage of the Danish territorial waters east of Great Belt.

Danish: Det marine arkiv
English: The Maritime Archives

Danish: Her var markedsfreden kongens ansvar, og de handlende betalte en afgift som modydelse.
English: The market place was the King's responsibility and the merchants paid a duty as a quid pro quo.

Danish: Den 8 meter lange, massive egestamme med en vægt lige omkring de 8 tons skal kløves med køller, kiler og ren, rå mu…
English: The massive 8 meter long oak log, with a weight of around 8 tons, will be cleaved with mallets, wedges and raw musc…

Danish: mastefisken vandrer fra side til side hver gang Havhingsten slår ind i en ny sø
English: The mast fish moves from side to side every time the sea Stallion hits a new swell

Danish: Masten er i vejen
English: The mast is blocking the way

Danish: Så er masten nede.
English: The mast is then down.

Danish: Masten står i mastefoden, som er indrettet, så masten let kan lægges og rejses.
English: The mast stands in the mast heel, which is designed so that the mast can be lowered and raised.

Danish: Masten var lagt ned og skibets høje stævne skulle fjernes ved hver af de mange broer, skibet skulle under.
English: The mast was laid and the ships high stems were removed at each of the many bridges the ship had to pass under.

Danish: Bygmesteren kunne modtage en bøde, hvis materialer eller værktøj manglede, hvis byggeriet ikke var færdigt i tide eller ikke var ordentligt udført.
English: The master builder could be fined if materials or tools went missing, if the shipbuilding was not completed on time or was not done correctly.

Danish: Materialerne til Åledrivkvasen er nøje udvalgte.
English: The materials for the eel drifter are carefully selected.

Danish: Materialerne er lærk på eg, mens prammenes bund bliver af fyrretræ.
English: The materials used are larch on oak, while the bottom of the pram will be made of pine.

Danish: Nogle af de materialer der er brugt til skibet er: eg til plankerne, piletræ til naglerne, fyrretræ til mast, rå og åre, lindetræ til skjolde, fyrretræsrødder til tjære og hamp til tovværk.
English: The materials were, for example, oak for the planks, willow for the treenails, pine for the mast, yard and oars, lime for the shields, pine roots for making tar and hemp for ropes.

Danish: Sagen var hurtigt blevet mørklagt; et ømtåleligt emne i den kolde krigs start.
English: The matter was quickly covered up; it was a delicate subject at the beginning of the Cold War.

Danish: De fuldvoksne egetræer skal bruges til byggeriet af et vikingeskib i fuld størrelse.
English: The mature oak trees will be used in the construction of a full-scale Viking ship.

Danish: Roskildes Borgmester Poul Lindor Nielsen og den irske Ambassadør til Danmark, Joe Hayes vil sammen sænke tidskapslen, der først skal åbnes igen om 250 år - i 2259.
English: The mayor of Roskilde, Poul Lindor Nielsen, and the Irish ambassador to Denmark, Joe Hayes, will jointly seal the capsule and it will remain sealed for 250 years, i.e. until 2259.

Danish: Måltidet vækker historien om de fem vikingeskibe i Vikingeskibshallen til live.
English: The meal brings to life the story of the five Viking ships in the Viking Ship Hall.

Danish: Måltidet kan realiseres pga. et generøst samarbejde; råvarerne er sponsoreret af lokale producenter fra Samsø, og måltidet tilberedes i et samarbejde mellem River Cottage kokke, lokale kokke og frivillige samt hovmestrene fra Havhingsten.
English: The meal can be realized due to a generous collaboration; the raw materials are sponsored by local producers from Samsø, and the meal will be prepared in collaboration between the River Cottage chefs, local chefs, volunteers and the stewards from the Sea Stallion.

Danish: Betydningen af symboler afhænger desuden af tid og tolkes ofte i vores nutidsforståelse.
English: The meaning of symbols is moreover time-dependent and is often interpreted in the light of current perceptions.

Danish: Målingerne udførtes dels manuelt for nogle detaljer og som kontrolmål, dels ved punktindmåling med totalstation og endelig ved dokumentation af konturer, tværsnit og overfladedetaljer med en 'digital arm'.
English: The measurements were in part done manually for some details and as a control, partly with the recording of a large number of points with total station, and finally with the documentation of contours, cross-sections and surface details with a ‘digital arm'.

Danish: Målingerne udførtes dels manuelt for nogle detaljer og som kontrolmål, dels ved punktindmåling med totalstation og endelig ved dokumentation af konturer, tværsnit og overfladedetaljer med en ’digital arm’.
English: The measurements were in part done manually for some details and as a control, partly with the recording of a large number of points with total station, and finally with the documentation of contours, cross-sections and surface details with a ‘digital arm’.

Danish: Så må målingerne kommer senere af folk, der har forstand på den slags.
English: The measurements will have to come later, made by people who understand that sort of thing.

Danish: Den middelalderlige bebyggelse Puck, ligger ved den vestligste ende af Gdansk-bugten i Polen.
English: The medieval settlement of Puck lies at the western end of the Bay of Gdansk in Poland.

Danish: Ved planlægningen blev følgende parametre prioriteret: autenticitet, seriøsitet, kvalitet og dokumentation, mens tidsfaktoren ikke blev fastlagt på forhånd.
English: The members divided themselves into a number of working groups, according to their own interests and abilities.

Danish: Derfor fik laugsmedlemmerne indledningsvis lejlighed til at optræne færdigheder med arbejde i lokalt lindetræ.
English: The members of the guild were therefore given the opportunity to do their introductory training by working with local linden.

Danish: Laugets 50-100 medlemmer i alderen 40-75 år repræsenterede et bredt udvalg af erhverv og personlige erfaringer, og de opdelte sig i en række arbejdsgrupper efter interesse og evner.
English: The membership of the guild, which fluctuated between 50 and 100 persons, with ages ranging between 40 and 75, represented a wide range of skills and personal experience.

Danish: Menuen indeholder også nordiske specialiteter, som blandt andet nordisk hummus på flækærter, nordiske oste og ristede ramsløgspølser med hybenketchup.
English: The menu also includes Nordic specialties, like Nordic hummus based on split peas, Nordic cheese and roasted ramson sausage with rose hip ketchup.

Danish: Vi benytter os af de råvarer, der var kendt af vikingerne, så her er hverken kartofler, tomater eller agurker, men selvfølgelig masser af urter, brød, kød, fisk og æg.
English: The menu also includes Nordic specialties, like Nordic hummus based on split peas, Nordic cheese and roasted ramson sausage with rose hip ketchup.

Danish: Handelsflåden blev derfor eskorteret af 8-10 engelske orlogsskibe, heriblandt linieskibene St. George og Defence.
English: The merchant fleet was therefore escorted by 8-10 British warships, including the ships of the line St. George and Defence.

Danish: Ud fra Johannessens linietegning er metacenterhøjden beregnet.
English: The metacentric height has been calculated from Johannessen's sheer draught.

Danish: Ud fra Johannessens linietegning er metacenterhøjden beregnet.
English: The metacentric height has been calculated from Johannessen’s sheer draught.

Danish: Og metoden er den samme i træbåde der bliver bygget i dag.
English: The method is the same for wooden boats built today.

Danish: Måden at se og spørge på må til stadighed udvikles og raffineres af et bredt sammensat arbejdsteam, der tilsammen kan behandle et omfattende og meget forskelligartet kildemateriale, og som med helheden for øje kan tage stilling til en lang række problemstillinger.
English: The method of examining and questioning must be constantly developed and refined by a broadly comprised team, who can together process a comprehensive and very diverse source material and who can develop ideas on a wide range of issues, always with the bigger picture in mind.

Danish: De metodiske tilgange fra såvel den eksperimentelle som den maritime arkæologi er udgangspunkter i museets forskning.
English: The methodological approaches from both experimental and maritime archaeology are central to the museums research.

Danish: Mellemråberens opgaver består i, at råbe kommandoer og beskeder videre til forskibet samt, at råbe udkiggens meldinger tilbage til løftingen.
English: The middleman's tasks involve relaying commands and messages on towards the bow of the vessel as well as shouting the look-out's messages back to the lofting.

Danish: Mellemråberens opgaver består i, at råbe kommandoer og beskeder videre til forskibet samt, at råbe udkiggens meldinger tilbage til løftingen.
English: The middleman’s tasks involve relaying commands and messages on towards the bow of the vessel as well as shouting the look-out’s messages back to the lofting.

Danish: Den midterste del af stammen var lidt mere stædig, end de havde regnet med. Det nedsatte hastigheden i et stykke tid, men langt om længe overgav den sig til kraften fra bådebyggernes slag.
English: The midsection had proved to be more stubborn than they had originally expected, slowing progress for a time, but eventually it yielded to the force of the blows.

Danish: Mini-udstillingen ”På sporet af Erik den Røde” er for tegneglade og kreative skibsbyggere.
English: The mini-exhibition “On the trail of Eric the Red” is for those who enjoy drawing and for creative shipbuilders.

Danish: De manglende dele genskabes ved hjælpe af andre skibsfund, skibsmotiver fra vikingetiden og nutidens traditionelle, Nordiske og klinkbyggede både, der viser tilbage til vikingetidens skibsdesign.
English: The missing parts are reconstructed using other ship-finds, Viking Age ship motifs and more modern traditional Nordic clinker-built boats, which hark back to the Viking Age ship design.

Danish: Det danske folk normalt meget modvillige overfor missionærerne.
English: The missionaries who were sent to Denmark was very disliked.

Danish: Blandingen blev kogt, afkølet og derpå gnedet ind i sejlet med glassten.
English: The mixture was boiled, cooled down and then rubbed into the sail using glass stones.

Danish: Mesanmasten bærer et lille sprydsejl, men årerne er hovedfremdrivningsmidlet.
English: The mizzen mast is rigged with a small spritsail.

Danish: Fremstillingsteknikken, de enkelte kunstneres talent, og formodentlig også et vist tidspres for at få den store opgave afsluttet, har sat grænser for detaljernes rigdom og troværdighed.
English: The mode of production, the talent of the individual artists and presumably also pressure on the time available for completing the great task have combined to put limitations on the richness and reliability of the details.

Danish: Forbilledet for HAVHINGSTEN er et arkæologisk fund, vikingeskibet Skuldelev 2, som blev udgravet i 1962.
English: The model for the SEA STALLION is an archaeological find, the Viking ship Skuldelev 2, that was excavated in 1962.

Danish: Modellen i halv størrelse giver et godt intryk om hvordan træet arter sig ved opvarmning over ild og udspændning.
English: The model gives a good impression of how the wood will behave in terms of being warmed up over flames and expanded.

Danish: Det moderne udstyr afspejler projektets forskningsmæssige prioritering: Alt er tilrettelagt med henblik på at afprøve selve rekonstruktionen, og med henblik på at undersøge, måle og dokumentere skibets sejlegenskaber, og de fysiske forhold, det sejler under.
English: The modern equipment reflects the research priorities of the project: everything is designed to test the reconstruction itself and to investigate, measure and document the sailing qualities of the ship, and the physical conditions in which it sails.

Danish: Skibets udrustning - det moderne udstyr
English: The modern ship equipment

Danish: Klosteret er indviet til St. Senan.
English: The monastery is dedicated to St. Senan.

Danish: Det afsidesliggende kloster på Skellig Michael, der blev angrebet af vikingerne i 824.
English: The monastry at Skellig Michael was attacked by Vikings in 824.

Danish: Pengene er ikke øremærkede, så det står museet frit for at bruge gaven til at købe proviant for, betale forsikring af skib og besætning eller hvad det nu måtte være”.
English: The money is not earmarked, leaving it up to the museum to spend the gift on provisions, insurance of the ship and crew or whatever it turns out to be.

Danish: Pengene skal bruges til udgivelse af et nyt bind i den internationale serie "Ships and Boats of the North".
English: The money will be used to publish a new volume in the international series “Ships and Boats of the North”.

Danish: Jo mere detaljeret viden vi deler, jo mere vil folk gerne vide.
English: The more detailed information we share, the more people want to know.

Danish: Jo mere mælk, juice, ost, morgenknas, yougurt og grov- toastbrød (som stadig er noget luftigt og klistret for danske ganer), vi køber, jo mere spiser vi.
English: The more milk, juice, cheese, yoghurt and coarse toast (still somewhat light and sticky for us Danes) we buy, the more we eat.

Danish: Jo flere observationer – jo mere sikre bliver vejrudsigterne.
English: The more observations – the better the weather forecast.

Danish: Den mere seriøse side af sociale medier
English: The more serious side of social media

Danish: Jo mere tætvokset gran er, jo stærkere er det.
English: The more slowly spruce grows, the stronger it will be.

Danish: Af drikkevarer om bord var det mest almindelige vand, som blev medbragt i tønder eller kar.
English: The most common drink on board was water; this was carried in barrels or vats.

Danish: Farligste farvande i Europa
English: The most dangerous waters in Europe

Danish: Den mest detaljerede rigning findes på gengivelsen af Harolds skib mens det krydser Kanalen
English: The most detailed rigging is found on the depiction of Harold’s ship as it crosses the English channel

Danish: Den uheldigste belastning for Hjortspringbåden har været under sejlads i bølger af en bølgelængde på 13 m svarende til vandlinielængden, hvor båden skiftevis rider på en bølgetop og over en bølgedal.
English: The most exposed position for the Hjortspring boat was sailing in seas with a wave-length of 13 m, corresponding to the length of the waterline, where the boat alternately rides on top of a wave and over the trough between the waves.

Danish: Den vigtigste graffiti af langskibe findes på en ca. 25 cm lang pind af enebær, som blev fundet ved udgravningerne på Bryggen i den vestnorske by Bergen.
English: The most important graffito showing longships is found on an approx. 25 cm long stick of juniper wood, which was recovered from the excavations at Bryggen in the West Norwegain town of Bergen.

Danish: Vigtigst af disse var udgravningen af Gokstadskibet i 1880 og af Osebergskibet i 1904, begge i Vestfold.
English: The most important of these were the excavations of the Gokstad ship in 1880 and of the Oseberg ship in 1904, both in Vestfold.

Danish: Den væsentligste grund til at masten hurtigt skal kunne lægges ned er, at man af hensyn til navigeringen ofte får behov for at smide sejlet og ro.
English: The most important reason for being able to lower the mast quickly is that for navigational purposes there is often a need to drop the sail and row.

Danish: Skjaldens vigtigste opgave var, at sikre et godt eftermæle for sin herre.
English: The most important task of the scald was to maintain or enhance his master's reputation.

Danish: Det vigtigste var, at båden fremstod i størrelse, materiale og overfladefinish som vi mente den oprindelige båd så ud, da den blev bygget.
English: The most important thing was that the boat would be completed in the same size, materials and surface finish that we estimate the original boat had.

Danish: Det mest interessante gravfund fra Danmark er fra Over Hornbæk ved Randers, hvor en skibsbygningsmester lå begravet med en bredbil indlagt med sølv.
English: The most interesting find from a dig in Denmark is from Over Hornbæk, near Randers, where a master shipbuilder lay buried with a broad axe inlaid with silver.

Danish: Det seneste og mest omfattende værk er Judith Jesch's Ships and Men in the Late Viking Age.
English: The most recent and most comprehensive work is Judith Jesch's Ships and Men in the Late Viking Age.

Danish: Det seneste og mest omfattende værk er Judith Jesch’s Ships and Men in the Late Viking Age.
English: The most recent and most comprehensive work is Judith Jesch’s Ships and Men in the Late Viking Age.

Danish: De nyeste logbogsnoter står øverst.
English: The most recent logbook notes are at the top.

Danish: De seneste testsejladser fandt sted da Havhingsten fra Glendalough (Skuldelev 2) i 2007 sejlede til Dublin via Orkneyøerne og Skotland og i 2008 sejlede retur til Roskilde igennem den Engelske Kanal.
English: The most recent sailing trials took place, when the Sea Stallion from Glendalough (Skuldelev 2) sailed to Dublin via the Orkney Islands and Scotland in 2007, and returned to Roskilde through the English Channel in 2008.

Danish: De sikreste skriftlige kilder er som hovedregel dem der er nedskrevet samtidigt med begivenhederne de omtaler.
English: The most reliable written sources are usually those written down at the time of the events they refer to.

Danish: Den dygtigste er Torberg, som har fået opgaven med at lave stævnene, men det er ikke ham, der i første omgang leder byggeriet.
English: The most skilful of these is Thorger, who has been given the task of making the stems, but it is not he who directed the building to begin with.

Danish: Bedst er det at få en såkaldt svikmølle, hvor man ved at flytte én brik frem og tilbageen “rendehest” - let kan skifte mellem to møller og altså hurtigt få overtaget.
English: The most strategic way to play Nine Mens Morris is to place the pieces in a position where it is possible to move just one of them back and forth between two line crossings and then get Nine Mens Morris in every move.

Danish: Det mest værdifulde resultat blev uden tvivl den øgede viden om den sene vikingetids skibsbygning og skibsfart.
English: The most valuable result was, without a doubt, expanding the knowledge of shipbuilding and shipping of the late Viking Age.

Danish: Det mest varierede og spontane billedmateriale kommer fra graffiti, som oftest findes indridset på træ.
English: The most varied and spontaneous picture material derives from graffiti, which are often carved in wood, more rarely hewn on stone.

Danish: Mest kendt er nok Den Angelsaksiske Krønike, der er en samling af dokumenter, som dækker anglesaksernes historie i England frem til 1154.
English: The most well-known of these is probably The Anglo-Saxon Chronicle, which is a collection of documents covering the history of the Anglo-Saxons in England up to AD 1154.

Danish: Motivet kan også laves i linoleum og bruges til tryk.
English: The motif could also be cut into a piece of lino and used for printing.

Danish: Motivationen er den samme: Ønsket om at sejle med vikingeskib, er det centrale for alle deltagere.
English: The motivation is the same: The desire to sail on a Viking ship is the primary motivation for all participants.

Danish: Motivet kaldes Urnæs-stil.
English: THe motive is called Urnæs-style.

Danish: Motivet forestiller et fantasidyr i kamp med slanger og symboliserer kristendommerns kamp mod hedenskaben.
English: The motive shows a fantasy animal struggling with snakes, a symbol of christianity´s fight against heathenism.

Danish: Motiverne er videnskabelige såvel som formidlingsmæssige og grundig dokumentation samt publicering udgør vigtige grundprincipper.
English: The motives were as much scientific as educational and both thorough documentation and publication constitute important basic principles.

Danish: Støbeform til både kors og torshamre.
English: The mould used to cast both crosses and Thor's hammers.

Danish: Skabelonens form beskriver den linie, der følger de inderste overkanter af de klinklagte bordplanker.
English: The mould's form shows the line that follows the inner edge of the clinker-built strakes.

Danish: Skabelonerne er stivet godt af med tømmer på kryds og tværs, så de ikke kan bevæge sig, når bordplankerne bliver spændt op imod.
English: The moulds are well supported with timbers, so that they won't move when the strakes are set fast against them.

Danish: Skabelonerne og dermed formen, er taget fra den gamle jolle, som blev ødelagt ved et uheld.
English: The moulds, and therefore also the final shape, are taken from an old dinghy, which was damaged in an accident.

Danish: De viste, at båden under disse forhold kan betragtes som et stift legeme.
English: The movements were documented on video but proved that the boat under these conditions can be considered as a stiff body.

Danish: Hør hvilke indtryk Havhingsten efterlader hos direktør Patrick F. Wallace
English: The movie gives a good impression of the work with tar, painting and ballasting of the skip.

Danish: Museet udlånte derudover Havhingstens første sejl til ophængning over det imponerende langskib Roskilde 6 samt et rekonstrueret Gokstadskjold til hovedudstillingen Die Wikinger.
English: The Museum also loaned out Sea Stallion's original sail, which was suspended over the impressive longship, Roskilde 6, as well as a reconstruction of the Gokstad shield, which was displayed in the main exhibition, Die Wikinger.

Danish: Museet arbejder overalt med et højt fagligt niveau, og tilstræber en stadig kompetenceudvikling.
English: The museum always works at a high professional level and strives to constantly develop its competency.

Danish: Museet arbejder overalt med en æstetisk bevidsthed, møder omverdenen med en sammenhængende grafisk profil.
English: The museum always works with an aesthetic awareness and meets the outside world with a coherent graphical profile.

Danish: Museet og dets medarbejdere var venlige, hjælpsomme og entusiastiske omkring vores besøg,” fortæller John Robetson.
English: The museum and its staff were friendly, helpful and enthusiastic about us being there,” John Robertson says.

Danish: Museet skabte et samspil mellem den historiske og arkæologiske viden og den moderne og folkelige fortolkning - men åbnede også for, at publikum kunne danne deres egne fortolkninger og billeder.
English: The museum created an interplay between historical and archaeological knowledge and the more modern and popular interpretation, while also allowing the audience to develop their own interpretations and images.

Danish: Museet skaber sammenhænge og kulturhistorisk perspektiv.
English: The museum creates coherence and cultural-historical perspective.

Danish: Udenfor hver deltagers rækkevidde lægges en knogle.
English: The museum guides will help you get startet.

Danish: Museumshavnen rummer den store samling af traditionelle nordiske træbåde og rekonstruerede vikingeskibe, der giver et billede af hvordan originalskibene så ud for 1000 år siden.
English: The Museum Harbour holds the the large collection of traditional Nordic wooden boats and the reconstructed Viking ships, which provide an image of how the original ships looked 1,000 years ago.

Danish: Museet har en plan
English: The Museum has a plan

Danish: Museet har mange dygtige håndværkere, der har forfinet de processer, som traditionelt maritimt håndværk indebærer.
English: The Museum has a skilled team of craft specialists who have mastered the processes involved in traditional, maritime craftwork.

Danish: Museet vil løbende have behov for at tage billeder af bådsamlingen, og vil i den forbindelse have ophavsretten til disse billeder.
English: The Museum has an ongoing need for taking photos of the boat collection and owns the copyright to these images.

Danish: Museet har ansøgt Søfartsstyrelsen om tilladelse til at leje prammene ud og når tilladelsen kommer, vil det være muligt at prøve kræfter med den ædle kunst at ro en båd.
English: The museum has applied to the Danish Maritime Authority for permission to hire out the prams and when permission is obtained, you will be able to test your skills in the noble art of rowing a boat.

Danish: Museet har samlet medlemmer fra to af Irlands supergrupper, med Mairéad Ní Mhaonaigh (Altan) og Muireann Nic Amhlaoibh (Danú) på vokal, violin og fløjte, og Benny Mc Carthy og Dónal Clancy fra Danú på akkordion og guitar.
English: The museum has gathered members from two of Ireland’s super groups, with Mairéad Ní Mhaonaigh (Altan) and Muireann Nic Amhlaoibh (Danú) on vocals, violin and flute, and Benny Mc Carthy and Dónal Clancy from Danú on the accordion and guitar.

Danish: Først på året åbnede museet en online-version af den levende bådsamling.
English: The museum has therefore today opened an on-line version of the living boat collection.

Danish: Museet håber at fotokonkurrencen vil få endnu flere til at lægge vejen forbi Havhingstens sejlrute gennem Danmark, for at nyde det fantastiske syn.
English: The Museum hopes that the photo competition will get even more people to follow the Sea Stallion's voyage across Denmark and enjoy the fantastic sight.

Danish: Dermed er museet i Roskilde gået en helt særlig og enestående vej.
English: The museum in Roskilde has chosen a very special and unique approach.

Danish: Og museet er således allerede i gang med at formulere nye visioner og perspektiver for den marin-arkæologiske forskning og fortællingen om mennesket, skibet og havet.
English: The museum is already engaged in formulating new visions and perspectives for the marine archaeological research and narrative on the person, the ship and the sea.

Danish: Museet er en arena for kollektiv erindring.
English: The museum is an arena for collective experience.

Danish: Museet er åbent
English: The museum is open

Danish: Vikingeskibsmuseet holder åbent i dagene mellem jul og nytår - den 26. til den 30. december - med rundvisninger til…
English: The Museum is open between Christmas and New Year from 26 to 30 December.

Danish: Museet bygger i øjeblikket to såkaldte Fejø-pramme.
English: The museum is presently constructing two so-called Fejø-prams.

Danish: Som det eneste sted i verden, kan du gå direkte fra oplevelsen af originale 1000-år gamle vikingeskibe ud til Museumshavnen, hvor vikingeskibsrekonstruktioer i fuld størrelse ligger fortøjet.
English: The Museum is the only place in the world where you can experience seeing 1000-year-old Viking ships, and then go directly out to the Museum harbour, where the full-scale reconstructed Viking ships lie moored at the quayside.

Danish: Som det eneste sted i verden, kan du gå direkte fra oplevelsen af originale 1000-år gamle vikingeskibe ud til Museumshavnen, hvor vikingeskibsrekonstruktioner i fuld størrelse ligger fortøjet.
English: The Museum is the only place in the world where you can experience seeing 1000-year-old Viking ships, and then go directly out to the Museum harbour, where the full-scale reconstructed Viking ships lie moored at the quayside.

Danish: På Museumsøen ligger havnen, bådeværftet og Tunet - vikingernes mødested - hvor man også finder Café Knarr.
English: The Museum Island contains the harbour, the boatyard and "Tunet" - the meeting place of the Vikings - where you will also find Café knarr.

Danish: Foråret er kommet: Museet søsætter bådsamlingen!
English: The museum launches its boat collection!

Danish: Museet skal endvidere samarbejde med andre kulturinstitutioner og inddrage flere kulturelle og kunstneriske udtryk, der åbner for sammensatte oplevelser og erkendelser, og sætter fantasien fri.
English: The museum must also cooperate with other cultural institutions and involve other cultural and artistic forms of expression that allow for composite experiences and acknowledgements that set the fantasy free.

Danish: Museet skal være en faktor i den aktuelle kulturdebat, og skal med sit nutidige udgangspunkt sætte aktuelle problemstillinger i perspektiv, hvor det er muligt og naturligt.
English: The museum must be a factor in the current cultural debate and it should use its present perspective to put current problems in perspective, wherever it is possible and natural.

Danish: Museet skal være venligt og imødekommende, og skal tilbyde høj service, god tilgængelighed og tidssvarende publikumsfaciliteter.
English: The museum must be friendly and welcoming and should provide a high level of service, good accessibility and modern public facilities.

Danish: Museet skal besidde en specialkompetence inden for rekonstruktion og traditionelle maritime håndværk.
English: The museum must possess a specialist competency within reconstruction and traditional maritime craftsmanship.

Danish: Museet skal møde sine gæster med åbenhed og tillid, og skal søge at underbygge oplevelsen af medansvar hos den enkelte gennem tydelig information, tilrettevisning og personlig kontakt, snarere end gennem forbudsskilte og overvågning.
English: The museum must welcome its visitors with openness and trust and should try to support the experience of shared responsibility in the individual guest through clear information, accessibility and the facilitating of personal contact, rather than through warning signs and surveillance.

Danish: Museet har i dag en samling af mere end 35 fartøjer, fra rekonstruktioner af de fem Skuldelevskibe, til færøske fiskerbåde og andre brugsbåde fra Skandinavien.
English: The Museum now has a collection of over 35 craft, ranging from reconstructions of the five Skuldelev Ships to traditional Færoese fishing boats and other Scandinavian working craft.

Danish: Museet tilbyder et fagligt kompetent grundlag for, at den enkelte kan forstå sig selv og sin omverden som deltagere i en historisk proces, hvor fortidsfortolkning, samtidsforståelse og fremtidsforventning spiller sammen.
English: The museum offers a professionally competent basis for the individual person to understand themselves and their surroundings as participants in an historical process, where interpreting the past, understanding the present and anticipating the future all interact.

Danish: Irlands Præsident besøger Vikingeskibsmuseet
English: The museum opens a Web TV station

Danish: Museet slår dørene op for ny sæson
English: The museum opens its doors for a new season

Danish: Museet har ophavsret til de resultater, du som laugsmedlem er med til at skabe, når du deltager i formidlings- eller forskningsarbejde omkring bådsamlingen.
English: The museum owns the copyright to the results that arise from the participation of the guilds in dissemination or research work in connection with the boat collection.

Danish: Museet besidder en specialkompetence, som til stadighed skal udvikles og gøres tilgængelig.
English: The museum possesses a specialised competency that should be continuously developed and made available.

Danish: Museet præsenterer kultur som en mangfoldighed af livsformer og værdibegreber.
English: The museum presents culture as a diversity of ways of life and value concepts.

Danish: Tøjet findes til både børn og voksne og er fremstillet af uld, hør, silke, mv.
English: The Museum publishes its own broad range of literature within the field of Nordic ship traditions.

Danish: Museet tager vare på den immaterielle kulturarv, der er repræsenteret i de traditionelle maritime håndværk.
English: The museum safeguards the intangible cultural inheritance that is represented in the traditional maritime crafts.

Danish: Museet skal selv varetage bådebygning og rebslagning, og skal indgå i netværk med håndværkere fra andre relevante fag.
English: The museum shall carry out boatbuilding and rope making itself, and shall also participate in networks with craftsmen from other relevant professions.

Danish: Museet skal sikre at arkiver, bibliotek og andet forskningsmateriale er tilgængeligt.
English: The museum shall ensure that the archives, library and other research material ate made available.

Danish: Museet skal bevare og fremme sin særlige status inden for rekonstruktion og eksperimentalarkæologi.
English: The museum shall maintain and promote its special status within reconstruction and experimental archaeology.

Danish: Museet skal derfor kombinere den traditionelle museumsformidling med tilbud om sejlads på fjorden, aktiviteter på land og mulighed for personlig kontakt med museets personale.
English: The museum shall therefore combine the traditional museum's mode of communication with offers of sailing in the fjord, activities on land and opportunities for personal contact with the staff at the museum.

Danish: Museet skal derfor kombinere den traditionelle museumsformidling med tilbud om sejlads på fjorden, aktiviteter på land og mulighed for personlig kontakt med museets personale.
English: The museum shall therefore combine the traditional museum’s mode of communication with offers of sailing in the fjord, activities on land and opportunities for personal contact with the staff at the museum.

Danish: Museet skal tage initiativer, der kan øge den offentlige bevidsthed om kulturarven på havbunden.
English: The museum shall undertake initiatives that can increase public awareness of cultural heritage and the seabed.

Danish: Museet skal arbejde med et udvidet museumsbegreb, der på én gang tager udgangspunkt i museets identitet som kulturhistorisk specialmuseum, og samtidig forholder sig bevidst til, at mennesker oplever og orienterer sig i verden gennem brug af mange sanser.
English: The museum shall work with an expanded museum concept that is simultaneously based on the museum's identity as a specialised, history of culture museum and is also conscious of the fact that people perceive and orientate themselves in the world through the use of their different senses.

Danish: Museumsbutikken bruger desuden DIBS (Dansk Internet Betalings System), hvilket sikrer, at din betaling med dankort og kreditkort er sikkert og certificeret af PBS (Pengeinstitutternes Betalings Systemer).
English: The Museum shop also uses DIBS (Danish Internet Payment System), which ensures that your payments with Dankort and credit card are secure and certified by PBS (Pengeinstitutternes Betalings Systemer).

Danish: Museumsbutikken garanterer, at det er sikkert at handle online hos os.
English: The Museum Shop guarantees that it is secure to shop online with us.

Danish: Museet skal have en aktiv publikationspraksis, og skal bidrage til uddannelsen af fremtidens forskere.
English: The museum should have an active publication practice and should contribute to the training of future researchers.

Danish: Museet tilstræber tilgængelighed, imødekommenhed og gennemsigtighed.
English: The museum strives for accessibility, courtesy and transparency.

Danish: Dernæst fik museet kontakt med firmaet Olsen Design Aps. i Skærbæk, som allerede var i gang med praktiske forsøg på at udvikle en moderne, ikke-miljødestruktiv bundmaling, der kunne beskyttede træskibe mod pæleorm.
English: The museum then came into contact with the firm of Olsen Design Aps in Skærbæk who were already involved in carrying out practical attempts to develop a modern non-environmentally damaging bottom paint that could protect wooden ships against shipworms.

Danish: Museet engagerede i stedet en gruppe unge, der to år tidligere havde bygget Imme Skinfaxe - en rekonstruktion af Skuldelev 3 i 9/10 størrelse.
English: The museum therefore engaged a group of young people who, two years earlier, built Imme Skinfaxe, a 9:10 scale reconstruction of Skuldelev 3.

Danish: Museet benyttede derfor lejligheden til at invitere Havhingstens besætning og de nærmeste samarbejdspartnere fra projekt "Fuldblod på Havet" til en reception, hvor præsidenten fik rig mulighed for at tale med blandt andet skipper Carsten Hvid.
English: The museum therefore used this opportunity to invite the Sea Stallion's crew and the closest collaborators from the project “Thoroughbred of the Sea” to a reception, where the president was given ample opportunity to talk with e.g. skipper Carsten Hvid.

Danish: Museet benyttede derfor lejligheden til at invitere Havhingstens besætning og de nærmeste samarbejdspartnere fra projekt "Fuldblod på Havet" til en reception, hvor præsidenten fik rig mulighed for at tale med blandt andet skipper Carsten Hvid.
English: The museum therefore used this opportunity to invite the Sea Stallion’s crew and the closest collaborators from the project “Thoroughbred of the Sea” to a reception, where the president was given ample opportunity to talk with e.g. skipper Carsten Hvid.

Danish: Museet ønsker at skabe historiefortælling fyldt med sanselige indtryk.
English: The museum wish to create storytelling filled with sense-based impressions.

Danish: Museet virker inden for sit område gennem indsamling, registrering, forskning, bevaring, udstilling og anden formidling af relevant arkæologisk, historisk og etnologisk materiale.
English: The museum works in its field through collecting, registering, researching, restoring, exhibiting and other communication of relevant, archaeological, historical and ethnological material.

Danish: Museet vil kunne kvalificere de eksisterende data, og afklare detaljer - men set fra et helt overordnet synspunkt, vil man på nuværende tidspunkt få større forskningsmæssigt udbytte af at gennemføre forsøg med de rekonstruktioner, der ikke er så godt dokumenterede.
English: The museum would be able to qualify the existing data and clarify details, but seen from a more general perspective, more important research results can be achieved at present by carry out experiments with the reconstructions that are not as well documented.

Danish: Museets bestyrelse sammensættes og udpeges som følger:
English: The Museum's board of directors is composed of:

Danish: På værftspladsen er museets bådebyggere i fuld sving med at bygge et nyt skib.
English: The museum's builders are in full swing building a new ship at the boat yard.

Danish: I museets biograf vises en film om skibet og hvordan det sejles.
English: The museum's cinema is showing a film about the ship and how it is operated.

Danish: Museets håndværkere og marinarkæologer trak i waders og dykkerdragter, og kæmpede mod det stigende vand.
English: The museum's craftsmen and marine archaeologists pulled on waders and diving suits and fought against the rising water.

Danish: Museets udstillinger er moderne historiefortællinger om vikingerne og deres skibe.
English: The museum's exhibitions are modern historical narratives about the Vikings and their ships.

Danish: Museets udstillinger er moderne historiefortællinger om vikingerne og deres skibe.
English: The museum's exhibitions are modern storytelling about the Vikings and their ships

Danish: Museets erfarne formidlere åbner skibskisterne og fremviser sværd, hjelm, ringbrynje, økser, hvalrostand og fortæller om vikingernes liv og togter.
English: The Museum's experienced guides open the ship's chests and display swords, helmets, chain mail, axes and walrus teeth and explain all about Viking life and voyages.

Danish: Museets formidlere viser rundt og fortæller om materialer, værktøj og håndværket.
English: The Museum's guides will show you around and tell all about the materials, tools and techniques of the their craft.

Danish: Museets originale råsejlriggede nordlandsottring Rana fra ca. 1892 blev gjort til genstand for en længere række sejladser i Roskilde Fjords ydre bredning nord for Elleore.
English: The museum's original square sail rigged Nordland fishing vessel Rana from about 1892 became the subject of a long series of voyages in the broad outer part of Roskilde Fjord, north of Elleore.

Danish: Til Udstillingsteamet hører museets fotograf og grafiker samt billedarkivet og museumsarkivet.
English: The museum's photographer and graphic designer as well as the picture library and the museum archives are connected to the Exhibitions team.

Danish: Museets reblægger, Carsten Hvid, vil fremstille reb af lindebast, hestehår, sælskind og uld til Gislingebådens rig.
English: The Museum's rope maker, Carsten Hvid, will produce ropes made from lime bast, horsehair, seal skin and wool for the Gislinge boat's rig.

Danish: Museets rebslager har et fast værksted på museumsøen, men kan ofte også findes rundt omkring i museets havn, i gang med at reparerer tovværk på de mange både og skibe, der ligger der.
English: The Museum's ropemaker has a permanent workshop on the Museum Island, but can often also be found working on the various ships and boats around the Museum Harbour.

Danish: I forvejen går museets skibe jævnligt på sommertogt i bådelaugenes regi.
English: The museum's ships already sail regular summer cruises under the auspices of the Museum's Boat Guilds.

Danish: Museets væver, Anna Nørgaard, er i gang med at fremstille et sejl af hør til Gislingebåden.
English: The Museum's weaver Anna Nørgaard, has begun working on a sail of flax for the Gislinge boat.

Danish: Museets væver vil fremstille det ene af panelerne på en opretstående vægtvæv, de fire andre paneler bliver vævet af vævere fra Instituttet for Blinde og Svagtseende.
English: The Museum's weaver will produce one of the panels; the other four panels are being woven by weavers from the Institute for the Blind and Partially Sighted.

Danish: Museets flagskib Havhingsten, vil sejle ud for første gang siden skibet returnerede fra Irland for præcist et år siden.
English: The museums flagship, the Sea Stallion, will set sail for the first time since the ship returned from Ireland exactly one year ago.

Danish: Når museerne nu har besluttet, at foretage registrerende undersøgelser på vraget, skal det ses i lyset af, at der i den seneste tid er modtaget gentagne anmeldelser af ulovlige dykninger på skibet.
English: The museums have decided to conduct registration studies on the wreck now because numerous reports have been received recently of illegal dives on the ship.

Danish: Museets udgangspunkt er nutidigt; historien bringes op i nutiden, ikke omvendt.
English: The museum’s basis is the present; history is related to the present, not the other way around.

Danish: I museets biograf vises en film om skibet og hvordan det sejles.
English: The museum’s cinema is showing a film about the ship and how it is operated.

Danish: Museets erfarne formidlere åbner skibskisterne og fremviser sværd, hjelm, ringbrynje, økser, hvalrostand og fortæller om vikingernes liv og togter.
English: The Museum’s experienced guides open the ship’s chests and display swords, helmets, chain mail, axes and walrus teeth and explain all about Viking life and voyages.

Danish: Museets formidlere viser rundt og fortæller om materialer, værktøj og håndværket.
English: The Museum’s guides will show you around and tell all about the materials, tools and techniques of the their craft.

Danish: Museets originale råsejlriggede nordlandsottring Rana fra ca. 1892 blev gjort til genstand for en længere række sejladser i Roskilde Fjords ydre bredning nord for Elleore.
English: The museum’s original square sail rigged Nordland fishing vessel Rana from about 1892 became the subject of a long series of voyages in the broad outer part of Roskilde Fjord, north of Elleore.

Danish: Museets rebslager har et fast værksted på museumsøen, men kan ofte også findes rundt omkring i museets havn, i gang med at reparerer tovværk på de mange både og skibe, der ligger der.
English: The Museum’s ropemaker has a permanent workshop on the Museum Island, but can often also be found working on the various ships and boats around the Museum Harbour.

Danish: Museets væver vil fremstille det ene af panelerne på en opretstående vægtvæv, de fire andre paneler bliver vævet af vævere fra Instituttet for Blinde og Svagtseende.
English: The Museum’s weaver will produce one of the panels; the other four panels are being woven by weavers from the Institute for the Blind and Partially Sighted.

Danish: Filmen har musik af Palle Mikkelborg, der er tilrettelagt af Niels Arild, Arildlyd.
English: The music for the film is by Palle Mikkelborg and is arranged by Niels Arild from Arildlyd.

Danish: Musikken var komponeret af en anden af Irlands berømte sønner, Shaun Davey og blev fremført af orkestret An Garda Síochána.
English: The music was by another great son of Ireland Shaun Davey og was presented by the An Garda Síochána orchestre.

Danish: Det gådefulde spidsvåben
English: The mysterious pointed weapon

Danish: Legenden om Sigurd
English: The myth of Sigurd

Danish: Historien om Sigurd fortælles på dette trækors.
English: The myth of Sigurd is portraied on this cross.

Danish: Vikingetidens mytiske fortællinger taler til et stort og mangfoldigt publikum.
English: The mythical tales from the Viking Age appeal to a large and varied audience.

Danish: Navnet dragespænde stammer fra formen på spændets hoved, som er fæstet til nålen ved hjælp af et hængsel.
English: The name kite-brooch derives from the shape of the head of the brooch, which is attached to the pin by a hinged tag.

Danish: Ole Crumlin-Pedersens navn er uløseligt forbundet med dem, med udviklingen af dansk marinarkæologi og med Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde.
English: The name Ole Crumlin-Pedersen is inherent in them, and with the development of maritime archaeology and the Viking Ship Museum in Roskilde.

Danish: Navnet "Scattery" er en oldnordisk omdannelse af det irske Inis Cathaig.
English: The name Scattery is an Old Norse re-formation of the Irish Inis Cathaig.

Danish: Navnet Waterford er afledt af det oldnordiske ord for vindblæst eller vindomsust fjord.
English: The name Waterford is derived from the Old Norse word for ram fjord or windy fjord.

Danish: Beretningen begynder sådan:
English: The narrative begins with these words:

Danish: Snævre bælter og sunde, mange lavvandede områder, samt hård vind, høje bølger og militære konflikter har ført til mange skibsforlis.
English: The narrow channels and sounds coupled with the many areas of shallow water, the often hard winds and high waves and frequent military conflict have all contributed to the loss of numerous ships.

Danish: Nationalbanken meddeler, at den kommende 100-, 200, 500 og 1000-kroneseddel også vil have Skuldelev 3 som motiv.
English: The National Bank of Denmark has announced that the coming DKK 100, 200, 500 and 1,000 notes will also have Skuldelev 3 as their motif.

Danish: 8. august 2008 udsendte Nationalbanken en ny 20-kronemønt med vikingeskibet Havhingsten fra Glendalough som motiv.
English: The National Bank of Denmark issued a new DKK 20 coin on 8 August 2008 with the Viking ship Sea Stallion from Glendalough as a motif.

Danish: Nationalbankens nye seddel-serie, som i de kommende år bliver sendt i omløb, har påtrykt to billedtemaer.
English: The National Bank of Denmark's new notes, which will come into circulation in the coming years, have two picture themes printed on them.

Danish: På Nationalmuseet i Dublin er der udstillet en række økser og smykker fra vikingetid, som Vikingeskibsmuseet nu vil kræve tilbage til Danmark.
English: The National Museum in Dublin displays a number of axes and jewellery from the Viking Age, which the Viking Ship Museum now will claim to come back to Denmark.

Danish: Nationalmuseet i Dublin åbner en udstilling om projektet den 28. juni, umiddelbart før skibets afrejse fra Roskilde.
English: The National Museum in Dublin opens an exhibition on the project on June 28, shortly before the ship’s departure from Roskilde.

Danish: National Museets skoletjeneste forestod en præsentation af vikingetiden i Irland, hvor børnene selv havde meget viden at byde ind med.
English: The National Museum's Schools' Service gave a presentation of the Viking Age in Ireland, on which the children had a lot to contribute.

Danish: Flyvertaktisk Kommandos redningshelikopter U-278 gør klar til at sende læge og reder ned på Havhingsten.
English: The Naval Command rescue helicopter U-278 is getting reading to lower down a medic and doctor on the Sea Stallion.

Danish: Martin ved navigationskassen med GPS, kortplodder, VHF radio ect.
English: The navigation box with GPS, VHF Radio and more.

Danish: Skibets navigationsinstrumenter måler undervejs og gemmer elektronisk følgende samtidige data:
English: The navigation equipment on board will continuously record and electronically save the following data:

Danish: Halskæden er dateret til 900-tallet og består af 73 perler i glas og rav.
English: The necklace dates to late 900 AD and consist of 73 beads of glass and amber.

Danish: Den nye båd får en indenbords motor, men bliver ellers bygget og indrettet som de gamle kvaser.
English: The new boat was fitted with an inboard engine, but was otherwise built and fitted out like the old drifters.

Danish: Den nye båd får en indenbords motor, men bliver ellers bygget og indrettet som de gamle kvaser.
English: The new boat will have an onboard motor, but will otherwise be built and arranged like the old smacks.

Danish: Den nye bro kommer til at krydse et område, hvor der tidligere er gjort opsigtsvækkende fund, og derfor er der helt rutinemæssigt igangsat omfattende Marinarkæologiske undersøgelser i det berørte område.
English: The new bridge will cross an area where important finds have been made previously, and it is therefore routine that the maritime archaeological investigations will take place in the affected area.

Danish: Den nye byggeri åbner for andre tolkninger af originalskibet og inviterer museets gæster til at følge bådebyggerne arbejde på helt tæt hold".
English: The new construction will allow for other interpretations of the original ship, and will invite the visitors to the museum to follow the boat builders’ work up close.”

Danish: Ny besætning er ankommet
English: The new crew members have arrived

Danish: Den nye 50-kroneseddel blev udsendt den 11. august 2009 med motiv af af Sallingsundbroen og Skarpsalling-karret.
English: The new DKK 50 note was issued 11 August 2009 with images of the Sallingsund Bridge and the Skarpsalling clay pot.

Danish: Den nye placering af samlingen betød, at den blev brugt mere, og den øgede brug gav øget slid og flere skader, der skulle repareres.
English: The new location of the collection meant it was used more, and this increased use led to more wear and tear and damage needing repaired.

Danish: Den nye rekonstruktion dannede en bovbølge og dirigerede vandet under skibet, hvilket fik forskibet til at løfte sig ved fartøgning.
English: The new model created bow water that guided the flow under the hull, which made the bow lift when gaining speed.

Danish: Den nye organisation er direkte foranlediget af besparelser på budget 2011.
English: The new organization is the direct result of savings in the 2011 budget.

Danish: Imellem bordene er der ikke kalfatret, de er høvlet sammen, så jollen bliver vandtæt.
English: The new owner provided champagne when the dinghy was delivered.

Danish: Den nye rekonstruktion af Osebergskibet har mere hult indløb i forskibet med stævnen løftet højere overe vandet.
English: The new reconstruction of the Oseberg ship has a more concave cross-section in the bow area with its stem lifted a little more out of the water.

Danish: Den nye rekonstruktion bygges med de oprindelige seks bordgange.
English: The new reconstruction shall be built with the original six strakes.

Danish: Den nye rekonstruktion blev søsat 2012, og er navngivet Saga Oseberg.
English: The new reconstruction was launched in 2012, and named Saga Oseberg.

Danish: Hjemmesidens nye struktur og det grundlæggende indhold forventes at være tilrettelagt og implementeret den 1. juni 2007.
English: The new setup and basic content is expected to be arranged and implemented by the 1st of June 2007.

Danish: Hjemmesidens nye struktur vil bl.a. omfatte en formidling af:
English: The new structure of the homepage will include the communication of:

Danish: Den nye vidje der sidder på skibet nu, har holdt siden Portsmouth, 695 sømil og 9 sejldøgn gammel.
English: The new tackle, which is still on the ship now, has held since Portsmouth, 695 nautical miles and 9 sailing days old.

Danish: De nye byer
English: The new towns

Danish: De købte mad af bønderne, der boede på jorderne uden for byen.
English: The new towns often lay centrally and strategically located within a kingdom or region of the country.

Danish: Det Ny Vikingegilde på Samsø er et generøst samarbejde
English: The New Viking Feast on Samsø is a generous collaboration

Danish: Nyheden blev lanceret i Radio Orkney, som hver morgen sender en halv times udsendelse på BBC's Radio Skotland.
English: The news was aired on Radio Orkney, which broadcasts a half-an-hour show on BBC's Radio Scotland every morning.

Danish: De næste fire uger vl blive brugt på at gøre skibet klar til sejladsen hjem til Roskilde.
English: The next four weeks will be spent getting the ship ready for the voyage home to Roskilde.

Danish: De næste langskibe dukkede op i undersøgelserne af søspærringen i Roskilde Fjord, ved byen Skuldelev, fra 1957 til 1962.
English: The next longship turned up during the investigations of the marine barrage at Skuldelev from 1957 to 1962.

Danish: Næste morgen vågnede vi til silende regn.
English: The next morning we woke up to pouring rain.

Danish: En lidt mere mat besætning mødte op næste morgen og tog til Glendalough i Wicklow.
English: The next morning, a bit more tired, the crew entered the busses heading for Glendalough in Wicklow.

Danish: De næste spørgsmål om riggens størrelse og udformning, besætningens håndteringen af skibet, og skibets sejlegenskaber bliver forhåbentlig besvaret her..
English: The next questions about the size and design of the rigging, the crew's handling of the ship and the ship's sailing quality will hopefully be answered here.

Danish: Næste skridt var en rejse i vikingernes kølvand for at afprøve rekonstruktionen.
English: The next step in the experiment was a voyage in the wake of the vikings to test the reconstruction.

Danish: Næste skridt var en rejse i vikingernes kølvand for at afprøve rekonstruktionen.
English: The next step was a voyage in the spirit of the Vikings to test the reconstruction.

Danish: Næste stop er i den smukke 'Historischer Hafen' med de mange gamle flodbåde.
English: The next stop is the beautiful 'Historic Harbour' with its many old naval ships.

Danish: Natkassen
English: The Night box

Danish: Natkassen var fuld af tørret røget oksekød, svinekød og lammekød.
English: The night boxes were filled with dried and smoked pork, beef and lam.

Danish: Stormændenes stærkeste mænd udfordrede hinanden til manddomskampe og styrkeprøver.
English: The nobles’ strongest men challenged each other to tests of manhood and trials of strength.

Danish: Lydniveauet er højt som en dansk skoleklasse i selvsving.
English: The noise level is as high as a Danish school class in overdrive.

Danish: Nordea Danmark-fonden donerer 3 millioner kr. til Havhingsten
English: The Nordea Denmark Foundation donates DKK 3 million to the Sea Stallion

Danish: I år har Nordea Fonden garanteret økonomien, siger Carsten Hvid.
English: The Nordea Foundation gave us the wherewithal this year, says Carsten Hvid.

Danish: Den nordiske båd - museets samling af traditionelle klinkbyggede både
English: The Nordic boat - our collection of traditional clinker builted boats

Danish: Den nordiske båd – museets samling af traditionelle klinkbyggede både
English: The Nordic boat - our collection of traditional clinker builted boats

Danish: Det Nordiske skib - færøbåden
English: The Nordic Ship - The Faroe Boat

Danish: Nordlandsbåden Rana er den ældste båd i samlingen og blev bygget i 1892.
English: The Nordland boat, Rana, is the oldest boat in the collection and was built in 1892.

Danish: Endelig - Nordsøen!
English: The North Sea at last!

Danish: Og de norske besætningsmedlemmer på Havhingsten fik råbt et tillykke til deres dronning, som fyldte 70 år i går.
English: The norwegian crew members on board the Sea Stallion congratulated their queen who turned 70 yesterday.

Danish: Det norske Gokstadskib under udgravning i 1880.
English: The Norwegian Gokstad ship during excavation in 1880.

Danish: Gulatingloven fra Norge fortæller, at kongen valgte en styrmand, og at styrmanden valgte besætningen.
English: The Norwegian Gulating Law, dating from the 12th and 13th century, relates that the King would appoint a coxswain.

Danish: De norske vikingeskibsfund, Osebergskibet og Gokstadskibet, er kun henholdsvis 22 og 24 meter lange.
English: The Norwegian Viking finds, the Oseberg and Gokstad ships, are "only" 22 m and 24 m long respectively.

Danish: Den norskfødte kaptajn Ivar Huitfeldt besluttede at kaste anker for at undgå at drive ned i den øvrige del af flåden, og han fortsatte beskydningen af de svenske skibe.
English: The Norwegian-born captain, Ivar Huitfeldt, decided to drop anchor in order to avoid running into the rest of the fleet, and he continued firing on the Swedish ships.

Danish: Selve antallet af perler på kæden og perlernes forskellighed gør fundet til et af de mest imponerende smykkefund nogensinde.
English: The number of beads on the necklace and the variety of them makes this one of the most impressive jewellery finds ever.

Danish: Antallet af årer er derimod formodentligt det samme, i alt 60.
English: The number of oars is, however, the same - 60 in total.

Danish: Antallet af årer er derimod formodentligt det samme, i alt 60.
English: The number of oars is, however, the same – 60 in total.

Danish: Under roning undervejs registreres altid i logbogen antallet af roere.
English: The number of oarsmen in action will be recorded whenever the ship is rowed.

Danish: Der er mellem 12 og 16 pladser i båden, og der er begrænsede pladser til børn.
English: The number of seats on the first sailing is from 12 to 16 seats.

Danish: Antallet af byer tiltager støt med tre til fire hvert halve århundrede indtil 1200, fulgt af en pludselig stigning fra 19 til 47 mellem 1200 og 1250; af dem er tre fjerdedele havnebyer.
English: The number of towns continually increases by three to four towns per half century until 1200, followed by a sudden rise from 19 to 47 towns from 1200 to 1250, three quarters of which had access to navigable waters.

Danish: Til behandling har sygeplejersken en kasse med medicin og en kasse med instrumenter til alvorligere skader.
English: The nurse has a chest with medicine and another chest with equipment for treating more serious injuries.

Danish: Til gengæld er hun mere bekymret for alvorlige tilfælde, som for eksempel hvis en gast ude på åbent hav får en blodprop.
English: The nurse is more worried about serious cases, like a crew members suffering a blood clot on open sea for example.

Danish: Sygeplejersken Susanne lægger forbinding om håndleddet på et besætningsmedlem.
English: The nurse Susanne bandaging the wrist of a crew member.

Danish: Skibets officielle sygedagbog føres som en journal over besætningens sundhed og sygdom, og fungerer som et redskab i sygeplejerskens væsentligste opgave ombord: At identificere, helbrede og lindre sygdom samt at hindre smittespredning i besætningen.
English: The nurse's log will journalise the crew's health and well-being, and will be an invaluable help in solving the nurse's principal task on board - diagnosing, relieving and curing sickness and preventing its spread among crew members.

Danish: Stammen begyndte 'at snakke' mere og mere, og man kunne høre fibrene flække, dybt ind i stammens kerne.
English: The oak began to ‘talk' more and more as you could hear the fibres giving way within the trunk.

Danish: Stammen begyndte ’at snakke’ mere og mere, og man kunne høre fibrene flække, dybt ind i stammens kerne.
English: The oak began to ‘talk’ more and more as you could hear the fibres giving way within the trunk.

Danish: Egekævlen er kløvet i halvdele, kvarte, ottendedele og sekstendedele.
English: The oak log is cleaved in halves, quarters, eighths and sixteenths.

Danish: Af egekævlen skal vi have køl, stævne og bordplanker.
English: The oak log must provide the keel, stem and strakes.

Danish: Her voksede egen nemlig kun i begrænset omfang i den sydlige del af landet, mens netop fyrren var det dominerende skibsbygningstræ længere nordpå.
English: The oak only grew in a limited area in the southern part of that country, while pine was the dominant timber for shipbuilding further north.

Danish: Egetræsbordet har fået ca. 10 minutter i svedekisten, før det sættes på.
English: The oak plank has had approximately 10 minutes in the steam chest before it is set in place.

Danish: Den egestamme, hvoraf kølsvinet er tilhugget, er fældet i sommeren 1042, og skibet er derfor formentlig søsat senere dette år.
English: The oak trunk from which the keelson has been shaped was felled in May-June 1042, and the ship was therefore probably launched later that year.

Danish: Egestammen blev fældet tidligere i år i Jægersborg Hegn.
English: The oak was felled earlier this year in Jægersborg Hegn

Danish: Her ligger åren i kejpen når der roes og humlebåndet fastholder åren når det trækkes tilbage til et nyt åretag, eller når der skoddes -bakkes med årene.
English: The oar is placed against the oar lock when rowing and the band secures the oar when it pulled back for a new stroke or when backing water.

Danish: De surres fast med enebærvidjer.
English: The oar lock is also lashed in place using withies.

Danish: Kejperne er, ligesom det resterende tømmer i båden, lavet af et formgroet stykke egetræ.
English: The oar locks in the Gislinge boat are made of crooked oak: a log with a laterally branch.

Danish: Kejperne i Gislingebåden er, ligesom det resterende tømmer i båden, lavet af et formgroet stykke egetræ.
English: The oar locks in the Gislinge boat are made of crooked oak: a log with a laterally branch.

Danish: Årehullerne blev derfor lukket med små træplader, og nye årehuller skåret ved siden af.
English: The oarports was closed with small wooden plates and new ones were carved right next to.

Danish: Generelt får vores åre ikke høje karaktere.
English: The oars are low graded in general.

Danish: Årerne er hovedfremdrivningsmidlet i al slags vejr.
English: The oars are the main means of propulsion in all kinds of weather.

Danish: Årerne er hovedfremdrivningssmidlet i al slags vejr.
English: The oars are the main means of propulsion in all kinds of weather.

Danish: Årerne ligger klar
English: The oars lie ready.

Danish: Stykket er givetvis kommet til findestedet med materiale opgrabbet i den nærliggende Gilleleje Havn.
English: The object probably arrived at the find location with material scooped up in nearby Gilleleje Harbour.

Danish: Den genstand, der af Thorvildsen blev opfattet som en pisk, må på baggrund af arkæologiske fund og afbildninger af lignende stykker snarest betegnes som en stav anvendt som symbol på magt og værdighed.
English: The object which Thorvildsen thought was a whip may, on the basis of other archaeological finds and depictions of similar pieces, be better interpreted as a staff used as a symbol of power and worth.

Danish: Foreningen er repræsenteret i museets bestyrelse, men er organiseret som en forening uafhængig af denne.
English: The objective of the association is to support the work of the museum and to promote its development.

Danish: Rejsens mål var at skaffe det byzantinske kejserrige allierede til kampen mod muslimske pirater, som havde erobret Kreta.
English: The objective of the journey was to gain allies in the Byzantine Empire's fight against Muslim pirates who had invaded Crete.

Danish: Rejsens mål var at skaffe det byzantinske kejserrige allierede til kampen mod muslimske pirater, som havde erobret Kreta.
English: The objective of the journey was to gain allies in the Byzantine Empire’s fight against Muslim pirates who had invaded Crete.

Danish: Genstande i tidskapslen er både Irske og Danske, og de afspejler både det lokale og det nationale.
English: The objects in the time capsule are both Irish and Danish and they reflect both local and national culture.

Danish: Tidskapslens genstande er indpakket og konserveret af John Gillis, Trinity College Dublin, Anette Hjelm Petersen, Nationalmuseets Bevaringsafdeling og Jimmy Larsen, Sea Safety A/S.
English: The objects in the time capsule have been packed and preserved by John Gillis, Trinity College Dublin, Anette Hjelm Petersen, the National Museum of Denmark and Jimmy Larsen, Sea Safety A/S.

Danish: Genstandene i tidskapslen giver et her og nu billede af det 21. århundrede.
English: The objects in the time capsule provide a here-and-now image of the 21st century.

Danish: Genstandene i tidskapslen giver et her og nu billede af det 21. århundrede og indholdet er Vikingeskibsmuseets bud på en beskrivelse af dansk-irsk kulturhistorie.
English: The objects in the time capsule were selected so as to provide a ‘here-and-now' impression of the 21st century and the contents represent the Viking Ship Museum's description of Danish-Irish cultural history.

Danish: Anledningen er Stormanden som er vendt hjem fra veloverstået togt og derfor inviterer til et brag af en fest.
English: The occasion is the Chieftain who has returned home from a successful voyage and so he is inviting everyone to an enormous feast.

Danish: Havskibet har kunnet sejle overalt i Nordsøen og Østersøen samt på Nordatlanten.
English: The ocean-going trader could have sailed all over the North Sea and the Baltic as well as in the North Atlantic.

Danish: Tilbuddet til publikum om at komme ud på Fjorden i en af museets mange både, trak mange gæster til, og helt frem til udgangen af september sejlede bådene ud af museumshavnen på hverdage og i weekender.
English: The offer to the public to sail on the fjord on one of the museum's many boats attracted many visitors and the boats sailed out onto the fjord on weekdays and at weekends until right up to the end of September

Danish: Det officielle Irland
English: The official Ireland

Danish: Den officielle sygedagbog er fortrolig.
English: The official nurse's log is confidential.

Danish: Den gamle båd er både smuk og velsejlende, så vi bygger den nye båd efter opmålinger af den gamle åledrivkvase.
English: The old boat is both beautiful and sails well, so we built the new boat based on the measurements of an old eel drifter.

Danish: Ved prøvesejladserne knyttedes an til den gamle kinesiske tradition for sejlads med 'dragebåde', der er genoplivet som en moderne konkurrencesport i lette både med en bemanding som i Hjortspringbåden.
English: The old Chinese tradition for dragon-boat races, revived as a modern competitive sport with light boats manned in a similar way as the Hjortspring boat, provided a starting point for the trials.

Danish: Ved prøvesejladserne knyttedes an til den gamle kinesiske tradition for sejlads med ’dragebåde’, der er genoplivet som en moderne konkurrencesport i lette både med en bemanding som i Hjortspringbåden.
English: The old Chinese tradition for dragon-boat races, revived as a modern competitive sport with light boats manned in a similar way as the Hjortspring boat, provided a starting point for the trials.

Danish: De gamle færøbåde, som er bevaret, har særlige træk: Stævne, kølbord, halse og halsblade, som kan siges at være særegne for Færøbåden og opstået på grund af manglende tilgang til de bedste materialer.
English: The old Faroe boats that have survived have some particular traits: the stems, garboards and hood end system can been said to be peculiar to the Faroe boat and have arisen as a result of a lack of access to the best materials.

Danish: De gamle kølbord blev halveret og et nyt kølbord blev klinket på og spigret på den gamle køl.
English: The old keel boards were cut in half and new keel boards were clinched and spiked on the old keel.

Danish: 1987-modellen pressede vandet til siderne i stedet for at lede vandet under skroget.
English: The old model pressed the water to the sides rather than guiding the flow under the hull.

Danish: Den ældste og mest almindelige dateringsmetode som er benyttet i arkæologien kaldes typologisk datering.
English: The oldest and most widely used dating method in archaeology is typological dating.

Danish: Den ældste del af museet, Vikingeskibshallen, er bygget som en montre omkring de fem vikingeskibe, fundet i Roskilde Fjord.
English: The oldest part of the Museum, the Viking Ship Hall, is constructed as a showcase around the five Viking ships, found in Roskilde Fjord.

Danish: De foreløbige undersøgelser peger på, at der er tale om en mindre vragdel fra et større fartøj.
English: The on-going investigations would suggest that it is a smaller section of a larger vessel.

Danish: Den ene type har tydelige stævnskæg for og agter, så skibet kommer til at ligne en klassisk krigsgalej fra Middelhavet.
English: The one type has obvious stem-beards fore and aft so that the ship comes to resemble a classical war-galley from the Mediterranean.

Danish: De eneste samtidige kilder vi har, er runeindskrifter på sten, pinde, smykker, mønter, våben og redskaber.
English: The only contemporary sources we have are runic inscriptions on stones, sticks, jewellery, coins, weapons and tools.

Danish: De eneste hornede hjelme, som man har fundet, stammer fra bronzealderen, altså 1300 år før vikingetiden.
English: The only horned helmets which have been found are from the Bronze Age, i.e. 1300 years before the Viking Age.

Danish: Det eneste, vi indtil videre ikke har kunnet få, er strøm.
English: The only thing we are in short of so far is power.

Danish: Den eneste måde at finde ud af det på var gennem en grundig undersøgelse af alle de bevarede dele.
English: The only way to find out was by thoroughly re-examining the exhibited remains.

Danish: Den eneste måde vi kunne finde svarene var ved at gennemgå det oprindelige materiale”, fortæller Vibeke som fungerede som leder af rekonstruktionsarbejdet i Oslo.
English: The only way we could find the answers was by reviewing the original material”, explains Vibeke, who acted as head of the reconstruction work in Oslo.

Danish: Open source delen af projektet er stadig i gang, og bådebyggerne på Vikingeskibsmuseet er i fuld sving med deres tredje rekonstruktion af Gislingebåden.
English: The open source element of the project is still on-going, as the Viking Ship Museum's boatbuilders now work on reconstructing their third version of the Gislinge Boat.

Danish: Open source delen af projektet er stadig i gang, og bådebyggerne på Vikingeskibsmuseet er i fuld sving med deres tredje rekonstruktion af Gislingebåden.
English: The open source element of the project is still on-going, as the Viking Ship Museum’s boatbuilders now work on reconstructing their third version of the Gislinge Boat.

Danish: Åbningen i midten holdes meget snæver.
English: The opening in the centre should be kept quite narrow.

Danish: Maik er færdig med sideroret.
English: The opening in the top is for the tiller.

Danish: Fri adgang til Vikingeskibsmuseet inkl. en ledsager så længe medlemskortet er gyldigt
English: The opportunity to purchase Viking Ship Museum publications and other items from the museum shop at favourable prices.

Danish: Den omvendte øvelse er lidt sværere.
English: The opposite exercise is rather more difficult.

Danish: De bestilte billeder tilsendes på cd-rom i tiff-format.
English: The ordered images are sent on CD-rom/e-mailed/transferred as Tiff-files.

Danish: Malmen skal først ristes, og bagefter bliver den knust.
English: The ore must first be roasted and then crushed.

Danish: Hærens organisation afspejles i antallet af de fundne våben af forskellige typer, idet der må tages højde for, at adskilligt er gået tabt ved tørvegravning.
English: The organisation of the invading, foreign ‘army’ is reflected in the numbers of various types of weapons found at Hjortspring, taking into account that many pieces were lost as a result of earlier peat digging.

Danish: Bayeux tapetets oprindelse er omdiskuteret.
English: The origin of the Bayeux Tapestry has been much discussed.

Danish: På den originale båd havde de åbentbart også problemer.
English: The original boat apparently also had some problems.

Danish: Den originale båd blev fundet i Norge sammen med Gokstadskibet i 1880 og haf formentlig fungeret som en slags skibsjolle for det 24 meter lange, søgående rejseskib.
English: The original boat is found in Norway together with the Gokstad ship in 1880 and it has probably been used as dinghy fot the 24 metre long, ocean going vessel.

Danish: Den originale båd er udstillet på Vikingeskibsmuseet.
English: The original boat is on display at the Viking Ship Museum.

Danish: Den originale båd blev bygget i 1902 på øen Fur, med dam midtskibs til opbevaring af levende fisk.
English: The original boat was built of pine on oak in 1902 on the island of Fur.

Danish: Den originale båd blev bygget i 1902 på øen Fur, med dam midtskibs til opbevaring af levende fisk. Sjægterne var slanke, lette og hurtige både.
English: The original boat was built of pine on oak in 1902 on the island of Fur.

Danish: Originalbåden blev fundet i 1993 ved landsbyen Gislinge i den nu inddæmmede og udtørrede Lammefjord, hvor der i vikingetiden var et vidtstrakt fjordområde.
English: The original boat was found in 1993 at Gislinge, a village that stands on the reclaimed Lammefjord, which in the Viking Age was an extensive stretch of water.

Danish: Den originale båd blev fundet i Norge sammen med Gokstadskibet i 1880 og haf formentlig fungeret som en slags skibsjolle for det 24 meter lange, søgående rejseskib.
English: The original boat was found together with the Gokstad ship in 1880 and presumably served as a kind of tender for the 24-metre oceangoing ship.

Danish: Den originale båd fandtes sammen med Gokstadskibet i 1880 og har formentlig fungeret som en slags skibsjolle for det 24 meter lange, søgående rejseskib.
English: The original boat was found together with the Gokstad ship in 1880 and presumably served as a kind of tender for the 24-metre oceangoing ship.

Danish: Båden, der lå knust ved en mægtig mands gravmæle, er omhyggeligt genskabt af bådebyggerne på Vikingeskibsmuseet i Roskilde og viser, hvordan vikingerne forstod at vælge det rigtige tømmer og udnytte træets naturlige form.
